The cut and style of the dress are great in that it shows off my shape but the ruching gives me a little extra coverage over areas Im not as confident about so I feel super confident wearing it!

As a previous reviewer stated its a bit scary when this dress shows up and there is no zipper. But have no fear (yes no fear for even the curvy girls!) this dress is SUUUUUPER stretchy.The dress itself fit like a glove and even though the dress is super stretchy the fabric and style of the dress doesn't make it look cheap and doesn't accent any flaw areas. In fact I was really impressed with how well it hid them. The only issue I had with it is the kick pleat in black was a little high cut. I think this may be because of my height too though. The dress is said to be longer length but only really comes to my knees. But quickly pinning the kick pleat solved the problem. It's a great dress for office/etc wear. I'm really happy that this and two other dresses I purchased here are the same brand. Had I known that they were I think I would have bought it and the Bright Path Dress sooner when I bought the Profesh Start Dress a couple weeks ago. I think it would be a great idea if ModCloth started listing the brands of some of the smaller/less known brands you guys sell on here. If I knew that some of the outfits/dresses/etc where similar styles/brands to ones I already purchased I would be more eager to buy them b/c I know how they usually fit. I also feel a size chart based off brand would be SUPER helpful too. :)

Vavavoom! I know my measurements are anything but ordinary; being this tall and curvy at the same time. But if your hourglass figure  is a little less extreme than mine, this dress will still do the trick. I'm always on the hunt for dresses that 'hug' me all over, and aren't fo flabby around the waist (29 inch) or pull at the hips (40 inch). Well, guess what, this dress makes it happen. It stretches as far as my hips ask it to, but bounces back wherever it finds room. Hourglass all the way. An added bonus: the fabric is thick enough to provide extra support and oompf in the bust area and boost my cleavage in all the right ways.The color is the exact same rich forest green as in the picture  combined with my ginger/strawberry hair it pops out wonderfully.Do mind that there's a split in te back, that for me ends up just  but only just  below the butt. Losing a few inches in that particular area will make this dress fit and look even better, but for now, high heels pump up the derriere just right. Now, I just need to wait for the right occasion to share my new love with the world. (I might find a change to upload a photo then!)
Nice professional dress! Great length for tall people. Soft, stretchy fabric. There is no zipper, so make sure to buy a size up!

FitList.review_summary: The dress was a great col
FitList.review_text: The dress was a great color and well made. The fit was fine. But it wasn't flattering for my figure type. The Vneck and tight sleeves made my upper body appear smaller, exaggerating my pear shaped figure in an unflattering way.

FitList.review_summary: Love it. I got it for a w
FitList.review_text: Love it. I got it for a wedding, wore it with heels, pearls, and an updo, and it was perfect. Retro and vampy without being scandalous. And so versatile that the next week I wore it with boots and a blazer to work! I'll be getting this in the pink. I like the way it fit, but if I wanted to be a little more vampy I would've gotten a medium (but then it would be more of a Friday night only dress). Also, it pills sort of fast, so wash cold or hand wash. Overall, I love it!

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! It vav
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! It vavavoomed perfectly! I wore it to work with a tan cardigan and my coworkers kept asking which big presentation I had that day. This is THE dress for the job I want. The only down side is that the stitching on the darts on the side isnt very strong. Fortunately it's strong enough to hold the darts together.

FitList.review_summary: My son bought this for me
FitList.review_text: My son bought this for me for my birthday. I love the color! At first I thought that it was going to be too tight, but I put it on and it fit perfectly! The material is stretchy and not see through at all, so you don't feel like if you have any bumps or bulges that they're going to show. I wore it with simple black heels and felt fabulous!

FitList.review_summary: I loved this dress. It hu
FitList.review_text: I loved this dress. It hugs you in all the right places. It gives you a nice classic look.
Flattering and comfortable. The color is very pretty, length is just right.

I don't have the perfect hourglass shape but am still drawn to dresses built for people who do. I am overall fairly thin but carry extra weight in lovehandles so I usually need a defined waistline/belt. HOWEVER, I gave this dress a try and the structure was firm enough that it ended up looking pretty darn good! It was fairly tight and not particularly forgiving in the back with lumps, bulges, etc. but the gathering in the front did smooth and flatter. I recommend Spanx if you don't have that perfect figure either! Very good buy, price is definitely worth it. Packs and travels well without wrinkling, and the sheen of the dress makes it appropriate for a dressy evening event.

FitList.review_summary: This dress hits all the r
FitList.review_text: This dress hits all the right places (comes to just below the knee on me) and accentuates an hour glass figure. Normally I would buy a medium but after reading the reviews I went with a small which fit perfectly

FitList.review_summary: I ordered this for a wint
FitList.review_text: I ordered this for a winter wedding after searching and searching other websites. After reading other reviews, I must agree that if you are bodyconscious this is a dress that you should order UP in. I am not a very big boned woman and decided to go with a Small. It is form fitted, lightly lined, and hugs your waist like no tomorrow:) I love this dress, classic and beautiful. I could have ordered up. Like another reviewer said, try it on with the right undergarments, the right shoes, and really give it a chance. No ZIPPER. Thank you ModCloth
Beautiful dress! Fits like a glove.

I really wanted this dress to work out, but unfortunately I had to return it. It was a beautiful color and great quality fabric. The waist gathering and fit in that area and around the hips was lovely, but it just wasn't flattering for my smaller chest.

FitList.review_summary: I LOVE this dress so much
FitList.review_text: I LOVE this dress so much  however, the small fit me a little snugly across the hips and it made the ruching lay weird. While the dress is the perfect style for an hourglass figure, I will say if you're between sizes with more hips than waist, go with the larger size. The fabric has a lot of stretch so it shouldn't hang loosely anywhere else. Would love to exchange this for a medium, but unfortunately I had to return it and will be anxiously waiting until it's back in stock!

FitList.review_summary: When I first tried this d
FitList.review_text: When I first tried this dress on, I hated it.  The part that crosses over the chest was weird to me.  Also, the folds/pleats from were resting awkwardly on me.  The next day I gave it another try and BOOM  in love.  I wore a different bra, threw on some heels and realized this might be one of the best dresses I own.  The quality is outstanding. The length is perfect. Those folds in the front hide all imperfections. I simply love this dress!

Great dress, fits nicely. I ordered the small and did have to squeeze into it a bit but that's more because of my body shape very short with broad shoulders. Luckily the fabric has a bit of stretch and it fits well once in place.

Excellent! The perfect dress for someone who is taller but still wants to show some leg! I'm 5'10 and it hits just at/below my knees. The fabric has great weight and draping, flattering on any figure. I get compliments from parents, friends, and strangers! Dresses up or down for any occasion.

This dress is really nice. When i took it out of the box my first impression was that it was too small and would never fit my waist. It fits just fine. The colour is a darker green that expected, but a really pretty shade still. The fabric is thicker than expected, but I guess bra/panty lines would show if it wasn't likie this.

This dress looks amazing! I'm a 34C, 27 waist, and 41 hips. So I'm thin, but very curvy. This dress will definitely bring out the cocacola figure on just about every body type. It hugs in all the right places, not too tight, and the material is a nice thick and comfortable cotton. There's a little stretch, so it fits true to size. I got a small, and although I could have sized up, I'm pretty happy overall with this purchase.

FitList.review_summary: Taking it out of the plas
FitList.review_text: Taking it out of the plastic bag, you have no idea of the genius you are holding in your hand.  You slip this garment over your head,and, for an instant, you are alarmed by the lack of a zipper  as you encounter a brief resistance pulling the dress over your shoulders.  And then, before you can even frown, the dress is on, caressing your body like a lover.   It is as light as air, lined only across the bodice, but substantial enough to make a slip unnecessary.   Finally, this amazing dress smoothed and in place, you turn and face your reflection in your mirror, only to beholda goddess!   Never have you looked so slender and curvaceous all at the same time and so COMFORTABLE!  You turn to look over your shoulder and see,again, a lovely sightyour tush is gorgeous.OK, so the dress fits TTS and is effortless to wear.  The neckline, which looked a little low on the Web site,  is perfect., wanting only a great locket or necklace to help set off your fabulous new dress.    The ruching across the midriff is enough to smooth away any little pouch you think you have, but adds no volume.  The length of the medium was perfect for me just covering the knee. Because the fabric may not be so durable (rayon and polyester) I am buying ANOTHER one, for when (if?) this dress starts to pill.  I can no longer live without it!!!!!!

This is my first ModCloth purchase and I am very happy with it! I was invited to a midFebruary wedding so I wanted to find a dark dress that wasn't sleeveless and when I saw this, I thought it was PERFECT.  I am average height, and not very busty and I ordered a small and it fits just right. With a padded bra, it will be even better.  My only issue is that I need to find shoes to match!  Very satisfied with my first purchase and I will be buying again :)

Gorgeous dress! I didn't even need to alter this at all in spite of my height and it fitted me like a glove. Perfect perfect fit. You won't be disappointed!The quality of the dress is a cotton / spandex blend so remember to dry it flat. I love the fact that you don't need to iron it even. As others have mentioned, just take note that the colour is nowhere near teal (IMO it's a forest green rather than emerald) but I thought the whole dress worked! One of my favourites to date! :)

FitList.review_summary: I lost weight in the last
FitList.review_text: I lost weight in the last year so this is the perfect figure flattering dress! I cant wait to wear it out. Owning outfits like this will hopefully encourage me to keep eating healthy!

I wasn't expecting the dress to be as long as it is (standing up, it's just covering my knees), but it's nicely fitted. I'm a teacher, so it is perfect on the days I might want to look a little more dressed up than usual and still be professional.

FitList.review_summary: This is the best dress I'
FitList.review_text: This is the best dress I've ever bought! I had been eyeing it for over a month and when it came back in stock I decided to get it. It is extremely figure flattering and classy with a capital C!! Great for dates but also professional attire when paired with the right accessories.  Love it!!

FitList.review_summary: This is the best dress I'
FitList.review_text: This is the best dress I've ever bought! I had been eyeing it for over a month and when it came back in stock I decided to get it. It is extremely figure flattering and classy with a capital C!! Great for dates but also professional attire when paired with the right accessories.  Love it!!

Fits snugly.  The fabric is very similar to Stop Staring's bengaline, but just a little thinner and stretchier.  Probably too tight to wear to work without a blazer, but great coverage up top and just long enough.

This dress is great! The fabric is very soft and cozy. The cut is very figure hugging and flattering. The gathered fabric accentuates my curves (waist/hips) in a great way, and forgives the curves I don't have at the top. The color is a lot darker and greener than I had expected. As another reviewer said, I would probably call it emerald rather than teal, but I still love it. Party, wedding, work  this dress will go anywhere with me!
I absolutely adored this dress! I wore it for my Christmas dress and got nothing but compliments. It is closer to an emerald green rather than a teal, which I liked better.

FitList.review_summary: I am always wary of shopp
FitList.review_text: I am always wary of shopping online but the size small fit me perfectly! This dress is perfect for work and could be dressed up for going out after. I'm 5'4 and it hits right about the knee on me. The colour is nice but not exactly a bright teal as I was expecting, more of a jewel tone. Great quality and the gathered waist hides belly rolls and is very flattering.

FitList.review_summary: I had my eye on this dres
FitList.review_text: I had my eye on this dress for awhile in the Magenta color and when Modcloth offered this in green I jumped at the chance. I kind of like the fact that there's no zipper on this dress because it keeps it from puckering like some other ones do.  The ruching does a pretty good job of smoothing bumps but I'm definitely gonna have to be careful about undergarment selection with this.  Also, this dress is form fitting (especially in the hips area for you ladies with bigger ones like me) so if you want it to be a little looser, I might size up.  The quality of the fabric is good and the length is perfect for taller girls.  Love it!

I wanted to fit in this dress so bad so I made sure to order a 3x thinking it'd be perfect but the dimensions just weren't right for me. If the material had more givemaybe it would work for more people, but the waist is super narrow and the bosom area is super generous, and the fabric is stiff, not soft, and kinda feels like a uniform. This dress is forlornly sitting in my closet waiting for me to either lose weight or give it to someone who can fit it better.

FitList.review_summary: Super cute, but WAYYYYYY tight in bust!
FitList.review_text: I'm 5'6, 140lbs, usually wear a size medium in Modcloth dresses. In seriously smallchested (36AA), and this dress in a medium was pulling apart at the buttons a LOT. Additionally, the shoulders were really, really tight. The rest of the dress fit like a dream, though, and it was really cute. I know if I sized up, the waist would be way too big. Such a bummer.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! It rem
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! It reminds me of Minnie Mouse. The waist is a little tight, but it's great
Good material. A bit snigger than I like. Fits though!

FitList.review_summary: Material is on the thin s
FitList.review_text: Material is on the thin side. The stitching is a little sloppy. The facing inside the buttons was done inside out so you see the wrong side of the fabric. I checked the photos that people posted and it's inconsistent, some are done properly and some aren't. I get that it's a lower price point but a little quality control on the manufacturers part would be nice. Cute dress but not well made.
The material is cheap and a bit boxy. Unsure if I would have bought it for this price had I known the material quality. However, I kept the dress. It is super cute even if it's a bit boxy.

FitList.review_summary: This dress is cute, but I
FitList.review_text: This dress is cute, but I will need to move the buttons over a little bit, because it pulls at the chest.  Otherwise the dress fits like a dream.  Do not care for the belt that comes with though.  With an actual belt this dress is fun and exactly what I wanted.

This dress turned out so much better than I expected. I've always admired the clothes on Modcloth but have never felt comfortable with online shopping. Because of the Black Friday sale, though, I was able to get this on sale and I'm so glad I did. The size is perfect and the material is comfortable and light. I can't wait to wear it out.
Didn't like this fabric that well.
Pretty dress. Material is a little thin

FitList.review_summary: Love this dress, I also o
FitList.review_text: Love this dress, I also own it in the blue polka dots. The quality is good, but not fantastic, however I have gotten a lot of wear out of both. Really cute with a white cardigan.
Great quality. Have to wear spanks with it to hide tummy rolls.
Great dress but better with an elastic white belt
Very cute. Slightly thinner material than I anticipated and wrinkles easily.
Cute fit for hourglass girls
Lovely dress, but definitely not for someone with large boobs (32DD), the chest is super tight.
great dress, the material is a bit thin,  and runs a bit small in the bust.

#Review ContestAlthough this dress is really cute and has that vintage look, it runs really long. It is a long tea length, and just didn't look right. It fit really well every where else. The fabric had a slight stretch to it which is nice when you have buttons that go over the chest area
I absolutely loved this dress! It's so flattering and so cute. It has some spandex, what makes it very comfortable and adaptable to different shapes of bodies.

This dress is very cute, but very short in the bodice.  The sash (which, as other reviewers have said, is pretty flimsy) hits me halfway between the underbust and my true waist.  It looks better without it, so I will just remove the beltloops and be happy.

FitList.review_summary: This dress was so small I
FitList.review_text: This dress was so small I thought the wrong size must have been sent. As such, I had to return it.

I'm 5'8 and usually wear the 1X. This was a 2X and too small. But I usually pick fit and flare dresses as they flatter me the most so that's probably why it didn't work out for me. This had a ton of potential but I ended up taking it back.
This dress makes me smile with every wear.
Love this dress!!! Every time I wear it I get a lot of compliments.
I've received compliments every time I wear this one! Quality is good, a little below the knee for me but still looks good.

I was really pleased with this dress! The color is true red. The belted waist is higher than I like, but i leave it off and it's so cute! It's perfect for my teacher wardrobe and will get a lot of use.
It's a nice dress. Sleeves do restrict your arms. I go back and forth deciding if it's a tad costumey though

FitList.review_summary: I wanted to love this dre
FitList.review_text: I wanted to love this dress SO badly  it's adorable! However, while it did fit, it just didn't look good with my broader shoulders and DD chest. I think for smaller girls, it must be darling.
Fit so perfectly! I'm tall and pretty big and it exceeded my expectations. Truly worth it
Not for the large breasted

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress, it is
FitList.review_text: I love this dress, it is a little tight on the bust, mainly because the buttons are so poorly sewn. It feels like they will bust any time. I'm going to sew them on again. However, the dress is gorgeous and retro chic.Judy  Denmark
The dress runs small and is tight in all the wrong places. I also found the fabric to be cheap and flimsy. I wouldn't recommend purchasing it.
The dress runs small and is tight in all the wrong places. I also found the fabric to be cheap and flimsy. I wouldn't recommend purchasing it.

This dress was cute, but the zipper hurt my armpit! The quality just didn't seem to be there for little details like that. The fit was good, if slightly small in the bust, to jab the dang zipper into my tender tickly spots. Back it went, but I still think about buying it and redoing the zipper.
It looks great! Fits well across my waist and hips but a little tight across the boobs. I may need to wear a compression bra. Lots of compliments! Great dress!
Love, love, LOVE this dress. I have gotten so many compliments on it. Other than the bottom button tending to come undone (easily fixed with a small safety pin) this dress is PERFECT.
Size up

The bust is smaller than I anticipated but with a well placed safety pin I was fine all day. It is a great dress for school. I'm on my feat teaching all day and the fabric doesn't tug or get uncomfortable at all.

I loooovee this dress! It fits like a glove and flatters my pair shaped body. The length is perfect and accentuates my waist in the right place! With that said, I warn bustier women with the sizing. I'm on the smaller side when it comes to my chest 32D or 34C and the dress fits a big snug. If your chest is any bit larger than mine I would suggest an L or sizing up from your regular size.

FitList.review_summary: I sized up and it still i
FitList.review_text: I sized up and it still is easy too tight in the stomach area.

I got this dress because I have the polka dot black one and I love it so much!The fit is great and I love the length. I'm only 5'2 so it hits me right at the knee. The top is a smidge tight when I wear a super  pushup bra... But it's not noticeable. The only thing I don't like is the ribbon belt... I can't tie a pretty bow to save my life! I'll probably replace it with a white belt and a pretty buckle.

FitList.review_summary: Love this dress! I have b
FitList.review_text: Love this dress! I have been eyeing it for months, and decided to grab it with a coupon code. It fits perfectly! I love everything about this dress!
Fits well, very comfortable, downright adorbs. Only wish there was an XL size ... I'm in between the L and 1x, so I got the 1x to be safe and it's a little loose

I purchased this dress for our blossoming twelve year old daughter. She loves this dress! The fit is a bit snug around her chest, but it's nothing that a thin cami can't fix. The length is perfectly modest and the pattern is so much fun!

This dress is perfect for when I want to look like I stepped out of a vintage era.  I wore this for Valentine's Day, and it was a hit!  It's comfortable, long enough for tall girls, and looks flattering on lots of body types.
the dress looked fine. I'm just not a fan of the material used to make it.

FitList.review_summary: I really wanted to like t
FitList.review_text: I really wanted to like this but the fabric feels like paper, very thin and a bit stiff. I'm returning it. Super cute design though  make this in a nicer quality fabric and I'm all in.

FitList.review_summary: I think this dress is ver
FitList.review_text: I think this dress is very flattering and the color is pretty also.  I am not a big fan of red because I think it is a very flashy color, but this one is pretty without being look at me!  The only issue I have with it is that while the cap sleeves are super cute, it does restrict arm movement.  Therefore, this dress is now date dress, not something I can wear to work.

FitList.review_summary: tight in the bust. I won'
FitList.review_text: tight in the bust. I won't be able to wear it buttoned. It's also very thin material. I expected a bit more quality for the price.

FitList.review_summary: Thin dress but not see th
FitList.review_text: Thin dress but not see through. As you can see in other photos, the white cloth sash gets a little saggy  could probably benefit from starch or using a different felt for a less retro vibe. My husband, son, friends and even the guy at the pet food store all spontaneously complimented me. I love the height of the shoulders, coverage without making arms look too big. I tried the 2x and it was just a little too snug for my busty girl body  the 3x was good for work

FitList.review_summary: I'm a 38 D/DD and I could
FitList.review_text: I'm a 38 D/DD and I couldn't button it. The rest fit fine. Story of my life. :/I tried a 1x and found it too large everywhere else.

My absolutely only complaint about this perfectly adorable dress is that the bust seems to be a bit tight. This pulls on the buttons and they often come undone. All of them. I don't have a large bust and wear bras with little padding.. It would almost be worth going up another size just for the measurement around the chest. Even though everything else fit perfectly!
Although this dress is a little on the short side, it's adorable and has a very flattering shape. It does seem to run a little bit small, especially in the arms.
I'm disappointed that it's too tight in the bust and shoulders. I gave it to my sister who's usually a small. But at least it looks cute on her.
Lovely dress. It's a bit tight around the bust for me but you can wear it with the buttons undone and wear something underneath
Love it!

FitList.review_summary: A little tight in the arm
FitList.review_text: A little tight in the arms and it doesn't seem to be the most high quality material but it's pretty cute overall. Big busted girls may want to go up a size
Very cute and comfy, and it's hard not to feel pretty damn sassy while wearing it!  I liked this dress so much, I bought it in a second color.
Poor quality fabric, tight in the chest, and not as a line as you think it will be. My husband says it looks good, but I feel awkward in it
kind of thin material, but I love it!

FitList.review_summary: love the dress but ran bi
FitList.review_text: love the dress but ran big ill have it taken in and very long even with a petticoat under it

FitList.review_summary: A little thin, but good f
FitList.review_text: A little thin, but good for summer.  and tight in the chest, but I liked it unbuttoned with a Cami underneath, so it worked!
The material is pretty cheap and thin, but I guess I should have expected that for the price. Wear a slip and it's fine.
Love this dress! It does fit a bit tight across the chest.

FitList.review_summary: I sized up and it was sti
FitList.review_text: I sized up and it was still too small! I normally am around a XL and it just didn't fit me correctly. I'm not large busted and it just looked strange.
I purchased this dress for a repeal day party. It was perfect.

I bought this dress hoping to wear it for Disneyland (like everyone else who has purchased this dress lol) and was so disappointed. It fit my chest area and  arms fine, however it was very tight across my stomach! It also had a weird, long torso type of look which I hated. I'm 52 and the dress went to about halfway down my shin. The quality of the dress is okay, kind of a starched feeling and I couldn't iron the folded lines out from being packaged.

FitList.review_summary: Got this dress for my upc
FitList.review_text: Got this dress for my upcoming Disney Cruise! It fits wonderful and I can't wait to show it off :)

FitList.review_summary: I love the style which th
FitList.review_text: I love the style which the only reason I kept it. The quality did not impress me at all.

FitList.review_summary: the dress is well made, g
FitList.review_text: the dress is well made, great product  overall,  just poorly  sized.  ive yet to wear it because it doesn't fit.  BUT...  ive had two friends  wear it and they looked great!  just didnt fit me well.  wished i had ordered it a size up.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! The on
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! The only thing j have against it is that the buttons pop open very easily. I don't consider myself a busty person, but there is a bit of gapping in between the buttons in that area, so if you're a busty girl, consider sizing up.
Cute dress but didn't fit for me

FitList.review_summary: The belt is pitiful and e
FitList.review_text: The belt is pitiful and even with sizing up I was still having problems with this gapping at the bust. It's pretty big on me everywhere else. But overall it's a cute dress.

FitList.review_summary: I picked out this dress f
FitList.review_text: I picked out this dress for a 1940s jazz concert I performed in last year. Initially I ordered a 1x, anticipating the fabric not having any stretch. But I tried it on and my boobs wouldn't fit! So I returned it and ordered a 2x, and it fit over the girls! It was a tad big on the waist, but the ribbon helped pull the look together.
Used it for vintage engagement phot shoot. Loved it !
Just lovely!

FitList.review_summary: I love the cut of this dr
FitList.review_text: I love the cut of this dress. I've worn it a number of times now, often switching out the (rather flimsy) cloth belt for a black leather belt if I want to change the look of the dress.Strangely enough, it fits perfectly in the bust for me without puckering or gaping (a common problem for me), but over the course of wearing it, the buttons have a tendency to slip out of the button holes... despite it fitting well. It seems the buttons may even be just a tad too small for the button holes.I solved this problem by stitching the placket shut so the buttons don't have to do any work. This is a super quick fix and with the side zipper, it's still easy to get on and off.This isn't the most quality dress (it isn't lined and the fabric is a little thin), but it's pretty much what I expected and overall, it's a lovely and flattering dress. I'm definitely tempted to buy the same style in other colors.

FitList.review_summary: I'm a little too busty fo
FitList.review_text: I'm a little too busty for this dress, so I had to sew on extra buttons. Other than that, it's perfect though! I wore it for my graduation

FitList.review_summary: Waist was a little big, b
FitList.review_text: Waist was a little big, but the overall fit was perfect. I didn't even need to unzip it to put it on. Perfect dress for the office and then dancing later.
Poor quality, too big

Sadly my first impression of this dress weren't great as the belt had somehow been misplaced in transit however the ModCloth support team were so amazing in helping to resolve it straight away! The bust is quite snug on me as I'm still breastfeeding my newborn but hopefully once 'things' settle I'll be able to wear it comfortably.Overall a cute dress, can't wait to wear it.

FitList.review_summary: I wore it for Halloween a
FitList.review_text: I wore it for Halloween and it was perfect! Such a cute retro dress

FitList.review_summary: fits well on my wide ribs
FitList.review_text: fits well on my wide ribs and short torso, gaps HORRIBLY on my bust but I can add a snap button, no problem. the sleeves fit well on my chubby arms and don't get particularly distorted like some puffy sleeves do. my biggest complaints are a) that shitty white belt, wtf. it's not worth even trying to iron it! and b) the fabric is basically exaggerated tissue paper and the dress doesn't even have pockets to make up for that crap. I like it, but I wouldn't buy it again.

FitList.review_text: I got a Medium and it was pretty snug in the chest and arms...my husband had to help me zip it up on the side but once that ordeal was over it is cute.

FitList.review_summary: Love this dress it is a s
FitList.review_text: Love this dress it is a staple of my wardrobe

FitList.review_summary: Great fit.  i order a lar
FitList.review_text: Great fit.  i order a large so that my waist is accommodated for.  most mediums on ModCloth are tight.  The Large is a bit loose in my shoulders and bust, but I like the loose fit, and it fits just right over my waist.  I love most everything I purchase on this site.  It is not lined and no pockets is why it only got 4 stars!
This dress is adorable!

FitList.review_summary: I am left wanting to love
FitList.review_text: I am left wanting to love this dress. I am looking for a slip to wear under it so it doesn't bunch. The fabric is cotton and it needs staic gaurd every time I wear it. Its a good fit and an ok feel. very vintage.

FitList.review_summary: the waist was a little to
FitList.review_text: the waist was a little too high up for my torso, giving me a pregnant bag lady look. the quality of material isn't great but it's still a very cute dress for casual wear.

FitList.review_summary: This dress is a great len
FitList.review_text: This dress is a great length and very comfy. Unfortunately it was extremely snug! I have several other mod cloth dresses in a 2X and usually a 3X is too big. Not the case with this dress. I sized up to a 3X as per recommendations, and the dress gaped open across the bust and pulled at the seams around the stomach. I know I'm a big girl, but even with the spandex stretch, this dress was just too tight. The armholes were perfect though and it is such a cute dress I'm sad to send it back.

This dress didn't fit me in the shoulders. I measure 16 inches across the back from shoulder to shoulder, and it was too tight (especially if I crossed my arms like I was going to give myself a hug). It fit everywhere else. I had to return it.

FitList.review_summary: I just love this dress! I
FitList.review_text: I just love this dress! I had been wanting a red dress and this one was just too cute to pass up. This was the first ModCloth dress I got, and I had been wanting to get my hands on one for approaching a year. (Not for lack of trying: I really wanted the Flavor Fave dress but they never had it in my size. I kept requesting it, but the second they got it back in, someone else bought the one XS that they brought back. When I finally ordered it, it was an oversale and I was devastated. Now it's completely out of stock. But I digress.) Anyway, this dress is wonderful. It's the perkiest cherry red and I got an insane amount of complements. Although it does wrinkle and pockets would make it even better, I LOVE that while it has sleeves, they do not come up to cover your armpits, so you can't pit it out! It hits the middle or top of my knee (so it's the perfect length) but it feels plenty long enough and the skirt won't start sneaking up to a nondress code length. Awesome dress.

FitList.review_summary: I love the Hepcat Soda Fo
FitList.review_text: I love the Hepcat Soda Fountain Dresses  strangely, the polkadotted versions run slightly bigger than the solid colors. I bought this one in L, and it was too big! Um, yay? Boo? Not sure if I'll try a M. Beautiful color and dress, though!

FitList.review_summary: It was quite small in the
FitList.review_text: It was quite small in the chest for me, but otherwise fit well and very cute.

FitList.review_summary: It is nice but the waist
FitList.review_text: It is nice but the waist is kinda bit off with me, I gave it to my sister and with her it fits perfect
I absolutely LOVE all the soda fountain dresses!  I have also the black/white polkadot, and purple.  I would buy one of every color/pattern if I could!

FitList.review_summary: It's a super cute dress a
FitList.review_text: It's a super cute dress and I get a lot of compliments.  It's also surprisingly slimming.  My only caution is that the bust can be tight but not uncomfortable.  I don't usually wear belts with dresses so I'm happy it's removeable.

Fun dress, but material is a little thin. It's also very tight in the chest. The red is also a little orangey for me. I wore it with a black cardigan and black belt for a Minnie Mouse costume and it was perfect.
I  really like this dress

I absolutely love this dress, and have it in the black with white polka dots as well. It fits wonderfully, and lays nicely over any tummy bulge while leaving enough room in the bust. The fabric isn't super high quality, but is light enough for comfortable summer wear and heavy enough to hang nicely and is not seethrough.

FitList.review_summary: Have to get this in anoth

My advice to all is read the care instructions on the label and you will have a lovely lasting dress with the correct fit. One less dot on the quality for having 'thready button holes though.But overall highly recommended.

The fabric is very lightweight but doesn't feel too cheap. It'll be great when wearing in the heat in Florida. The ribbon is very cheap but easily replaced. The length is perfect. Right at the knee! Zipper sticks a bit as well but over all very satisfied. I think I'll get a lot of wear out of it. Xmas money well spent!

FitList.review_summary: I LOVE this dress. I orde
FitList.review_text: I LOVE this dress. I ordered it on a whim that another dress wouldn't work out. Its light weight, cute, easy to wear. It is a little tight across the chest for me but I am currently nursing baby #3, so whats new? I am very curvy and this dress hits all my curves PERFECTLY. Can I have it in every color? I feel like sexy meets Mayberry... (I am 5'5 155lbs, 36DD, typically wear between a 10 and 12 depending on brand). I took pics right out of the box... I cant wait to get dressed up and wear this to my husbands military homecoming!!! Perfection!

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! The fi
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! The fit is perfect and the skirt is full. The only thing I am not crazy about is the zipper goes all the way up into the sleeve. I foresee a pinch or two in the future.

FitList.review_summary: I was on the fence about
FitList.review_text: I was on the fence about buying this dress, but it kept catching my eye whenever I visited the Mod Cloth site, so when it went on sale recently I couldn't resist anymore. I sized up and am glad I did because it definitely runs small. It's a bit snug around the bust. Despite being snug, it is flattering. It accentuates my curves and gives me a nice hourglass figure, and the red color is stunning. It was a bit longer than I hoped it would be, so I put it in the dryer on purpose and got it to shrink a couple of inches. Now it comes to about an inch below my knee, which is fine. If you want to avoid shrinking I'd suggest washing it in cold water and line drying. The only thing I really dislike about the dress is the shoulders. They're unflattering on me and make my shoulders look broader than they are. I'm also not too thrilled with the white sash that came with the dress, although I do think that this dress looks best with some sort of belt. I'll probably just replace the sash that it came with with a white ribbon of my own. All in all, it's not my favorite dress, but there's enough that I like about it that I'm determined to make it work.

I LOVE this dress!  I'm 5'6'' and 125lbs. I first ordered a small but it was too tight around the bust (and I don't have a big chest!!)  I then ordered a medium and it fits much better! I'm a 35 year old mom of three and having some identity issue but whenever I wear this dress I feel AMAZING.  I always get tons of comments on how great the dress looks.  I've even been stopped on the street several times by STRANGERS who wanted to compliment me!!!  This dress is an wonderful confidence booster!  I wear it with the sash samba belt in black, which I think makes the dress even better than the white sash (Thanks to Shanna's review for the idea)My one complain is that the dress shrunk in the wash.  The original length was very appropriate for work but now it's sort of borderline (I work in a conservative office)

FitList.review_summary: loved the dress! it was j
FitList.review_text: loved the dress! it was just a bit too long so I had to shorten it (see second picture) it is perfect for the hourglass type as it did well both in the bust and in the waist area! I also like the thickness of the fabric, yet a lining would still be desirable.
love love love this dress

FitList.review_summary: If you have a large bust
FitList.review_text: If you have a large bust you should go a size up as it's very fitted in this area. I would usually go for a med but went for a large after looking at other reviews. Length and shape of the dress was very flattering.

I probably should have just gone with a large on this one.  The only real downside to this dress is that you'll need to iron the white belt whenever you want to wear it, but that's standard with cotton ties.
Fit and looked great. Even better with a petticoat.

I was right in between 1x and 2x (I go by my hips which is my biggest measurement). So, I decided to just go the size up, even though my bust fit best in the 1x, I had some more wiggle room with my hips in the 2x. Also, this dress was extremely long (both sizes 1x and 2x on me)  about 3 inches past my knee, so I had to get that hemmed up. Haven't had an occasion for this yet, but I do plan on using it as part of Minnie Mouse costume for Halloween. (:

FitList.review_summary: I have owned this dress f
FitList.review_text: I have owned this dress for over a year and finally wore it the other day. I got so many compliments! I can't wait to buy more dresses with this cut. it's so figure flattering no matter what size you are . I'm glad I sized up to accommodate my ample bosom.
Adorable, but very tight at the bust.

FitList.review_summary: This is one of my favouri
FitList.review_text: This is one of my favourite dresses! It's cute and comfortable. I always feel like I'm more put together when wearing it. For the bigger chested people out there  it does gape a little over my bust and the buttons will probably need to be resewn at some point, but it's not noticeable.

FitList.review_summary: I wear it often! It's lai
FitList.review_text: I wear it often! It's laid back and classy all in one
Beautiful dress!

First off, yes it's very cute. And excellent quality! I love how well made it is. It is a bit tight in the chest, but that's something I deal with on the reg with button downs. I expected it anyways. It would like fine I think but I just feel too much like Minnie Mouse. Probably the silliest return reason ever! But yeah. It's reminds me exactly of Minnie Mouse. I'll have to find a nonpolka dotted one in a similar style because it is amazeballs for the figure and wonderful feeling and make.

This dress is very tight in the bust, I'm what I'd like to call a B+ in the breast department , and it barely fit over my chest , no way you could wear a bra with it , but , if not wearing a bra doesn't phase you , it's so cute and very comfortable !
Snug across the girls. Fit great everywhere else and I'm a classic hourglass. Hips a little wider than bust.

The dress looked great when I got it! Unfortunately I ordered the wrong size, the XL was huge on top! The sleeves and waist were large too, so I'm exchanging for a large. Really love this dress though! I go swing dancing about once a month and this dress will be perfect for that.

Wore this dress for family pictures at the beach with a feather fascinator and red lipstick. Got tons of compliments. Material is a little stiff but comfortable enough and importantly fit fine on my large (muscular and fat) upper arms. Belt is pretty lame, and rolled up into a thin, wrinkled string that I kept having to straighten out. I would recommend buying your own wide, ribbon sash if you like the look or some type of belt.

I enjoy this dress. Everything from the cut to the color and pattern are great. I receive many compliments whenever I wear it. The fabric seems a bit thin and I'm often concerned it may catch and tear so I do wish it was a bit thicker. I also wish the sash was a bit longer but that's a small thing. Overall I do love this dress.

The Hepcat Dresses fit exactly the same as the Soda Fountain Dresses. Keep this in mind when purchasing because you need to size up in order to get the correct size. I usually wear a Medium at modcloth and wear a Large on Soda Fountain and Hepcat dresses. Even the Large is very formfitting, almost snug. If you have larger than a Bcup bust, you might want to consider upping more. The front doesn't pucker, though if my bust were any larger, it might. The dress is adorable, though I'll never figure out how to tie the bow as nicely as in the picture.

FitList.review_summary: Love the fit of this dres
FitList.review_text: Love the fit of this dress! It's long, and the belt hits just the right spot. The fabric is good, not flimsy or see through.

FitList.review_summary: Bought this first in a sm
FitList.review_text: Bought this first in a small and it fit perfectly through the ribcage, waist and hips but was too tight to even button across the bust.....and I am not very busty.  Returned it for a medium.   It's still a little snug in the bust, but by leaving the top button undone and adding some hooks to keep the lower, buttons from coming undone, it works.  The medium is slightly loose around my waist, but ok.  I had to alter the cap sleeves by slitting them half way up and facing with wide bias tape, because I bought this dress to swing dance and the cap sleeves had so little material in them, they were restrictive....I couldn't raise my arms.  All in all, I still like the dress.  I'm surprised no one else has mentioned a problem with the sleeves being a hindrance to movement.

Very disappointed with this one. I hate to say it, but everything about this dress just felt cheap.  You would really be hard pressed to make the belt look decent at all.  The shoulders are tiny an this is not a dress for anyone with a chest at all.  If you are tiny up top and willing to get a different belt, it has potential. The color is nice.

I just had to wear a black cami under so the girls didn't fall out.
The dress looks wonderful but the bust feels a little tight. Over all: very nice

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! I'm th
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! I'm thinking about getting every color. ! I have very large thighs and a large amount of my weight is there and my knees, so shorter skirts rarely flatter me. This has the perfect length. Literally perfect. I wear the belt tied in the back to give the front a more streamlined look. If you are big busted, this will probably be really tight on you. I have a little wiggle room on the top and I'm a 44D. Material is a little stiff, but feels good and gives it structure. Beautiful dress, you will not be disappointed!

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress. it is
FitList.review_text: I love this dress. it is a little long but it is a 50s style dress so it's supposed to be.

FitList.review_summary: I ordered a this dress in
FitList.review_text: I ordered a this dress in both a L and a 1X and I had to go with L because the 1X is WAY too big! I am absolutely swimming in it. This stinks because the L fits my body, but holy boobage! I have to have the whole thing unbuttoned with a tank top underneath just to fit it over my bust. I don't mind this so much, as it's a super cute dress, but I don't think that's how it was intended to be worn. But seriously, this needs to be available in an XL!!!The material is very thin and feels cheap, making me feel that it's not quite worth the $50 price tag. If you can get it for less, I'd say go for it!

FitList.review_summary: Great fit and if you're a
FitList.review_text: Great fit and if you're a chesty gal then don't fret, this breastfeeding mom easily got all the goods in place ;).
Best dress!!! Perfect cut, great material, great lenght.
Runs small. Super cute though.
Love it!  It fits perfectly and is great material

FitList.review_summary: It was a great idea that
FitList.review_text: It was a great idea that didn't fit correctly. It was quite snug in the stomach area but fit well in the bust. Really wished it worked out better. Thicker material would be preferable. However, if there was a size larger I would have taken it. I wear a 2x size 20 normally. I sized up and alas still not working for me. This one is going back.
A bit disappointed with the fit.  more snug up top than expected.

I LOOOOOVE this dress. Wore it for practical teaching experience and the kids thought it was wonderful. I turn the bow around to tie in the back. The only thing I have with this (and my soda fountain dress) is that the zipper digs in to me. But apart from that, love it. Looks good with black leggings underneath when it gets cooler too. Sizing chart wise, I'm a 3x, but I learnt from the soda fountain dress that this size swims on me, so sized down.

The length of this dress is perfectly below the knees without being too long.  It does run small along the midsection so size up if you are in the plus size like me.  It is extremely comfy though because it has a little stretch.
I ordered this same dress in black bit this one did not fit the same in my busy area. The buttons would not stay buttoned so I may have to return it.

Lovely dress, very cute. Nice light fabric will make it excellent for spring/summer. A little tight in the bust, but nothing to return it about. I love it so much, I'll probably buy it in another colour as well!
My only complaint is that the lapel on the one side wouldn't lay completely flat. Was concerned about the underarms being tight but that was not a problem at all.

FitList.review_summary: This is a very pretty dre
FitList.review_text: This is a very pretty dress. Not as comfortable as I hoped, the size is a bit snug and I should have sized up. However I am happy with it.

this is a beautiful dress. The fabric is nice and thick and the stitching is really high quality. I'm 58 and got it in XL when I should have ordered L, so it was a bit long for me  it was a good few centimeters under my knee.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress!  I wea
FitList.review_text: I love this dress!  I wear it all the time.  My favorite part is that I can style it many ways.  I even wore it with a blue blazer and yellow heels.
So cute! Very flattering. The only issue was that since I'm so short (5'0) I had to have it hemmed. Other than that though, perfect!
So cute! Very flattering. The only issue was that since I'm so short (5'0) I had to have it hemmed. Other than that though, perfect!
Beautiful dress buy should have went 1 size bigger. Kind of tight in shoulder and bust area. A little disappointed because it's such a great dress!

FitList.review_summary: Too long! I was hoping fo
FitList.review_text: Too long! I was hoping for an above the knee look and instead I looked like a grandmother
Differs from another dress I bought, same size.  On the small size, order a size up.  Very nice otherwise.
It's perfect!

This dress is very pretty on, and flattering as all getout from the hips up. It's a little too long, hitting me at a weird height that makes my legs look a bit stumpy, but the material is such that it could easily be rehemmed with the right skills. And even though the waist seemed like it was tight, it was actually quite slimming. Overall, I'm happy with this purchase!
love it...

FitList.review_summary: It's a cute dress, but th
FitList.review_text: It's a cute dress, but the fabric feels scratchy and cheap. Also, I could barely get it to zip over my chest without even wearing a bra and it pinched my skin in the zipper. I don't know if my dress was just weirdly made, but it definitely fit like an XS or even XXS in the bust and a small everywhere else.
I love this dress.
Absolutely adorable on...very comfortable.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! I have
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! I have such a hard time finding dresses that fit, and this fits wonderfully!
This is the most adorable dress ever. It's a bit snug up top but Im used to that. I wish the belt was a little more substantial though. It's hard to get it to tie well enough to not look sloppy.
Good quality and super cute

FitList.review_summary: Love this dress. I now ha
FitList.review_text: Love this dress. I now have it in blue and red!
I love this dress!! I'm 5'3'' so m only complaint is it's a tad longer on me than I imagined but it's perfect and soo cute and flattering on!! Love it!!

FitList.review_summary: I need to have the sleeve
FitList.review_text: I need to have the sleeves removed because it is so small in my frame. It will become sleeveless already so I could use it.

I absolutely love this dress. It was everything it looks like through others pictures and what I expected from the website. It's a medium length dress and fit extremely well for sizing. The only issue I've found with it is that the button holes are just a tad too big for the buttons so they pop out while I'm wearing it which is weird because it isn't even tight in the chest. But at least it's an easy fix! Still a terrific dress and my boyfriend adores it

I love this dress *SO* much.  It is utterly perfect.  As soon as I saw it, I knew I had to wear it to Disney World, and get my photo taken with Minnie Mouse while wearing it  and I did just that.  It was super comfortable to wear around the park all day, even in the heat.My only *minor* complaint is that the buttons are small and the button holes are large... and I'm a bit chesty.  So the buttons kept popping open throughout the day.  My solution was to wear one of those CamiSecret things underneath, and it prevented me from flashing the entire world.

FitList.review_summary: I have had this dress in
FitList.review_text: I have had this dress in my wish list for a long time and finally committed. The dress is well made and the fabric is good quality and not seethru like I feared it might be. However  in person and on me  it's a lot of red dress and polka dots which tends to give people a reason to call me 'Minnie Mouse'. I was going to return it for that reason but my toddler girl loves when I wear it so here it stays :) It is a good dress and flattering on the curves.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! I am v
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! I am very broad shouldered and so I ended up having to get a size up from what I usually would. In retrospect if I wasn't so broad shouldered it would be perfect. The quality is good and then dress is adorable. I wore it for Easter and i loved it!

FitList.review_summary: This is my first order wi
FitList.review_text: This is my first order with Modcloth and I couldn't be happier. Just got this dress today and wore it five minutes after opening the box.  It is lovely! An added benefit is that the belt does not sit on the waist, but slightly raised.  Makes it more like an Empire on me, which is very flattering.  Being a lady with a full bust I did order up one size. The dress still gaps slightly mid bust and is slightly tight in the sleeve, but no so badly that I would think of returning it.  I would just keep that in mind if you are full busted. I'm thinking of getting another one now that they are on sale.
This is a beautiful dress but it runs small and I would have bought it in a size up but it wasn't available.

FitList.review_summary: I looked at all the revie
FitList.review_text: I looked at all the reviews to get an idea of size, and I settled on a medium, I'm 5.3/ 123 lb / 34D. I can agree with the other reviews the top is a little tight but to go up to a large would not have made the rest fit as perfect as it did and that bottom button does like to pop open.Dress is also nice and light weight.I has to exchange the first one at there was a hole along on of the seams, but this was done super fast and i received the new dress next day, Couldn't have been happier with the service i received.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress and fee
FitList.review_text: I love this dress and feel great in it. Very flattering cut. The zipper in mine was a little sharp on the edges, but it was an easy fix.

FitList.review_summary: a bit small in the torso.
FitList.review_text: a bit small in the torso... I had to go 2 sizes up!

I absolutely love this dress.  The quality is great.  The length and fit around the waist is great.  But the fit around the bust made my day out in this dress unnerving.  The first issue was there was a gap between the buttons which was easily remedied by a safety pin.  However as the day went on and I was moving around more the buttons would pop open.  If I got a Large the rest of  the dress would have been too big.  Just be weary if you are busty that you may have button malfunctions.
One of my favorite dresses that I love to wear all the time! It's super comfortable and flowy. I get compliments on this dress all the time.

Shorties beware! Great dress but long. Fit wonderful everywhere but the skirt on it skims mid calf. Might have to get it altered to bring it up to knee length, as mid calf is not a very flattering length on me, giving the illusion of squat and short.

FitList.review_summary: I loved this as my first
FitList.review_text: I loved this as my first order from modcloth! It fits perfectly and the length is just at the knees where i wanted it! 10/10 would recommend to all ModCloth lovers! :D

A great casual dress, especially for hot summers! A lightweight, cotton dress is exactly what you need in Texas summers. I'm planning on wearing it to a dance and I'm looking forward to looking absolutely adorable in this dress. :)
This was weirdly shaped. It is too small on top and too big on the bottom. I am pear shaped and this should have worked but it really did not.
Nice dress, smaller than I imagine so I am going to wear it with a cami to leave buttons open like in one of th e pictures
Get lots of compliments when wearing this one.
Love this dress!

FitList.review_summary: Super cute! I wish it fit
FitList.review_text: Super cute! I wish it fit better on top. I can't button it without pulling. It is adorable and light weight. The ribbon is not going to last long I need to find a better belt.

FitList.review_summary: I love love love this dre
FitList.review_text: I love love love this dress. The color is so vibrant in person. I wore this to work today and almost everyone complimented me on how fantastic it was! I paired it with the best of times heel in black, and it was a great classic look. The material is very strong and feels very durable. The length was just at my knees which was perfect. I thought that the belt might draw attention to the belly area, but it didn't look bad at all. I am now considering buying this dress in the other colors that are available too since I love it so much!
The hepcat dress is comfortable and well made. I wish it came in an XL, as the 1X is a tad big, but because of the pattern it's not easy to tell so it doesn't look too big.
Awesome dress! Looks beautiful on! It's the perfect length.
This is a great purchase. Love the cotton. Haven't washed it yet.

I was torn between 3 and 4 stars and ended up going with 4 stars! I'm normally a 2X but ordered up per the note on sizing. I tried the dress on right out of the box and initially was very upset that it was to a bit large and hung about 4 inches past my knees! I'm 5.4 and it looked frumpy! I wore it all day and I loved the way it fit my shoulders and came in at my waist! I figured I could hem it and it would look super cute! Then I washed it, cold water wash on gentle, air dry! I put it back on and was shocked that it now fit me like a glove, it had shrunk about 4 inches in length and about 23 inches everywhere else! So it now fits perfectly except the bust. I have a large bust, 40 DDE. I can button it without a problem, but the seam that is supposed to be under the bust actually comes up on my bust! It still looks fine as long as I don't wear the belt with it, but I notice it and it's annoying! I have three of these dresses and they all had/have the same issues in sizing! Now regarding the quality, I'm wearing these while nursing a baby so I am using the buttons more than normal. But the button holes are really ratty and there's lots of loose threads! I'm going to have to redo them by hand to keep them looking nice! The buttons themselves are going to be resew on as several of them are dangling and about to fall off! I've had these dresses for a few months and over all I've been pretty happy but I think these are things people should be aware of! :)

I ADORE this dress!!!! It is my first purchase from ModCloth and I am now a believer! I usually wear an XL but after reading the reviews on this dress I sized up and I am glad I did. Everything about the fit is perfect!!! Happy!!!
Runs a little small. Bought as a gift for a friend and it's a winner!

FitList.review_summary: I was looking at this dre
FitList.review_text: I was looking at this dress for quite some time now. The colour red is really great and the dress is more lovely in person. However, even though I prefer cotton dresses, this one didn't feel right below the waist. I had a feeling I was wearing an apron, it was just too stiff. Otherwise, the length (for my height) was just right (slightly above the knees) and I was sad that it wasn't a keeper. Unfortunately I had to return it.

FitList.review_summary: Over all it is very cute,
FitList.review_text: Over all it is very cute, but the zipper on the side broke right away. The teeth are very small and come apart easily. I'm gong to take it in and have a better zipper put in. You can see it on the right side of my waistline.
This dress is lightweight, and fits in all the right places.
Fabric is slightly thin good for a hot day  but women of larger size may need a foundation garment for the midriff.
The dress was soooooo small! This was actually for my mom and she said that maybe my 13 year old niece could fit in it. Sadly must return our first purchase from ModCloth.

I LOVE this dress, BUT...there's not a ton of give in the bust. I CAN get into it, but it's super snug. Everywhere else it fits wonderfully. The length is long enough for work, and I'm fairly tall. Super cute and fun. I dig it!

FitList.review_summary: It's quite a thin dress a
FitList.review_text: It's quite a thin dress and a little tight of you have a decent bust size... A lot of fun!
Love this dress! Color is bright and fits perfect

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress so much
FitList.review_text: I love this dress so much. I get so many compliments on it. I wish it were a little higher quality (there's some white cottony material that sticks out of the seams) but I love it anyway. I want to buy it in every colour. I do wish it were a tiny bit shorter, but I guess I also wish I were a tiny bit taller.

Received my 2nd try on this dress today. It fir great through the shoulders but nowhere else. I tried the 3x and it didn't work at all :(. I wear a 42DDD bra and 1820 pants and I looked like a sausage in a casing with this dress on, super disappointed :(. I've ordered 2 2x shirts from Mod and they both fit great! Not sure what the deal was with this one. Maybe its just the brand (Tropical Wear)
Very cute and youthful dress ... Gives you a happy feeling...pair it with a great belt and voila ... Ur a diva !!! :)

It fits well everywhere except the sleeves. They are a bit tight on my shoulders when I reach up, or go to give someone a hug. It is a nice dress overall though, and as long as you don't need to do a lot of reaching it should fit fine.
I was a bit disappointed when I got this dress. The material is very thin. It is very cute on though. I definitely like it

FitList.review_summary: I haven't worn this out y
FitList.review_text: I haven't worn this out yet (despite the fact that I bought it nearly a year ago). Honestly, the print is a little louder than I have had the courage to wear yet. It's much louder in person than it was online. Also, for a fitandflare dress, it doesn't really hide my belly as much as I wish it did. I might wear it to Dragon*Con as part of a Minnie Mouse costume. We will see.

FitList.review_summary: I like this dress, but mo
FitList.review_text: I like this dress, but modcloth's 3x has often been way too big on me. This one was a little too tight in the midsection so that it wasn't flattering. Not made for hips! Not super high quality fabric either. Looks a little costumey. But I will keep it around and try it on again after a few weeks of running! Wish I could return it though.

FitList.review_summary: I fell in love with this
FitList.review_text: I fell in love with this dress and finally convinced myself to buy after reading so many good reviews. I'm so glad I bought it, I look for any reason to wear it and it's easily dressed up a little bit for a bridal shower but also can be worn every day. My figure is a pear shape so fit and flare typically does very well on me and this dress and this pattern really do a heck of a job balancing me out. Fabric is a little thin (can't see through it though) and does wrinkle easily, so be prepped for some light ironing and having a shawl or cardi handy if you get cool easily, length is good on me (if a little taller than my 5'3 it may hit mid thigh).
Absolutely love the color of this dress. It was a great purchase 3

This dress was amazing. I bought it for my first dapper day at Disneyland and it was so comfortable, I didn't mind wearing it all day. The dress hit my knees and fit around my busy comfortably. The only flaw is the white belt provided. It's really thin, but does add a nice touch. Overall, I love this dress.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress for a
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress for a friend of mine and it fit him  perfectly.
I'm small breasted so it was a tad loose in my chest but an all around great buy!

These hepcat dresses make me so happy!  This is my second hepcat dress (I previously bought the green version and loved it so much I had to get the red... especially when it went on sale! It is a great find at a decent price to begin with.

FitList.review_summary: This dress was on sale fo
FitList.review_text: This dress was on sale for half off, so I snapped it up without thinking too hard about it. I'm so glad I did! After reading some of the reviews, I decided to size up to the 1X in order to avoid any issues with possible gapping in the button area. It fits perfectly, and that's saying something (it is so hard to get the chest to fit without everything else being too big). It's a lovely Aline shape, so it skims everything it needs to. It hits me right at about midcalf, and it's perfect for the office. The only small gripe I have is that the fabric is a fairly runofthemill cotton, and I was hoping for something a bit more special given the usual price point. But overall it's a lovely day dress and one I will wear to the office quite a bit.

FitList.review_summary: I have a large bust for m
FitList.review_text: I have a large bust for my size, I think and I always have the problem that if the top fits my boobs, it makes the rest of me look like I'm wearing a sack. Especially if there are buttons. I didn't size up this time, and I am OK with it I think. The top does allow for some stretch, which is helpful. The buttons are very small and turn in a little if the fabric is stretched, so the 2 middle buttons kept popping open. I could wear a small cami under the top easily, and I used a safety pin through the 2 offending buttons and that worked great. It wasn't restrictively tight anywhere, even with the button issue, and I got tons of compliments, so unless everyone was just being nice, I think it was a good buy!
Cute dress

FitList.review_summary: I love the shape of the h
FitList.review_text: I love the shape of the hepcat and soda fountain dresses. I think these dresses run small if you are more pear shaped, and use to buying a smaller size for fit and flare dresses (which is what I usually do).   The colors on this dress are very vibrant, but I'm not sure about the white belt, which feels off to me.  No matter, I have plenty of alternates in my closet!

FitList.review_summary: I had high hopes for this
FitList.review_text: I had high hopes for this dress, but alas, it didn't work out. The material is stiff and feels cheap. Maybe a good wash might have fixed it. While a medium fit me almost perfectly in every place, my chest strained the top half and the buttons undid themselves. While that's certainly not the fault of the dress (I do have a rather amole chest), I did feel that the buttons weren't sewn on well. They looks like they'd rip right off in a moment.
Reviews aren't kidding  it's more than snug, compared to other dresses purchased from ModCloth.  Still love it, and plan on keeping it!

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress so much
FitList.review_text: I love this dress so much!!  I feel so feminine. And the amount of people who comment on this dress is amazing!!!

FitList.review_summary: Love the way the dress lo
FitList.review_text: Love the way the dress looks but a little tight where it zips on the side. If you have a large rib cage this may be a bit tight.

This dress is perfect! It looks great, fits so well, and feels like good quality. The only tiny quibble I have is that the zipper is a little hard to undo by yourself since it is on the side under the arm. It can be done, but I had to do some gymnastics.

FitList.review_summary: Love this dress! I get so
FitList.review_text: Love this dress! I get so many compliments when I wear it. Perfect length and flattering in all the right places. Only thing I don't like are the buttons; they easily can slip out and pop open.. but I just use a safety pin to keep the girls in check. It's worth it!

FitList.review_summary: I am a busty gal, so it's
FitList.review_text: I am a busty gal, so it's difficult for me to find dresses that don't make me look like I'm all boob.  I tend to look for a dropped waist because that usually looks pretty flattering.  I was torn on this one when ordering it because the waist looks like it might be too high, thus making me look like all boob.  I paired it with some shape wear underneath and a plum colored cardigan with matching leggings.  It was so adorable!  The top fit my large bust with no issues.  However, don't order this if you are averse to ironing!  It needs some intense ironing after being washed.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! I wore
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! I wore it for my band's annual Valentine's Day Swing Dance.  The dress was very comfortable to move in and the fabric was breathable so I could dance the night away! Really cute dress :)

LOVE LOVE LOVE this dress.  I wore it to an outdoor wedding in July, and was very comfortable.  It breathes, it moves, and it doesn't show off your bits.  It looks sort of casual in the photo but wearing it, it felt dressy and appropriate for a wedding. The only thing I noticed was that after one wash the belt loops came unsewed so I had to stitch those back on, but otherwise I couldn't be happier.
Received this dress as a gift from my Mom and cannot be more pleased! The fit is perfect for me and I love love love it. It's super cute and fun!

FitList.review_summary: See review of Hepcat in C
FitList.review_text: See review of Hepcat in Clover.
I returned the Large cause it was too tight in the chest for the L but the 1X was too big for me. I wish there was a size in between. I love the dress, just didn't fit me right =/

Really love the dress! I ordered a S and it fits me pretty well, although I normally fit in size XS :D the dress is so pretty and perfect for Christmas! I wear a petticoat in the second picture, that's why the dress looks so puffy, haha
This is beautiful! I had to add in a white panel to the bust because I couldn't close the buttons  too busty for the dress!
Super cute but too small for me. Please make some in XL!
Absolutely love this dress. Had wanted to get it for some time. Fit great everywhere except in the bust. Returned dress.
Cute with a little stretch. Had to hem it. The bow/belt doesn't keep it's shape very well so I usually don't wear it. The arms are a little tight for me but not too uncomfortable.
Lovely dress. This fits very well a nice waist and stretchy fabric that stays crisp.
Very 50's. Classy fit and flattering.

FitList.review_summary: Love this dress! I gets l
FitList.review_text: Love this dress! I gets lots of comments on how cute it is  and occasionally comments about Minnie Mouse. :) Probably a little longer than average on my short figure, but I like it at that length. Just barely fits my boobs with a pushup bra, but a more minimizing one fits perfectly. Looks sweet with a little black cardi, leggings, and bright shoes!
Feels like cheap stiff cotton.

FitList.review_summary: Tricky one to review, I a
FitList.review_text: Tricky one to review, I am short waisted, and this dress most definitely is not. I had to take nearly two inches out of the skirt below the bust (down to the bottom of the belt loops) to make it fit. But now it fits beautifully and looks fab. This is a constant problem for short waisted women  I wish styles were clearer on the shoulder to waist measurement!

Love the dress! Material thinner than I thought and a bit wider around the hips but belt pulls that in. Seam is a Straight line from bottom to armpit in case I decide to take it in. Length to knee. Worth it.

FitList.review_summary: I had to return this dres
FitList.review_text: I had to return this dress after my husband bought it for my birthday. One of the cutest dresses of all time , but the cap sleeves have no stretch! Unless you plan to only keep your arms pinned to your sides, this dress is not for you. Very disappointing and brought down my quality rating significantly.
I love this dress!! Super cute! Down side is I am a kindergarten teacher and this is a bit short for my liking...

FitList.review_summary: Good for big butts! I'm g
FitList.review_text: Good for big butts! I'm glad I sized up. I usually wear L in dresses. I got the 1X and it fits perfectly  not too tight.The cut is gorgeous and so is the pattern.

FitList.review_summary: LOVE this dress it is so
FitList.review_text: LOVE this dress it is so cute.  Just buy it seriously it's perfect #forgoodmeasure

FitList.review_summary: This was my very first Mo
FitList.review_text: This was my very first ModCloth purchase and I had high expectations. This dress absolutely delivered! The cap sleeves were a little snug around my arms but everything else fit perfectly! I wore it swing dancing this past weekend and received so many compliments! New favorite dress!

I've owned the Black Licorice one for ages it was my first ModCloth purchase, and it's kind of become my good luck outfit for when I know I need something easy, classic, and fabulous. When I saw it came in RED now, I had to buy it... and I don't regret it one bit. Love it just as much as the original... if not maybe a little more? I think the fabric of the dress and belt are better quality on this one, although maybe since it hasn't been through nearly as many washings as my black one yet. The color combo on this is precious and I feel fantastic in it. Kudos to ModCloth for another amazing dress!
This is the best fitting dress I have ever worn. Very figure flattering. Does not make my hips look too wide or my bust look too big. Very happy with it.

This dress is just swell! I'm 5'5, 145 lbs, with a 34DD bust. This dress comes down to my knees (perfect length) and fits well everywhere! It even hides my tummy! My only beef is that the buttons didn't want to stay buttonedI wasn't straining the buttons open, they just slip out of the buttonholes easily. Fixed it right up with a safety pin! This dress irons easily too. Thanks!!!!
Ordered my normal size and it fit perfectly! Love this dress!!!
Perfect with the exception of the top buttons coming undone constantly!

FitList.review_summary: I bought a size larger an
FitList.review_text: I bought a size larger and it fit well.  Very classy.

FitList.review_summary: This is one of my favorit
FitList.review_text: This is one of my favorite dresses! It is super cute and girly and I get so many compliments every time I wear it. It fits almost perfect, but if you are a little on the busty side it can be slightly tight in the chest. I know my sister, who also has (and loves) this dress wears a white camisole underneath. I don't know if sizing up would make for a better fit, because it is perfect in every other way!

FitList.review_summary: This dress is a little ti
FitList.review_text: This dress is a little tight in the bust and therefore the buttons don't want to stay buttoned, so I just wear it with a little cami under it so that is no big deal if it unbuttons.
I absolutely adore this dress! The length is perfect for me and just hits my knees. It is very flattering and comfortable.

FitList.review_summary: Love this dress! I was be
FitList.review_text: Love this dress! I was beyond delighted to receive it as a gift after wanting for what seemed like ages. It was a little hard to get the zipper up, I needed my hubby to help. I larger on top, so I worried that the buttons would 'gap' when done up, but they didn't. I've gotten so many compliments on it. The material isn't too heavy so it's great in warm weather, but with tights and a cardi it'll work in winter too.

FitList.review_summary: I love the look of this d
FitList.review_text: I love the look of this dress. The colour is great and it has nice lines. Not too short and not too long. My only complaint is that it has no give at all. I can't lift my arms up above shoulder hight. This limits my ability to wear it to work (as a kindergarten teacher I need to be able to move around more). Ordering a size up would not have helped, as the fit would not look right if it were bigger. I will save it for date nights :)

FitList.review_summary: Just a little tight in th
FitList.review_text: Just a little tight in the bust for me. I have the same dress, in the same size (M) in black, and it is even tighter in the bust. I think this particular dress varies from one to the next. Still a very pretty and a flattering fit. I wear it with a tube cami under it so I can have all the buttons open.

FitList.review_summary: I just got this dress tod
FitList.review_text: I just got this dress today and immediately tried it on. It looks adorable but the fabric feels a little stiff. That might just be because I haven't washed it yet. The length is a bit long compared to most dresses but it isn't excessive. I love that the buttons match the fabric. The cap sleeves I really like because I don't have to worry about the underarm seams irritating my skin. The white sash is also thicker material. I kind of expected the white to be stained by the dress but it wasn't and that made me even happier with it. I can easily see myself wearing this during all seasons of the year.

FitList.review_summary: This is one of my favorit
FitList.review_text: This is one of my favorite dresses now! It's a nice light material and I love the color.I originally ordered the L because I'm usually in between sizes, but opted to exchange it for the XL due to large boob problems. The XL does leave me extra room in the waist, but with a belt it looks great.

This dress is awesome!! My boyfriend got it for me in green as a surprise present. (i can't find the green version so i thought id just post the review here..) Anyway, this dress is totally out of my comfort zone but it really paid off cause it looks awesome! It's truly the only green thing in my wardrobe but it really made an impact! I wore it all day to a party and was very active in it and i felt very comfortable.
