I'm pretty small and skinny but it really helped me look more curvy especially in the bust which is a huge plus! the dress isn't lined and the belt is a little basic but so far that is all there could be to complain about. im so happy with it though!

FitList.review_summary: Just a little tight at th
FitList.review_text: Just a little tight at the shoulder area, everything else is good. I usually wear medium but had to send it back for large.

FitList.review_summary: I am absolutely in love w
FitList.review_text: I am absolutely in love with this dress! It fits me perfectly and is so light and comfortable. I live in Florida and it is perfect for summer! I live in dresses all summer long cause it's just too hot to wear pants. Anyway, this dress is adorable and flatters my curves wonderfully. I'm rather blessed in the bust area so I'm always worried about how things will fit. This dress covers the girls perfectly without me feeling like I'm going to bust out of it. I just love it so much and I got lots of compliments on it too!

FitList.review_summary: This dress is so darned c
FitList.review_text: This dress is so darned cute, I really want it to be perfect. However, the cotton is really wrinkly and it fits a little small, especially across my bust.  I'll be adding hidden snaps to keep the buttons from gaping.

I absolutely love this dress. I typically wear an 18 but mostly based on my bust size I ordered a 3x. It turns out that was a perfect decision. The dress fits just right and I don't have any gaping issues with the bustline, which was my concern. I've gotten a ton of compliments on this dress every single time I've worn it. It's so bright and cheerful and I just love it!

FitList.review_summary: I got a lot of compliment
FitList.review_text: I got a lot of compliments on this dress, especially from older ladies, which is perfect considering it's retro. Very comfy. Nice material

FitList.review_summary: I have this in black and
FitList.review_text: I have this in black and wasn't too impressed but thought what the heck... Am I ever glad I did! It's perfectly vintage, stunning and fits like a dream. Very worthy purchase.

FitList.review_summary: I love it! Can't wait to
FitList.review_text: I love it! Can't wait to wear it!

FitList.review_summary: Seems to run a but snug a
FitList.review_text: Seems to run a but snug and seems to be a little cheap with the thin stretchy fabric. However, it is cute and nice length
It's a great dress!  Fabric is on the thin side and the buttons don't stay buttoned.  Other than that I think it's super cute!

FitList.review_summary: This dress is great for h
FitList.review_text: This dress is great for hot summer days as it is thin and comfortable.  I love the style and it always brings a compliment from others when I wear it.  On the down side, I hate to iron and after I wash it it usually is required before wearing.  It is worth it though.  I love that I can wear it anywhere!
Very cute pattern and good quality but the chest just seemed to high on me. Did not fit me well so i returned it

FitList.review_summary: This is such a cute dress
FitList.review_text: This is such a cute dress!!! Word to the wise though, it does run a bit small up top. I am usually a medium in shirts and tops but this dress would not even halfway button over my bust. So busty girls size up
Great  dress !! the shoulder it juste a little bit too large  ...

I absolutely love this dress it's a little long and I'm still debating whether to have it hemmed or not.  I ordered a size up because my chest is so large and I'd rather have it fit there and take in the rest, but its just adorable.  My only issue is that it came without the white belt shown in the photo.  I completely had forgotten about the belt and assumed it didn't come with one until I came here to review.
I love this dress.
Very cute dress! The only complaint I have is that the armpits are very tight. I also bought this dress in black and white.

FitList.review_summary: I was so excited to get t
FitList.review_text: I was so excited to get this in the mail, and I was even more excited that it fit!  Seems I never have luck buying clothes online.  Anyway the fit was great.  I did have to sew the front button area bc it seemed to want to bust open, but after I did that it looked perfect and was no longer pulling across the chest.  I do like the fullness of the skirt as it hides any tummy that isn't completely flat!

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! My Fir
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! My First successful ModCloth order. It was an anniversary present from my husband for our cotton 2 year annivesary,. Everyone loved it when we went out and I heard the comments I want her dress...cute dress...she looks great in that dress...   I am going to get it shortened to above the knee and wear sexy stocking with it for a glam pin up girl look. Fit perfect fit but definitely size up. I usually wear a 1X but the 3X fit this bod perfectoooo! Sightly scratchy cotton till you wash it, cold water and hang to dry...save the dry cleaning costs.

FitList.review_summary: I wish the quality of thi
FitList.review_text: I wish the quality of this dress was better, but  I get compliments whenever I wear this all the same! A woman once stopped me on the street and told me that I looked 'wonderful.' I somehow managed to lose the white sash but I usually pair this dress with a black belt and I think I like that combination better. Please note that if you are busty like I am, I'd recommend you safetypin or sew the buttons shut to prevent any unfortunate wardrobe malfunction incidents... (speaking from personal experience.)

This dress is fabulous, and such a good deal! I got so many compliments on it all day that I wore it, and I felt so good! The length is just the length I like a dress to be  just above my knee. It was a little snug around the bust, but I was expecting that, and I don't think it was terribly noticeable. I could also wear the top open with a camisole underneath if I wanted, but I think it would be cute either way. For being one of the cheapest dresses on ModCloth, this is a great find  I might just have to order it in another color one of these days.

FitList.review_summary: this is a really cute dre
FitList.review_text: this is a really cute dress, but the material is a little light, and there was no way that zipper was going to make it up. if you are a busty girl, even if you are small on bottom, definitely size up. it's possible a medium would have worked in this dress, but I wasn't sold enough on the fabric to try it. obviously I returned this item!

I'm usually an 8 in dresses, sometimes a 10, so I bought a L. I don't consider myself busty (I'm a 36 C, but I'm as small as Cs get), but I'm fairly broad throughout the chest and shoulders, which is why I sometimes have to go up a size in dresses even if they fit everywhere else. This dress was a good length and fit through the waist, but would zip (side zipper) once it got up around my chest. I am surprised by this given the number of reviews by busty girls who were pleased to have found a dress that gave them enough room to breathe in the top. Maybe I should have gotten the 1X? The dress runs quite small, if that's the case though. I was a little disappointed in the fabric. It's thin, unlined, and just feels a little cheap to me. On the plus side, I don't think it looks cheap at all. That, combined with the fact that my newly dyed copper hair clashes with the red, was enough to convince me to return rather than exchange it

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress. Its su
FitList.review_text: I love this dress. Its super flattering and just plain adorable on. Already had it in black, and had to get it in another color.

I'm giving this three stars because even though the dress didn't work out for me, it is very cute and decent quality. The fit wasn't quite right in the waist, a little too snug. And the bust was a little to large on this for me. No issues with returning it.

FitList.review_summary: I was so excited to get t
FitList.review_text: I was so excited to get this dress and try it on, so when I opened the box I literally tore the tape off with my fingers as I walked in the house. It has a side zipper and the buttons come undone so it's easy to put on; the fabric itself is very light which at first I thought was kind of flimsy but then I was glad because it will be really comfortable in summer. Unfortunately mine had some tears in the fabric and I had to send it back :( but the bright side is (and I'm really impressed), I called customer care and they emailed me a return label right after they shipped me a replacement via 2nd day air, at no cost to me. So I will have it really soon, and I can't wait!! It fit perfectly, and I'm so happy about that, because I have a hard time finding things with buttons that actually fit throughout because I have a larger bust. I was worried that it would be too tight but it really wasn't.

FitList.review_summary: So sad this did not fit.
FitList.review_text: So sad this did not fit. Wasn't sure what size to order since this was one of 6 dresses in my first modcloth purchase. Could not even get this one zipped/buttoned. I have never worn plus sizes in my life, but I guess that is what I need. :(

FitList.review_summary: Super cute and fit very w
FitList.review_text: Super cute and fit very well.  I get tons of compliments!
Great fitting dress although buttons keep opening as the holes seem to be too large. Other than that I love it :)

FitList.review_summary: My boobs are too big for
FitList.review_text: My boobs are too big for this dress... kinda wish it came in XL

FitList.review_summary: If you have any doubts wh
FitList.review_text: If you have any doubts whatsoever, discard them.  I was a bit hesitant at first because the material seems a little... papery or uncomfortable?  I also don't really like the white ribbon belt but I have a navy/brown/white belt that I wear with it.   This dress (paired with cowboy boots, and a different belt, earned me an old fashioned super romantic, sunglass removing movie style double take by a frenchman with stunning blue eyes at the Brussels airport.  He came over to me and said something in French.  I told him I didn't understand and he said, I just wanted to say that dress goes very well.  Whenever I wear it I feel like a million bucks and so in style it hurts  also LOVE it with my Navy Toms Classics.

This dress is really cute. It fit me nicely from the waist down, but not from the waist up. The collar stuck out from behind my neck and the cap sleeves fit strangely. One of the cap sleeves was definitely not the same length as the other so the dress was slightly off at the top. The length is perfect, sitting just at the top of my knee. If the top fit nicely this dress would have been a keeper.

I was a little concerned when I ordered this dress that it might be too long for me, but the length is great. It came to my knees which is perfect for work. The overall fit is perfect. The only I would change is the sash, which scrunches up pretty easily. I may see if I can find a sturdier belt.

I love this dress.  Simple as that. I've had this dress a little over a year now, and people complement me every time I wear it! I'm 5'8 and it hits me at the knee, so it's a perfect length for work or play.

FitList.review_summary: I was so excited to try o
FitList.review_text: I was so excited to try on this dress, but once I got it on, it was so snug that I didn't have room to move, let alone sit.  Very pretty dress, but for someone who normally wears a 20/22, this wasn't the dress for me.  Sadly, I am returning it.

FitList.review_summary: Love this dress but the r
FitList.review_text: Love this dress but the red was too bright for me  I prefer the black or the green version of this item.  Great fit though and flattering to boot!

This was my first purchase from ModCloth. It is in great condition. The fabric is a bit stiff out of the box but nothing a washing won't help. It was just a touch large on me in some areas but perfectly wearable. Very happy with this purchase.
Adorable! The fabric is perfect for spring and summer.

I've admired some ModCloth dresses for a while and when I saw this adorable dress, I had to have it. I am a busty gal, though with my measurements, a 2X seemed perfect. It was a little snug and gaping, but nothing I can't fix/handle. This dress is now my new favorite dress and ModCloth has a new fan!
There are some loose threads and the fabric is very thin, but it looks good
Love  the retro feel and recd many compliments

FitList.review_summary: Love the color of this dr
FitList.review_text: Love the color of this dress. The fit is good and the length is perfect. I like the sleeves and the neckline. The material is a bit thin but it is great for summer. Will have to think of some accessories to make it work in the winter.

FitList.review_summary: I love, love, love this d
FitList.review_text: I love, love, love this dress.  Received in the mail today.  Great quality fabric, vibrant color, absolutely true to size.  Loved it!  You should buy it if you're eyeing it.  :)

They really need to make this in an XL. I went with the 1X and it was way too baggy in the bust area. Reading other reviews the large will be too small for me. Cute dress but it just didn't work for me.

I absolutely LOVE this dress. It fits perfectly, and I get oodles of compliments every time I wear it. I have long legs, so dresses are usuall short on me, but this one is a marvelous just above the knee length. You won't be disappointed!
A little bigger wouldn't have hurt, but this also fits nicely.  Hits right below the knees.  I weight 173.  No waist but this dress makes it look like I have one.
Very cute. I was worried bc most structured clothes are stiff and unforgiving. This is stretchy and soft. At 5'7 it hits right below the knee.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress so much
FitList.review_text: I love this dress so much!  It fits like it was tailored for me.  It is easy to clean and doesn't wrinkle easily.  Dress it up or dress it down.  I think it would look better with a shiny, wide white belt.

Love this dress!  It was a bit short for me since I'm 5'9 but I wore it with black leggings and danced the night away!  The bust area is a bit tight, but that's just the nature of the dress.  Love that it is machine washable.

Being a classic 'pear shaped' I was really excited to get this dress with the A line. I hoped I could fit in the L and I did.  It is very flattering and it FIT which made me really happy as nothing ever seems to in regular stores.  I doesn't matter if I lose 30lbs or pile on 30  I never really fit in 'one' particular size, darn those genetic hips of mine : ).   I'd like it to be an inch or two longer  but I'm not picky and at 5'7 I cannot complain.  It fits, its a lovely dress and I have had many compliments.  If you're on the fence with it  BUY it!  It will make you happy!

FitList.review_summary: I was a little bit afraid
FitList.review_text: I was a little bit afraid about the size of this dress but I just received it and I'm in love! The size fits perfectly! The only thing is: I'm 5'2 so I find a bit long, but this is not a real problem! Thank you, ModCloth, now, I'm not afraid anymore about order more pieces of clothe!

FitList.review_summary: If you are looking for a
FitList.review_text: If you are looking for a great dress for the hot summer months this is the one! Its lightweight, has a comfortable design and is beautiful on. Its so simple but the red colour and the polka dots really make it eye catching. I got a ton of compliments at work after wearing it one Friday. I highly recommend it.

I absolutely adore this dress. It is tight in the bust, but I expected that, considering anything button up is tight across my bust. It doesn't pucker and the buttons stay buttoned, so it is manageable. It fits perfectly across my tummy and flows around my hips. I love the style, because I can wear it modestly at work, then throw on some heels and unbutton the top button for a night out on the town. It's versatile; it's rockabilly, but it's easy to add a punk flair to it. The material is perfect for summer, which is exactly what I wanted. I get tons of compliments on it. It's perfect!

FitList.review_summary: This dress is cute and co
FitList.review_text: This dress is cute and comfortable, ideal for a spring Sunday!

FitList.review_summary: Chest is a little tight s
FitList.review_text: Chest is a little tight so the buttons pull open

FitList.review_summary: I would like to say that
FitList.review_text: I would like to say that I like this cut of dress...it is very flattering to my figure. However, upon washing it the first time the red bled all over the white dots... even with a color catcher in with it...it isn't super noticeable but that's not really the point. I was expecting a better quality of garments when I found this site. I would like to see modcloth look into their suppliers and maybe ask for better construction on their garments as this is the second item that has been substandard just for me...and I can't be the only person who this has happened to.

Love this dress.  I've been struggling to find dresses that are stylish, but that I can unbutton the front for nursing purposes.  This is harder to find than you would think since most things look like prego maternity things!  Most of thing items I have found in this category will be exiting my closet once nursing is over, but this dress will definitely be part of my wardrobe from now until I wear it out!  Love it!I usually size up for length, but I just ordered my normal size, and it comes just past my knee.

Finally, a dress in this style that works for me! Given I've noted major fit differences in almost identical dresses of the same size, I was a little afraid to order. I decided to order both the 1x and 2x, and cross my fingers one of them would fit. The 1x is very slightly snug, but the bust fits great. No gapping! My daughters saw it and loved it. One said mom if you return that I'll be mad. I thought the 2x fit a little better but my daughters strongly disagreed they said it was too big. So I went with their vote and kept the 1x. I hope it doesn't shrink in the wash but if it does it will inspire me to drop those ten pounds I've been wanting to drop (cold water gentle cycle and line dry!)Mild problem the belt loops, as others have said, are a little funny. One seems to be higher than the other. If I take off that ribbon (which is not that nice looking) and replace it with a narrow belt, it's not as obvious. I'll probably get someone to adjust the belt loops for me. What others said about the collar is very true you can see the underside of the material where the collar opens as it's not faced. It's not a deal breaker but it would be good if the maker corrected that.The color is very nicea true red (not berry as some here have said). But it's not an orangey red, it's a pure red and despite being bright is not overwhelming.the price is right, the dress is made in the USA, and it looks nice. So I'm pretty happy with it.

FitList.review_summary: Love this dress! I wore t
FitList.review_text: Love this dress! I wore this for my engagement photo session and it looked great! I paired it with a white cardigan and red heels. The dress is very light and does provide a little stretch. It was comfortable to wear all day long and I got a ton of compliments on it!
This dress has great fit and just the right length.  I can't wait to wear it to work and out to a few summer festivals!
This dress is so adorable and flattering! I have had two babies so I was looking for something that would hide my tummy. It was perfect!

Absolutely adorable! The belt made my curves look fantastic, and nothing beats a bright 40'sstyle outfit. I get compliments every time I wear it! My only complaint is that a few of the buttons are sort of loose. It's not too big of an issue, but it scares me a bit when I try to button up! Eek, I'd hate to ruin such a wonderful dress!

This dress is an absolute hit, perfect fit, light cotton, exactly as expected. I did turn the ribbon around so the bow ties in the back(for a cleaner look) and strongly recommend a slip if you are wearing in it any kind of wind! In all I would highly recommend this dress if you are looking for that cute 50's style with simple flare. As an aside I do NOT buy fitted dresses online because of my measurements, my wide hips are hard to size and I am often a small on top and large for bottom so the flare skirt on this dress is perfect for me. Accentuates my waist and hides the booty. Awesome dress.

This dress was my favorite one in my modcloth package! It fits great and looks so pretty! I feel like back in the 50s wearing it! It makes me look so beautiful and I get a lot of compliments.The fit is perfect for me.

Great dress I bought this for a wedding and I was complimented on it literally all night, old men, old women, middle aged people, young guys.. seriously, everyone loved this dress (and I do too!) it's super comfortable and dressy enough that I could wear it to a wedding, but casual enough that I often put it on just for breakfast out or running errands. Great little outfit.

FitList.review_summary: I waited for this dress e
FitList.review_text: I waited for this dress eagerly, but unsure if i had the right size. It is AWESOME! I didnt find the material to be flimsy at all, and it is a bit tight around the bust, but otherwise perfect. I absolutely love it and wore it as soon as it came out of the box. SO CUTE!

FitList.review_summary: I tried this on and insta
FitList.review_text: I tried this on and instantly loved it. No tugging, no adjusting, everything fit perfectly. The hem hit right at my knees. The material is perfect for a light summer dress. I paired this dress with simple red ball stud earrings and black heels for a wedding. This is a great dress!

FitList.review_summary: I just love this dress! M
FitList.review_text: I just love this dress! My fiancee bought this for me for valentines day and it is perfect. I love everything about it, but I do have to safety pin the top of it. I have a rather large bust and the buttons tend to pop open, but other than that its a great dress, I totally recommend it! :D
Such a cute little dress. Good length as it fitted my friend of 61 very well!

I usually reserve the word love for family and friends... but here's an exception.  I love this dress.  So much so, that I got it in both Cherry and Clover.  The colors and polka dots are fabulously cheery and the fit is fantastic everywhere.  The length is perfect  I prefer things to hit at the knee.  I feel so comfortable in this dress, I wish I could wear it all the time.

This is my absolute favourite of the three dresses in my first ModCloth order! The quality of the fabric is great, the fit is perfect and the colour just pops. My 4 year old son told me immediately that it was a very pretty dress :)

This dress arrived today, so I'm not sure how well it holds up. But I am in love! This is my second ModCloth purchase and I am quickly becoming addicted to this site. I am in the process of ordering the Soda Fountain dress in ginger because I love the style so much. The length is perfect. It comes to my knees and I'm relatively tall. It's a little bit large in the waist and small in the bust, but I'm used to that. A thicker belt cinches it in perfectly. It's definitely workable, and the dress is adorable.

Good quality, fabric looks solid (but creases easily), look the same as on the picture, length at the knees for me (153 cm).Though this is not my favorite dress because the shape is not the most flattering on me, I feel confident and very 60's when I wear it !

FitList.review_summary: This dress was my first m
FitList.review_text: This dress was my first modcloth purchase and I love it.  I wore it out on the night before my wedding and I received so many compliments.

FitList.review_summary: If your looking to get th
FitList.review_text: If your looking to get this dress, go by the waist size more than anything.  My hips were bigger than the size dimension, and my bust small, but that didn't matter when wearing the dress. It fit wonderfully.You'll want to sepeerate the belt when washing other wise it may try to turn pink on you. The fabric is really light and the dress is unlined. It's a great casual dress!

FitList.review_summary: It's as if this dress was
FitList.review_text: It's as if this dress was made for me.  Fits me perfectly!  I never know if I can wear a small or medium with Modcloth, so I depend on reviews of those who include all their measurements now.  This however was my first purchase from Modcloth and I didn't know about the option of posting measurements at the time, so I took a guess and went with it.  If you have my measurements and weigh 130 lbs, you will fit this dress.This is a perfect dress for work or for weekends  very comfortable and cute.

This dress is so versatile.  I got it in the winter, so I've been wearing it without the white belt and with tights and a cardigan. It's great for work and play.  I have an hourglass/pear shape with narrow shoulders and it fits perfectly and is very flattering.  I have a feeling I'll get a lot of mileage out of this piece when the weather warms up.

FitList.review_summary: I'm pretty much a dead on
FitList.review_text: I'm pretty much a dead on 2x in most Modcloth sizes however this one just did not work. It was way to tight in the midsection and I could have lost someone in the top the fit was so large on me. I'm a ccup and there was no way I was going to fill it out. Colour is very nice and I could see this working on most girls just not me. Back to the drawing board for me!

FitList.review_summary: I am from Australia and t
FitList.review_text: I am from Australia and this is the first time buying from modcloth. I ordered a large as my measurments where middle of size large. It arrived today and I was disappointed. The style is nice but the material is very thin. The fit is very small across the bust and the waist is high.I am returning this dress and having spent $18 on delivery and it will cost me $19.60 in return postage I wont risk buying again. Very disappointed.

I loved this dress online, and nearly kept it. I always worry about buttonclosure tops as I'm busty, and I _might_ have been able to make this one work. Cap sleeves are a concern for my volleyballplayer shoulders, and these were _almost_ okay (at least not too tight, just stretched a bit). But what tipped the scale for deciding to return this dress was the instant thought of minnie mouse! when I looked in the mirror. I'm afraid the bright red of the dress paired with my black hair was just too Disney. Really cute style. If the fit hd been better, I would have just exchanged for a different color. As it was, not worth the $50 for me.

This is a great everyday dress that I have every intention of wearing as much as possible! The fit is great  a little bit snug across the bust  but I am used to that. The colour is divine  a real cherry red that is very bright and cheerful. I often find cap sleeves a bit unflattering but these are the perfect size. Super happy with this dress.
This dress is adorable! The fabric is a bit thin and stiff, but I still think it's a great dress. It covers my belly perfectly because of the cut of the dress. I would buy it in another color.

FitList.review_summary: I read a lot of reviews b
FitList.review_text: I read a lot of reviews before I bought this and was very disappointed when I tried it on.  The belt loops were very high (nowhere near my waist) and I tried tying the belt in the front and back. The length hit above my knee, which I expected as I'm tall, but another 5'8 customer had said it hit below her knee.

Very cute and flattering dress! I'm actually surprised how well the medium fit me although I could see it getting tight around the waist while sitting if I was an inch or so thicker in that area. Also I found the sleeves a bit restricting when raising my arms but its not a big deal unless you routinely give out high fives.

I have been wanting this dress for soooo long and was excited when it finally came.  I normally wear between a size 10 and 12 so I ordered the large.  The fit was almost perfect!  I feel like it is just a little tight right under my bust but it is still very comfortable.  The material is also a little thin but not see through.
This dress is super cute on the computer, but it didn't fit the way I expected. The cap sleeves were very tight and the fabric is cheap.

FitList.review_summary: This is one of the cutest
FitList.review_text: This is one of the cutest dresses I have purchased from ModCloth. I bought it to dress up as Minnie Mouse for a company costume party, pairing it with the yellow Lemonade My Day heels and the black Strolling Around tights. It fit like a dream, hitting just above the knee and cinching right at my natural waist. My only complaint is that the fabric is a bit thin, but it is not seethrough. Although I bought this dress for a costume party, I continue to wear it often and receive many compliments on it. I think I'll buy another in a different color!

FitList.review_summary: I already had the very si
FitList.review_text: I already had the very similar Soda Fountain dress in black, and it fit so well, I had to get this too. It is absolutely adorable on! I have a very large chest, but the buttons don't pull at all, and it nips in nicely to show off my small waist while hiding my belly. It comes just past my knees, which seems a little long for this style, but also makes it easier to wear. This is an extremely flattering dress for curvy girls. I can't wait to wear it, so I'm going to wear it to work next week!

FitList.review_summary: I usually sit between a s
FitList.review_text: I usually sit between a small and a medium and this time opted for the smallperfect fit! I didn't find the material to be too thin and the workmanship is what I would expect for what I paid, though I did find the zipper to be very poor (my only issue with the dress) which is why I didn't rate it perfect for quality. For anyone with a bust larger than mine I would recommend sizing up. Can't wait for spring to wear this out!

FitList.review_summary: Love this dress. I was a
FitList.review_text: Love this dress. I was a little nervous about ordering it in case the fit was bad (I live in the UK, so have to pay additional charges), but after reading a ton of reviews and all the extra info, I'm relieved to say I got a pretty much perfect fit.The colour is a really bright, very vibrant red that the picture doesn't do complete justice to. This made me a little nervous about washing it, but after a cool wash it seemed fine, with no shrinkage or damage. The only thing I will say is that the white belt, as a few others have said, does look a bit cheap, and I may swap it out for another one. Also, on a very minor note, this dress hits me just above the knee. This isn't that much of an issue, but I thought I'd mention it for anyone who's significantly taller.

adorable dress! One of my first purchases from ModCloth.  Fits really nicely, and hit right above the knee  being tall (5'8 with my height in my legs) it's hard to find dresses that are work appropriate.  This one is perfect!

FitList.review_summary: This dress is so cute. Th
FitList.review_text: This dress is so cute. The only issue I have is with quality. The fabric is thin and wrinkles easily. The color is perfect.

FitList.review_summary: This dress is great. I or
FitList.review_text: This dress is great. I ordered 2 sizes up. Although, the waist belt is in an odd place. I'm high wasted and it doesn't work. I will have to figure out how to take the belt loops off. Many compliments when I wear this. However, the quality is not really there and the buttons and seams are all fraying. Still, the price is right and I plan on ordering in other colors.

This is a fantastic summer dress, but the quality leaves a little to be desired. It's very thin and I needed to wash it several times to help soften the fabric. The length is great on me because I'm just a pinch over 6 feet, but I could see it being too long on a shorter person. I'm glad I own it, but I would run out to buy it again.
I really like this dress, the line below the bust is a bit awkward and the belt is of poor quality. But overall I am happy with the purchase!

This is my first purchase from ModCloth. I love this dress.I wore it to dance this week and felt really good in it. Very stylish for  dance.. thank you m/c cant wait for my second purchase to arrive..

I could probably do with a XS in this dress, but I love it so much that I'm gonna wear it anyway!  Most of the reviews have been by curvier ladies, and I was worried that it wouldn't suit me, but as soon as I put it on I loved it!  It hits me just above the knee, which is a good length for anyone, and the chest is a little too loose, but I can't really complain!  The colour is gorgeous too  overall, a great purchase!

FitList.review_summary: I am kneeling in the phot
FitList.review_text: I am kneeling in the photograph because I have a TINY mirror, haha. I am 5'8 and a dress size 18, this fit perfectly.This dress is quite flattering. It's not so thin that I can see through it, and it's not bulky or thick. It has just the right amount of give in the right places.  The cap sleeves are feminine and fall at just the right length, the length of the skirt is perfect as I am tall! The belt is not as stiff as it appears on the website but most certainly nothing to complain about, and can definitely be substituted easily for a different one. I strongly believe that undergarments should be taken into consideration with dresses, wear the right bra, and buy this dress!

Love, love this dress.  I feel a little too retro in it, but I still love it anyway. The cut is very flattering, the details are great, the color is perfect.  The only thing I don't love is that the cut of the sleeve opening starts to dig into the front of my shoulders by the end of the day.  Weird.  Otherwise, it's perfect!Note: I bought this at the same time as the Soda Fountain dress  they are identical  same maker, same cut, same sizing  only the color/pattern was different.

I don't usually wear bold, bright dresses like this, but I absolutely love this one! I picked medium to be safe, and it fits great. A smaller size would have been too tight in the shoulders.The fabric is lightweight but overall the quality is better than I was expecting. I'm very happy with it, and I would love to get the same dress in Licorice at some point! :)

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! It is
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! It is very girly and vintage looking. Anytime I wear it I feel like I am gorgeous. I am a busty (40DDD) girl (although it is often hidden well) and this dress is not too tight anywhere.

I've always been hesitant to buy dresses online, but when I saw this dress I had to have it!  I wear a size 14 and it fit me perfectly.  The fabric is highquality and the red is beautiful and bright.  I get so many compliments on it  I love this dress! :)

FitList.review_summary: I bought three of these d
FitList.review_text: I bought three of these dresses, one in each color and I am overall very happy with them. I think they look nice and are comfortable. I was disappointed that even in a large the front was tight. I am looking for a pretty but conservative dress and I think this will require an undershirt. Strangely the black one in the same size fits more loosely. Definitely keeping it. The color is a bright cherry red as compared to the darker, deeper red of the brick About the Artist dress that I also love. I have attached a picture of it buttoned and you can see that the buttons are working hard. And a picture of it open (sorry, no undershirt yet so it's a little PG13). Just what I was looking for! I also bought the Soda Fountain dresses but they are even tighter in the same sizes. Bummer.

I couldn't be happier with this dress. I ordered my usual Modcloth size, small, and it fit perfectly. It is super cute, and I got so many compliments. The dress would be cute with crinoline underneath, but I wore it without. I highly recommend this dress.

FitList.review_summary: This is a sweet dress it
FitList.review_text: This is a sweet dress it fits well but is a little long but that's to be expected as I'm a complete shorty.

Lovely, lovely dress. Even more so in person, If you're a chesty woman like myself I recommend wearing a bra with little to no padding. Very, Very comfortable fabric, Not too long or too short. Makes me feel very retro and goes especially well with red lipstick. Sleeves fit a bit snug, and the white belt I felt looks better with the bow in the back versus the front, however very worth the money.

FitList.review_summary: I usually wear an XL on M
FitList.review_text: I usually wear an XL on ModCloth but I took a chance on the L, and it fit quite nicely. Unfortunately, the red and white polka dots were just too overwhelming and Minnie Mouse for me. I may try again in the black or green, because the cut is rather flattering. I will need to hem it, but I am on the short side and I like my dresses to hit a few inches above the knees. This was juuuuuuust below the knee on me.

My first ever purchase from Modcloth and what a leap of faith it was.  I live in NZ and I struggle to find clothes to fit.  I am not huge but I dont have a waist.  Nothing looks feminine....until now!  This dress fit like a dream!  I ordered based on my waist  measurement thinking I may need to take in in other places...but I dont.  It fits brilliantly.I love the coolness of the fabric.  Great coming into summer.  I have had so many compliments. Just wish the belt was thicker.  My only complaint.  Otherwise this dress rocks.  I also haven't had to iron it..wash it, hang to dry and straight on to a hanger....thats my kind of dress!

FitList.review_summary: I like this dress a lot.
FitList.review_text: I like this dress a lot.  I went with a large, after a previously ordered medium was too small and I may need to take it in a little. Only complaint is that the red color bled and stained the white dots.  I'd read that in the other reviews and tried to avoid it, but it happened anyway. I still like it, but it doesn't look as crisp.
Very cute dress, both work and date appropriate.

FitList.review_summary: Much like the Soda shop d
FitList.review_text: Much like the Soda shop dress but with polka dots! Was a but large on top and the belt seemed awkwardly low. Returned it 'cause it just seemed slightly off. Pockets would be good!

I'm a size 10 top, 12 bottom (Australian sizes) and only 151cm tall. This dress was pretty perfect in every way. Except the buttons, they keep slipping lose because the button holes are too large. The waist also sits a little bit lower than my natural waist. But I love it and always get compliments when I wear it.

I was disappointed when I opened up the box... the material is cheap and costumelike. The belt wrinkles as well. However, the fit is perfect and very slimming. The sleeves can be a little awkward and puffy. I was all set to return this item but my boyfriend loved it so I have to keep it.

I order the 2X when the 1X went out of stock, thinking I could take it in (I'm a seamstress).  However, the size 2X fits pretty well.  I am large busted and very curvy but the dress is flattering, even if it is a smidge loose.  The material is nice and heavy, with a little stretch, so it flatters.  My only negative is that the opening at the front is not faced, so when it gaps at all you see the inside of the fabric.

I've been wanting this dress for about a year or so (well, it seems like it at least) and it was FINALLY on sale so I snagged it up! I was worried the L wouldn't fit me since I normally wear an XL but I ordered the L b/c I knew the 1X would be too big. I got it and omg it fits amazingly! A little bit tight around the arms but other than that its wonderful! The fabric is soft and light but it feels a a tad bit cheap. I loved the little belt, totally completed the dress! I also liked the way it was cut around the bust, very flattering!

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress in a
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress in a L and XL to try on both...it's free shipping both ways...why not? The L fit perfectly. I am between a dress size 12 and 14 (more on the 12 side). Granted, I had to keep the buttons unbuttoned (I'm a 38DD) and wore a cami underneath but I like that look anyway. This was for a Halloween costume (Minnie Mouse) so I was not afraid of a little cleavage showing. I did hem the dress as it was too long for my Halloween needs but as a 5'3 girl it originally hit right above the knees. The material is a basic cotton feel  no stretch  didn't wrinkle after wearing it all night. I would make this purchase again.

FitList.review_summary: After the success I had w
FitList.review_text: After the success I had with the Hepcat in green, I'm adding to the collection. I got this one a size smaller and wasn't disappointed  the fit around the bust and waist is now perfect but the fit over the hips is still nice and loose  I'd been worried the hips would be too tight. So, now that I've got the size just right I've bought Soda Fountain in grape (same cut, no dots) because I LOVE THIS CUT! One word of warning  do not tumble dry even on cool! I'm pretty sure this little number has gotten at least an inch shorter since its last wash, oops. Lengthwise, preshrinking it the dress sat about 2in above my knee, so is about as short as a modest 30y/o would go.
This dress is really cute and comfortable. Fits to a T without being too clingy. I'm 106 lbs, 5'3 and a Medium fits perfect.

FitList.review_summary: This is such a cute dress
FitList.review_text: This is such a cute dress!  I bought it for part of my Halloween costume but plan to keep it around for the next summer as well.  It was a little tight in my bust area (40DDD) but fit perfectly through the shoulder and waist area.

This dress is super cute...it fits like a glove with just the right amount of stretch and the hem falls at my knee which works out well for work.  Because the fabric is just a bit thinner than I expected, I do wish the dress was lined.  This is my first dress that I have kept from modcloth; I had previously ordered two dresses that ended up much shorter than what I could wear.  Overall I am very happy with this purchase and I'm considering getting the same one in licorice.

Apart from the fact that I've been told I looked like Minnie Mouse, I LOVE it. It's beautiful. It makes any figure look good. I think it is fun. I had trouble finding socks and shoes to fit with it here since it is cold here in Quebec.

I loved this dress since the first time I saw it. I have received many compliments for this dress. The red is bright and the fabric fits my body perfectly (I am 5'3'' and I weight 140 lb). The stretch of the fabric makes this dress very comfortable to move around and do for all the things I did on my sons first birthday and in a humid Florida weather. The length is below the knees, which I think it is perfect to keep a classy look. My only concern is with the fabric, ladies be careful, the fabric bleeds! Therefore, wash it by hand separately and to stop the bleeding, there are some traditional recipes online.Oh, I forgot to mention that I received a beautiful gift from ModCloth! What a nice surprise, Thank you guys!

I absolutely love this dress!  I usually wear a 16 in dresses, and even though my measurements were between the 1X and the 2X, I opted for the larger just in case.  I was very satisfied with the fit overall, but it was a tad longer than I expected.  It was also a little loose in the bust, but that was ok with me because my big boobs usually cause gaping in any top that has buttons.  I would definitely recommend this dress for the curvy girls out there.  It shows off our curves while hiding the dreaded spare tire.  I ordered this for a wedding and received many compliments...even from the bride!

FitList.review_summary: This dress is so cute I t
FitList.review_text: This dress is so cute I think I'd look even better in the black one, but I get lots of compliments whenever I wear this one.  If you like retro styles at all, then you can't beat this for the price.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress.  It wa
FitList.review_text: I love this dress.  It was my first Mod purchase, and it fit perfectly.  I have never worn a 2X in my life, but I went strictly by my measurements and ignored the mental connotations of the 2X. I can wear this dress for work because it has a sleeve and it lies below the knee.  I have a long torso and was surprised the waist sat on my natural waist  that is rare.  I washed it in cold water to get packaging wrinkles out and the red color ran like crazy.  No big deal  I washed it alone.  I hung it dry and there were no wrinkles after it dried. Overall, I am very happy with this purchase.

FitList.review_summary: This was my first order f
FitList.review_text: This was my first order from ModCloth and I LOVE it. It's going to be part of a Halloween costume, but I'm sure I will get a lot of regular wear out of it too. Looking forward to my next MC purchase.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! It's s
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! It's so classy and flattering. I only wish that there was some sort of lining fabric around the collar instead of just the inside of the polka dot print. it would make it look much sharper.

Very sweet dress. Shorter girls like me might find the dress a little bit long, but I plan to wear this to work and require at least knee length, so it's just perfect. I found the dress a tad on the big side, and might size down. I have not yet washed the dress, so we'll see. Overall, very happy!

I love this dress.  Very similar to the Soda Fountain dress but with more room up top.  However, I did have some issues with the buttons popping open but I think I might just stitch them shut. Very cute!

FitList.review_summary: I love the fit of this dr
FitList.review_text: I love the fit of this dress.  It'll be perfect for so many things.  I do feel like I need to get a nice white belt for it though so it's not quite so casual.  I want to get one in green now too!!

Be warned! The soda fountain and hepcat dresses both have sizing which washes out. This means that after about 4 washes, it shrinks. This dress and two of my soda fountain dresses are now AT LEAST 3 inches shorter than they were at first. Too short to wear to work now! The rest still fits okay but the style isn't quite right with a short skirt. *sigh* I'm disappointed. Glad I didn't leave a review earlier.
Very cute dress. It's good for the price, fit great and I got a lot of compliments!
Lots of compliments with this one! Very comfy too. Just love it and would get it in another color if I find one. Bust is a tiny bit snug, but fits well in all of the other places.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress, it's s
FitList.review_text: I love this dress, it's so pretty :) I got it yesterday, tried it on as soon as it came out of the box. It's perfect. The size is just right (all though I could fit in larger boobs here, but hey....) The material is slightly thin but this was mentioned in prior reviews so I knew this. Put a white petticoat underneath, and voila, no seethrough dress anymore.

I bought this dress about 4 months ago when I went to stay in Japan.  I love it so much, I think every photo of my trip has me wearing it!  I didn't think the fabric was too thin, as others have mentioned and have rolled it for travel without it wrinkling.  It fits perfectly and I always feel good when I'm wearing it.

Nice light fabric, was a bit big in the bust, but got it fixed!  Don't care much for the white bow, since the fabric of that it's kinda meh, Overall is a it's a very pretty girly dress!  Definitely accentuates a woman's curves!

I absolutely love this dress! I am a plus size gal and it looks amazingly delicious on me. Because of this dress I spent alot of money on this site and intend to spend alot more lol. i love the styles

This dress was wonderfully cute, but the Medium size is too small for my 36C chest. It fits great in the waist, but I can't close the buttons on the top. The fabric is thin (as other reviewers mentioned), but it doesn't look cheap and would be fantastic for summer. I worry that the large will be too big in the waist, but I won't know until I try!

FitList.review_summary: I just recieved my very f
FitList.review_text: I just recieved my very first ModCloth purchase and had to put this on just as soon as I could get the box open! I have to admit, I was wary in purchasing a dress online, since I worry so much about the fit. But the reviews of this dress from people that actually bought it (and are real girls, not super skinny, perfect shaped models) were SO helpful, that I took the plunge!I will definately be purchasing another adorable frock when payday rolls around. ^_^ Thank you fellow reviewers!!!

FitList.review_summary: I loved this dress and it
FitList.review_text: I loved this dress and it was very flattering, but the way the sleeves are made made it hard to move my arms. This is one of my pet peeves, so I couldn't sacrifice fashion for comfort on this one. Had to return it.
Great fit! It's a little sheer on the bottom for me, but easily fixed with a slip if you need it. A cute and versatile addition!

I'd been wanting this dress forever and was deeply depressed that it didn't fit when I finally got it. The waist and length were perfect but the top was an awkward fit, especially the arms. In fact, I would probably keep this dress if the arms weren't so tight. Sadly I'll be returning this dress but I look forward to using the $50 store credit towards something else! ;D

Wearing it for the first time today so I don't know how it washes, but I love the way it makes me feel. Gotten compliments about the color, the fit. Great dress. Only con I see so far: the white ribbon bunches up. Going to be looking for a better white belt.

I love the Soda Fountain and Hepcat dresses. They have a nice vintage vibe, but are reasonably priced. I have the Hepcat Dress in black and prefer it over this one. The red background with white polks dots was a bit too Minnie Mouse for me. This dress runs truetosize.

This dress fits me perfectly! Finally a dress that works for those of us with a larger bust. The length is also perfect for my 5'9'' frame and hits just above the knee. This dress can easily go from work to party plus with its cute 50's style I couldn't pass it up! First modcloth purchase of many to come.
Fits perfectly and is adorable! I recommend sizing up from a small if you're any bigger than an A cup; the top is snug.

It's such a pretty dress but I will be returning it. It fit almost perfectly. My two issues: (1) Slight puckering at the bust. This probably could have been remedied with a different bra choice on my part. However, (2) I did not like that the dress was unlined at the top. Since you can see the inside of the dress where the collar forms the vneck, the lack of lining makes the dress look cheaper than it is. It's strange because I also bought the dress in green and it has lining. Overall, a cute dress and very flattering.
This dress makes me feel like Minnie Mouse. It's so cute and retro. Pair it with a black belt and black mary janes!

Love this dress!  The quality is very good and it fits quite well.  I may have been able to swing the smaller size, but it fits perfectly in the chest and is not tight anywhere, making very comfy and cute to wear!  Being shorter, the length is more tealength on me, as most shorter dresses are, but it is really quite lovely!  Now want to order in the solid colours!
This dress fits perfectly. There is enough room for a little stretch, but it dosen't look sloppy. I love it and can't wait to wear it!

I absolutely adore this dress.  Of all of my ModCloth purchases, this is by far my favorite.  The color and pattern are stunning and the cut is extremely flattering  for my body type.  I pair this with a white cardigan and some platform sandals and it's perfect for work.  When the weather is warmer I wear it without the cardigan and it's equally adorable.  Love this dress!  Thank you ModCloth!

Very cute dress.  I'd give it 5 stars if it just had an extra little bit in the bust area  I read the reviews and it sounded like this would accommodate without straining the buttons, and it *almost* does.  Love the material, and it really is a cute dress.

FitList.review_summary: I am very happy with this
FitList.review_text: I am very happy with this product! It is perfect for work. I love the way the skirt flairs out. My only complaint is that the cap sleeves are a little tight. Not bad if you are at work, but if you are trying to swing dance and lifting your hands over your head, it's a little difficult. A beautiful dress though.

First, my apologies since I actually bought this dress in Black Licorice (currently sold out), but wanted to review this somewhere it might help others.  My main concerns for fit were the 'spare tire' right at my beltline, my manly broad shoulders which make most buttonup tops look absolutely ridiculous on me, and whether the cap sleeves would allow for mobility.   I took my measurements and opted for the 2X, even though I was on the line between the 2X and 3X.  While the waist is a little snug, it's not uncomfortably so.  I think a solid pattern would hide the 'spare tire' a little better, but overall it doesn't look bad.  I honestly couldn't have been happier with the fit in the shoulders/arms, as the top is plenty wide and the cap sleeves are not restrictive and actually hit at my shoulders.   I knew this dress was the right size when I came home from work feeling super bloated and like a burlap sack would be a better outfit to wear than my normal clothes, but the moment I put this dress on, the fit just made me feel happy and pretty.  I can't wait to wear it out!

FitList.review_summary: I saw this dress and i th
FitList.review_text: I saw this dress and i thought it was absolutely adorable. It fits absolutely perfectly; the waist hits just at my natural waist, and the length is perfect for work. I was slightly worried it might be too long; I don't like to wear dresses that go below my knee because of my height. However, it hits at just the right spot. The color is just the right shade of red, not garish or overpowering. The fit is extremely flattering in the bust area, and the rest of the dress accents the fact that I have hips while skimming over any extra pudge I might have on a given day. I absolutely love it.

FitList.review_summary: I have this dress in both
FitList.review_text: I have this dress in both black and canary yellow, and I love them both.  I loved this one too, but it also had the qualities of the other two dresses that I didn't like.  Those qualities were the fabric was thin, and the buttons appeared to want to pop open.  Despite how cute this dress is, I sent it back.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress for a
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress for a friends wedding, and it came in a week before. Me being me, I decided to try it on to make sure everything fit and fell properly. I put this dress on and WOW. I have curves I didn't know existed. I haven't worn a dress since the 5th grade and now, thanks to this website. I have the confidence to start wearing them again. The fabric is PERFECT for a summer dress, and not sheer at all. I love that the buttons are fabric covered. You can't tell very well in the phot, or at least I couldn't, but I thought they'd be plastic. This dress is just... wow....My brother, Who never compliments ANYTHING I wear, thought this dress was amazing. Paired with the dot style tights and some red flats. I am the envy of the wedding party. Expect alot of business from me!!!!
Again, this dress's underarm area was too gappy.  I don't want to have to wear a cami to make up for the flaws of the dress.  Sent it back.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! It's f
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! It's flattering and cute but covers enough to be work appropriate, at least at my office where dress is pretty casual. Only things I'd change ADD POCKETS and make it just a tiny bit longer. The length I can make work, I'll probably just have to wear tights to work for my own comfort. I'm just not sure what color, white just seems cheap or like I'm a little girl going to church, and black might be strange since the dress is red and white. Tights for Every Occasion in Ivory would have been perfect but unfortunately they're sold out in my size :(

FitList.review_summary: I just love this dress! T
FitList.review_text: I just love this dress! The fabric is thin, but structured and lays perfectly. The one thing I'm having some trouble with is keeping the buttons from gapping, but it's such a cute dress that it's worth closing the button holes with some quick hand stitches. It's just above the knee in length (I'm 5'4). Any shorter and it wouldn't work for the office. Very fun dress!

Love this dress!Hits right above the knee and fit perfectly.I'm 5'7, about 135, and it wasn't too tight in any areas except maybe under the arms (but not that bad at all). It spins well when I went dancing, and I get plenty of compliments on it. Happy with my first purchase of a modcloth dress! :)

This dress is wonderful! As my first purchase I was a little nervous about fit, but once it arrived and I tried it on I had nothing to worry about. The length, chest, arms, all fit perfectly! This is a very flattering dress, I can't wait to buy more like it. The only down side is that the material is thin and wrinkles.

ADORABLE! Fit me absolutely perfectly (the buttons do NOT strain at the bust, and it is hard for me to find a buttoned garment that doesn't do that, so I was very happy!). I like the white sash belt as a default, though I also like how it looks with a bright yellow belt and yellow heels. I highly recommend this dress!

FitList.review_summary: I LOVE this dress!! I had
FitList.review_text: I LOVE this dress!! I had been waiting for it to come back in stock so I could buy it. It fits perfectly. The cap sleeves are snug but comfortable. I'm neither busty nor broad shouldered. If my shoulders were any wider I would have needed a Medium. I am completely in love with this dress though. The vibrant color, the fit, the material are exactly what I was expecting! I am so pleased with my first Modcloth purchase and will be making more purchases!!

Not happy with this one, thank you Modcloth for having a great return policy! It's only one of the reasons I love you guys. (:Back to the dress: The color is lovely, a true red. But aside from that, I don't have much positive to say.The fabric is very thin, stiff and fragile, a common problem one runs into with vintage style dresses I've noticed. It feels like I'm wearing a cheap table cloth. This one just isn't going to hold up well over time, sorry to say...it will either fall apart in the wash or from regular use.The cap sleeves are awkwardly constructed and the sleeve holes themselves are way too large/deep.  The fitted waist makes sliding into the thing awkward, not to mention it's a neat trick not pinching your underarm in the zipper. The waist falls at a level that I can only describe as 'little girllike' ...too high to hit one's natural waist, too low for an empire waist. It made me feel like an over grown Shirley Temple.

The dress is beautiful and has that 1940s flair I was looking for. The quality is good but not great, its in line with the price paid for the dress. It is very comfortable to wear and looks great.My only complaint is that the dress is snug through the bust. I had to wear a camisole and leave the buttons undone, otherwise the buttons pull. I followed the sizing chart and fell within the bust size. I am pretty proportional and its not as though I'm huge on top. If you are bustier you might need to go up a size above what the sizing chart recommends.

FitList.review_summary: Order this dress! It is b
FitList.review_text: Order this dress! It is beautiful! I'm very tempted to order it in other colors. I switched out the bow for a skinny white leather belt. I felt to bow was cute for someone younger (teens or early 20s) but in my late 20s I need something a little more mature, hence the belt. I've washed it once, in cold water on the gentle cycle, and hung it out on the line to dry. It washed very well and needed a little ironing after it dried but that's to be expected with this type of fabric. My only caution is that the dress is a little narrow across the shoulders and might not work well for broad shouldered gals.

FitList.review_summary: I ordered this dress on a
FitList.review_text: I ordered this dress on a whim because of the cut and the color (I almost NEVER wear red). I was a little nervous about it, since ordering clothing online can go either way...it came and it is absolutely perfect!!! I love the cut and the tailoring of this dress. The only thing I would change is I would maybe have ordered a small, since it's just a tad bit loose in the upper part, but it's too cute for me to want to send back. I can't wait to wear it!

This dress is amazing. As soon as I put it on I felt pretty, feminine, and fantastic. The small is the perfect sized for my small frame. I think this is my new staple dress for everything as it can be dressed up for work and casual events and dressed down for the weekend!

FitList.review_summary: I am a short person, so I
FitList.review_text: I am a short person, so I can't blame the dress for being a little long, but I took it to the tailor and perfect!

These dresses are great! Being of the larger bust but smaller waist variety these dresses are perfect, it's usually so hard to find something that fits over the chest for me, but these are perfect.  Also being 511 sometimes dresses can be a bit short, but this is the perfect length, hitting me just at the knee, so I can easily wear to work.  Highly recommend if you have a larger bust.

This dress is beautiful. The colour is bright which I like. For this dress I was supposedly a size XL, but I've never been an XL in my life, so I bought an L, and I'm glad I did. The L fits nicely through the waist and hips with a bit of extra room included. However, girls with larger busts be warned This dress may unexpectedly burst open at innapropriate moments if you don't fasten the buttons. I wore this dress today, and if I moved the wrong way the buttons would slide out of the button holes and leave me with cleavage in full view. There was also a bit of a gaping between buttons, these aren't dress flaws, but just the result of having a large bust. I'm going to sew the button holes/front of the dress so it doesn't gape and undo, as this dress has a sidezip only the top button really needs the the ability to undo. But I do not mind at all, I've had to do a fair bit more to more expensive dresses and this dress fits beautifully and I love it otherwise. Good job!

FitList.review_summary: This dress has lived up t
FitList.review_text: This dress has lived up to the anticipation

Very vibrant dress! I got many compliments. Paired with my bright blue heels and my blue coat, it looked stunning. It's hard to find dresses that flatter at my size but this fit well, moved well, and most importantly looked great.

I really love this dress!!! Having a kind of curvy figure it's a little difficult to pull over my chest or hips (okay, so it HAS to come from over my head), then it fits really well. It pulls a little around the chest, but that's just my weird sizing I think. I don't think I would be as happy with a size larger. Also, I was a bit disappointed by the lack of lining and finishing with the seams. I had to comb over the whole dress looking for stray threads. I mean, these are the only things I can say I have a problem with. I really, really do love this dress and am so happy I could find something with such a cute vintage style for a reasonable price.

FitList.review_summary: Amazing dress. It was a g
FitList.review_text: Amazing dress. It was a great fit, felt slimming and got lots of compliments even from strangers!
Despite being a 2, I went w/ a medium on this dress and it worked out great. I can't wait to wear this to work this spring. Great purchase!

FitList.review_summary: I do believe this is my m
FitList.review_text: I do believe this is my most favorite dress I've ever purchased from Modcloth. I have a swing dance ball for which I had ordered it, and it's just so perfect for the occasion, but I'm definitely going to find as many reasons to wear this dress as possible. I'm more of a pearshaped girl than anything, but this dress accentuates my tiny waist, especially with the white (cotton) sash in the middle. I look slim everywhere, and the color really suits me. Add a splash of ruby red lipstick, some dance shoes, and you're ready to go! This would also be perfect for summer, or any season with the right accessories. I've never been happier with any Modcloth purchase as I am with this one. It fits my chest perfectly, no pulling, but not baggy. My hips are very comfortable, no pulling there, and not baggy either. A wonderful dress for girls with even the slightest bit of curves. I definitely recommend. Plus its fun to twirl in. :)

FitList.review_summary: I love love love LOVE thi
FitList.review_text: I love love love LOVE this dress!!! I got it a couple of days ago and I thought, oh man, it might be too big! But I put it on, and it fits perfectly!! It hides my icky stomach and accentuates my body in the right places!! I just absolutely love it! I can't wait for my next ModCloth purchase! :D Also, this dress goes really well with like a solid black belt instead of the ribbon.

FitList.review_summary: Well, I was looking for a
FitList.review_text: Well, I was looking for a dress to wear for my Mad Men season premiere party and boy did I find it in this!  I'm short, so I was worried about it coming too far down, but it hit just above the knee and the aline didn't make me look stumpy at all.  The sleeves are tight to your shoulders, but it didn't restrict my movement and I think they looked better that way.  The material is a little thin, but on a warm day it's just fine.  A little bit of threading around the buttons looks like it might come loose, but nothing that can't be reinforced.  I paired it with some white heels and swapped the ribbon belt (which I just couldn't tie in a nice bow) for a white leather belt of my own, then I popped the collar, undid all but the last button, and put my hair in a ponytail for a nice, 50's housewife look.  I can't wait to wear it for the show and out around town once spring weather shows up!

This dress is adorable and it got top reviews, but I was less than impressed when I got it.  It is cotten and spandex, but the material feels cheap.  Also, because of the way the cap sleeves are designed, when you raise your arms, the hem also raises.  Since I wanted to go swing dancing in this dress, that is a problem.  I have other things that are cap sleeved that don't have this problem  it's a poor design.  Sending it back.  :(

FitList.review_summary: I like the fit on this dr
FitList.review_text: I like the fit on this dress, the length is good (at the knees) but the mix of the color and polka dots make me look Minnie Mouse.. and I can't get over it.. Other than that, I love this style but I will be returning this dress but I am keeping it in black! :)

I have nothing exactly wrong to say with this dress  it just wasn't for me. The fit was good, the quality was decent  not bad at all. My major complaint was for my body, it was just overwhelming to have the big collar next to my face  it made my shoulders look really broad and my head by comparison tiny, which was just odd. So keep that in mind if you're not one to wear a lot of collared items. But i've seen this dress on others and it's lovely.  I didn't find the sleeves to fit tightly myself  all in all the fit was absolutely perfect to my measurements.

Really great color, it just pops! This is a very flattering cut, and the material is not too thick or too thin  it's right in the middle, so it can be light for warmer months and layered up for winter weather. Great dress!

FitList.review_summary: I think this has just bec
FitList.review_text: I think this has just become my favorite ModCloth purchase! This dress is exactly as pictured. The red is just as vibrant as it appears, the length is work and play appropriate, and the material is lightweight without being thin. The small fit me perfectly. It's such a girly dress, you can't help but feel beautiful in it! I think I might need this in multiple colors! I'm extremely happy with this purchase :)

I just received this dress and had to try it on immediately!  The color and print on this dress is so cute.  The material has a little give and feels good.  The dress looked really cute!  Hit above my knee a little which is very flattering.  I have more of a pear shape and this fit nicely around my hips and the cap sleeve helps balance that out too. It does fit a little snug in the shoulders, so if you are bigger through there you may want to keep that in mind when choosing your size. Quality seems fine.  May have to have a bit of altering done around the cap sleeve, but will take another look to see if the material is still popping up after it is cleaned and pressed.  If you are considering this dress, buy it and try it.  It's darling. I wear a 6  8 right now and the dress fit well on top in the medium size.

FitList.review_summary: This was my first dress I
FitList.review_text: This was my first dress I ordered from Mod Cloth and I adore it!  Fits perfectly, great fabric that has just a bit of stretch to it.  Not sure if I'm going to keep the white bow or add a  black belt but just adore it!  I am now addicted to Mod Cloth, can't wait to order my next one!

My boyfriend bought me this dress for Valentines Day and it fits perfectly and the length is just right! It washes great and is so fun to wear! I got so many compliments the day I wore it! It's an all around great dress! 3

I'd been watching to see if this dress was going to be in any colours except the black and green (I already have a similar black polkadot dress, and I don't wear green) so I was delighted when I saw this in red  I love red dresses!  I was a little unsure about getting it in a small (I can be somewhere between small and medium) but it fits perfectly and the length is great.  The only reason I didn't rate it as perfect quality is that the button holes are a little messy, with threads which catch on the buttons if you try to undo them.  It needed a good iron out of the box, but that wasn't a problem.

FitList.review_summary: I've had my eye on this i
FitList.review_text: I've had my eye on this in black for a while, and I own one of the Soda Fountain dresses (same style)...but when I saw this, I ordered it instantly!  Call it a gut instinct but I just HAD to have it.  It was that so utterly perfect, pinup, swingin' style that works so well on me (I swear I should have been born in the 40s!).  Got it today, put it on and it fits perfectly, even better than my Soda Fountain dress.  Plus, it may well be the cutest piece of clothing I own.  I knew I made a good choice ordering this, and now I'm brainstorming dozens of different places to wear it.  I purchased the Tights for Every Occasion in Ivory as well, and they style PERFECTLY with this dress.  Add a pair of black Mary Janes, and I'm good to go!
beautiful dress, might have a tiny issue with the color being too bright but it's nothing pairing with a cardigan can't fix

Unfortunately the fabric is soooo thin and wrinkly. I am very anti iron. But I ironed. I laid it down gently. And it wrinkled again before I even got it on.  Since there is no stretch, this will have to fit perfect. It's pretty large in the bust for me and slightly loose in the waist.
My only complaint is that people notice when I try to wear it every day!

I've always loved dinosaurs, so of course, I had to get the teal/navy version. The style is super cute, and the fabric does have some give to it. And it's fully lined! The only problem I found is that I had bought it as a fun thing to wear to work, but it's unfortunately a bit too short. Oh well, I love it so much that I won't return it just because of that. It'll just have to be a casual dress.

I bought this dress after my BFF bought it in the cats pattern (I got it in hearts) and I absolutely loved it on her. I was a little bit worried that it wouldn't look as nice on me because our proportions are very different  she's a little bit taller, which a bigger chest and slimmer hips  but the cut is so forgiving that it looks great on both of our figures. It's just really flattering and comfortable, cute enough to wear out and about during a regular day, but would also be easily dressed up for a date. The quality is excellent as with most Modcloth dresses. My only minor complaints are that because of the lining it's been a little bit too warm here in CA during the late summer to wear on certain days, and it's on the shorter side (for me, because I'm self conscious about my thighs). I just wear leggings with it and it's fine and still really cute. Five very happy stars for this one!
So this dress:1. Fits perfectly2. Does not require I battle a zipper in order to fit perfectly3. Is super soft.Sure, maybe I can't wear it to the office, but it's definitely now my goto casual dress.

I bought the dinosaur dress in orange and blue. I received so many compliments on the style and pattern I bought the dino in green! I'm IN LOVE with this dress. I can wear it to work or out on the town.
Perfect fit and super fun! I wore it to work and got tons of compliments

FitList.review_summary: Cute Dress, not on me, but still cute
FitList.review_text: This dress was just all kinds of bad on my short dumpy frame.  The slight puff of the sleeves only made my large chest larger, the side view made me even fuller, the elastic waist hit me in all the wrong places. I would call it a complete disaster, but it's not the dress' fault.  The dress is adorable.  Silky, fully lined, vibrant colors.  (I could see it getting very wrinkly though.)  On someone slightly taller and slimmer, it would be great.

FitList.review_summary: Love the dinos, hate the sleeves
FitList.review_text: Alas! I love the print of this dress and, based on the pictures, it seems like it looks wicked flattering on lots of body types. But the sleeves just look ridiculous on me. Nothing against the dress (which is lined, well made and comfortable)  just a poor fit.

So cute, and good length on me, but it was so tight in the chest and on the sides. It awkwardly squeezed my boobs down. It almost felt like a sports bra. I normally don't have any problems with fitting in the chest if it fits everywhere else, so I was very disappointed.

FitList.review_summary: I really think this is an
FitList.review_text: I really think this is an adorable dress. Fits perfect, length is perfect, and it is flattering to my figure. Only thing is material...very prone to static.

I own this in both the navy dino and the gummy bear print. I loved one so much I had to buy they other. They are incredibly flattering, fit comfortably, and are made of a good quality soft material. I get compliments every time I wear them!

This dress was just really baggy and unflattering in me. The fabric was also quite thick, so it didn't flow or fall very nicely. I ordered it in 2x, before I knew that 1x is generally my size for modcloth. I don't think a size down would have been enough though, this is just a bad cut for my body type. This one was a return for me.
The top fit of this is a little strange but not unflattering. It hangs on my tummy a bit in the front so I'll need to wear a shaper under but super cute and comfy!

FitList.review_summary: Soft and comfy but a bit loose.
FitList.review_text: Ok. The dress is a bit baggy on me. I think it should look finer one size down but in that case my hips would not fit in it. It's very comfortable but I just feel a bit too big in it, nothing a good cardigan couldn't fix. If you are an hourglass like me, well, you already know.At any rate I still love the print and the colour so I think I would use this dress a lot.

FitList.review_summary: I never look good in this
FitList.review_text: I never look good in this type dress. It is just a little too unstructured and I looked very messy. The feel of the fabric is nice but it is a little transparent. This would be a prefect dress for warmer weather but I returned.

FitList.review_summary: Just wish it sat more on
FitList.review_text: Just wish it sat more on my waist, the elastic is more empire. Otherwise it's super cute!

FitList.review_summary: I wanted to love this dre
FitList.review_text: I wanted to love this dress but the fit was just too strange. It was very blousy on the top and seemed to cling on the skirt bottom. I had to send it back.
The materials and colors are great. It is a silky polyester. It does have a tendency to wrinkle, but the colors and cute print are totally worth it.
Adorable, need it in more colours and patterns!
I ordered the 1X which usually fits me; however, this dress was cut to small for my body type. I had really been looking forward to wearing this dress; unfortunately, I had to return it. Cute print!

I'm usually a medium (sometimes a large) on this site due to my chest, but I am otherwise a size small. When I saw this dress, it was out of stock in every size except small, but after comparing reviews with similar sizes, I decided to go for it since this dress is too dang cute. My girls are squished and it's a little tight in the armpits, but I'm keeping it anyway, I just can't give it up!

FitList.review_summary: The bust pulls a bit tigh
FitList.review_text: The bust pulls a bit tight but it's not uncomfortable and the waist and hem are a bit higher that ideal for my body type.  Despite that's it's quite flattering. I always wear it with a belt and tights.

FitList.review_summary: How can you not love a di
FitList.review_text: How can you not love a dino dress?!
Aside from some static cling issues, this dress is the best!! I get so many compliments
These dresses are the best. Always get compliments

I love dinosaurs, so purchasing this dress was a no brained for me.  Unfortunately, as other reviewers have stated, there isn't enough room in the bust.  This dress fits perfectly everywhere else, but for some some reason it fits like a straight jacket over my bosom area.  My love for this dress has made me force the issue, and I have creatively shoved the ladies in place just to make it work.  I will likely see if I can have the dress altered so that it will fit the way it should.
So cute. Love wearing this with tights and some ballet flats to work!

I sized up, to accommodate my hips, but I'm short so the length on me gives the dress a very different shape. Still nice. Love any dress with sleeves that doesn't constrict me chest. Size down if possible.

FitList.review_summary: The arms could be a tiny
