FitList.review_text: The arms could be a tiny bit bigger. But I love this dress. It's more formal in cut and cloth than I thought it would be.
Great dress! Love to pair this with a belt for more structure. I always get lots of compliments!

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress, it is
FitList.review_text: I love this dress, it is so cute! it does fit a little big but still looks great!

The dress is good quality, lined, and l wish I could keep it but it is WAY too big!  I measured my parts and used the sizing chart as recommended, but I should have stuck with my gut and ordered the 2x instead (my usual size).  In addition to this dress, I also ordered two other dresses and a jacket, and they are ALL too big.  Now I'm stuck paying the shipping to return, as well as never getting the $20 duty back from the border.  Waste of money ordering international!  I may try to order this dress again after I'm refunded, but I'll definitely think twice about ordering anything else.Also, it's annoying getting a coupon after you've placed your order.

FitList.review_summary: Print is cute. Way too la
FitList.review_text: Print is cute. Way too large. Not sure if the dress sizes vary between people, but I went off of reviews based on my measurement (28 waist, 36D) and it fit me very differently than others.
Great dress!

I've gotten so many compliments on this dress! The shape is pretty flattering, but I like to belt it for extra contrast below the billowy top. The fabric is nice, and it's lined with a thicker fabric underneath the skirt part. It's a great length for work, and the colors are great! (It goes great with the royal blue charter school cardigan btw!)

FitList.review_summary: kind of a boring dress. n
FitList.review_text: kind of a boring dress. nothing special about the way it fit or looked. i returned it.

FitList.review_summary: I love fun design so much
FitList.review_text: I love fun design so much fun with little dinos

FitList.review_summary: I love the sleeves on thi
FitList.review_text: I love the sleeves on this dress. It's a beautiful dress and a fun pattern.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress, it loo
FitList.review_text: I love this dress, it looks cute, fits almost perfect  my only reservation in saying I love everything about this dress is that it is a bit too snug across my shoulders. Its livable, but not entirely comfortable for anything with a lot of activity, including working with kids. This could just be because I am very hourglass (in fact I have room across the waist), but I haven't encountered this before. Not enough to make me hate this dress! Just enough to not make me wear it as often as I would like to.

FitList.review_summary: Love this dress I wear it
FitList.review_text: Love this dress I wear it all the time.

FitList.review_summary: This is such a fun dress
FitList.review_text: This is such a fun dress to wear to work, my kindergarten students love it! Have the navy with orange Dinos too! So fun.

I've been wanting to buy this dress since I discovered ModCloth and finally did it! It's very cute and looks great with a belt. The one thing that disappoints me is that the dinosaurs don't show up as well in person as they do in the picture. When not looking up close, they could be mistaken for a bird or another design. Still love it, though!
One if my favorite dresses. The dinos are so cute and I get tons of compliments whenever I wear it.
Love it! It fits perfectly.
Loved the dress but since I'm on the short side the top part of the dress had a lot of extra room, so I'm going to have alter it. Besides that I love it!
High quality material, so fun and quirky
I really bought this dress for the print, but the cut is pretty cute as well. It fits perfectly in the shoulders but I wish the torso section was a little longer.

This was my first plussized Modcloth purchase, and I was nervous because I never know what other people's 4x is going to look like on me. Luckily, this fits perfectly and is a very forgiving style and fabric. It's all synthetic, so it's kind of warm for summer, but it's worth a little sweat for the compliments that I get on it. I really like the fit of the sleeves, especially. The cover enough of my upper arms while allowing me to move them.

FitList.review_summary: I adored this dress but i
FitList.review_text: I adored this dress but it was super tight in the arm holes. I couldn't comfortably put my arms down in it. The waist was also incredible high compared to my natural waist. I was sad to ship this one back.

FitList.review_summary: This has become one of my
FitList.review_text: This has become one of my favourite dresses.  Super cute, gets lots of compliments, and very comfortable to wear.  The sleeves are super flattering and the length is good (however, I always wear it with nylons or leggings).  It does fit snuggly across the chest on me, but not so much that it looks bad.Like other reviewers said, it was very staticy when it arrived, but I ran a metal hanger through it a bunch of times (and a dryer sheet too, if I recall correctly) which helped and it's been fine since.
Being an elementary teacher, this is a perfect dress for work! I think it would've fit better if it was an XS. Quality is great!

FitList.review_summary: The fit was weird. It was
FitList.review_text: The fit was weird. It was too tight up top and wrinkled. When I tried it on, it was rather shapeless. I am so bummed because I was really looking forward to this purchase. Unfortunately, it's going back.
fit pretty well. the material sticks to the lining and bunches sometimes. watch out for a clothing malfunction.

FitList.review_summary: Cute print but the top is
FitList.review_text: Cute print but the top is tight. If you are curvy on top you might need to wear a cardigan over dress to mask the tightness of it. Still get lots of compliments on it.
I waited forever to order this dress and it's adorable In person but it was too small through the hips so unfortunately I had to return it.

FitList.review_summary: What a great dress! A lit
FitList.review_text: What a great dress! A little short for my personal taste, but totally worth the occasional tug. I get complemented everywhere I go in it! Comfortable and cute, make sure you get this before it's extinct.
Love it. Fabric is clingy.
Very cute!

FitList.review_summary: This is a good quality dr
FitList.review_text: This is a good quality dress and I love the print, but it smooshes my boobs even though I sized up

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress I also
FitList.review_text: I love this dress I also have the Dino earrings!  I wear this dress to work all the time ! Fabric is lovely, not at all see through, and there is a slip underneath. Color is as shows. It looks better with a belt

FitList.review_summary: I need this in every prin
FitList.review_text: I need this in every print. Bring on more prints ModCloth!! Made so well and fits a little large. Love it!
So cute. Perfect for fall!

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress for o
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress for our twelve year old daughter and while it's adorable, it runs a bit bigger than other dresses. She can still wear it with a sweater which helps with the wider neckline. This dress is a great length on her 5'3 frame and I'm happy that she'll be able to wear this dress for a long time!
This fit exactly the way it was described but was just slightly tight in the bust. the stretch really helps though and the length was perfect for someone my size.  #reviewcontest
The fabric felt very cheap and the dinosaurs don't stand out as well as they do in the photograph. Plus, the piece fit oddly for me. I returned this!

FitList.review_summary: for the most part I love
FitList.review_text: for the most part I love it, it's just gets a littleeeee bunched up around the chest after a little while, but I'm ok with fixing it every now and then because I think it's so cute

FitList.review_summary: I loved this with my trex
FitList.review_text: I loved this with my trex necklace. It?s a great fit and comfortable !

FitList.review_summary: I expected it to fall a b
FitList.review_text: I expected it to fall a bit above the knee (I have a relatively long torso) buy it's a little below the knee. still adorable and so very comfortable. It's light weight, so perfect for springtime in CA. The dinosaur print is subtle in this color but always gets me compliments on both the style and the print once it is realized. I may have to purchase one of the other prints in the future!
so cute!

FitList.review_summary: fit is weird... big in wa
FitList.review_text: fit is weird... big in waist, tight in the bust/shoulder. print is super cute, though
This is my new favorite! :D
Bought for a friend. She loves it!

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress, and go
FitList.review_text: I love this dress, and got so many compliments on it. The fabric is comfortable and lightweight, and the print is adorable. The length was perfect on me and I was worried that the elasticized waist would make the top pull or sag but it turned out to be a lovely and flattering fit. I can't recommend this enough.

Absolutely love this dress! Only downfall is that I'm slightly short for it and it bunches a little too much in the middle, but that is easily fixed with a belt. The dino print is divine and I've received many compliments on it!

FitList.review_summary: This is a dress that need
FitList.review_text: This is a dress that needs jeans or leggings to be worn appropriately in an office or school environment. The material is very thin and wrinkles easily. However the fit is great and the color and pattern is true to the photos. Worth 60 bucks? Probably not... But who am I to tell you how to spend your money? :P
The dress is lovely, however still very tight from the chest even though I got an XL; I am petite L. I didn't notice but after I removed the tag there was a little hole on the front.

FitList.review_summary: Runs a little small and t
FitList.review_text: Runs a little small and tight in the chest, otherwise adorable!
Love it!

FitList.review_summary: fits very well a lot of s
FitList.review_text: fits very well a lot of static though so sticks to me and makes it shorter then it is
sooooo staticy. but love it

I stalked this dress online forever! When I finally got it, I was immediately in love! I am thrilled with the cut and fit. The length is great and it's a fun dress I can wear to work or going out with friends.
This dress is so fun!
The cutest dang thing. I wear this dress and make friends. It's powerful like that.

This is probably my least favorite purchase from ModCloth.  For the price, the quality is kind of low.  The material is very thin and the cut is weird.  I probably could have gotten a smaller size, but I thought it looked odd on me.  I was sad because I love the dinosaur print, but this one just didn't work out.
Ended up sending this dress back.. Loved the fabric and print, but it didn't look right on my curvy figure.

FitList.review_summary: I love love love this pri
FitList.review_text: I love love love this print! BUT the fabric is quite shiny, which I would be okay with if the fit wasn't kinda weird also. The bodice is much baggier than I wanted, and doesn't really do my figure any favors, so I'm going to return it

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! The pr
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! The print is really playful and it's very comfy. A great dress to wear to work.
This is just ridiculously cute.

Really love this dress! The sizing was perfect and it's very comfortable. I'm short so the length is great and allows it to be work appropriate. The pattern is so unassuming that it takes people a while to realize it has dinosaurs on it. And you can never go wrong with dinosaurs!!

FitList.review_summary: I love love love this dre
FitList.review_text: I love love love this dress. It is so comfy and cute and perfect for work. It is a bit big in the top, but I have a small chest and it just looks flowy.
love it! the sleeves lay nicely and compliment my arms I'm self conscious about the size of my upper arms
The dinosaur print is so cool!

FitList.review_summary: I had to return it. It wa
FitList.review_text: I had to return it. It was too small.
Bah.  Adorable pattern, so freaking adorable, but the quality of fabric and cut were subpar.  The material is super thin and that clingy staticky synthetic.

FitList.review_summary: The dress is very cute an
FitList.review_text: The dress is very cute and fun. The dress fits very well everywhere except for across the bust. It was very tight across the top which has made it unwearable.
just as pictured. fits true to size with some stretch in the waist. the fabric is prone to static though so keep dryer sheets on hand.

Love this dress! I agree with the other reviewers that It is a little boxy in the chest area. It totally fine for me with my small boobs, but got a bustier girl it could be an issue. The fabric is a little different than I was expecting...it's stiffer? Slicker? I'm not sure how to describe it. But I'm actually going to say that the fabric is a plus, especially if you intend to wear the dress around kids. The second time I wore it My friend's baby spit up on me right as I was heading to work, and the fabric wiped/spot cleaned marvelously. Overall, I love this dress and I always get compliments when u wear it.

FitList.review_summary: This dress is a bit short
FitList.review_text: This dress is a bit short and not cut for a pearshaped girl.  But the pattern is too fun to pass up!

FitList.review_summary: i would live in this dres
FitList.review_text: i would live in this dress. only issue is that it wrinkles really easily. but the material is amazing. so comfortable.
love the print
This dress is adorable. Fits just right and the pattern is cute. Looks just like the picture.

FitList.review_summary: My husband gave me this d
FitList.review_text: My husband gave me this dress for Christmas and it is fabulous! the material is very soft and the design is adorable! It also goes great with a belt!

FitList.review_summary: Very cute dress! I wish t
FitList.review_text: Very cute dress! I wish the material wasn't so clingy though. I will have to find a way to get rid of the static. The fit is somewhat loose. The length is great. Right above the knee. The dinosaur pattern is pretty subtle in these colours.
love this dress. Cute print and great colors.
This was a Christmas gift for a friend. She loves it and it looks great on her!

FitList.review_summary: I had to size up because
FitList.review_text: I had to size up because there is no give in the skirt. Otherwise, very cute and comfortable.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress in bo
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress in both colors that Modcloth offers (I bought the navy one first) and the green one is cut across the bust smaller than the navy one. It isn't a big deal as I just changed the type of bra to fix it, but I am estimating there is about a 1/2 to a 1 inch difference between the two. I still love his dress though, the material is absolutely amazing and the dress can be worn both in the summer with sandals, or in the winter with tights, boots, and a cute jacket. It is also fully lined which is something I really like to see in dresses as I absolutely hate having to wear a slip.

FitList.review_summary: This dress is so cute and
FitList.review_text: This dress is so cute and fits like a dream. It's not to short and has a liner so I don't have to worry about my bum hanging out, or it being see through. The only issue I have is static cling, thank goodness for Static Guard!!

FitList.review_summary: I'm usually an XL, but th
FitList.review_text: I'm usually an XL, but they were out of it in this color, and I didn't like the red and navy one. It's definitely tight, especially across the chest, but it's still cute. I love the fabric, and the colors are good; a nice subtle dinosaur print, if there is such a thing.

FitList.review_summary: I purchased this as a Mod
FitList.review_text: I purchased this as a ModCloth employee.  I don't normally go for quirky animal patterns, but I am so glad I tried this dress!  The colors are perfection and you almost don't even notice the print is dinosaurs until you look close.  I love the length and the flutter sleeves  the bust is slightly big for my 34b, but still looks cute.  Lastly, I love how silky the material feels for polyester.  Overall adorable dress.
Adorable print but suuuuper tight in the boobs and hips.

FitList.review_summary: This dress is SO cute. It
FitList.review_text: This dress is SO cute. It was a little bit tight around the breast area, though. Overall, it is definitely one of the prettiest yet peculiar pieces of clothes I own. Also, a great conversation starter.
THIS IS PERFECT!!!!! I love dinosaurs and I also love dresses! BAM! It looks adorable on and fits perfectly! No complaints

Super cute! The material is a bit more clingy than I was expecting, but it's not clinging in any weird spots. Wish it were an inch or 2 longer, but it'll be fine with tights or leggings. I don't find the chest tight at all. It's nice when brands don't assume just because we wear an XL, we have a super large chest.

FitList.review_summary: Love it! Can't wait to we
FitList.review_text: Love it! Can't wait to wear it to work and for fun. The print is super cute and the fabric is a great colour.

This dress is much better quality than I was expecting. Well made with lovely fabric. Very comfortable, the only issue I have is that it emphasises my bust (not cleavage, just the area). It's just the cut of it. Still cute and fits well, although I did upsize to be safe.

This dress was perfect, the sleeves allow my arms such a lovely freedom of movement. The dress has no pockets, but is lined. I found the bust very close fitting (but thankfully due to the style of the sleeves I still had full movement!), so if you have a larger bust than me I would recommend sizing up!

FitList.review_summary: I bought this in the othe
FitList.review_text: I bought this in the other color several years ago, and get compliments on it all the time. this color is beautiful, too, exactly as pictured. It's a great dress for work, and fits well, even if you are busty. I wear it both with a wide belt or unaccessorized. Highly recommend.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this in the othe
FitList.review_text: I bought this in the other color several years ago, and get compliments on it all the time. this color is beautiful, too, exactly as pictured. It's a great dress for work, and fits well, even if you are busty. I wear it both with a wide belt or unaccessorized. Highly recommend.
Great dress for work!
Tragically this dress did not fit me at all. I could barely pull the dress over my bust. Definitely size up if you are a busty lady!
I was expecting the skirt to be a bit fluffier but other than that its a cute dress for dates or when u just wanna look nice.
This dress is super cute. The only critique I have is the way the front drapes just below the bust; it looks a little bit frumpy. Super cute otherwise, though!

Love this dress. Fits really well, nice cut for the larger bust. Material is thicker than expected and well lined, no need for a slip underneath. Loving the design on the material, each little dinosaur even has eyes! Very pleased with this awesome purchase.
Love!!!
My students love this dress!

FitList.review_summary: I love this little dino d
FitList.review_text: I love this little dino dress! It fits very well, but the cut of the dress is definitely not the most flattering on me. This is not the dress' fault though! I just have very a large chest and hips, and a very small waist so its not my best cut but I just love the dress so much i don't care. Actually I found that using a belt at the waist fixes that problem for me. I think people with less of a disparity between their hips/chest and waist measurements will probably look even better in this dress! I love it so much though.

FitList.review_summary: I wanted to love this, bu
FitList.review_text: I wanted to love this, but it just didn't work out. The fabric is so stiff and left no room in the chest area. The color is gorgeous but the synthetic material just kills the flow of the outfit.
This is an absolutely adorable dress :)

FitList.review_summary: Love the print!  It's a l
FitList.review_text: Love the print!  It's a little snug through the hips (mostly when sitting) but if I sized up it would be much too big everywhere else. Wish the skirt part was a little more flowy. Otherwise, a very cute, comfy dress.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress to bits
FitList.review_text: I love this dress to bits! I ordered both colours. I got the navy one in 3X and this one in 4X in case it ran small. It does not. I could have gotten away with a 4X but 3X is better. Otherwise it's perfect. the colour us great, the material is lovely. It's short on me but I wear it I've leggings and it's perfect!
Meh. Runs small. Staticy clingy material. I gave to to my size small wearing daughter.

I really wanted this dress to work. I read other reviews about the top being too tight but decided to take my chances. Unfortunately this dress just smooshed my boobs down and was way too uncomfortable. Had to return.
Just like pictured

FitList.review_summary: Love it! The length is pe
FitList.review_text: Love it! The length is perfect (just above the knee for me at 5'3). Pattern is cute.It's comfortable and casual. If you're on the fence  get it.

I love everything about this dress, the length is just perfect (I find it hard to find dresses that are not too short or too long), the material is great quality and the little dinosaurs are just the right amount of cute without being too much.

FitList.review_summary: I love the Dino's on this
FitList.review_text: I love the Dino's on this dress! It is so cute! Five stars all around. I have only one complaint. It is a little short by 35 inches for my taste, but I will be keeping this dress. This will be cute to wear as a casual dress out and about.

FitList.review_summary: This is such a cute print
FitList.review_text: This is such a cute print and perfect in so many ways, but there was a snag on the fabric towards the hem. Shipping from Australia is going to be too hard to return, so I'll just chalk this one down to a loss. That said, this dress is super cute, and would be perfectly breezy for spring.
Love it.
Really cute, fits well, looks great with a blue cardigan.
This dress has potential but looks so, SO bad on. It looks like it should flare but it was snug and baggy all at once. It's unfortunate because I really wanted to love this one.
This dress is adorable! It's one of my new favorites, pair it with a thin belt and fun shoes and I'm ready to head to work.
Cute dress but very large in the chest area. Makes your chest look like they droop to the waist. Sent it back for a smaller size. We will see!

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! I get
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! I get so many compliments on it. True to size and super cute.

This fits beautifully! I usually have trouble finding dresses that fit my arms but the way the sleeves are cut on this are perfect, and even fit nicely under a cardigan without bunching up. I got so many compliments on it. Originally I ordered the XL but when I got it it was too tight in the bust so I returned for a 1X which fits much better.
To tight around my chest

I loved everything about this dress. The color, print, length, fit. I almost didn't send it back but it was just too tight in the chest for me. If you're larger in the chest area this might be one to skip but otherwise I'd highly recommend it.
super cute and fun. high quality, hits at knees. Roomy bust area without looking like a potato sack. lined.

FitList.review_summary: It was a cute dress, but
FitList.review_text: It was a cute dress, but as someone else mentioned it is not flattering for pear shaped women. The top fit perfectly, but the bottom would have been more flattering if it flared out more. Unfortunately I will be returning it.
Love the dress, the print is perfect and clear however it was a little too large for me in the bust but not enough to lose a star.
love the soft material and it fits amazingly. if you have a large bust, be careful when choosing a size. I bought 2x, when im usually around a 1x, and my bust fit was snug (b cup)

Love this dress! Totally flattering and original. I love the flowey (is that a word?) nature of the sleeves. Super comfortable and super cute print. The quality of stitching and materiel is superb. Plus, my son also digs it cuz dinosaurs are his favorite.

FitList.review_summary: The style did not work fo
FitList.review_text: The style did not work for me. To much fabric on the top half. What I disliked most was the fabric, reminded me of a silky nightie. Had to return.

FitList.review_summary: I loved the colors but th
FitList.review_text: I loved the colors but the dress was oddly cut. Too baggy up top and strangely fitted below. It was also extremely clingy. I returned this one.
Returned because it was cut too slim in the hips and too big on top for me, and the thin fabric was a static electricity magnet. I love the print, but the style did no favors for my pearshaped body.

FitList.review_summary: Perfect for work if you w
FitList.review_text: Perfect for work if you wear with leggings

FitList.review_summary: Great color, I have the b
FitList.review_text: Great color, I have the blue and orange also.

FitList.review_summary: Reason I gave it didn't g

I really really wanted this one to work out, but it was too small in the chest for me.

As others have said, it's a little tight in the chest. But, I wear a 32H, and I can still wear a M as long as I wear a bra that holds everything in a little more. I've never had more compliments on a dress than when I wore this one.

FitList.review_summary: I have the same dress in
FitList.review_text: I have the same dress in blue in 1X. It's a bit too large for me so I ordered the XL in green. The difference is enormous. The XL was way too small for me, very tight across the bust (and I'm not especially busty) and very short. Had to send it back, unfortunately, since I love the color and I still wear the blue one.
New favorite dress, hands down

I returned this item. The print is awesome and I wish the dress fit a little more flattering. The top is a little blousey for me. Also it did not seem like a wash and wear product which is a top priority for me. I opted to exchange it because as much as I was in love with the print, the fit made me think it wouldn't be a favorite.

FitList.review_summary: Really cute fun for Any c
FitList.review_text: Really cute fun for Any casual occasion its so fun!!!

FitList.review_summary: I love love love this dre
FitList.review_text: I love love love this dress! It looks so cute on. I can't wait to wear it to work.
I got so many compliments on this! It is super comfy

FitList.review_summary: So cute! Perfect for my q
FitList.review_text: So cute! Perfect for my quirky personality and for the office.

FitList.review_summary: I'm so glad I took a chan
FitList.review_text: I'm so glad I took a chance on this dress!! When other reviews said it wasn't for busty women, I was almost discouraged... But I had to try it for myself. It's perfect, I love it, the end. The print is fantastic, the sleeves are adorable, and honestly, I like that the top is purposely made to look loose. I'm used to my bust taking up every inch of room in the tops of dresses but the extra fabric of this dress gives me that effortlessly flowy look. It also doesn't pull strangely at all and I have a very large bust.... The length is comfortable on me, though I am pretty short. I would say try it for yourself if you've been eyeing it! It's a super unique dress that I'm stoked to have in my closet.
Cute dress, fit well but it just didn't flatter my body type. I looked very boxy on top. I wanted to love it, the pattern was cute and subtle, but ultimately I sent it back.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! It's r
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! It's really comfortable, and the print is too cute. I was worried that the flutter sleeves wouldn't be very flattering, but actually they offer a good amount of coverage. If I have one complaint, it's that this dress is very staticky. I wash it on the delicate cycle in my washing machine with liquid fabric softener, and that helps, but there's still a good amount of static between the shell and lining fabrics.
LOVE IT!

FitList.review_summary: This is one of my new fav
FitList.review_text: This is one of my new favorites. I like that the dinos aren't super noticeable at first but once you see it you can't help but smile! The length was just right on me, just above the knee but not too short. I can wear this to work.

Really sad about this one  I've been coveting the navy/orange version for ages but it always seemed to be sold out in my size, so I jumped on it when this version appeared in my favourite shade of green, but unfortunately it fits really weirdly on me. The top half is really baggy and makes my bust just look enormous while also being drowned by material. The bottom half isn't flared enough, it just sort of goes straight down and looks really odd in comparison with the top and makes me look much wider than I am. Overall it gives me a terrible silhouette, which I'm so disappointed about because the print is just so cute! Gonna have to send this one back :(

It just really didn't suit me. It just kind of hung there and was shapeless and a little too long. The puffy sleeves also made my shoulders look very wide and pointy. There were a few loose threads but the quality seemed fine overall. Seemed like it would wrinkle easily though.

FitList.review_summary: I got this as a gift for
FitList.review_text: I got this as a gift for a friend and it is adorable! the print is so cute and it is a flattering cut. I will not be wearing it but I am sure my friend will be super happy to get it!

This is super adorable, first off. The print is cute, the colors are so pretty, and the shape and cut is super flattering. And although I wasn't too sure about the sleeves at first (typically the shorter, almost caplike sleeves never go over too well in plussizes), but they actually are very nice and have a loose, flowy silhouette.  The length is good, toohitting me right above the knee. Not to long, not too short. It's a cute summer dress, but I think it will be quite easy to style this for fall and winter, as well. I would totally recommend this dress!

The fabric is really soft and a great color.  Dress comes to my knees and I'm 5'6 with a long torso.  Fits perfectly in bust and hips.  I don't love the way the elastic looks at the waist, but a belt will cover it.  A new favorite!!
Most of the other reviews said size up one but it should be 2
I fell in love with this dress, and it fit in the hips and waist with room to spare, but was not able to zip it all the way up.
Love it! Beautiful and perfect for the wedding I?m going to wear it to!

FitList.review_summary: I have owned this dress f
FitList.review_text: I have owned this dress for about 6 years I believe and still love it! It is holding up so nicely and still looks brand new. I wear it at least 34 times a year for weddings or events. I love the neckline and how it flows. So perfect!
bought this for a wedding and it was perfect! I'm between a small and medium, went with a small, and the fit is really nice and flattering. so happy I splurged on this dress!

Love the colour! I'm very busty (FF cup) and normally struggle to find clothes that fit me right. This dress is fairly flattering as the waist band accentuates my smallest part, giving a good shape. The only downside is the 3 buttons on the back of the neck with tiny elastic loops to do them up. I found them to be really difficult to undo, and have got it altered to be press studs instead.
The material is nice and looks cute itself, but just didn't fit right on me (5'3 height). It bunched out quite a bit above the band might look better on someone with a taller torso!
I really like this dress! It's classy and cute. I wish I had more chances to wear it. Very flattering.

I bought this dress for a wedding and it's perfect!  I usually wear a size medium in dresses and around a size 68 in pants.  I bought a size medium in this dress and it fits perfectly!  I love the color and the material feels light, but not cheap. Will be perfect for a summer wedding.
This dress' waist rode up, then ballooned around my bosom... so strange. I wouldn't recommend for those with high waists or shorter torsos. Back it goes!

FitList.review_summary: I don't know if I've lost
FitList.review_text: I don't know if I've lost weight or if the zipper is easier to close now  I ordered this dress a year or two ago and had to return it because the thing wouldn't zip up! I don't have that problem now, and boy am I glad, because this is probably my favorite dress ever. I don't have much of a bust, so the medium is a little baggy on top, but it's still flattering. The length is also ideal for me  I'm tall, so it doesn't quite hit my knees, but it's definitely work appropriate! The color is gorgeous, and my only wish is that I could wear this more often.

I absolutely love this dress! I bought it for a desert wedding and got lots of compliments on it. As a taller girl, I sometimes have trouble with length, but this one hit right at the knee. Overall a very classy and comfortable dress.
The fit was great except for it being a tad too short for my long legs. it's nothing that a pair of tights can't fix, though.
Loved this dress. Comfortable and classy.

FitList.review_summary: I have the out it in with
FitList.review_text: I have the out it in without unzipping side zipper because i cant zip up at home alone! But cute flowy dress

FitList.review_summary: Waist was too small for m
FitList.review_text: Waist was too small for me.
Beautiful dress  perfect mix of classy and elegant but not uptight.
Great dress!
Loved it!

This dress was amazing for my graduation. The dress was a good not as flattering as I hoped it would be because of my broad shoulders and the zipper hook at the side broke so the flap stood up at the side. Otherwise I loved it and I wish I had kept in better shape so it still fit.

FitList.review_summary: I had to buy this dress a
FitList.review_text: I had to buy this dress as part of the bridal party for a friend's wedding. It was adorable and very comfortable! I've worn it multiple times since the wedding and I love it! My only complaint is that it was a bit tight around the midsection and there isn't any give to the material, so be careful when sizing! Otherwise, I love it!

The waistband area is rather small with little to no give. I needed assistance you get the zipper up all the way but then it was fine. Also, the neckline is way too big whether it  slouched down instead if sitting nicely like normal halter tops. I loved that it was lined and overall the shape of the dress is very nice.

Great dress! Fit is true to size and length is modest but not frumpy. One complaint is a button came off the morning of needing to wear it as a bridesmaid. Thankfully a relative was available with needle and thread. Have since worn it with no further button problems.
This is a beautiful dress. It fits perfect once on. It is difficult to zip up on your own.
great dress for any occasion

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress!! I bou
FitList.review_text: I love this dress!! I bought this for a wedding and it's just gorgeous. it is flowy and lightweight and feminine and beautiful. Like others have mentioned there isn't much stretch in the fabric at all but I'm a DDD and had plenty of fabric up top. The only issue I have with this dress is the waist band runs small. It was a bit tight in the waist, any tighter and I would not have been able to wear it. Also the was it band had a tendency to ride up under my chest but overall this is a beautiful dress.

FitList.review_summary: Dress was a little big in
FitList.review_text: Dress was a little big in the bust but otherwise fit great. It was really nice to find a dress that's long enough! Quality seemed pretty good initially, but one of the three buttons from the top back of the dress fell off during the first wash. Hoping it holds up better in the future and that the quality otherwise will match the price.

FitList.review_summary: Gave this to my cousin. S
FitList.review_text: Gave this to my cousin. She loved it!
Turns out high necklines aren't for me and i got the wrong size, so it was bulky on me. Would probably be beautiful in the right size on someone with a longer neck
The neck was tighter than I though was comfortable and as a smaller chested woman (pear shaped) I thought it made me look bigger than I am in an unflattering way.

This dress is gorgeous, and I've had my eye on it for years. I finally bought it for my dad's wedding while wearing a medium shirt size and 1012 pants. I ordered it in a large, figuring that my DDD bust would pose a problem and that I'd need some wiggle room to accommodate.Well, I wasn't wrong, except that like the top review, I can't get it zipped past my bust. I've lost 20 pounds since I bought this dress, well on my way to size 8 jeans, and I think I'm going to have to lose another 1015 pounds before I can even dream of getting this dress to close at the largest point of my bust. (I am not losing weight merely to fit into this dress, by the way.) I suppose it'll make a cute wear for the faculty Christmas party before the semester ends... IF I've lost enough around my bust and ribcage by then.

FitList.review_summary: I really want to make thi
FitList.review_text: I really want to make this dress work but it just made my chest look bad. There was too much fabric from the cinched waist up through the neck giving you the appearance of strange proportions.
Eh just okay
I had read other reviews that said it was short.  I'm 5'4 and it comes to my knees.
Very flattering. Tempted to buy in other colors!

FitList.review_summary: When I saw this dress, I
FitList.review_text: When I saw this dress, I fell in love with it and I thought it would be perfect for the wedding I'm attending but then when I got it, I kind of fell out of it. It still looked cute on me but I think the collar part got to me so unfortunately, I am going to send this back... it was my first time purchasing anything from ModCloth (with the advice of their stylist) and buying a collared dress. So for those who are interested in buying this dress, I say go for it if you don't mind the collar.
Love this dress! I bought it as a bridesmaid dress. There's no stretch in the waist so make sure you get a size that fits! The color and quality are great.

The dress was very flattering and the perfect length! I wasn't a big fan of the neckline though. It had a turtleneck feel to it. I was really excited to wear this dress, but I didn't read the care directions and ironed a hole right through it like a dummy, so they're being serious when they say not to iron it!
This dress is very beautiful. The neckline is perfect  I thought it would awkward on me but it didn't. :)
Weird fabric gathering at the waist. :(

FitList.review_summary: I've had this dress for a
FitList.review_text: I've had this dress for about 6 years now and it's absolutely one of my favorites. The quality has lasted over the years and it washes and wears really well.  I always get compliments when I wear it.
The chest flows over the belted area too much.
The neckline was higher than I thought, but it is my goto fancy dress
Dress was really pretty and nice color but far too big in the bust area and too long

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress is bl
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress is black lace and loved it so much that I ordered this one too. It was made by a different company and fit a little more snug but I still love it. Can be dressed up or down easily.
The perfect dress!
Just didn't look good in me

FitList.review_summary: I've had my eye on this d
FitList.review_text: I've had my eye on this dress for over a year and could finally buy it! Was so excited, but unfortunately this wasn't what I had imagined. I would recommend not buying if you have a big bust as the mid section sits right up under boobs and looks very odd (unless you want to accentuate them, which I don't)... not like the picture. Otherwise, the sizing is ok, but not what I had expected and the zip also seems a bit flimsy. Unfortunately since I'm an international customer, I've just looked at what it would cost to return and it's just not worth it. Loved the rest of my package Modcloth, just a bit heartbroken over this one.
Wore for a bridesmaids dress. Looked very nice.
LOVE this dress!!!
I love this dress! Waist is fitted but not too snug. Bodice draps well and the collar isn't tight.

FitList.review_summary: Super cute and a bit sexy
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress a few months ago for work.  It is a fun dress to wear and I felt very feminine in it.  I wore a 3/4 length white cardigan with it.  My hubby said Wow when he saw me in the dress and I was voted best dressed in the office.
Great dress comfortable with extreme heat.  Perfect for a late summer wedding.

FitList.review_summary: Wore this to my sister in
FitList.review_text: Wore this to my sister in law's wedding and got lots of compliments the length was just right and I was happy with the quality. My only complaint is that the lace and the piping are slightly different colors and that made matching a cardigan to it kind of impossible.
Beyond comfortable dress. I will definitely be using this as a transition piece between seasons!

Absolutely love this dress! Wore this as a bridesmaids dress for a wedding in March. The fit is perfect, the pleats are gorgeous and the lace detail just tops it off. I was comfortable but felt appropriate for the occasion. The length was spot on for my 5'5 frame.
It is perfect!
Beautiful color and style. Fits perfectly. It's a great dress that can be worn to plenty of different kinds of events.
Love this dress .. looks elegant on it
Dress was cute. Simpler than I thought but nice stretchy material. I'm 5'9 with long legs so it was very short and sadly, I had to return it.
Fits nicely, arm holes aren't too large, lace is nice quality. Will be good for wearing to work with a cardigan

Being so long waisted, I struggle with any dress that has a waist line. Buying this was a total gamble, but it sure paid off. The dress looks GREAT!  It's flattering. It's comfortable. It's pretty. So happy.
Great dress. Right length and made well.

FitList.review_summary: Love this dress! I get co
FitList.review_text: Love this dress! I get compliments every time I wear it. The hem hits right at the top of my knees. The elastic waistband is forgiving without making me look pregnant. The waist is a little higher than I prefer but everything else about this dress is wonderful.

FitList.review_summary: I got this dress for my r
FitList.review_text: I got this dress for my rehersal dinner and I totally love it. The fit is good a little loose which is what I expected. very pleased with this purchase.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this to wear to
FitList.review_text: I bought this to wear to a friend's wedding, but this was my secondchoice dress after my original order took over a week to ship, and the dress I wanted went out of stock in the meantime. I chose this as a backup because it was the only dress in my size and price range that was even remotely my style (the fact that there are only 37 size 2X dresses under $50 in stock right now compared to 300+ in sizes XSL is a wicked bummer...) Customer service was super helpful and expedited both my original order and the second dress, but unfortunately this just looks terrible on me. The plussize version has much wider straps, and something about it just makes me look very matronly. I carry a lot of weight in my stomach and the hemline WILL NOT sit straight, which is extra noticeable with the contrasting lace. The elastic on the inside hit me in a weird spot that made it feel really stiff and itchy. I still haven't decided if I'll return it, as I need something to wear to this wedding, but I had such high hopes for this after reading all the positive reviews and it turned out to be a dud :(

this dress is perfect! I bought it for a fall wedding, I just had a baby 2 months ago so I wanted something loose fitting around my belly but something that covered my large chest since I am nursing...it fits perfectly for my smaller frame and large chest!
Ordered this for a bridesmaid dress. Very nice and comfortable, although the it's a very casual dress, more of a date dress than a wedding one. But you don't argue with the bride!

FitList.review_summary: Love it! I can't wait to
FitList.review_text: Love it! I can't wait to wear it again!
beautiful dress!
I love this dress!

FitList.review_summary: loved how it looked on my

FitList.review_summary: This dress is the best! I
FitList.review_text: This dress is the best! I wear it with a navy vest underneath as it is quite low cut and my cleavage needs a bit of extra cover. I also wear a thick brown belt around the waist and team it with cowboy boots for a fun casual look or brown heels / boots for a day through to night look. One of my favorites :)
beautiful dress, would buy it a million times over.

I read reviews and looked at photos and, having tried it on now, I can confirm that this dress is so flattering to almost any body type. Great for a bridesmaid dress, attending a fancy function, a nice date, attending a wedding, or (if you're me) your own  elopement! (He's in the navy and wearing his whites.) Good quality, just enough stretch, super comfortable, and totally adorable. Xl fits me great. This one is a keeper!

FitList.review_summary: Easy to wear and so comfy
FitList.review_text: Easy to wear and so comfy!

FitList.review_summary: Cute dress, but not for m
FitList.review_text: Cute dress, but not for me. I'm smaller chested, and the top half of the dress was very large on me. The pleats were also not the most flattering. Sadly, I had to return this one.
Bought this for my graduation and I love it! Such comfortable and pretty material and it fits perfectly, even with my small chest. Great dress for special occasions.
this dress is beautiful, I wore it to a wedding and it was perfect!

I bought this dress with the intentions of wearing if for my graduation in May and then weddings and other times throughout the spring/summer. I was excited when it came back in a size I thought I needed...the dress arrived quickly and the fabric of the dress would make it very comfortable to wear all day but I'm going to have to return it. I wanted it to be perfect but the dress is too big, i thought the top would be more fitted/structure but it's not and it is a little short and not flattering once I got it on. The cream trim also seems more noticeable in real life.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress for m
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress for my friends wedding to wear as a bridesmaid. I think the dress is cute! The lace is much prettier in person. The dress is stretchy so you have some play with sizing, I went with a smaller size than I would have to account for some weight I am loosing and will likely be smaller by the time of the wedding. I have a small waist and it didn't hit me right at my lowest point, it hit me a little higher than my natural waist.  So, we will be adding a belt for more definition. The material is soft, though it wont breathe like cotton (read: sweaty!), stretchy, and twirls nice. The bottom part looks a bit cheap up close, but from a bit away looks great. Again, the lace is beautiful and great quality! Overall, nice fit, pretty lace, needs a belt, cute style.

FitList.review_summary: For me this dress was too
FitList.review_text: For me this dress was too loose of the top and a bit tight on the bottom. I also honestly didn't love the overall look like I thought I would.

This dress is fantastic. It's one of the best things I've ever bough from Modcloth. The V isn't too low, it's a perfect length, and it looks so cute with boots and a colorful cardigan. I usually stay away from pleats since I'm hipy, but these look great.

FitList.review_summary: The lace is heavy in a go
FitList.review_text: The lace is heavy in a good way  it helps the dress sit right. The pleating is well done and doesn't wrinkle.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress. It's f
FitList.review_text: I love this dress. It's flattering and so fun to spin around in. However, it's a little shorter than I'd like, hitting just above my knee.

FitList.review_summary: Great for dancing at a we
FitList.review_text: Great for dancing at a wedding. The weight from the lace bottom keeps the dress from flying up.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! It fit
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! It fits just as expected. It is very flattering!
Love the material! very flattering! love the waistline.

Love these dresses! Bought 8 of them for my bridesmaid and they look perfect! Very good quality

So pretty. Great material! Very flattering

FitList.review_summary: The cut on top is a littl

The material is a nice weight...it doesn't blow around in the wind but it will has plenty of movement. It's good dressed up or down, and the neckline is modest enough to wear even to conservative family events, which is a bit of a feat for me. And it's sooo comfy.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress to we

This was the perfect dress for my post pregnancy body, shaped me, and made me feel beautiful

FitList.review_text: I saw this dress and wanted it immediately.  I waited until I was afraid it would sell out and jumped.  I measure between a 2 and 3X, so based on the reviews, I sized down from my normal 3x.  I think I could have done either but the 2x fits very well so I'm pleased with my purchase.  It was a heavier dress than expected, and the fabric has some sheen to it.  The quality of the dress and lace is amazing!  Worth every full priced penny :)  Highly recommend!

Love this dress! My first purchase from mod cloth and now I'm addicted!

I wore this to a local wine festival and got a ton of compliments!
I love this dress classic! Can wear alone or with a cover up!

Wore these dress for Senior Pictures and was incredibly happy! So lightweight and comfortable while still maintaining a good quality and shape. No zippers but it didn't feel like a cheap stretchy dress. Can't wait to wear it more this summer!
This dress is perfect. The quality of the dress is really really good and it's long enough to wear to work!
The waist creeps up under my boosms and becomes an empire waist.

FitList.review_summary: I wore this dress for our
FitList.review_text: I wore this dress for our selfuniting marriage in DC. It fits well in the bust and waist. It is free flowing and comfortable in the hips. The color is true to the photos and the embroidered lace on the bottom gives the skirt some weight so it doesn't go flying in the wind. My only con to this dress is that it is a tad short. Climbing in and out of a minivan was fun... I will wear it again but will just need to be mindful of bending over, etc.
didn't like the material and dress was a little short for my liking.

Love this dress! It's so easy to dress up or down and is great for semiformal occasions! I also love that you can maintain a sense of professional modesty in it, which means it also doubles as a fun work piece. I would definitely buy it again!

FitList.review_summary: Just a smidge short but i

FitList.review_summary: I found this dress to be
FitList.review_text: I found this dress to be a very nice weight  not too heavy, nor too light. Seems to be nice quality, too.  Just a bit short, if you are tall, although nothing opaque tights cant handle. So far, I'm very happy!

The quality of the fabric is so much better than I thought it was going to be

FitList.review_summary: I just came home and foun
FitList.review_text: I just came home and found this beauty on my front porch! So of course I ran inside to try it on and I am totally in love. I bought this dress to wear at my cousin's wedding in April and I am so excited. I was scared it wouldn't fit because of my measurements and what the size chart says, but I read the reviews and decided to go with the 2X since my bust isn't that big and this is perfect. The top part is just slight slight slightly big but not enough to complain about. The material is breatheable (which is great since the wedding is down south) and it's so freaking cute! I can't stop twirling in it! I can't wait to show off some dance moves and celebrate with my family in this perfect dress! April can't come fast enough!
Love this dress! Long enough for the work place too!

This dress couldn't be better! I absolutely LOVE it! I'm fairly tall, and it can be a challenge to find things that are pretty but still long enough that they're not inappropriate. This dress hits the mark in every category. It's flattering, it's good quality material, it's a great length for really anything, and it's a great price! My only complaint is that when I took it out of the box, a section of the lace at the bottom wasn't sewed on properly and it was coming loose. I live in Canada and the shipping is insane, so trying to get it replaced by ModCloth wasn't something I was interested in paying for. I took it to a tailor to be fixed, and now I'm totally in love with the dress.

LOVE this dress!! The colour is quite dark  looks more black than navy blue, unless you're in very bright sunshine. I'm quite petite so even the small was looser on me than ideal, but the elasticity of the material and the waistband meant that it still sits in a way that's very flattering!

This dress is really pretty. I like the fabric; it's a little heavier, especially with the lace trim, so it hangs nicely. It's a tiny bit shorter than I like  about knee length  and a bit low at the neckline. I wear a cami under just to be more confident when leaning over.

FitList.review_summary: I like the dress enough t
FitList.review_text: I like the dress enough to keep it.  The fabric is very stretchy and the piping around the neckline and armholes is a nice touch.  The lace at the bottom is a little heavy compared to the navy fabric but it works.

So cute!! This dress has a lot of stretch to it so size down one. I'm 9 months pregnant and usually wear a size 22/24, but ordered the 3X because of my 9 month pregnant belly but it has plenty of room. If I wasn't so pregnant I would have gone with a 2X. Very well made and cute!!
Love this dress. Perfect with a cardigan for work or dress it up for a party.
great dress!
Looks great

FitList.review_summary: I really wanted to like t

FitList.review_summary: I have to agree with the

I ordered these dresses for my bridesmaids and I absolutely love them! They fit on a variety of body types and they are very flattering. The material is a very nice quality as well. I would definitely recommend them.

FitList.review_summary: If you are a curvy girl (
FitList.review_text: If you are a curvy girl (hourglass) figure....don't hesitate to buy this. It's AMAZING. It's the perfect length (hits at knees...I'm 5'5.) accentuates waist right under bust. Great dress. I would buy it in more colors if they had it.
Very excited to have this dress !!! The quality of the material is excellent, it fits my mom of 2 body perfect. This will be my go to dress from now on. Buy it!!!!
I don't normally like dresses, but I LOVE this one! It's comfortable and beautiful and just the right length. It falls just at my knees. Very happy with this dress.
I'm usually a size 12 and this dress fits like a dream. The fabric is stretchy enough to be comfortable but still high quality. This dress is beautiful!

FitList.review_summary: love this dress I just go

This dress is beautiful! I bought it for a bridesmaid dress for an outdoor wedding this summer. It's great quality.
Fab

FitList.review_summary: This is a lovely dress, n
FitList.review_text: This is a lovely dress, nice piping and lace detailing, good quality for the price. But, as is my problem with most dresses, it is a little too shortwaisted for busty folks, and a bit short overall. It still fits and works for me but looks better with a cardigan to balance it out. For reference, I have a 36G bust and a very typical hourglass shape.
This dress was great but just not for my body shape.

Beautiful dress!  I bought this dress when I was six months pregnant and wore it to my baby shower.  Now, I'm still wearing the dress (just had it taken in a little bit) and it's still beautiful.  I've received many compliments on it.  Plus, it is so effortless and easy to wear.  The pleats are perfect and the lace is really sweet.  It looks great with a cardigan and flats, so perfect for the days when you need to look extra special, but don't have time for all the fuss.

I am usually a size 14/16 but this does not come in a XL, so I ordered a 1X. Too big. When it arrived, before I even put it on, I realized that it's a stretchy material so I knew it would be big. When I did try it on, I was right. The top was way too big with strange gaps. The middle waist band fell at a strange place and made me look awfully frumpy. I promptly returned it for a smaller L size, hoping it would fit better. It did! The top is a little snug on my D's, but everywhere else is perfect. No more strange gaps. It's flattering as now the waist band falls right under the chest and not at a strange spot accentuating any strange belly shapes. I love it. Wore it with a taupe cardigan, navy blue tights and taupe calfhigh boots. I received so many compliments!
Very comfy!
This dress just looked ghastly on me and was tight across the back and so regrettably I am returning it
Using this for my bridesmaids dress! Fits great on everyonewhich is amazing and they all love having a dress they could wear again. Winwin!

FitList.review_text: I am in love with the dress.

It's a bit big for me, but in that way that stretchy fabrics can be when they're not stretching  draping instead, which I much prefer! So the only negative is the armholes gaping just a little.

Love this dress  very comfy and easy to wear. Holds up to washing.  The pleats help hide some of my problem areas which is always welcome!

I wear this with a cardigan and wedges and am ready for work or a day out with friends.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! Very f

Fantastic dress! It is exactly the length it was advertised as. The skirt is gorgeous, fully lined and has a nice weight to it without being heavy. The skirt has a great shape, and is not clingy. The dress itself is just beautiful without being super dressy. I will be wearing it to a September wedding and am so excited and relieved to have found such a nice dress.Honestly I could not be happier with this dress, totally work full price. FitList.review_summary: I loved this dress the mi

This dress makes me feel beautiful. As a new mama I love that I can wear a regular bra with it. It is well made and the lace is such a sweet and feminine touch. I can't wait to wear it to a wedding next month!
Ordered in two sizes. Medium was a little tight on chest. Large was perfect!
very impressed
Love it! Size up one:)
Great dress!  Worked perfect for my daughters wedding.

I ordered this dress for my small wedding. I got so many compliments on this. Thanks modcloth it was a hit.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress, most w

FitList.review_summary: I bought this for my upco
FitList.review_text: I bought this for my upcoming wedding reception and have mixed feelings about it. My friends all chose this one over any of the others so I know it's cute, but the mesh/tulleish overlay really throws me. I feel like a ballerina in it, and I'm not sure that's the look I'm going for. The bow around the neck is a nice touch but a weird feeling. I got feedback that the dress is unique and flattering, so I'm still deciding.

This. Dress. Is. So. Stunning. I bought it for a Great Gatsby party that we will be attending in two weeks and it has totally blown me away. As a curvy lady, I was a little nervous about finding a dress that would invoke the spirit of the boyish frame roaring 20s. This dress is not only beautiful and unique, it really does scream '20s. Such a gorgeous dress and very comfortable, too! Putting it on was a little confusing, though, since I had to figure out through trial and error that the right side is kept together by the tie at the neck.

FitList.review_summary: I wore this dress for my
FitList.review_text: I wore this dress for my cousin's wedding and it was a hit! It's really flattering, but hides the things I needed hidden, perfectly ;)The design is a bit tricky because of the bow, it kept getting a not loose and I had to tighten it a couple times, but besides that, it was PERFECT!!!

FitList.review_summary: I bought this for my niec
FitList.review_text: I bought this for my niece to wear in my wedding and she looked beautiful in it and felt pretty.

FitList.review_summary: I LOVE this dress. I'm tr
FitList.review_text: I LOVE this dress. I'm trying to convince my workplace to have Fancy Fridays just so I can wear it more often. The color is a lovely dark champagne, and THE LACE. Oh lord, the lace! It hugged just enough to give a form under the just as lovely tulle overlay. And I'm extremely self conscious when wearing tent dresses because, well, I look like I'm wearing a tent. But this dress was infused with magic because I still looked like I had a body under the layers. I received compliment after compliment about the dress, which just reaffirmed how fabulous it was. It also held up great while showing off all my dance moves later that evening. If you're on the fence, BUY IT. You will not be disappointed.
Loved this dress!
Looks lovely on, especially with a black belt
Absolutely love this dress.  I did order a size bigger. And it's perfect!

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress and it
FitList.review_text: I love this dress and it is super flattering, but it is brown. I really wanted it to be champagne but that overlay is definitely brown, ladies. This dress does not feel or look very bridal.
Beautiful dress and very comfortable. I wore to a wedding and got so many compliments. Ordered M Champagne and it fit well. Perfect wedding/shower/event dress.
Beautiful dress! Slightly skimpy coverage over the chest, but not enough to get a side boob and the bow covers the small gap.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress for m
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress for my baby shower. I was 34 weeks at the time. The stylists on mod cloth were able to answer any questions I had about sizing to get the right size since I'm pregnant. It's just a little long but I'm only 5'1 so that's expected, and I ordered it a little large because I wasn't sure how much I would've grown since ordering it. The quality is very nice, it really is a beautiful dress.
Nice...fits really well.

I absolutely love this dress! I wish it was just a tiny bit smaller, but it's hard for me to find anything that fits just right. The quality is amazing and it feels like an expensive dress. It's very versatile and great for just about any occasion.

This is my favorite dress. I absolutely adore it. The delicate blush coloring paired with the lacy fabric underneath and the light, flowy layer of sheer makes you feel like a fairy princess when you put it on. This dress is also soooo comfortable. The sheer fabric is not itchy on your neck or underarms at all, which I was a little apprehensive about when I ordered the dress. It's very soft, the fabric is stretchy, and the tie closure at the neck allows you to make it as tight or as loose at you want around your neck. For a pretty shapeless dress, it was so flattering. The bottom layer of fabric is more shapely so it shows your figure nicely, and the loose sheer fabric on top drapes over your curves. It's very dainty and modest, but also accentuating in the right places. Also, for a tall girl like me, the length was perfect, and I could even wear it with heels. I bought the dress for my homecoming dance, but I love it because it can be dressed up or dressed down! I have also worn it for my senior pictures, a dress casual awards banquet, and just to school somedays with a jean jacket and some tights. It's effortless dressup with heels and nice jewelry or comfy to dress down with cute ankle boots and a cardigan. The best thing is that it's so unique. There aren't a lot of dresses out there similar to this one, and whenever I wear it I always recieve tons of compliments. I normally don't like to spend 100$ on a dress but without a doubt, this one was worth it! #ReviewContest

FitList.review_summary: I love the feel of this f
FitList.review_text: I love the feel of this fabric and the way it looks on me
Perfect for our wedding!  It was appropriate for our event, which was small and at a BandB.

FitList.review_summary: it was a lovely dress but
FitList.review_text: it was a lovely dress but I probably ordered way too large. it was way too big and kind of boxy looking on me unfortunately in a way that simply wasn't flattering. it's being returned now the fabric was lovely though

I love everything about the dress except the color. It's not champagne but rather taupe  the package it came in referred to it as tan. Additionally, it's a rather dark shade of tan which leaves me a bit disappointed as it was to be my wedding dress...undecided on sending back or making it work.

I ordered a medium based on comments in other reviews, and it fits okay but since I'm 5'8 the dress is a little shorter than I like.  The overlay creates an illusion that the dress is longer, so I'm okay with it.
I am 5 foot 11 inches and the dress is pretty short, but I use love it so I am keeping it
What a gorgeous dress! I wasn't sure it would look good on me bc shift dresses don't usually but the slip under the sheer overlay is actually quite fitted. Anyway. What a stunner!

This dress isn't exactly made to be flattering, so I won't fault it for being shapeless. The XS fit as expected  very roomy. The champagne overlay is what really ruined it for me. It is the exact color or a bandaid in my opinion and looks very rough like gauze rather than delicate tulle. This dress looks better in pictures online than in person. Sad :( because it is a cute design.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! I alwa
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! I always wish dresses were longer, but I guess that can't really be helped when you're almost 6' tall... Anyway, now I just have to find an excuse to wear it!

FitList.review_summary: Wore this to my bridal sh
FitList.review_text: Wore this to my bridal shower and I loved it!
This is a beautiful dress.  But it was a bit short for what I needed.
Really elegant and flowy. I can't wait to wear it!
This dress is sized perfectly and looks even better when worn. I get compliments every time I wear it. The fabric is nice and the swing is lovely.

FitList.review_summary: This was a nice dress bea
FitList.review_text: This was a nice dress beautiful color and fit. This dress really flows and has a lot of movement.  The dress was a little big around the bust and I would have had to get it taken in.

FitList.review_summary: OMG! I had been wanting t
FitList.review_text: OMG! I had been wanting to buy myself this dress for months! Every time it was on sale I was broke. I told my s/o about it and he kinda shrugged it off. Until the day before Christmas Eve he saw how frustrated I was getting when I couldn't find a good fitting dress. He pulled out my Christmas present and it was this dress! It fits so nice! Just a little bit long but I expect that with everything cause I'm so short! I felt so pretty and flowy wearing it. The color of the overlay is so delicate like cafe au lait and the lace makes it look so dainty. If I was getting married, this would be my reception dress.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress to at
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress to attend my husband's company Christmas party, which also happened to be on my 50th birthday...so I decided to buy a new dress and be Fifty and Fabulous! This dress was everything I hoped. It's very well made. The lace is beautiful and the bow at the neck is a very feminine touch. I got many compliments on the dress! Love, love, love!!!

FitList.review_summary: I wanted to love this. I
FitList.review_text: I wanted to love this. I wore it for my rehearsal dinner. It's cute and unique but not flattering at all. Prepare to not feel sexy, maybe cutesy. I don't even have a photo wearing it because I felt like a frump.
Another good piece from ryu. Can't say anything bad about it . Just watch out for the lace not to get hook
this is a beautiful dress! fits perfectly, very comfortable. just be careful not to let the top layer get snagged on anything as it is very delicate.
loved this dress. felt so pretty!

FitList.review_summary: Wore this to emcee a majo
FitList.review_text: Wore this to emcee a major event of 2100 people. Got tons if compliments. The inner dress us quite form fitting so shapewear is a good idea but the overlay gives you the illusion of more space. Color is great and so was the length: short enough to show off some legs but the rest is roomy enough to leave the rest to the imagination. The large fit perfectly.

FitList.review_summary: My boyfriend and I were i
FitList.review_text: My boyfriend and I were invited to a vintagethemed event, and I had this dress express shipped so it would arrive in time! I was so relieved when I tried it on, and it fit perfectly! :) The bow around the neck is just lovely, and the dress itself is very comfortable. I do recommend sizing down. I am normally a large, and the medium was a great fit for me. Highly recommend this dress!
This dress was perfect for both my graduation and a few weddings!

FitList.review_summary: It looks great when bow i
FitList.review_text: It looks great when bow is very small and tied high up on my neck. It was quite large in the armpits.
This dress is perfect probably the best thing I bought from this site

FitList.review_summary: I wore this as my bridesm
FitList.review_text: I wore this as my bridesmaids dress in my best friends wedding and it was perfect! I'm shorter so I had it taken up a little bit but that's optional. And I also added a snap to the top shoulder because the tie that ties around the neck is also what keeps it up and I just wanted it to feel more secure. But overall this dress was perfect and I can't wait to wear it again!
I originally bought this dress for my bridal shower but ended up wearing it to my dads country outdoor wedding. This dress is fun, and I love it! I received so many compliments!
Love everything about this dress. I'm fuller on the top so the small was a bit tight. I exchange for a medium and it's perfect!

FitList.review_summary: I wore this dress to my d
FitList.review_text: I wore this dress to my daughter's wedding and it was an absolute hit. Everyone asked where I got it from and of course I told them! It was well worth the money.
Everyone loved this dress and it is even more beautiful in person! I usually wear a medium but a small fit me perfect. This dress is a little shapeless but I think it's still flattering!
looks prettier on web sight than it dose on.

It's definitely more of a taupe than a blush, and it's absolutely beautiful.  I just wish it was more of an Aline as opposed to a sheath underneath that gorgeous tulle layer.   Fantastic, but not right for me.

FitList.review_summary: Wasn't as formal as it lo
FitList.review_text: Wasn't as formal as it looked in pictures and needed it for a black tie, so I sent it back. It was surprisingly really soft and easy to wear. Maybe not the best shape for my short and curvy figure.

FitList.review_summary: I could take it or leave
FitList.review_text: I could take it or leave it!

FitList.review_summary: This is a pretty dress bu

a little loose (but nothing noticeable to the onlooker); gorgeous dress and absolutely worth the $!!; online ModCloth image a bit more pink in hue compared to the actual dress, which is more brown in hue due to the sheer material

FitList.review_summary: The thing I loved most ab
FitList.review_text: The thing I loved most about this dress was the QUALITY. Right out of the box, it was such a beautiful fabric and was so soft and well made. I felt like a princess in this dress. Being VERY tall, this dress hit me perfectly midthigh. I know some reviews mentioned it was more brown then pictured, however I did not find this at all. I would highly recommend this dress for any formal occasion. It is classy and fun yet sophisticated. Love love LOVE!
Wearing to my cousins wedding, it's so perfect

FitList.review_summary: I love the dress. I'm pre
FitList.review_text: I love the dress. I'm pregnant and the reason why I chose the dress coz the style can fit me even if my belly expands. Before I got pregnant, I'm a medium. Ordered a large just so I'll have an allowance. Large was a bit big for me, should've stuck w medium, though it's my fault. Kinda hard to predict your size when you're pregnant.

Oh my goodness this dress! Loved it the second I saw it finally broke down and bought it for my anniversary. I am the girl who always has the hardest time finding dresses. I was very weary because the largest size was a large but it was perfect!!! So so so happy and my fianc? loved it to!

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! I boug

The overlay is long enough to hit me at the knee (I'm 6 ft) but the skirt under it is very short and comes just above my mid thigh. No matter what though I love it and I can't wait for more events to wear it to!

FitList.review_summary: I felt it was slightly lo

This dress is gorgeous! I wish it was the tiniest bit longer but itnis still very modest. I have ordered it in merlot too!

FitList.review_summary: I wore this to my cousin'
FitList.review_text: I wore this to my cousin's summer outdoor wedding in Monterey. I was in a pinch to find a dress and this is what showed up on my Modcloth search.  Good quality,  the chiffon overlay gives it an ethereal, feminine touch and compliments were aplenty.  A little pricey for $99.99, but I haven't seen anything similar to it elsewhere.

The only downfall to this item is that I believed it would have more of a pale rose color, when infact it was more of a light beige/brown.Still way adorable and super comfortable. (Which are two traits that do not usually coincide with each other.)Very well made and the fabric feels incredible! :D
This dress is so elegant and flattering, I absolutely love it!

FitList.review_summary: I got this dress for my h
FitList.review_text: I got this dress for my high school prom and it's still my favorite dress to this day!

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress so much

FitList.review_summary: I had to get the actual d
