Love love love this dress it's perfect ??

This dress is an absolute head turner! I wore it to a wedding and received many compliments . It is so classy. I wore one those stick on bra and danced all night . I matched it with gold shoes and red clutch for a pop of color. The dress is lined. Be careful if you wear jewelry , the top fabric can get tied up with your accessory.Beautiful dress!

FitList.review_summary: I had to order a size too
FitList.review_text: I had to order a size too big but had it altered to fit. Very elegant and classy piece.
Love this dress!!!! Fit and quality is beautiful. I'm 5'6 150 pounds and medium fit perfect. Love !!!

This dress is absolutely adorable.  I bought it in a shop in St. Augustine FL and had purchased one from them last year as well. This is so comfortable and pretty!  So glad I found the website.  Their dresses are lovely!

My doubts with this dress were confirmed once it came to my doorstep. This dress is meant for tall girls with no curves. Also, the lace is plain brown. The picture online made the lace look pink. The third issue is that there is only one shoulder strap. The bow is the strap for the other side, so there's no way to fluff up the bow or tie it loosely without the dress hanging too low on one side.

FitList.review_summary: Lovely dress! One of my f
FitList.review_text: Lovely dress! One of my favorites this far. It's everything the description says. The nude underlay had to be taken in just a tad but other than that great quality!
Best summer dress ever!!! I recieved so many compliments on the dress. I felt so great and confident in this dress.
Love this dress! Fits perfect and very comfy.

Knowing that this isn't my normal style in a dress I went with it anyway cause I loved the look of it. I'm so glad I did. The dress is great quality but I do find that it takes a bit of effort to make the bow lie right. In saying that it could be my lack of now tying skills! As another reviewer suggested I will be taking the underlay in to figure hug a little cause I feel that the dress looks better on me that way.

Beautiful dress! I felt pretty wearing it and got lots of compliments. The outer layer is super flowy, but did get caught on my bracelet a few times. This dress is very forgiving. I can't wait to wear it again!
The dress was incredible. I am the mother of the Bride and people couldn't quit talking about how perfect it was. Thank you for getting this dress back in. Absolute favorite!'

Ryu dresses are awesome.  I love this style of dress.  With this dress I have two such styled dresses.  I originally purchased the Time and Grace dress in L but had to return it.  This style does run big.  I sent the dress back and requested an exchange for a M but it was sold out by the time my package was received.  Luckily they restocked the M and I got it. YAY!  I am looking forward to wearing this cute dress soon.

Beautiful dress with soft flowing material. I was worried this may be 'sacklike' for my shape, but it was very flattering. Many compliments on this unusual but stunning dress. It get very dressy paired with taupe round toe pumps and simple pearl earrings.
The dress is amazing quality just looked like it was way too big on me. I buy this style of dress quite often because they are so comfortable and easy to wear.
Love

This dress is amazing. Very flattering and comfortable. Well made. Totally worth the price! Only problem is the color. It's more of a beige/ antiqueish white.....I wanted to wear it to upcoming weddings and I don't want to any version of white out of respect for the bride.....I am definitely keeping it because I love it so!
Gorgeous dress that has that perfect  difference about it.  Very comfortable and perfect dress to wear all night at a wedding!
The color looks almost peach in the picture but is more nude/tan in person. I love this dress so much and can't wait to wear it!
Love love love this dress. Wore it to a wedding and the bride kept telling me how much she loved MY dress. Perfect fit, was so comfortable. Great purchase
I ordered this dress for a summer wedding and I am in love. I tried it on and it is perfect. I feel like pictures just don't even come close to doing it justice.
this dress is just stunning.  everything works.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress sooo mu
FitList.review_text: I love this dress sooo much that when it came back and there was only one large left I bought it anyway.  It is so lovely but I am leaving the tags on hoping and praying that is comes back in a medium!  I will wear the large but I will definitely have to pin it.  Perfect dress for my rehearsal dinner.

This dress is beautiful. The material is thick and nice and heavy. The bow on the sleeve adds just the right amount of girly without over powering the dress. I am really tall and this hit me right above my knee.

This dress was SO PRETTY but it was HUGE!  I bought the small and ended up sending it back there was not an XS.  It could have been fixed by a seamstress, but I didn't want to have to go through all that!

FitList.review_summary: This dress is much more b
FitList.review_text: This dress is much more brown than depicted....it will not work at all for spring. Pretty design but based on colour I think I will be returning.

This dress is a stunner. Amazingly gorgeous and beautiful. It was big in the bust/arm pit area and when I went to exchange it for a medium I saw that it is sold out. I decided to take it to a seamstress and have it taken in, as I am not going to let go of it without another being shipped. This dress is comfortable with a looser fit. Very flattering and the bow at the neck is such a girly detail. This is one of the most beautiful garments that I have ever purchased.

I bought this dress several months ago as I love maxi dresses for the summer. Absolutely in love with this dress! Get more compliments with it than any other. Fits beautiful and great shape for slightly curvier girls. Have been debating getting another in one of the other colours.

FitList.review_summary: So comfortable and fits so well!
FitList.review_text: This is my very first purchase from modcloth. I'm always hesitant to buy things online because of fitting issues. However, this dress won me over. It is SO comfortable and fits my body perfectly. Now that I have it I want to buy all the other prints!
Fits well, very flattering, but the material is a bit cheaper than expected for the price

Gorgeous maxi dress that I love! Though the front V part does still a little lower than it does on the model. But while I'm big busted, it hasn't become a problem yet. The length of this dress just touches the floor when I'm in flats, so when paired with some wedges it's absolutely perfect. A great casual summer outfit.

FitList.review_summary: I loved this dress!  I go
FitList.review_text: I loved this dress!  I got many compliments.  It does wrinkle easily but overall was a great pick!

I call this the constant compliment dress because every time I wear it I get a ton of compliments (and not just from people I know!). The fit and cut are flattering, love the color. I wanted black but it was out of stock, so I got blue. Very pretty dress.

I love this dress! Perfect color for darker skin. I got a lot of compliments. Only negative  is that the top did not quite fit me. Runs large. I was able to figure it out by sewing the neck line up a bit and making it more of a off the shoulder look. Great buy! Don't regret it!

FitList.review_summary: I LOVE this dress and so does everyone else!
FitList.review_text: I'm 5'5 and 135 lbs.  I bought this in this gorgeous blue in a Medium.  It is very true to size and makes my waist look small. The fabric is soft,breathable and comfortable.The cut is really pretty too...dramatic front and back V, but conceals my bra well.  It is a bit long  I have to wear it with a 3 or 4 inch heel....not a big deal.   EVERY time I wear it, women tell me how much they love it and ask where I purchased it. My only complaint is that the fabric started pulling out of the seam on the front bust panel where it meets the waist band.  I had to stitch it to reinforce it.  If you purchase this, you may want to reinforce the stitching preventatively.

This is a gorgeous dress! I never spend this kind of money on clothes but blues are my favorites and you don't see these bright blues too often.  I bought the medium and it fits perfect. (The only thing that would make it better is if I had some C's or D's to fill out the top!)  The way it's cut, it gives you a very nice silhouette and accentuates the waist.  A nice light fabric, it will be perfect during the summer  or yearround if you live in the south like me :)
a lovely long length

Thinner fabric, but breathable and machine washable. I feel very beautiful in this dress and found the length to be perfect for me. Lots of cleavage without a Cami, but easy to dress up or down! I have broader shoulders and did not find the sleeves to be loose when you pull the waist down to where it should be sitting (thus the cleavage).
I always get compliments when I wear this dress. It's almost impossible not to. It's such a beautiful blue color in person too. Love this dress

Hi waited for this dress to be back specifically to wear to a friend's wedding. This dress is amazing and fits perfect. The stretch panel in the back allows for a Bit of some wiggle room if you aren't sure of sizing. The material can wrinkle fairly easy but other than that it floats around and it just is the comfiest prettiest maxi !!

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! It is
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! It is cute/flattering, comfortable, and quite warm (which is actually unfortunate for me since it means I can't wear it yearround where I live). Considering getting another in a different color, too.
Only complaint is that the top is snug and because I'm busty, the waist sits a little higher than I'd like. Otherwise, this was exactly what I was looking for. I love the color.

FitList.review_summary: I wanted to love this! Th
FitList.review_text: I wanted to love this! The skirt shape and draping was perfect but the top fit a little too snugly for a comfortable item. Returned.
Love, love, love this sweater dress. It's perfect for winter. Such a great color and feels great. Highly recommend.

Love this dress so much! It is cozy and the length is perfect for my height. Couldn't have asked for anything more.
Warm and flattering. A bit short but one with tights and boots. Lots of compliments.
So pretty! Thick, quality material. Not snug in the tummy so it is very flattering.

FitList.review_summary: The fit was a little slou
FitList.review_text: The fit was a little slouchy, and the quality was poor for the price. I returned this.

FitList.review_summary: I love the fit and color
FitList.review_text: I love the fit and color of this dress. I've had it for awhile now and it still looks great. Comfortable and warm for dressy occasions when it's cool out. Only downside, the fabric is a little bit itchy. Would have gotten a 5/5 if it hadn't been itchy. That said, I don't find it intolerable and I'm usually really bad about itchy clothes. I can't wear anything wool (even cashmere) directly on my skin cause I find it too itchy but I can wear this dress as is and it's worth it.Sizing note:I typically wear a medium, but like my clothes a little on the looser size so I got a large and it falls well but I could have worn a medium in this dress just fine also for a more formfitting look.

This dress is so comfortable! I love the shape and the details too. It's so nice to be able to throw this dress on and still look put together. I've already received several compliments on this dress. Perfect for the holiday season as well!
Love this! Mak brand, which everything I've ever owned by then has held for for years and I expect this to do the same. Fits perfectly, stretchy but has shape to it. Love the detailing as well!

This dress is wonderful! The fabric stretches and the pattern of the braids is flattering on any body type.  The only down side is that the dress is a little shorter than I expected, so I can't wear it without tights. However, as it is made to be worn in the cold, I'm fine with tights!
Cute dress but weird fit for me. Not flattering at all. The waist part came up too high and didn't accentuate my actual waist, making me look chunky. I'm 5'6.
Fits nice and is wellmade.  It hasn't been cold enough to wear it yet, though!

FitList.review_summary: I loved the fit of this d

Love this sweater dress! Fits like a dream over my chest, and it's super comfortable in the upcoming colder weather.
Beautiful, nice quality dress. The length hits me just above the knees, so it may be a bit short on someone taller. Know this will be a goto dress for me this fall and winter. #ReviewContest

I was super nervous initially to purchase an outfit for the first time here but the dress for my body type worked out wonderfully!! The material is really soft (like a handmade throw blanket.) The dress hits just above my knees and the sleeve are not tight at all! This dress fits like a glove! I am so glad I made the decision to make this purchase.

I bought this sweater dress in burgundy last year and have absolutely LOVED it!!! When I saw it in Forest, I bought it as a gift for my sister along with the Turn Back Time pendant. She looks amazing in it and loves it!! She is 5'8 and a 36 DD.

FitList.review_summary: It's a nice dress but sen
FitList.review_text: It's a nice dress but sent it back because it was a little too short for me.

FitList.review_summary: A bit short, but still gr

FitList.review_summary: The color of this dress i

However, it didn't fit to my waist and ended up making me look wide and bulky. If paired with a belt, I could see that problem going away.

I've had it for about six months now and there has been pilling, but nothing unexpected from a sweater. I usually pair it with tights because it's just a little shorter than I'm comfortable with but I'd recommend this dress to anyone.
LOVE this Dress!  Fit perfectly, and very flattering.  Will be great for the winter holiday season as well.  #ReviewContest
Warm and cozy and cute.

FitList.review_summary: I have this in green and
FitList.review_text: I have this in green and red.  It is hands down the most flattering dress I own but I can only wear it a few times a year (I live in Southern CA).  But whenever I can wear it I do, because it is SO flattering and cute!  With tights and tall boots it's perfect!
Fits very comfortably. A winter favorite.

FitList.review_summary: Love this dress! It is so
FitList.review_text: Love this dress! It is so comfortable and fits great!

I've been wearing this a few months now and I have to say it is holding up really well for a knitted acrylic sweater dress. Since I am wearing it at least twice a week there are a few things to note: a) This dress pills under the arm b) the knit is loose by which I mean that it will snag if you brush up against anything poking out c)  the sleeves will stretch out of shape. I have hand washed it once, and will do so again to see if it helps spring the knit back into shape.
Great fit. Super comfy and flattering

Cute and warm sweater dress. I have always loved sweater dresses but never bought them since I never felt I could wear the tight styles around my tummy. This dress is perfect with the aline cut. It hits me just above my natural waist, but I am short torsoed, so I could see how the waist would be too high for some. I went out on a limb ordered the medium since it was the only one left. I normally would go for a small, but found the medium to fit well. A bit big in the waist, but not noticeably. Overall I am pleased with this dress. I recommend folding, not hanging to store as I think it could easily lose its shape. I wore it on Christmas and received tons of compliments.

Love, Love, LOVE the Warm Cider Dress! Bought this to wear for Christmas Eve dinner and wore it with some black tights and the Just in the Kick of Time booties. Got SO many compliments. I'm 4'11 and the length is perfect for me, slightly below my knee (although I can see that being an issue for taller girls). It is VERY warm. Just mind the care label  it is Acrylic, but it wears like wool, so you might want to wash it in cool water and hang dry it.

FitList.review_summary: I really wanted to like t
FitList.review_text: I really wanted to like this dress, and I didjust not on me. I'm a petite gal with a large chest and this dress made me look like one gigantic boob. It fit everywhere else in the large side, but ultimately the fit of the chest just won't work for me, so I am sending it back.

FitList.review_summary: This was very cute! A bit
FitList.review_text: This was very cute! A bit big around the waist, but I had to size up for my chest. The asymmetric buttons on the left shoulder are cute too.
Really cute and warm

FitList.review_summary: I really wanted to love t
FitList.review_text: I really wanted to love this dress! The material and color are wonderful and the length is decent, but the dress is not flattering to women with larger chests. The waistline ended up hitting me right under my breasts, making me look very top heavy. It's definitely a dress for ladies with smaller chests.

This looked awful on me. I was so excited for this dress, as I'm a redhead with green eyes, and just *needed* to have this sweater dress. There were only a few reviews, but they were all positive. I'm so sad! The bust and sleeves of the dress were waaaay too tight. If you have any arms at all, they'll just look like sausages in this dress. I have a long torso, so the waistline hit just under my boobs and tented out from just above my hips, making my lower half look three sizes bigger than my upper half, and NOT in a good way. The little knit balls on the skirt of the dress reminded me of the green shag carpet we had in my house when I was little; again, not in a good way. Sigh. It's not the dress, it's me. The search continues! Thank you, ModCloth, for your awesome return policy!
Cute dress and good quality,  just didn't look right on me.  A little itchy but not bad
Cute dress it just looked and felt frumpy on my slender frame sent it back

FitList.review_summary: Wish it was a bit smaller
FitList.review_text: Wish it was a bit smaller. It runs a little large and billows out at the hips.

This dress ended up being too small for me. I think, because of my disproportionately larger bust, the waste line drew up in the front and wasn't flattering. Also, it was shorter than I had anticipated.
Lovely dress, but too highwaisted and short. I'm 5'4, but still the waist band was about 34 above my natural waistline. Sorta looked like a maternity dress on me. Sending back.
Love this dress.  Great for cozy fall days and great for cold weather.

FitList.review_summary: This does look just as am
FitList.review_text: This does look just as amazing on as it does in the photos. While it is fairly complex design for a sweater dress, I find I can get away with wearing it casually as well as 'dressed up.' The fibers are surprisingly hardy and held up to an entire day at the arboretum without getting stretched out. The one bummer is this dress's waist line is not low enough to hit me where my natural waist is, but I am unusually long waisted so for the majority of people out there this shouldn't be a problem!
Makes a great fall/winter dress! Great colour too!
This sweater dress is so soft and comfortable. Its short, but so am I so it hits just above my knee. The color is green, but not forest. Has blue hues, but I still adore it.

FitList.review_summary: The quality and look of t
FitList.review_text: The quality and look of this dress was cute and the fit was fine except that the waist was unusually high. For this reason I decided to return it, but if it had hit my waist where it was supposed to, it would have been cute.

FitList.review_summary: I saw reviews where it wa
FitList.review_text: I saw reviews where it was too short, but it was perfect on me  I'm 5'2 and usually wear a petite small. Love the color, soft knit fabric feels great.

FitList.review_summary: Love the color and the fi
FitList.review_text: Love the color and the fit is cute! It's a little itchy, but putting a slip underneath will fix that! :)
So warm and cozy.  Looks great with boots.

FitList.review_summary: Such a comfy dress!  I re
FitList.review_text: Such a comfy dress!  I recommend adding a belt, and layering it up!  Leggings, leg warmers, boots, a belt, a scarf, and a jacket!
I love this dress! Sweater dresses are often hard to wear unless you're stick thin, but this one is both warm and flattering. I will wear the crap out of this dress.
This dress is so lovely.  It fits great and the knit is comfortable, not at all itchy.  The color is really pretty too.

FitList.review_summary: I ordered this dress in O
FitList.review_text: I ordered this dress in October 2015 and I LOVE IT! It fits exact and the length hits around my kneecaps. I don't have a lot of green sweaters in my wardrobe, but that has changed now :)  The color goes with both black or brown tights and boots. It's adorable!  Shipping was super fast and I had the garment in less than a week.

FitList.review_summary: This dress is lovely! I d
FitList.review_text: This dress is lovely! I didn't find it itchy at all, which was a concern after reading a few reviews, and the fit is perfect! The color is true to the photo and the skirt flows out from my natural waist. My only critique is that the light does show through the skirt, so either a slip or dark, opaque tights are recommended. I'm very happy with this purchase.
No complaints. Exactly what I thought it would be. Nice and warm, perfect length, doesnt ride up.

FitList.review_summary: I own this dress in every
FitList.review_text: I own this dress in every color. Super flattering and comfortable. Best sweater dress I've ever found!
Love this dress. A little on the short side, but nice and warm and good with tights.
The dress was really nice.

Color: I ordered the Forest green but the dress is slightly more bluishgreen and matches the Peacock color label that was printed on the dress's wrapper.  There's even a separate sticker label on the plastic that just says green.  I wish the dress really was the forest green that I ordered but I like the blue/green color too so I'm keeping it.Size:I ordered both the S and M. Though I liked the length of the M I opted for the shorter and slightly more fitted feel of the S since I'll be wearing this with tights.  Also, this dress is slightly longer in the front and back (vs the sides) just like in the sample photo of the grey dress.

FitList.review_summary: I LOVE this dress! It's a
FitList.review_text: I LOVE this dress! It's a beautiful color and the details are perfect. I didn't find it to be itchy at all, and I have pretty sensitive skin. I did have to take it in a little at the waist, but after that it fits perfectly. It is short on me, but all my height is in my legs so I've come to expect that from most Modcloth dresses. I'll be wearing it with tights most of the time anyway, so no big deal. I can't wait to get this in the other colors!

lovely dress!  a bit short for my tastes,  a younger gal probably wouldn't mind,  but as other reviews say: just put on some tights!  for me,  it's loose at the waist,  but it adds comfort in my opinion.  I'm happy with this purchase!

Fit was perfect. The dress is a good weight and the knit fabric quality good. It has a bit of stretch, but not enough to loose it's shape. It was a fun dress to wear. I wore it with a long dog tag style chain necklace, tights and black boots. I love the rich forest green colour.
The top fits perfectly, but the bottom is a bit loose. I like it with boots. Not itchy.
A lovely dress! It's made of very warm materials and provides stretch! Very flattering!

FitList.review_summary: I have this dress in grey
FitList.review_text: I have this dress in grey and I loved everything about it so when I saw it in green I snatched it up! It is lovely and thick for the winters here And with a pair of sweater tights and little booties it's adorable! If it comes in more colors I will get them all! The green is a nice shade of pine a little darker than the photos online, the length is perfect and it fits like a glove.

FitList.review_summary: Just didn't love it on. F
FitList.review_text: Just didn't love it on. Felt good to see it was a bit big.  It as cute on as it is on the model.

I am in LOVE with this dress. It is so elegant and beautiful, especially the neckline. The neckline is a little higher than usual, but the fact that it is unlined makes it sooooo pretty on. This dress is a bit pricey but well worth the money; I can see myself wearing this to multiple parties and events. The lace fabric feels like it is quality and has some weight to it, which is nice. I'm 5'5 and this hits me right at the knee/slightly below the knee. If you're worried about the fit,  I would say to consider sizing down. I ordered my usual size, but because of the elastic waist (which, by the way, hits slightly higher than my natural waist), I could have easily sized down on it. The waist is the most fitted part of the dress; the flared shape of the skirt elegantly glides over hips, so sizing down shouldn't cause you any fit problems on the bottom half.

I thought this dress was really pretty, the design makes your boobs look a little odd. The length is to the knees a little past them. Sizing is off, I normally am a L and needed the XL. I am a 38 DDD, 168lbs

FitList.review_summary: I got a 2x. I found it sl
FitList.review_text: I got a 2x. I found it slightly large (could be cos it has a v back) so I'm returning it for a 1x so hopefully it's tighter across my back. The quality is lovely, as is the fabric and the rest of the fit. Fingers crossed the 1x is right!

I love the look of this dress, but I agree with others that the waist was too short for me. It came up almost like an empire waist. Maybe if I sized up it would work. Luckily Modcloth has a great return policy :)
Very happy with this dress. It's the godly locks of black dresses. Not too fancy, not too plain... it's perfect!

I'm 5'8 and purchased the small. The size was perfect, and the length is absolutely phenomenal!! Ends just above the knees. Totally something you can wear to work. HOWEVER the fit was strange... I have more of an athletic, muscular figure, and the butterfly wings on the dress ended up looking like shoulder pads. Rather than looking classy and ready for work, I looked like I was about to bust out the door and play me some football haha. The waist also looked shorter in person than it did on the model. This dress might be better fitted for women with tiny/more narrow shoulders. I returned it.

I read a review that said this might not work if you have a long torso. This is correct! I am 5'10'' size 6 with a long torso and the waist hit too high on my body. It wasn't quite an empire waist, but it was well enough above my natural waist to make me look heavier than I really am. I felt very childish in this.The quality seemed nice though.
It's perfect! Shape is very cute, accent ruffles & sash are flattering. Length is great for multiple occasions & dress can be dressed up or down as needed

I purchased this beautiful dress over a month ago to wear to my mum's funeral. It was super classy and I didn't feel that I had to wear a sweater with it since it covered me but still didn't feel frumpy. Not sure if it was the stress eating of everything but it was a tiny bit tight. Still fit flatteringly though. I paired it with some sheer polkadot stockings. The quality of the fabric was quite nice and doesn't require ironing either. Overall I would definitely recommend it.

FitList.review_summary: Waist fits great, but long in the torso.
FitList.review_text: I purchased a Small, and the waist fits great on me. Skirt length ends right around the knees. The only problem is the dress is too long for my torso, it has a saggy appearance around the Vshaped back, chest, and reveals the bra in the arm holes. If I fold over the material on my shoulder about an 1inch on both sides, I suddenly have a perfect fit all around. I like it, so I'll keep it and have the top altered.

I love this dress. The material is very high quality, and the silhouette is beautiful and flattering.  I love the flutter sleeves and the gold zipper down the back. Definitely worth the price! I am 165 pounds and 5'5. The L was perfect. The dress hits the very tops of my knees.
This dress is very flattering and just as cute on as it is in the picture. perfect length.
I am 5'9 and 150 lbs. The medium fits fine. I'm so happy to find a dress that isn't too short! The fabric and stitching are great quality.

FitList.review_summary: Better suited for a small bust
FitList.review_text: I like the fabric and some of the sewing details, such as on the shoulders. However, there didn't really seem to be a bust allowance. While I found it was true to size and zipped up easily, because there was not fabric enough to accommodate my bust, it raised the waistband and made the dress look lopsided (which then emphasized my stomach; not something I am looking for).I'd say it's really well suited for someone who has a small or flat chest, especially because there are no side darts. There is enough fabric for it to accommodate a broad ribcage, just less so if there's a large bust as well.  For length, it came to my knees. Had it not been for the awkward fit from the waist up, I would have kept it.
Thanks so much for your review! What a perfect homecoming dress! If you have photos, we'd love it if you shared them to our style gallery! Here's the link: https://www.modcloth.com/style-gallery/
Truly obsessed with this dress! It's so classy and comfortable and i got so many compliments in it. It's perfect!

FitList.review_summary: I really love the color s
FitList.review_text: I have been wanting to make a Modcloth purchase for quite sometime, but I have had my reservations because I am very picky with how clothing fits me. I am the person who tries things on a couple of times before I make a purchase. I saw this dress and was immediately in love with it!! I took the plunge and bought it and I am SO happy with it! I got it in the mail a few days before the event due to some snow that delayed delivery. I put it in and immediately felt confident and beautiful. The fit is absolutely great!! There is extra padding for the girls, but I still recommend wearing at least a strapless bra with the dress if you have a bigger cup size like me. A definite 10/10 on my first Modcloth purchase, and I can't wait to make my next one! And wear this dress again :) < 3

Love this dress in theory, but in person it was a bit poofier (lots of tulle) and youngerfeeling than I had anticipated. It felt more like a high school homecoming dress and less like an office holiday party dress. The tulle and mesh overlay definitely make it feel cheaper and less formal. However, it's super flattering and the color is beautiful! I would absolutely recommend it for school dances and formals and the like. Also, I went by the modcloth size chart and ended up buying two sizes up from what I normally wear, and it fit me perfectly. So I would suggest going by the size chart and knowing your measurements! I also had help from a modstylist which I highly encourage.
LOVE chichi London!

I love this dress. normally I fall between a 2x and 3x with modcloth. I went with just a tad bigger of a size and I love it. My only complaint is the zippwr sticks right at the bodice. Not a size issue but the zipper itself. I have to have a second set of hands to get in it.
LOVE THIS DRESS!!!! Stunning, I just don't have many places to wear it to
Beautiful dress! a little roomy in the chest but nothing that cant be fixed.
The color is brighter and lighter than the picture, the skirt is huge and made me look big, and the neckline is strange. It is going back. Far too much net

FitList.review_summary: I am so happy with this!
FitList.review_text: I am so happy with this! I 5'10 and this dress hit right above the knee. The skirt is fuller than I was expecting, but I think I can remedy that. The embroidery is very high quality and there are built in pads for the bra. Very nice quality, I can't wait to wear it to my ball.

FitList.review_summary: A bit too poofy in real l
FitList.review_text: A bit too poofy in real life for my taste. Also the color is very red. Loved the top part of the dress though, and beautiful quality.

Overall this is a STUNNING dress! Seriously gorgeous! The fit is slightly smaller as the description said, but since I'm typically between a 2 and a 4 it fit perfectly. The quality is great, lots of tulle but it has good structure to it. I find it very comfortable and so flattering! The top has one of those tough small zippers, but it zips up tight and it has builtcups. The length is a midlength style, and the skirt is a little full. The color is a deep rose color just like the picture. This dress is gorgeous and it makes me feel so elegant. Can't wait to wear it to a wedding!

FitList.review_summary: A bit tight in the bust b
FitList.review_text: A bit tight in the bust but an otherwise very flattering fit.

This dress is perfect for a pear body type, but wouldn't work for anyone else. Although the fabric is beautiful and soft, there's no give, so the waist won't budget. If you're a pear, give it a go, it's a soft printed fabric, not thick at all. It's a favourite.

I really wanted to love this dress, and it looks super cute on a hanger. The bodice is disproportionately small to the bottom half of the dress, and I'm not stacked up top. I have no idea how it would ever fit someone who was. The material is nice, but the construction makes me sad. I took a chance and got this on final sale, so can't return it  have to see if I can work some magic on the sizing.
The bodice in this dress is tiny! And I am by no means a large chested lady. It's really lovely once you have the correct size.

I loved this pattern and the style of this dress online. Receiving it, I immediately noticed poor construction. The waist along the back was not lined up, and had black fabric from the lining sewn into the outside of the dress. I actually ordered two, one for a friend. And both ended up being returned. Really disappointing and the first time I've ever been disappointed by quality from ModCloth.

FitList.review_summary: The dart on the side with
FitList.review_text: The dart on the side with the zipper wasn't right. The other side fit perfectly but this one stuck out about an inch off my chest and about an inch and a half too high. Otherwise the dress was perfect! So sorry to send it back.

FitList.review_summary: I really like the built i
FitList.review_text: I really like the built in slip and weight of this dress.  I was in the process of shedding major lbs so it didn't fit at first, but now I can get it zipped.  It doesn't have any give so you need the correct size.  I wear a 10 I'm dresses and the large fits, a tad small where it zips up because of my bust.  Once it's on it's not noticeable.

FitList.review_summary: The zipper on this was a
FitList.review_text: The zipper on this was a little hard to get done on this dress but otherwise a great fit and super cute!
Adorable!  Tons of compliments!

FitList.review_summary: Had I known this dress wa
FitList.review_text: Had I known this dress was made by Yellow Star I wouldn't have purchased it. Every dress I own by them the fabric tears in the pleats because it's too thin.  I gave it 4 stars cause it fits me nicely, the length is perfect and I like the pattern.
Cute

I didn't want to believe the reviews but this dress is a bit of a let down. I assumed the side zipper wouldn't bother me but it's true it's very tight. This dress is also one of those that has no give. I bought XL since many said it ran small and I'm between a L and XL and it fits perfect mostly but is pretty tight on my bust and I have to be careful getting dressed not to pull at it. I was pretty surprised at how thin it was, and the waist isn't as fitted as I hopped. It's a cute dress but just not one of my favorites and definitely not worth the price.

Very soft, comfortable, and fits me well! I was nervous that the S would be too big since I'm sometimes an XS, but it fits well, and I've gotten lots of compliments on it. Still looks and fits the same after washing it on cold.

FitList.review_summary: This is a dress by Yellow
FitList.review_text: This is a dress by Yellow Star. The material has absolutely no give, so it can be too tight or too big, depending on how your body is. For me, I have been a pretty solid size 1X on Modcloth, but this one is a strange fit. It is loose in the waist, but not overly so. You could cinch with a belt and it would be fine. The chest was also baggy, and there was so much open skin exposed without showing much cleavage. Just weird. Finally the sleeves, they are supposed to be cap sleeves, but just look odd and fluttery  NOT what I was going for. There were no saving graces either  no pockets, and a side zipper! Really hard to do by yourself. I will be returning this dress. The print was nice, and so I am disappointed to return.

Really cute dress but WAY too small. I ordered a small which is my normal size and couldn't even zip the zipper up halfway. I think I would have to size up to a large in order to fit into this dress. I am returning it but will probably not order another size. It's too bad because the dress is really cute.

FitList.review_summary: This is a Yellow Star dre
FitList.review_text: This is a Yellow Star dress, fits much smaller than usual.  I own a couple mediums from them, and this one was hard to zip.  The material is not what one would expect, thin polyester fabric.:\\

I measured myself and followed the size chart, but it fits a little large.  I still LOVE this dress.  There's no stretch, but it is still comfy.  The lining is great, too.  No problem with the side zipper, either.  Definitely a good buy.

FitList.review_summary: I love the way this dress
FitList.review_text: I love the way this dress looks on, it is very flattering in all the right places. However, It definitely runs a size down. I ordered a size up and if I ate too many cupcakes for lunch I would have a hard time breathing in it. Also, the zipper was also difficult to zip, I had to engage my daughter for assistance. As well, I am small in the bust area and could NOT wear a bra with this or the top portion would not fit. I had to make due with a bralette for minimal coverage.
Very flattering for a curvy figure, but the zipper is a bit flimsy.

FitList.review_summary: I found the side zipper t
FitList.review_text: I found the side zipper to be a tad awkward, but I think that's just because I'm not used to them. Fits like a glove and is adoooorable.

This dress. Is so amazing. It just arrived today and I'm already so in love with it. I absolutely love the Sunny Girl line and this dress is no different. Amazingly, the XS actually fits well enough in the top section that I can wear it with no bra! This is honestly one of my favorite purchases ever.

Best dress I've purchased on this site! (and there's been a few) it fits perfectly on the top, but doesn't cling to your waist while still showing you have one. I'm a C cup and I can wear it without a bra comfortably! Wore it to a wedding over the weekend and got a million complements. Can totally dress it up or down.

I managed to get this dress in my Stylish Surprise order and I'm so happy with it! I needed something to wear for my two year anniversary and this is perfect. It's light enough to wear in the summer but looks great when layered for colder weather. I can't wear a bra with it because of the bodice design but the adjustable straps give pretty great coverage if you want it. If you're much taller than me (5'2) and get nervous in short dresses, I do recommend a slip; the wrap skirt covers all my bits going up stairs so far, but I can see it being an issue for taller ladies. If I had to nitpick something, a couple of the seams came a bit frayed, but it isn't anything that can't be repaired with minimal effort.

This dress looks great on. I'm a pretty current body type, but it fits really well. I do have to be careful that my boobs don't show too much and that the split in the skirt isn't too open but I do love the dress. The material is a little flimsy, but I don't mind too much.
So adorable! The straps are adjustable, which is nice for the girls. Very sleek fitting. Material is a little shear, you'll have to wear something neutral underneath.
love it!

FitList.review_summary: These reviews got me so e
FitList.review_text: These reviews got me so excited. I'd like to reinforce the fact that the bodice runs small. It still fit, but snugly. As soon as I zipped up, one of the straps popped off, with very very little strain having been applied. It was a strange, clean break. No sign of a tear, just popped off. ModCloth handled it so well by refunding me immediately, with the trust that I would get the dress shipped back. I've been saying this for years: hands down best customer service of any company I deal with, and I deal with a lot of em!

FitList.review_summary: I love the print. The fab
FitList.review_text: I love the print. The fabric is thin and soft. It fits just right. Has a zipper in the back and the straps are adjustable. Not the best quality.

FitList.review_summary: I LOVE this dress! It's s
FitList.review_text: I LOVE this dress! It's so beautiful and classy! I wasn't sure about the length because I am on the shorter side, but it worked well! I cannooooot wait until spring to wear this dress, it's so beautiful :) I'm 5'3 and 117lbs and the xs fits perfectly!

Thought the material was going to be a lot more stretchy and form fitting. The dress had a beautiful pattern and great design, but the fabric ruined it. It sat so stiff on my entire body, and made my figure look so odd. Ended up returning.

This dress was perfect, I ordered it for a wedding and it came just in time! It's absolutely stunning. The fabric is super soft. The only thing I was not super excited about was that this dress will open and show everything you got with he slightest gust of wind.
This dress is really lovely. The material is good quality, and it hits below my knees in the back. It is a wrap style though, so be conscious when you're crossing your legs!

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! I boug
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! I bought it to wear to a wedding in October, and it was perfect. Light enough to dance in, but long enough to wear in church. I plan to wear it for more casual occasions, as well!

This dress is perfect! The color, fit, and length are very flattering. It's also very comfortable, and looks cute both dressed up and down. It's hard to wear a bra with, even my strapless bra was visible, but just slap on some nipple pasties, and you'll be good to go.

My sister is actually the one that got this, but I tried it on and immediately fell in love. It's a sexy dress that I can imagine wearing on a summer night out. It fit like a glove on me (I'm normally small/medium) so you may want to size up. It's also just barely longer than I would like on my legs, but I'm so happy with it.
perfect fit!
Weird fit

This dress is super comfortable and cute. The straps are adjustable so you can go easily from cute summer look to sexy in a snap. My only small complaint is I wish it had some give, because while the bust is fitted, the waist area is loose enough it doesn't emphasize it the way I'd like. But nbd. I can belt it, it's a great dress. The color is stunning!
This dress was too small at the waist. It was also a very thin fabric that I am sure would not have lasted, sort of like a sarong.

FitList.review_summary: It is such a cute dress.
FitList.review_text: It is such a cute dress. Unfortunately,  if you are a little busty, you may want to size up. I am exchanging mine first the larger size. Fingers crossed it fits.

So beautiful! Hides everything it should and flatters every curve perfect. I think I'll need to go braless with it though since every bra I own shows. Not a problem though cause even with DDs I feel safe going barless in it, it holds you in just right ;) My only issue is that I can't figure out what shoes to wear with it! If anyone has a suggestion please help :)
Beautiful dress, slightly snug in the chest area when I wear a bra with it. Although you don't really need one with this dress. Fits my figure, and makes me feel incredibly sexy!

Dress of my dreams! Sexy and sweet at the same time. I can dress it down with a turtleneck underneath or really flaunt what I got if I want. The adjustable straps are amazing, especially for us busty girls. The fabric is relatively thin and soft, in a good way. I've worn it everyday since it was delivered... :)

FitList.review_summary: It is a beautiful dress a
FitList.review_text: It is a beautiful dress and fits as if it were tailored just for me!  The fabric is light and very comfortable. I don't know if anyone with a larger bust would enjoy this, but it's perfect for me.
Lovely and very flattering for an apple shape! Material is very soft!
Nice Dress!
Although I'm not entirely crazy about the pattern, I love the color of the dress and the fit. It's a little snug in the chest area. I may have to go sans bra when I wear it out.
Love love this dress. Perfect fit. So flattering. Great summer dress!
Lightweight, comfortable material paired with a beautiful print and flattering shape make this dress and absolute winner.
So cute for the summer/fall. Fits beautifully especially if you have larger hips :)

This was my wedding dress!  It was perfect for my fun vintage wedding I felt like the poufiness (It IS poufy) and lace made it fancy enough to feel bridal even though it was a scandalously (Kidding!) nontraditional color. This review is also an excuse to post a wedding photo because I am super stoked to be #marriedinmodcloth !

Used as my wedding dress and I LOVED it!PROS  Loved the lace design, colour and length. Well worth the money. CONS  Many layers of tulle made it a bit too poofy for me. Required at least 1 other person to help zip up (easy zip down).NOTES: Took dress to a tailor who said I could have ordered a size smaller. Nonetheless tailor only made slight adjustments to sleeves, took out at least one layer of the tulle and adjusted near the zipper to fit waist.

FitList.review_summary: Quality is WAY beyond the price point
FitList.review_text: I purchased this dress to wear for my wedding.  It was comfortable, very well made, and absolutely gorgeous.  I absolutely did not want to spend a fortune on my wedding dress and I wanted to be able to wear it again for other occasions.  This dress totally fit the bill, and then some!  I ordered a size up in order to fit my bust and broad shoulders and I was right on target.  After viewing the wedding photos, I probably would have benefited by having the dress taken in at the waist. I also did fold down the lace in the middle of my chest and back, as it did not want to lay flat.I received so many compliments on this dress.  When I ordered this dress, lake happened to be the only color option.  But it was a wonderful compliment to my hair and skin tone.  I was easily able to find wonderful accessories to match.I would very much like to add photos, but Modcloth's site isn't letting me at this time.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress, it's b
FitList.review_text: I love this dress, it's beautiful ! Wore this to a wedding and got tons of compliments. I'm 5'7 165lbs and a size 1012 in dresses, the top was snug ( I'm larger chested ) and the zipper was a pain to zip up( 1st time I tried to zip it up I thought it wouldn't go and I got angry and hulked it up and didn't break it so it's not too cheap but I wouldve liked a better constructed zipper ) .On the plus side of the topPart being so snug I didn't need a bra. This will be my go to dress for special occasions . Would size up and have it tailored if I had more time before the event !!

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress!!! I bo
FitList.review_text: I love this dress!!! I bought it specifically to wear to a friend's wedding, and I received so many compliments! After reading other reviews, I decided to order one size larger than I normally would and I'm so glad I did. The material doesn't really have much give to it, so sizing up gave me enough room to move and dance it was perfect! The color of the dress in person is quite a bit darker, but still beautiful. I didn't have a problem with the neckline not sitting right as a few other reviewers did. The length was perfect and I liked the fullness of the skirt. Definitely worth the price, one of my favorite purchases!!!

I purchased this dress for a black tie optional wedding and it was perfect.  I followed the advice of other reviewers and ordered a size up, and I'm glad I did. Fit like a glove. There are molded cups, so I didn't need to wear a bra. I would highly recommend this dress!

This dress is absolutely stunning! I did have to exchange it for a larger size, which Modcloth was amazing about!! I think it's U.K. Sizing, so I was two sizes up from my usual.This dress looks just like the pictures! However, like previous reviews stated, the zipper does stick a bit around the hips/waist, but I think that's due to all the lace and tulle. As a whole, this dress is stunning, and is perfect for weddings, proms, formal events, and dressy photos! I highly suggest it!

FitList.review_summary: So my review is mixed. Th
FitList.review_text: So my review is mixed. The dress is beautiful and I loved it the first time I tried it on. The first problem was the zipper had a lot of trouble zipping. Not because it would fit, but because it was a bad. For the prize it should be that difficult to zip up. If you're short this will cut you off even more length wise. The color was beautiful and the neck line is amazing. Just didn't work for me.

I was really excited about this dress and ordered it for a summer party I am having to celebrate my recent marriage. The lace was just as pretty as in the picture and although I read reviews about the fabric looking cheap, I didn't think this was the case at all. The lake color is just gorgeous! I also loved the length of the dress. Overall, I did really like the dress! I will say though, I agree with some past reviews about the zipper being difficult, even when the dress is off, the zipper is a bit finicky. Also, the dress poofed out  a lot more than in the picture...which is fine, but if you don't want a dress that is a bit poofy, I would consider something else. I normally am fine with some poof but for some reason the way this dress is designed it made me look a bit larger than I am, but I am sure that is not the case for everyone, whether they are my size or not. I did have to end up returning this, but mostly because the dress didn't fit and at the time, they were out of the next size up. This was my first purchase with modcloth, but the return was so easy and hassle free! I also was considering keeping the dress for a couple weeks, and decided against it, and the return still went SO easily. I wasn't even charged for shipping! Because of all of this, I will definitely be looking at clothing at modcloth again and will not have to worry if something isn't

So I'm normally a size 16 in everything, jeans, dresses, shorts, etc., I went ahead and ordered a size bigger, an 18 per all the reviews. When I received the dress, I feel in love, great quality, material, everything, it was gorgeous...one problem, it was too small, 5 inches from zipping up too small! I was devastated. So of course, I put in an exchange, the employees at Modcloth are great, they walked me through getting it done and even referred me to a sizing specialist! When ordering the exchange, I had to go up to the size 22, now have you, I'm now nervous that the dress is going to be insanely large and I would have to get it tailored, all within 3 days of the event...nope, I get it and it fit like a glove, like the dress had my name on it and was made just for me. It is definitely a beautiful dress! Just go with the sizing chart inch by inch, and if any  questions, I definitely recommend calling in, you won't be disappointed.

Gorgeous dress. It's very poofy though, I am considering removing a layer of tulle as there are three and I was expecting the poof one one. Tad bit small but I sized down because my bust is much smaller than my hips.

Love this dress! The fit was great but the zipper would get a little stuck. You have to be extra careful with the delicate material. As for the neck line, it does bunch and fall but a little clothing tape holds it up perfectly.

This dress is beautiful! I got so many compliments! The skirt was a little poofier than I expected so I did take out a layer of tulle. The top was just a little snug and the zipper was a bit tough to manage. Overall I would definitely recommend this dress!

FitList.review_summary: Poof skirt makes it too costumey
FitList.review_text: My daughter wanted to try this dress for her 8th grade graduation ceremony. Although she loved the color, and had no complaints about the quality of the dress overall, she felt like she was wearing a Disney princess costume, so we are sending it back. For other possible buyers, I want to comment on the sizing. This is a typical British dress. I ordered a 4 for my willowy XS daughter for the correct fit.

FitList.review_summary: Beautiful, but not on this petite girl
FitList.review_text: I had a feeling this dress wouldn't work on me, but it's so beautiful and the color (Lake) is really flattering with my fair skin and red hair. So, I took a chance. Unfortunately, it's just too long, and too...much. I'm 5' 0, so the proportions are just wrong. The lace at the top hits my neck in a weird place (and flops over in the middle as others have mentioned), and the skirt could stand to be 8 shorterno hemming on this dress with that beautiful detail at the bottom. Also, as many other reviewers said, the zipper just doesn't want to zip past the seam at the waist, even with my husband's help. I have a little extra girth around my belly, and I have a pretty short torso, so I ordered a size 6 hoping it would fit in the waist without swimming on the rest of me, but alas, the waist was just a teensy bit too tight, and would not have been comfortable to sit in, while the rest was too big. Back it goes :(

FitList.review_summary: Review of the Dress for Women with Curves
FitList.review_text: I am a woman with curves. That being said, I wanted to write a helpful review for the woman who are over a size 12. I am a size 14 on a good day but usually am a size 16 which is the size of this dress that I am wearing in these pictures. The wedding I am wearing  it to is at the end of May so this is not the finished look that I will be wearing it was just for the sake of trying it on and writing a review. I love the dress but it can be a bit cupcake like on me especially at the waist where it poofs out a little too much (see pics). There are 3 layers of tule on my dress and I really think they could have gotten the same effect with less tule, especially on more curvy women and then with less tule it would be more slimming. The biggest complaint I have though is the neckline although it's not a deal breaker. When the dress is on me, it in no way matches the look of the model when it comes to the neckline. There is an awkward scalloped detail along the collar bone and so it does not sit flush against the skin. Whereas on the model, it is perfectly flush along her collarbone. I understand this is most likely because I have more broad shoulders and later breasts however, I think the designer should design and sew it in a way so that it looks very similar on all different kinds of figures. My favorite thing about the dress is the color. This color is exquisite and I really like the lace which makes it look really like a  black tie affair look. I also think the fabric is a nice quality. It is not itchy nor irritating and it is something I could wear all night without being annoyed by the fabric. Finally, the best part about the dress, my breasts are size 36 D and I DO NOT have to wear a bra in order for my girls to stay up and look perky. I think that's awesome because of the fact that if I did wear a normal bra, you would absolutely see the bra straps on this dress. I would recommend this look for curvier women but caution you from thinking that it will fit exactly as it fits on the model. If you purchase it, you have to find a way to make it work on you. I am keeping it and plan to wear it to the wedding in about a month so I will post the pictures of my final look after the wedding!

I am so excited to  have received this dress. No, seriously I was having dreams about it! I screamed when it arrived and when I tried it on, I fell inlove. I  find this dress to be a classic and elegant piece ,and I look forward to wearing it at a friend's wedding. Now let's get to the nitty gritty, although the dress is lovely the zipper is a pain. You will surely need to use some muscle to pull it up. As far as the fit, I suggest If you are in between sizes as I am, size up. I am a 34A ,and a size 6 fits well without it being too lose in the chest area. Lastly, I am short about 5'2 and this dress hit a little below the knees.Overall, I say buy this dress! You won't regret it doll!

I bought this dress in a black friday sale for SUPER cheap for my last minute wedding! It fit perfectly, slightly large in the shoulders. It was comfortable and perfect for our big day. The best part  I didn't have to wear a bra! Perfect. I want to buy it in every color!

I returned this dress.  For $175, I had too many complaints to keep it. My biggest complaint was the lace at the neckline. It didn't look right no matter what I did. It would lie flat in some areas, stand straight up in others, flop forward in others  it's as if the length of lace used was too long so it bunches up oddly.  It was especially noticeable at the back. The lace on the bottom hem behaved similarly, flipping up, curling under.  The skirt is extremely full, making this definitely something only to be worn for a formal event, and the dress is absolutely a midi, unless you are very tall. I'm on the shorter side (5'4), but do wear huge heels, and this still looked too long and cut me off in the wrong place. The quality of the lace and fabric reminded me of a Halloween costume or that cheap fabric they make Barbie doll clothes from.

FitList.review_summary: Nice in the picture, different when you see it in person
FitList.review_text: The dress looked amazing online. I couldn't wait to get it in the mail. When I finally got it, I tried it on right away. The zipper was so hard to zip up. It took everything in me to zip up the zipper. It broke the second time I wore it! The dress is also longer in person and very poofy. I wish I would have known this before buying the dress.

My husband just gave this to me for Christmas! Beautiful color! Yes, the zipper is very hard to do once you get to the waistline but I like that it has a snug fit. The poof is much much bigger than expected, so I'm hoping that I can iron it down or maybe take a layer out? This will be perfect for attending our upcoming show, Wicked!
This dress is simply divine, you can never go wrong with Chichi London. Top quality and elegance.
The scalloped detail along the collar does not sit flush against the skin, instead it flops over.

This dress is beautiful , the color is exactly as shown. It definitely has more tulle than depicted. I'm glad I got a size up because the top is a little small. It runs about 2 inches past my knees. As previous reviewers posted, the zipper is difficult but the dress does make you look like a princess. Would recommend

The dress itself is beautiful! The tulle underneath is sparkly and the embroidered mesh allows a little bit of that shimmer to shine through. However the dress was large on me. I'm usually a size 0 or a 2, but the smallest available here was a 2. Based on other reviews, it sounded like the dress fit perfectly or ran small. I'm glad I didn't size up, as the dress runs large on me. I guess my measurements put me at more of a true size 0, but the dress at a size 2 still seems large. I can just pull it off, although it is very loose around the torso, and the arm holes are big, as you might be able to see in the photos. I'm still debating whether or not I should keep it, or hoping I can find a way to alter it to fit more snugly! Sorry for the terrible quality of the photos.

This dress was really pretty, but with 3 layers of tulle, it was way too poofy. From the pictures, it seems like it lays so nicely on the model, but the poof was huge on me! The zipper was a nightmare, so you'll definitely need someone to zip you in!

FitList.review_summary: I had issues with the zip
FitList.review_text: I had issues with the zipper in between the thicknesses of fabric. I looked fabulous, I got a bunch of complements. The dress is puffy I didn't bother ironing it it just made my waist look smaller. I felt amazing.
This dress is stunning and is sized perfectly. I feel like a princess.

I love this dress...and it has pockets!!  The fit is gorgeous and pretty true to size.  I?m a size 10, possibly a large 8 and the Large fit perfectly.  The dress does wrinkle but the fit is so gorgeous, it doesn?t matter.  I loved the dress so much, I bought 2 more

FitList.review_summary: I feel like an adult vers
FitList.review_text: I feel like an adult version of Wednesday Adams in this dress! Super stretchy, form fitting and very cute! It may be a bit long but not enough that I need to get it hemmed. I love it!

I'm 5'11 and 383142. Per the reviews, I sized up to an XXL from the XL I'd usually order from Modcloth. The skirt fit great, but the waist, chest, shoulders, and sleeves of this dress were way too big. I have wide shoulders, but a narrow ribcage. I'd order a size down, but I worry it won't fit through the hips. I'm returning this.

I purchased this about a month ago. It FINALLY arrived (despite my 10 business day shipping option), and the fabric is really poor quality.  It smells like a wetsuit, and the material feels similar to a wetsuit too.  I was aware it was made from polyester material prior to purchase, however this is BAD polyester. It just seems like really really cheap material... but given the dress costs almost $US70 plus postage, I would expect far greater quality of material. I live in Australia, and we pay a lot for all our goods, which is one of the reasons I love purchasing my clothes online from the USA... but this dress is expensive for Australia, let alone USA prices. In terms of the style.. very cute, the dress fitted me well, ( Im not usually an XL but like my prior Modshop purchases, their sizes seem to be small  I always buy the size up to what I would usually shop), the length was good. If the material had matched the price point, I would have been happy with this dress...

FitList.review_summary: So in love with this dres
FitList.review_text: So in love with this dress.  Perfect length.  Love the stretchy material!

I saw this in a promo email and I snapped it up. Best impulse buy ever. It's modest yet sexy and professional looking. My sizing is in between the XL and XXL so i played it safe and got the XXL. It fits and stretches beautifully. I've only worn it out once and got so many compliments!

I bought this as a small since the overwhelming review was that it was too small. But I should've gone with an XS, as I'm usually a standard XS. The length is a bit long but you can hem it. Will return  the top is too loose all around including sleeves.

Very form fitting yet flattering dress. It has enough stretch that it is easy to move and is amazing with my hourglass figure. The only fit issue I have is the collar sits oddly far away from the back of my neck but I am able to adjust this a bit thanks to the stiffness of the collar. Warning! it is really hard to zip the dress by yourself, it is doable but having some help will save you a fair amount of time and frustration

I am typically a size 4 dress, size medium at Modcloth. I read all the smallsize reviews and prayed that the small would fit since the mediums were sold out. It's VERY formfitting (not a cm to spare!) but I love how it hugs my curves, almost feels like a costume than a regular everyday dress, probably because of the stiff material.

ModCloth, I love you, but the fitting is just so strange here! According to the size chart, I should be able to comfortably wear a size XL in this. But knowing that I typically take a larger size here, I went up to an XXL. And I STILL barely got it zipped up by the skin of my teeth! I needed helpI'll never be able to zip this up when I'm alone in the house. It is SO SNUG. But, now that it's on, I LOVE it. It's the sexiest dress I have that I still consider officeappropriate. It feels cute, sexy, professional, retro, all at once.

It is true to size considering the style is super tight. I feel it like Adma's family! My only complaint is the quality of fabric  not that soft and getting dirty easily. Overall I love wearting this dress almost every day.
After reading the reviews, I am glad I ordered a size up. The medium fits like a dream, and I love the fit! The material is a little strange at first, but very comfy!

FitList.review_summary: I love the style of this
FitList.review_text: I love the style of this dress and it looks great on, however, it is very tight. I ordered a S, but I think I would be happier with a M. I could zip it up, but it is just so, so snug. For only 3% spandex, the material seems to have a lot of stretch.

This dress is skin tight and a great sexy look. The material was very crinkly, but perhaps would get better with a wash. I am returning it because I do not like the material and I can't wear it to work. The collar can also be a little funky. Again, perhaps it would get better with a wash, but in my case, the collar stood up strangely because it was too large for my neck and the material was stiff.
I know this dress has a huge cult following but the one I received was very thin, it was almost seethrough! Sending ba
Best dress ever!! I love the light weight jersey material, and this dress is so easy to dress up or down! It is a very flattering fit.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! It's f
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! It's float and doesn't show any flab in the stomach area (boom!). I'm a 36 D and I usually wear a Large. This fit perfectly. I'd buy this again in other colors.
The color is pretty, but it fits small. It's a very lightweight fabric, which makes it lift in the breeze. I always wear covert shorts underneath

FitList.review_summary: Does This Need More Reviews? Fantastic!
FitList.review_text: I ordered the forest green and it is GORGEOUS I may order the other colors to have options in rotation. It's a very flattering cut for my figure, the waistband sits right under my bust and the vertical folding over the bust is attractive without being lewd  which makes it very versatile. The fabric is thin and light without being sheer and feels like it will hold up to washing. I first wore it to a nice dinner with my boyfriend's family and now to work, and I plan to pack it for a vacation as well. I have been wildly disappointed by some of ModCloth's items in the past, but their bestsellers sell well because they're well made. At 5'2 the dress hits right at my knees.
Perfect for work and appropriate. Comfy and easy to care for. Works well in the fall with knitted tights and a cardigan.

I love your dress is a perfect name because I love mine. Super comfortable and flattering. The bust is roomy enough for busty gals without being revealing. It is loose and flowy around the mid section. I'm 5'7 and it hits just above my knees. Perfect for work with a shaw or cardigan and perfect for weekends around town as well.
Material was a very thin and sheer. Like pajamas or a house dress. I have better quality dresses from discount shops. Totally not worth it, and I got it on sale. Returned.

This dress is fantastic  it can be dressed up or dressed down. The plum color is very flattering. The dress cut is very flattering to curvy, hourglass figures and hides the tummy well. The only critique is that the arm holes are long and sometimes weirdly bunch and you have to pull the dress down to fix it.

FitList.review_summary: I SO wish this dress would have worked
FitList.review_text: the style is super cute, and the cut is great if you have hips or a belly.  I had read other reviews that the fabric was thin but just chalked it up to more or less opinion.  but no, the fabric really is so very thin that I'm returning.  for the price, the dress is not worth it.  the only positive about this dress is the color  a beautiful shade of purple.

I purchased this dress about three years ago for a casual wedding party. Since then, I have worn it several times a month in all seasons. The style is easily dressed up or down, it's comfortable and light enough to be cool in summer and is friendly to layering in winter. I get compliments every time I wear this dress. I have the plum one in size small (34B, 26, 37, 5'5), and this dress has plenty of room to allow some weight fluctuation without ever looking illfitted. The plum color is very dark, and because I look terrible in black, I often wear this color as a substitute for black when the occasion calls for it.

I bought this dress for my birthday party at a winery. It fits beautifully and is well made. I need things that are a little longer waisted and this fit just below my ribs. I liked the higher neckline too. Can be dressed up or down easily. Great buy!

This dress is very nice.  I love that it fits my bust and makes my waist look narrow.  I typically fit well into a large, but this one is just a smudge smaller than I am used to.  It is appropriate for school, and would look nice with a cardigan.  It could also be dressed up with the right accessories.
I just got this, tried it on and love it.  It's cute, flattering and comfortable.  I've thickened around the middle at this point in life, but the cut of the dress hides my secrets well.
Material was just too thin and it was too short for my taste.
Very comfortable dress. The color is deep purple and the fabric is soft . Very nice for casual days and can be dressed up if needed. The fabric is also very light and semi thin.
Perfect!

FitList.review_summary: Fits just as perfect as m
FitList.review_text: Fits just as perfect as my green one! I'm slowly buying every color!

FitList.review_summary: Not too happy with the qu
FitList.review_text: Not too happy with the qualitythin material.  I won't return it since I love the color and will make do.
This dress looks a little more formal (like a bridesmaid dress) than I thought it would, so it's less of an every day item and more of a nice dinner/wedding/event piece.
Great summer dress, quality of the material is much nicer than I expected. very easy to dress up or down.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress for a
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress for a fundraiser and I absolutely love it! Received a lot of compliments on the color too.
Cozy, flattering, versatile. What isn't to like about this dress? I wish it came in mustard yellow, too!
This dress fit perfectly. It makes me look slimmer (probably because it makes me look more busty). The color is gorgeous!

FitList.review_summary: I love the color of this
FitList.review_text: I love the color of this dress, and it's very comfortable. The style makes it pretty versatile which is always a plus, too. The waistband might be tricky for some people, but I'm pretty short so it works fine on me.

FitList.review_summary: Very soft and a lovely co
FitList.review_text: Very soft and a lovely color, a little long for my taste though.

FitList.review_summary: Loved it. Bought an XL in
FitList.review_text: Loved it. Bought an XL in olive and a 1X in plum. Kept both. The 1X is loose, but still looks good.
Great dress! Go for causal use or for a night out
This dress fits beautifully and hangs perfectly. I bought it for work, and it absolutely serves that purpose. Really versatile, easy to wear, comfortable, and dynamic.

FitList.review_summary: Love it. Bought it in plu
FitList.review_text: Love it. Bought it in plum after having it in olive as well. Can't have too many of these.

Love this dress!  Wore it all the time during my trip to Thailand, and was super cute with a cardigan.  It can be dressed up or down, and the jersey is incredibly comfortable for traveling.  It's definitely summery, so I probably won't wear it much this winter.  The top is a perfect fit in the bust and the cap sleeves.  BUT, I am so bummed because I washed it after a load that contained some bleach.  The color came right out in blotches.  Be extra careful when washing!
So comfy and flattering covers up my bigger tummy without losing shape!

This dress was just what it was supposed to be and felt to be of good quality though maybe not quite worth full price being thin jersey and all. If I did not have knee image issues I would have kept it but I had hoped it would cover them since I am short and it did not. I love how the armpit area is designed so it doesn't ride up and cause irritation or soak up sweat, a very welcome touch for me.

FitList.review_summary: I'm short so it fell belo
FitList.review_text: I'm short so it fell below my knees which is fine. ???? the color.
Lightweight / comfortable

FitList.review_summary: I have this dress in two
FitList.review_text: I have this dress in two colors and would buy it in others if they come in my palette! Fun, casual dress that can be dressed up as well.

Overall, this dress is going to be a regular wear item for me, but I wasn't very impressed with the quality for the price.  The dress is a great deep plum color.  It's got some nice reddish tones, which makes it a great summer/fall choice.  The fit is super flattering, as it has enough stretch to hug your curves but isn't like skin tight.  I struggle to find dresses that accommodate my bust, but aren't indecent and this for sure met the bill.  It might have even fit one cup size higher without looking too stretched out, but anything bigger than about a 43 bust should size up.However, the material is really thin and feels rather cheap.  This would be a good deal at a $2535 price point, but is really, really over priced at $55. It's a slinky, stretchy material.  It's not lined, not thick, and not particularly structured, so it's hard to justify the higher price point.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! It's g
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! It's great almost all year, and plays well with other players, either on top or underneath. It can be very casual, or I can dress up the rich purple with the right accessories.
Nice dress, however the bottom is unlined and kinda thin, FYI.
Nice and comfy.

FitList.review_summary: I have this dress in four
FitList.review_text: I have this dress in four colors, and I never fail to get complements every time I wear one.  Thanks to layering, I can wear them all year.  They ate fabulously made, designed, and flattering too.
Love this! Very comfortable but professional looking. The fabric is a bit clingy, but the that's remedied with control top tights.
This dress is adorable! The fabric attracts every cat hair in my house, but it has nice drape and is very comfortable.
I love this dress. Super comfortable.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress!  It fi
FitList.review_text: I love this dress!  It fits perfectly and is soooooo comfortable.
Comfortable and awesome colour

#ReviewContest   Obsessed with these dresses. I have it in four colors now, and hoping to get a fifth for Christmas! Soft, comfy, and super work appropriate. Can easily mix and match different accessories and cardigans to get lots of different looks with this one.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress so much
FitList.review_text: I love this dress so much I'm ordering it in Navy as well. Great fabric and comfortable fit. Perfect for leggings for the winter or without in the summer!
Simple design that is good for church, day out with friends and family, and work place. Easy and quick put on if you are running late.
I get compliments every time I wear it. It's suuuuuuppper comfy and doesn't wrinkle much so great for trips. Great style for everyday, date night or to attend a wedding.
Thin fabric but not sheer. Nice and stretchy.
This dress was just meh. It doesn't lay very well and it's super thin. For the price I expected a lot more. The sleeves are weird, they go onto my shoulders but aren't really a sleeve. Returned.
Nice quality and for well!

FitList.review_summary: Hated it. But it could ju
FitList.review_text: Hated it. But it could just be that it looked bad on my body type. I'm not a skinny girl, and this dress did me no favors.
The fabric is thin.  I'm going to keep it for  casual dress over leggings.
Modest but super cute and flattering!
comfy, lite weight and love the color

FitList.review_summary: it's a cute dress, but if
FitList.review_text: it's a cute dress, but if I had tried it on immediately after receiving it, I probably would have returned it.  I definitely felt like my boobs needed to be bigger to fill it out, and after wearing it once, and washing on gentle, there is already a seam coming apart.however, the fabric is great, doesn't feel cheap at all, it's just not quite right for me.

I wasn't sure about this dress, but it turns out to be fabulous.  I thought it might be too plain, but it somehow blends comfort and style. According to all the reviews I read, I figured that I could have gone with a Medium or a Large. Originally I ordered the Medium and it fit ohsoperfectly and I looked fantastic in it. However, I wanted a bit more fabric in the skirt and I wanted a more loosefitting comfy everyday dress so I exchanged it for the Large. I'm so glad I did! The Large clings less and it looks just as fabulous as the Medium. There's quite a bit of extra fabric around the bust, but it doesn't look sloppy. (And I'd rather have a bit too much room in the chest then too little.) Hopefully this will help someone out like me who is debating between two sizes! :)
