FitList.review_summary: I'm in love with this dre
FitList.review_text: I'm in love with this dress! The fabric is soft, and the plum color is very true to the picture. The dress has a very Grecian vibe with the folds, and really accentuates my figure. It's very versatile, and could be dressed up for work or events. I couldn't recommend it enough!

I bought this dress about 3 years ago, and while I didn't love the synthetic knit (it's a bit hot for Texas summers), I loved the color and the fact that it rarely needs to be ironed. The dress is really cute and very flattering to my super hourglassy shape (currently about 46, 35, 49). Because the fabric is pretty cheap and the dress is three years old (it's been worn once a month or so on average), it is starting to look pretty worn out by now. Earlier this year, I bought another of this dress in green, and thought the fabric seemed even cheaper (thinner, almost as bad as a Halloween costume), but I hoped maybe it was just that color.  Since I really like wearing this dress, and always get lots of complements, I decided to buy a new purple one to replace the worn dress. Disappointingly, the fabric in this is also quite a bit cheaper than in my old one. I would be surprised if it looks decent after a year of wear. As a result, I don't expect that I will buy this dress in any other colors or replace the ones I have when they wear out.

I can wear it in the summer to work (with a cardigan and ballet flats), to casual events (with sandals), and in the winter I wear it with tights, boots, and a cardigan. It packs well and the wrinkles will shake out (hang it for a few hours or in the bathroom while you shower, the steam will help pull the wrinkles out). I didn't find the fabric to be too thin; I wore it without a slip and my undergarments didn't show. Great coverage (modest but not stuffylooking) for women with an ample bust line.I expect to be able to wear the dress again as part of my regular wardrobe now that I've had the baby and I'm looking forward to ordering it in more colors.

FitList.review_text: This dress is so cute! It's a little big in the bust for me but the pleating pretty much hides it. I always get a lot of compliments whenever I wear this. The color is great year round but perfect for autumn. I'll definitely be purchasing this dress in some of the other colors.

The dress is warmer purple than it seems on the site, but it is still a nice color. Also, it fits much better than the picture gives the impression that it does. My only complaint is that the material is on the thin side, but it should be fine for warmer fall/winter days (depending on where you live).

FitList.review_summary: This dress was so, so lon
FitList.review_text: This dress was so, so long. it hit probably midcalf and sagged a bit around my bust. That being said it fit my torso and shoulders perfectly. I was sad this dress didn't work out, the plum color was beautiful and it seems well made. I'm just way too short for this dress.

Fabric was a little thinner than expected. I'm also not a super fan of the tiny cap sleeves. However, I usually wear cardigans anyway plus the swing of the dress is nice. Not super flattering on my larger bosom, but will probably look different in a different bra. Overall, I'm happy with the purchase.

FitList.review_summary: Fabric is a little on the
FitList.review_text: Fabric is a little on the thin side. But the dress itself is awesome, comfortable, flattering and works well for both winter and summer!
Low quality for fifty bucks

FitList.review_summary: I am SO happy with this p
FitList.review_text: I am SO happy with this purchase! This line of dresses had great reviews so i decided to give it a try myself. I am extremely glad i did.  The fit is great especially in the bust and waist areas (always my main concern when purchasing clothes).  I love the soft feel of the material, however, I wish that it was slightly thicker or lined.  This problem is easily remedied by a slip or leggings, so it is a very minimal problem.  Thanks ModCloth! Love this dress!

FitList.review_summary: This is a go to staple fo

FitList.review_summary: It was nice. Just a littl

It also hits a little below the knee on me but I am 5 ft 3 in ( not tall ).  : ) still I received many compliments and plan to order more colors.

is this the world's most flattering dress? I think it might be. What I mean is that, I have several friends who also own this dress and even though we have very different body types it somehow looks great on all of us. I'm on the taller size and have a have a bust size between an A and B and one of my friends is 5' 2 and has a bus size of the D and the stress looks great on both of us! Still, it's a gorgeous dress, and I'll be ordering the other colors (eventually).

FitList.review_summary: My go to dress for everyt
FitList.review_text: My go to dress for everything...work, going out, around the house.  I literally love it!  I have an hourglass figure with a poochy tummy.  This dress accentuates all of the good things and hides the pooch.  On top of that, it is the most comfortable dress ever.  I can put it on and forget about it.  For me, that is such a huge selling point.  When I'm in front of people at work I hate that nagging feeling of worrying that my skirt is clinging or I'm showing too much cleavage or my tummy is poking out.  Ugh.  With this there is no adjusting or tugging.  Heaven!  My female colleagues have all asked where they can get it.  I'm buying the other colors as well.  Couldn't be happier!

Dress it up, dress it down, you will want to wear it every day and buy every color! The material is a bit thin, but the color is fantastically rich.
This was the smallest size small I've ever seen. I returned it without even trying it on. Pity because it's a very cute dress.
Very flattering although I could have gone down a size.. I have this dress in Olive and in Plum and receive many compliments.

FitList.review_summary: I have this dress in oliv
FitList.review_text: I have this dress in olive and have found it to be the most heavily circulated item in my wardrobe. Light weight enough to wear in tropical heat, versatile enough to wear with tights, boot and a sweater in the PNW. I want one in every color. It's comfortable and the jersey fabric had stretch to it. It has held up well to weekly machine washings. It looks cute for every occasion. You won't regret this purchase.
Beautiful color, very comfy and very flattering.  I'm super excited to wear this!!  Normally I go medium, but the small is great.
Really Great Dress!
Bought this dress to attend a wedding. It is as pretty on as the picture and perfectly easy, no fuss with this dress.

I have bought 2x other I love you dresses in size 1x and they have been a great fit. Sadly 1x in plum has been a little tighter, it is still ok but not as comfortable as I have previously experienced. Great deep colour and this style of dress is very flattering and comfortable to wear.
This dress is so flattering in all the right places.  Accentuates the positive and hides the not so positive.  I love it.  I got so many compliments on it, and the color is beautiful!

FitList.review_summary: This is a great, light dr
FitList.review_text: This is a great, light dress that's easy to dress up or down. I wear it to work with ModCloth's Charter School Cardigan all the time! I am busty and it's hard to find dresses that fit (usually too tight in the chest or too revealing and not appropriate for work). This dress is just perfect though!

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! I boug
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! I bought it in two colors and wear it with cardigans for work and without when I'm out on the town.
Beautiful color and amazing fit. This is a wonderful work dress, can't recommend it enough

All of Gili's dresses are perfect.  They fit very well,  the covering of most of the shoulders is a great detail. Definitely hides that weird arm fat bulge most girls are self conscious about. Length is great and color is rich. The plum color feels very regal but also casual.  Fabric is thin,  makes it able to be dressed down... Or up depending on accessories.  I own this dress in olive and black and plan on buying more.

FitList.review_summary: This dress is great! I am
FitList.review_text: This dress is great! I am very busty, and also very short, but this dress fits me like a glove!
I absolutely love this dress!!  Extremely comfortable and very flattering.  I plan on buying other colors too.  The rich purple is gorgeous!!

FitList.review_summary: This is such a great dres
FitList.review_text: This is such a great dress! I just got it and put it on and I am so in love. Pair it with cute Capri leggings, a cardigan and go it is going to be perfect for my vacation and I think I'll be living in it all summer. It fits wonderfully. Might be a bit thin hence the leggings and cardigan. It is sort of that tee shirt you love and wear everyday but in dress form. Which is better because you don't have to find pants ;)
I love this dress. I'm 5'3 so most dresses are too long on me but after I had it hemmed it got like a dream. It's now my first  date dress.
An unusual, comphy and flattering dress, easy to dress up or down. It has become one of my goto summer dresses.

FitList.review_summary: I am so thrilled I finall
FitList.review_text: I am so thrilled I finally got this dress in plum! The XL seems to be the most desired size, since it sells out almost immediately, and it's only available in certain colors (WHY?). Originally I got the 1X, but it was way too big. It's exactly what I wanted: emphasizes the waist, smooths over the belly and other undesirable bits, and is so comfortable. I can accessorize it with anything (cardigans, blazers, scarves, necklaces, flats, heels, sandals, boots), and it can be layered for cold weather or worn on its own when it's warm. The only thing I'm worried about it wearing it out! I'd get the blue in a minute if it was available in XL. Modcloth, please tell the manufacturer!
Comfortable material. Modest (but not stuffy) length. The arm holes are perfectly sized and the dress does a great job of covering up anything *extra* like bra bulge! Love it!
I love this dress!! Need to order it in more colors, I'm addicted!

FitList.review_summary: This dress is so cozy but
FitList.review_text: This dress is so cozy but looks professional for work.  I love it.  I just wore it for a talk I did in front of a large audience, because it is very flattering!  Just added a cardi and tights and boots!  Love this dress!

Its a nice dress, fabric is thin but ok.  Price is good.  Length just barely long enough for my liking but ok.  Overall happy enough with it to keep and wear casually.  I am a size 8 and sized up to a large VERY glad I did as wouldn't want dress much tighter in the bust area.
love it!

FitList.review_summary: Surprised by how much I l
FitList.review_text: Surprised by how much I love this dress. Incredibly comfortable for starters, and very simply pretty. The purple is a dark grape  being plus sized I worry about looking like Barney and this is not that color. I also really like the neck line  not at my neck (hate) and not cleavagey at all. Really happy with this dress  the only thing I would change is I would prefer a little sleeve.

FitList.review_summary: I needed a purple dress f
FitList.review_text: I needed a purple dress for Easter and I found the perfect one!! So comfortable and will be a great dress during the hot summer days here in the south.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! I have
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! I have it in olive, black, stone and plum. More colors, please!

This dress fits amazingly.  I've been looking for a dress that is flattering, doesn't show my mommy pouch and is also long enough that I don't have to worry about my butt showing constantly.  I really think it would work great for all body types.  Love it!
This dress is super comfy! I get compliments on it whenever I wear it. Love the color and for!

FitList.review_summary: The top fit like a dream
FitList.review_text: The top fit like a dream  Good coverage, really flattering, made my neck look long and graceful.  The waist band hit in just the right spot for me, minimizing my tummy.  And then the skirt wrecked it.  sigh.  The material was too thin and drapey to skim nicely past my hips and thighs.  I've got a saddlebag issue, and the skirt made me look lumpy and weird.  I tried with a slip and it didn't help.  So I sent it back.  The plum color is lovely and rich.  And if I had a curvy (not lumpy) lower body this dress would have been great!
People really do love this dress when I wear it, and it is very versatile. Dress it up or down with accessories, leggings, stockings, boots, heels...you name it!
it fit perfectly! perfect for summer

I already have this dress in black and I liked it so much, I came back for a second one. Flattering cut and soft material. I wear an 8 or 10 (US) and the medium is a perfect fit. Can be dressed up or down.
This is the perfect dress. Looks great, and is comfy, too!

FitList.review_summary: There were a lot of thing
FitList.review_text: There were a lot of things I liked about this dress. I liked the color, the length, the comfy material. But the little sleeves just gaped open and looked superawkward on me. I considered keeping it and having them altered to sleeveless, but instead I decided to return it to get something I'll love more. Oh well!As a sidenote, I'm on the busty side, and when I first tried it on that part of the dress looked very flattering. But when I put it on a second time (to decide if I liked it enough to wear it out), it didn't sit correctly and I found myself fussing with it.Overall it is a pretty dress, but just not meant for me.

FitList.review_summary: This dress is so simple a
FitList.review_text: This dress is so simple and wearable! I like that it can go from dressy to casual very easily. Super comfy, and the cut is flattering on anybody. Seriously.Perfect length on 5' 8 moi.
This dress is replacing a Grecian old favorite. Color is gorgeous and will be great with boots and a jean jacket

FitList.review_summary: I own these in every colo
FitList.review_text: I own these in every color Modcloth ever offered besides coral. (Darn, should've been on that right away) Anyway, that's seven different colors. They're so comfortable, flattering, and I love the fit. The material is thin, but I'm okay with that. You can wear these in the summer, and pair them with boots, tights, and a sweater in winter.

FitList.review_summary: I've had this dress for a
FitList.review_text: I've had this dress for about a year or so, I guess. It is absolutely lovely, very flattering, and in general has never let me down when I needed to look nice. A lovely color, and so soft and comfortable. Hits at about knee length for me. I very much recommend it.

FitList.review_summary: I do think this dress run
FitList.review_text: I do think this dress runs just a TINY bit small, and that's because my bra is fairly clearly outlined in the back. But I think the color and shape is just gorgeous, and I don't want to get a large instead. This is my FIFTH Gilli dress that I've purchased from Modcloth, and I have gotten a medium in the others without issue. Qualitywise, this dress does not disappoint. Be aware that it does not have buttons or a zipper, so you must pull the dress over your head.
this dress fits perfectly and I always get compliments whenever I wear it. length hits right at my knees so it's work appropriate as well.
This dress is very flattering and I love it!
great flattering fit

FitList.review_summary: Cute dress but in the day

Perfect anytime any day dress to throw on and feel pretty!

Love love love this dress. So comfortable but I can dress it up with the right accessories. I would love to have this dress in every color. It fits perfect and allows stretch on days when I really need it. Absolutely perfect!

Glad I did because the medium would have been too clingy. Bought this as a bridesmaids dress for a friend's wedding. Looked great and I wear it all the time now.

FitList.review_text: This dress is so soft and lovely. Definitely true to size.

Loved it! Perfect for winter with tights and a sweater and light enough to be very comfy in the summer as well. Very appropriate length for a 30yearold too. Beautiful color!

FitList.review_summary: Perfect to dress up or do

Love the plum colour.  The fit is perfect...cinched in at the waist and fitted in the bust in a very flattering way.
Love this dress. Already had it in blue and love the dark purple.

FitList.review_summary: This is a really great dr
FitList.review_text: This is a really great dress.  Very flattering fitmodest but emphasizes the bust and slims the waist.  Length is very comfortable to wear with or without tights.  Material is soft, and can easily be worn casual or dressy!  Highly recommend!

This is a beautiful dress. The quality is great and it could easily be worn in the winter or summer months. It's long enough to wear when playing at the park with my daughter which is hard for me to find since I'm on the tall side.

Fit:Finding tops and dresses for my 38H chest without looking like a bag everywhere is kind of tough.  This dress worked out pretty well for me, so I actually bought three colors (my reviews for the three will be the same, until the color blurb at the end).The 2x size had enough room in the bust that the waist sits very comfortably in a sort of empirestyle way.  The waist is a little bigger than my ribcage and natural waist, so I may take it in a few inches eventually so that it will fit lower on my torso.The hem hits right in the center of my knees.Cut/quality:The cut is pretty flattering on my bust.  The neckline doesn't expose my cleavage, and the ruching on the bust and the waist sort of balance the whole thing out by lending a bit of flare to the skirt as well.  The top is lined with the same fabric, the skirt is unlined.  The instructions say to handwash and flat dry, however, I've washed these in my undergarment bag on cold/delicate cycle, and hung it up to dry: it held up just fine.Out and about:This dress is simple enough that it's great for dressing up and wearing casually! It looks good with scarves and button down cardigans, and it's fun to pair with colored tights. Color:It's hard to describe the color of this dress.  It is much more of a saturated purple in person than the darker plum pictured.  It's still very pretty, and looks great with rustycolored accessories.
Loved the dress...just a bit ill fitting on me.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress. Very e
FitList.review_text: I love this dress. Very easy to wear and can be dressed up or down. Perfect for my shape which has a small waist before curving out at the hips.

FitList.review_summary: Love the rich color of th
FitList.review_text: Love the rich color of this dress.  The cut and fabric are very versatile  this works for work, for brunch, or even for a wedding depending on how it's styled.  Definitely needs a slip, but unlike most jersey dresses it doesn't show the outline of my bras.
Great wardrobe staple!  Beautiful color, comfortable, soft and nicely made.

FitList.review_summary: This is a very comfy, ver
FitList.review_text: This is a very comfy, versatile and flattering dress. My only issue is that the material is a bit thin and clingy, with a tendency to pill slightly.

FitList.review_summary: This is a go to dress for
FitList.review_text: This is a go to dress for me. I have it in olive as well. Perfect for any occasion. The material is super soft and comfy and the fit is great. The cut of the dress is flattering on everyone with ruching around the belly (where I can feel insecure sometimes). The length hits right above my knee making it appropriate for work and play, and I don't feel self conscious about unintentionally flashing my bum.
This is my favorite dress! It is flattering to an ample tummy and super comfortable. It is jersey (tshirt material) so it is so soft to wear. If they made more than 3 colors I would own them all.

The color is gorgeous. It is perfect for any occasion, work, going out with friends, and my sister is considering it for her bridesmaids! In the colder days I have been layering it with leggings and a black sweater. It is jersey knit, so it is thin, I haven't had the see through problem that other reviews mentioned. The waist is great because it hides that little extra that I carry in my middle. The sleeves are also great because they go out just enough so that it covers everything, and is not revealing. LOVE IT!
Love!

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! I am 5

FitList.review_summary: I adore this dress! I am
FitList.review_text: I adore this dress! I am a curvy gal, who had basically given up on wearing form fitting dresses. I got this in an L, and it was perfect! Creates and accentuates an hour glass figure, very comfortable. and hugs all the right places. This is my new selfesteem boosting dress! I wore it out with a cardigan, long drapey necklace, and knee high boots. I am getting it in every color!
Super cute and very versatile!

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress. I have

FitList.review_summary: I first purchased it in t
FitList.review_text: I first purchased it in the olive. Received so many compliments~ I had to get them in the other two colors. Thank you for such beautiful, easy dresses in plus sizes!
Comfy, flattering and cute! Great dress for everyday or going out. Long enough to be appropriate for work. Love it!
This is one amazingly flattering dress, and I want it in every color. It is designed to flatter so many body types and I highly recommend it.

FitList.review_summary: This is a lovely dress  c
FitList.review_text: This is a lovely dress  can be accessorized up or just worn as a day dress. It is certainly a $50 dress though, don't kid yourself. There is a bit of threading coming undone, but it's nothing that I can't fix with five minutes and a needle. Also I probably could have sized down. There's a bit more give in the bust than I thought there would be. All in all, I love the dress, I love the colour, I love the length (knee length, perfect with boots) and I love the speedy shipping to northern Canada. Would buy again!

FitList.review_summary: It wasn't bad but just wa

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress. This i

FitList.review_summary: If it was made out of thi

FitList.review_summary: I saw this dress and thou
FitList.review_text: I saw this dress and thought it was super cute. I got it home and love it even more. It is like a classy short maxi dress. Totally going to have some fun in this dress!!!

The dress fits perfectly and is insanely comfortable. The color is beautiful and the cut is very flattering. It hits just below my knee, a perfect length to wear for work or special occasions. I wore it with a cardigan and flats to dress it down a little for work, but it could easily be dressed up accessories and heels

The dress fits perfectly and is a great deep plum color. The material is soft and casual but the cut makes it dressy. My boyfriend loved it on me and said to make it a regular in my datenight rotation.
Fits perfectly
Great dress!! Easy to wear. Soft and flattering! Easy to dress up or down

This dress is perfectly named! I Love, love, love these dresses. Got one in purple and one in black and as I was trying on all my purchases from Modcloth and got to this one, my husband held up the box which said, Gorgeous! I also bought the Mind over Matte wedges in Sage and they look wonderful with both colors. The reason I love this dress: Very flattering top. Wide enough straps that it covers any armpit roll you might have. Rouching on the chest makes it the perfect cover for large or small chests. The waist hits just under the chest and is thick enough to accent or create a waist but the skirt starts to float before any pooch can stick out. Wonderful! Hits just above my knee so I wouldn't mind if it were a couple inches longer. The material is pretty thin and I was disappointed when I first opened them, but once it's on it looks great!
This dress has an excellent cut and I'm very pleased with the shape and size. The material is great and the colour is fantastic  the perfect elegant dress!
Nice dress. Difficult to wash.
Fantastic dress!  Received many compliments, so I had to order the green one as well... :)

This is another simple, yet elegant dress from modcloth.  In most U.S. sizes, I'm a medium, but I always order large from modcloth, according to their size chart, and it's never steered me wrong.  This material is lightweight, and would be unflattering if it fit too tight.  With the right size, though, it makes it comfy and elegant.

Love this dress!!! I have a similar dress in navy and am (I'm)patiently waiting for a green one!!! The fabric is soft and easy and the fit is perfect...LOVE this! I think they are all the same brand and I LOVE this brand...It's a great dress!

Perfect dress.  Light, flattering, and drapes beautifully.  Only minor criticism would be the arm holes are just a tad big, and honestly, that's being picky.  This dress showing up on my doorstep made my day.
Great for wearing to brunch, to work, or out for the evening! I have it in purple and black! :)
Love this dress! It fits so well!

I cannot rave enough about this dress!  I thought I had ordered an XL because I am a busty girl, and when I saw it was just a L, the wind was immediately taken out of my sails.  But when I tried it on...it fit like a dream!I ordered this for my cousin's early Sept wedding and I felt truly radiant and beautiful all night.  The fabric is stretchy and forgiving, the skirt is the perfect length, the waist and bust are incredibly flattering and the color is breathtaking.  The picture really doesn't do the color justice.  I'm not much of a dresswearer, really, but I think I will be ordering this dress in at least one more color to add to my wardrobe!  Thank you ModCloth!!
very soft, lovely color. very flattering, as well. I'm considering the other colors, because it's so comfortable.
Gorgeous color! Love this dress!
Best dress to invest in, it's so comfy and the fabric is amazing. Must have
This is a beautiful color! And so comfortable!

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! It is
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! It is flattering for many body types...I've had friends borrow it because they like it so much!  easily dressed up or down.

A beautiful dress to transition through the seasons! The gathers and somewhat empire waist give an elegant and forgiving profile. The fabric is nice and soft, though a little thinner than I expected but not cheap in any way. Hangs nicely to my knee. Could dress up or down. Color is very pretty deep plum. Love it!!

It fits beautifully, the drape hides my stomach and hugs my hourglass figure in a very flattering way. My only regret is not purchasing it in green and blue when they were available. Looking at other's measurements and photos helped me choose the perfect size for me
I absolutely LOVE this dress.  In fact, I also have the one in olive and just ordered the black one!  Great for any occasion!

This is a great everyday dress that can easily be worn to either a casual or more formal event. The medium fits me very well. I love the soft, flowing material, but as others have said it is on the thin side. I don't see this as a problem because it is great for the hot summer months and can then be layered to continue wearing it in the winter. I can't wait to wear it with leggings and a pair of boots!Looking at the picture I expected the horizontally ruched section to be at my natural waist line, but it falls right at the bottom of my bra line making it more of an Empire waist. The dress still looks good on me, I was just expecting an Aline waist from the picture.Overall I really like this dress. It reminds me of a Greek goddess and it is so comfortable. This was my first ModCloth purchase and I will definitely be back for more!
Nice dress!!

FitList.review_summary: I wasn't so sure about it
FitList.review_text: I wasn't so sure about it when it first came in (got it in olive and plum), and it sat in my closet for a while. But it's a great summer dress. It covers under the arm area and has thick straps to cover bra straps.  It's modest and covers any cleavage, but is formfitting in the right places and flowy in the right places. It's very flattering. Lightweight, perfect for hot days when you must go out.
Great dress!
Pretty much the perfect dress. Super flattering, great for work or play, hides a multitude of sins. If there were more colors than plum and black, I'd buy every shade.

FitList.review_summary: My only regret is that I
FitList.review_text: My only regret is that I waited so long to buy this dress. I have a very highwaist on an hourglass shape and this dress is perfectly flattering. I'm busty so I always worry about the fit up top, but it looks fantastic. It's even a little warm for a hot summer day, so I imagine it will hold up well in the fall and winter months with the right layering. The color is a rich plum and beautiful as well. Fits as expected. Can't say enough good things about this one!

I absolutely love this dress, I own it in 3 colors and would buy more if I could afford it. The dress is a little darker purple than pictured, but floats away from the waist to hide anything you don't want people to see. The cotton fabric is soft and the dress fits as I would expect for a large.

FitList.review_summary: This dress was not at all
FitList.review_text: This dress was not at all flattering on my body. The sleeves cut off in an awkward place. My chest looked very strange. The material was not that nice. I sent it back.

This is a beautiful dress. The color is rich and gorgeous. The cut is very flattering. It's a really versatile piece and can be dressed up or down easily. It's lightweight, which is great for hot summers, but it's also easy to layer for colder weather. The only thing that I worry about is some stretching in the upper part of the dress, which I've noticed over the past 6 monthsbe careful how you hang it and watch those heavy shoulder bags. I really love this dress thoughI also own it in black and olive, but I think the plum is the prettiest overall.
Buy this dress NOW. It's amazing! Such a perfect fit. Flattering and attractive and covers all the right places. Seriously, why are you hesitating to buy this dress? DO IT!
Believe the hype! This dress is perfect. It's very form flattering and hits right above the knee on me. The plum color is dark and rich  a colored cardigan is a great accessory. Adore it!

I looooove this dress! I have it both in Olive and Plum, they fit so wonderfully and are super comfy AND cover up everything while still making me feel shapely and beautiful in the office. It's a lighter dress so as it cools down it'll need to be paired with leggings (or I'm just a weirdo who's always cold) and a sweater, but it's great and gorgeous and I've gotten a lot of complements!

FitList.review_summary: Bought this one to be a p
FitList.review_text: Bought this one to be a purpleclad bridesmaid in a casualish outdoor wedding. I purchased it after reading the positive reviews, so I had high hopes for it. Now that I've received it, I have to say, I'm still blown away by how fantastic this dress is! A fellow commenter who described herself as having a petite bust, long torso, and curvy hips said that it's very flattering for this body shape  being of the same shape, I can attest to that! I love this dress and can't be happier  can't beat a flattering, pretty, affordable dress that can be worn as a bridesmaid and then worn later on. I want to emphasize that this is an outdoor wedding on the more casual side  this dress is made of a soft jersey material, so it's not for a formal event. That being said, I highly recommend this one!

Very flattering dress. Great cut and fit. Length is workappropriate (whatever that means these days). My only complaint is that the material is pretty thin. I might be able to get away without wearing a slip under it, but I always do to be safe. Get lots if compliments (like That's a smokin' hot dress!). :)
This dress is simple but fit just right. The material hangs well and is a good length if you're a bit short. Or a lot short.
Wonderful color and a great fit
This is my favorite dress! I wish it was available in a brighter color, I would get a second one!

Soft...stylish...stunning! This dress is a beautiful rich color, is light and easy to wear, has just enough detailing/structure to flatter many shapes and sizes. I run between a M and L, and probably could have done an M, but the L flatters my pear body shape. Dressed up with statement jewelry or down with a cardigan, this dress always gets complimented!

FitList.review_summary: So I generally take a Mod
FitList.review_text: So I generally take a Modcloth XL for comfort's sake, but after reading the reviews on how stretchy the waist is, I decided to take a risk and go with a L (they were out of XL). I am SUPER happy with this purchase. Yes it is a tiny bit snug around the waist, but nothing uncomfortable! The length is perfect and can I say, this material is the SOFTEST I have EVER felt. I LOVE this dress.

FitList.review_summary: I LOVE this dress! I'm pr
FitList.review_text: I LOVE this dress! I'm pretty hard to fit (large bust and small waist I think I tried on every dress at the mall and found one that fit tolerably well), and it flatters my figure like no dress I have worn in a long time. There's plenty of room in the bust (both length and widthwise), and the waist actually fits me. It hits just above the knees. The material is soft and comfortable, but a little thin, which is my only concern. Overall, a great find!
Very nice drapey mid weight knit fabric. Medium size just right for my 34DDs.  Forgiving empire waist.
I LOVE this dress!It fits me perfectly, and it's very flattering.  The color and cut are wonderful :)
Wore this to a coworker's wedding and got tons of compliments! Perfect with a cute sweater and wedges.

FitList.review_summary: Fits true to size.  The m
FitList.review_text: Fits true to size.  The material is somewhat stretchy, so it will accommodate curves without having to size up.  I have worn this dress for many occasions through all seasons. Sandals for summer, tights/boots and cardigans for fall and winter, this dress can do it all.

FitList.review_summary: This is a light little dr
FitList.review_text: This is a light little dress that does a pretty good job at hiding a tummy pooch in the summer months. Looks even better with a long cardi. The color is very flattering.
So very comfortable and soft! Also got it in olive.  love the length, below the knee.

FitList.review_summary: This is a great little, l
FitList.review_text: This is a great little, light weight dress.  The fit is flattering, with the empire waist, and full armpit and chest coverage.  It is a hair on the short side (and I am short to start, at 5'4) for the office, but might be OK for work with flats; but for a casual weekend or even a night out, the length is fine.  The olive and plum are both gorgeous!  I held back 1 star because the fabric is clearly summerweight, and yet the fabric is so clingy that I would not wear this without my Spanxwhich is a summer nonstarter. Static will be a challenge.  Still, if you are looking for easy and comfy, look no further.  The knit fabric and finishing is topnotch.
Great dress perfect for the summer
Beautiful color! Great staple to be dressed up or down for almost any situation.

FitList.review_summary: I also have this dress in
FitList.review_text: I also have this dress in the olive/green and knew it would be comfy and cute. Love the deep purple color, the style is ideal for work or play. Great length too, it hits me right at my knee.

Love love love this dress!  I'm so pleased with this purchase!  It's a great length (just above my knees when standing), the arm holes are neither too small nor too large, and the material is not too clingy as I feared it might be.  I also really like that the waist is higher than so many of the drop waisted dresses I see now.  The more empire waist suits my figure better.  I just wish there were more colors in this dress...I would definitely buy this cut in other colors!

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress so much
FitList.review_text: I love this dress so much that I have it in every colour. I wore the plum version to a wedding with a cardigan, tights and heels and got lots of compliments.

FitList.review_summary: Love! Will make a great c
FitList.review_text: Love! Will make a great casual dress. May need to purchase in more colours!!

FitList.review_summary: This dress is soft and gr
FitList.review_text: This dress is soft and great for summer as the fabric is so light weight.  For that reason, it may not last more than a few seasons.  The fit is very nice, and the length is good.  I have long legs, and I feel comfortable wearing this to work.
Wonderful, beautiful, and simple! A great ModCloth find.
Great dress  easy to wear and nice neckline.
LOVE this dress! I don't think it's thin like others have mentioned. The fit is great, it's super flattering, and it's not at all clingy. Highly recommend!

FitList.review_summary: A bit longer than I'd lik
FitList.review_text: A bit longer than I'd like but still a great dress.

FitList.review_summary: The material is so soft a
FitList.review_text: The material is so soft and pretty! It fits well and the cut seems to flatter many different body types. Overall, I'm very pleased.

This dress has been perfect for so many occasions. I have worn it to work, to bridal showers, and even on the weekends just for fun. It works with belts, scarves, and cardigans and generally is as versatile as you would want a dress to be. Plus it's super soft and comfortable!

FitList.review_summary: This dress is a little aw
FitList.review_text: This dress is a little awkward because it static clings to my butt and thighs no matter what I do, which reveals every lump, bump, and underwear line. When I can get it to lie flat, it is great. Since that almost never happens, it's  a constant battle with the skirt. Also, the arm holes fit oddly large and show my arm fat to the extreme, so I have to pair this with a cardi. Fits my boobs great, though, and on my skinnier days I don't mind the clinging too much if I wear shape wear.

FitList.review_summary: This is my go to dress fo
FitList.review_text: This is my go to dress for work, for fun, for anything!  It's soft and comfortable, and extremely flattering.
Comfortable

FitList.review_summary: I love the style and fit
FitList.review_text: I love the style and fit of this dress! I had already bought it in another color so I knew it would fit right. The only issues I have had with this dress is that it pills quite a bit, especially on the bust where necklaces fall and on the hips where my arms brush. I have only worn this dress four or five times and I am already seeing start to pill.

FitList.review_summary: I can't even begin to exp
FitList.review_text: I can't even begin to explain how much I LOVE this dress. It fits like a glove, the fabric is amazing for summer and the pleats hide the unpleasant chubbiness on my tummy. You ladies are OBLIGATED to buy this dress. An absolute must have for your closet.
This dress is lightweight and extremely flattering!
Well cut and flattering drape. Appropriate for work and play. Love it!

FitList.review_summary: The name says it all! The
FitList.review_text: The name says it all! The plum color is especially wonderful.

FitList.review_summary: Love it! The color is awe
FitList.review_text: Love it! The color is awesome.
Love it!

FitList.review_summary: I really liked how this d
FitList.review_text: I really liked how this dress fit and how the fabric felt.
Fabric a little thin
This dress was an excellent choice for my first Modcloth purchase! It fits well and I've gotten a lot of compliments on it.

FitList.review_summary: This was a little long on
FitList.review_text: This was a little long on me hitting midknee. I may get it hemmed. Otherwise it is perfect!

Was very happy with this dress! I'm larger on top and have a hard time finding dresses that fit my bust area. It's a bit tight, but I can definitely move in it. Also the fabric is much lighter than I thought  it's only lined in the bust  so it almost seems a little seethrough on the bottom. Super comfy, and great for the  hot summer weather in NYC! I would love to see it in more colors, too!
Very flattering.  Love it color.

This dress is my favourite purchase from Modcloth to date  so much so that I've also ordered it in Olive and waiting on other colours in my size. It's crazy flattering! Hightlights the waist and flatters the bust, with the perfect amount of cleavage without being inappropriate for work. The fabric is quite thin but I haven't felt the need to wear a slip or anything  it's not seethrough, just very lightweight. Overall VERY happy with this dress, I love it more than dresses that have cost three times the price!
Perfect summer dress  can dress it up or down easily.
Perfect dress for a curvy girl! Makes your waist look tiny but smooths out those of us with the bigger hip/butt area. I adore this dress!

This is crazy flattering!!! I want this dress in a million colors! The fabric is a really nice texture and comfortable. This style makes my waist look tiny and though I'm larger proportioned on top, it gives me a nice hour glass without feeling exposed. I can even wear a normal bra with this, which is a plus for me. Will be so easy to wear to many occasions.

FitList.review_summary: This dress is so cute and
FitList.review_text: This dress is so cute and comfortable! I usually run between a medium and a large on Modcloth just depending on the dress. After reading other reviews I got a medium this time and it fits perfectly! I have bigger boobs and it fits over them well and makes my waist look smaller. I can dress it up or down. Hooray!
Perfect.
Cute!

FitList.review_summary: I got this dress in the o
FitList.review_text: I got this dress in the original olive color and liked it so much I ordered one in plum, too. It's really comfortable and versatile, and for smallchested women like me, I think it gives the illusion of a little more up top.

This dress is amazing! I don't wear dresses often because I find them uncomfortable and restricting, but this dress is super comfortable and easy to move around in.The color is deep and beautiful and the fabric is soft. The top is lightly lined, really flattering for boobs of any size. The arm holes are just the right size  no pinching or making my upper arms look huge and flabby.I did wear a slip underneath, just to be safe. Plus, I hate it when a dress or skirt gets stuck between your thighs when walking  not a good look for anyone. Since the color is so dark, I don't think a slip is completely necessary, but I prefer wearing one.This dress is extremely versatile and I will wear it often!

FitList.review_summary: GREAT dress. The fit is f
FitList.review_text: GREAT dress. The fit is fitted and flattering, accentuates my small bust, is made very well, and is comfortable. The color is beautiful and compliments my skin tone very well. I did not think this dress was too thin, not necessary to wear a slip at all. I bought it after returning a similar dress (it's twin) to another store that was more than double this price. A definite keeper that's sure to get a lot of use.

FitList.review_summary: I was in my friend's wedd
FitList.review_text: I was in my friend's wedding and this is the beautiful dress she picked for the bridesmaids. I'm super petite, but this was the perfect length and it's the first time I can honestly say I'll be wearing a bridesmaid dress again :)

FitList.review_summary: A little pricey for the q
FitList.review_text: A little pricey for the quality but a comfortable dress that's become a regular for work, hanging out, or going on trips. Thin, soft fabric and a great color.

FitList.review_summary: This is a cute dress, but
FitList.review_text: This is a cute dress, but it is built for women with larger breasts than me (I'm a 32B). It's just loose enough in the chest area that I, and probably no one else, notice. In addition, I thought the quality was lacking, given that the material is pretty thin, the seams have lots of loose threads, the tag is made of scratchy paper, and it has one of those annoying plastic hanger things that shows if you don't cut it off (and is unfortunately sewn into a seam, making it more difficult to cleanly remove). Also, beware, this dress is HAND WASH ONLY. Take home message: if I found this dress in a store, I would have bought it only if it was on sale for $25 or less, but my dissatisfaction with the quality wasn't strong enough to motivate me to send it back.

Perfect casual dress! I was worried about the material with being a curvy girl and having a tummy but the waistband under the breasts lets the dress fall very nicely. The length is a touch too long for me (bottom of my knees) but nothing upsetting. I feel it's a bit more casual but it could be dress up with the right shoes/accessories.
Great basic dress.
Great dress. Light and airy material, more casual fabric.M hits a couple inches above my knee at 5'10 and fits well in the chest area. Flexible fabric and the bunches are very forgiving!
Fits well! Super comfortable!

FitList.review_summary: I had bought this dress i
FitList.review_text: I had bought this dress in black and figured why not order it in purple. The black is a little better at hiding some not so nice spots on my sides, purple is great color though, still keeping it.
Very comfortable jersey like fabric, not cheap. Fits perfectly

I really love this dress.  It's flattering, casual and dressy at the same time(because of the material...supersoft jersey).  I also love the color...but I would purchase this in other colors as well.  A great basic dress.
very comfortable, versatile, can be worn for any occasion

This dress is great. Very flattering on my pear shape. The length hits a few inches above the knee, not too short, perfect for girls with long legs like me. I love the rich purple color. The jersey material is comfortable enough for summer but will be better for spring or fall, and with tights and a sweater it can work in the winter as well.
Very comfortable and flattering. I wore it when I was 4 months pregnant.

FitList.review_summary: The top was nice. It woul
FitList.review_text: The top was nice. It would be good for work. It was just ok. Not special.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! It's s
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! It's so cute and comfortable, plus extremely flattering.

Love it! There's a reason I've got this in olive as well, and it's the first time I've owned any article of clothing in multiple colours. These dresses are so comfortable and flattering, I never want to wear anything else! The plum is a lovely warm colour that will look good on pretty much anyone. Definitely recommended! :)
This is the second color of this dress I have purchased. I just love the material and fit so much. It's my perfect weekend goto for day activities. I will probably buy more. Oops :)

This dress couldn't be more perfect, seriously. It's flattering across the chest, drapes gorgeously, and falls just to my knees (I'm 5'7). I can dress it up with ballet flats and a cardi, or keep it casual over yoga pants. I'll be getting this dress in every other colour!

I ordered this dress for an outdoor wedding and it was great! As the ministers wife I need to look nice don't want to look older than I am(40) and this worked out great. The material is a little thin but a full slip underneath fixed that. In the summer I almost live in dresses so this will be perfect! Great dress I highly recommend it!!

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! As soo
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! As soon as I got it in the mail I ripped it out of the packaging and tried it on. As most other reviewers say, it fit like a glove and was extremely comfortable. It's a beautiful color and a flattering fit.I'm looking forward to wearing this with some cute shoes and a nice cardigan at a conference I'll be going to for work this month :).

FitList.review_summary: As the name suggests, I d
FitList.review_text: As the name suggests, I do hear I love your dress a lot when I am wearing this dress. And I love it, too! The color, the fit, the length  all great. My one qualm is some of the stitching has already begun to pull loose, and I've only washed it a few times.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! I got
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! I got so many complements on it. It is the most beautiful color. A little clingy and short for my comfort  but a slip helped a bunch.

FitList.review_summary: This dress is so soft and
FitList.review_text: This dress is so soft and lovely. It is very flattering and fits well!

This dress is extremely flattering! I haven't worn it out yet since it just arrived but I can't wait. I love the color, and after having three kids and some weight left to lose it's hard to find something that looks good these days. Part of my first order at modcloth but definitely not my last!

FitList.review_summary: After I wore it the first
FitList.review_text: After I wore it the first time, some of the stiching came lose on the back of the collar.  Other than that, I love this dress.  The color is gorgeous and it is so comfortable.
Very comfy and great for warm weather.
Thin but soft fabric.  Very comfortable dress for a summer day.

FitList.review_summary: There are a lot of great
FitList.review_text: There are a lot of great reviews for good reason  it is soft, comfortable, and the eggplant hue is gorgeous. I especially love the skirt of the dress, loose and flowy. But despite all this, the overall look is a bit drab for me. I think it's the sleeve width that makes this dress look overly modest. I think it's a little more casual than I expected, but I could see wearing it out for coffee with friends. Dressing it up with a belt, jewelry, or different hairstyle might spice it up a bit, too. Sort of on the fence with this one...

Love love love. I'm broad shouldered, big chested, long legs, short torso, but with a small upper waist and non too bulging extra bits. This dress is flattering, light, and I can wear it casual or dress it up for work and dinner. My boyfriend also loves it! My only complaint is the bottom is not lined and it clings. I wear bike shorts under all dresses and skirts, so if you don't watch out! But yes, if highly recommend. I feel confident every time I walk out the door wearing this dress.

FitList.review_summary: I have this I Love Your D
FitList.review_text: I have this I Love Your Dress in two colors (the blue and the purple) because I love the cut so much. It's extremely flattering, even for somebody with an ample bust. It's a good length for work, too. Some have mentioned that the purple is a bit sheer, but I didn't find that to be the case. I have only worn it with leggings, though, and not just with underpants. It doesn't cling and I haven't needed to wear a slip. It's a gorgeous eggplant color.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress, it fit
FitList.review_text: I love this dress, it fits me perfectly, and it swishes nicely. Plus, the purple color is perfect. I love purple, but so often clothes come in lavender or bright royal purple. I love wearing this dress, it's so comfy and looks so good!
This dress fits beautifully, and the color is a nice, deep plumb. I got a lot of compliments on it!

This dress was so promising, but just didn't work for me.  The material is a little thin and clingy.  My problem with it was mostly that my belly is bigger than my hips so it didn't flatter, but i bet this is a great dress for a lot of ladies!

FitList.review_summary: I have this dress in ever
FitList.review_text: I have this dress in every color. I love empire waistlines and this one is so flattering. The straps are thick enough to hide any unflattering underarm skin that can show from a bra, and for the winter, I've just thrown them over leggings and put on a sweater, but I know I'll be able to wear them in the summer with bare legs since it hits right above the knee and would be a perfect warm weather nofuss dress. I normally wear XLs but in this dress an L is just perfect.
simple and flattering, exactly what i was looking for, can be dressed up or down.

This dress is really nice, it's stretchy and comfortable and very versatile! Can be worn casual, or can easily be dressed up with accessories for more formal events. And with so many nice colors to choose from, it's really a musthave in your wardrobe!
Another keeper! Thin material but soft and comfortable.

Lovely dress, the fabric falsl nicely, I didn't find I needed a slip because of underwear lines or having it sticking to my legs it drapes well!  I would have liked it to have been an inch longer, but I do have a short torso and long legs.  The color is great, a perfect plum and the empire waist is very flattering for small chests!

FitList.review_summary: I am pretty busty and am
FitList.review_text: I am pretty busty and am always looking for dresses that I can wear to work that won't expose my chest and that still look nice.  I wore this dress with a cardigan and the fit was amazing!  It covers everything that I want to be covered and is long enough that I don't need to worry about flashing anyone.  I took the advice of prior reviewers and wore a slip underneath it because I did notice that the fabric was a little sheer  this solved the problem quite nicely.  This is a wonderful dress and I recommend it to anyone!

Beautiful dress. Fabric is thin jersey, better for summer, but the seaming is competent and the look is flowy. The waist detail sits fully below my bust with a small amount of cleavage showing, but can ride up slightly over hours of wear. This is a fantastic dress if you have a large bust! The dress hits right above my knees. This and the green version have become staples in my wardrobe.

FitList.review_summary: I have had my eye on this
FitList.review_text: I have had my eye on this for a casual summer dress for a long time.  I love the plum color, which looks great with my pale skin and blonde hair, but I was worried it would be too short.  The hem is right above my knees, and the fabric is light enough to feel casual without feeling cheap.  It fits beautifully, and actually makes my modest chest look bigger than it is.  A win/win all around.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress in pu
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress in purple and brown and I just love it. The jersey fabric can be a tad clingy (and can show lumps and bumps), but a pair of mild everyday shaping underwear dealt with it just fine. At another reviewers suggestion, I ordered the I Can't Stop Dancing slip in bronze and it worked nicely to smooth things out as well (without needing the special underwear).Love how cool and free this feels, just like wearing a tshirt (in terms of comfort). Add a sweater and/or a pair of fancy heels and it gets a little dressier, or wear with everyday flats and it's perfect for everyday.
It's the perfect length and is a great color. Love this dress!

FitList.review_summary: This is a dress that I wi
FitList.review_text: This is a dress that I will be getting in all of the available colors.  It fit me perfectly and showed off my curves and the girls perfectly while hiding my imperfections.  Very comfortable too  easy to grab and go. Not a lot of fuss is  needed to wear the dress.

FitList.review_summary: I have to admit that I've
FitList.review_text: I have to admit that I've purchased 2 of the same dress because I love it so much! The purple color is beautiful and the silhouette is so flattering in very elegant way! The material is soft and comfortable.Please note that it shows the silhouette of your body with its thin material. It's a flowy dress than fully lined/structured dress so you might want to wear a shape wear underneath if you don't feel comfortable with one layer of the thin material.

After reading other reviews I decided to size down as I am in between an M and L in waist size (28.5 in or 73cm). Good decision cos it fits perfectly. I love the colour and love that the folds and ruching mask your stomach if you have one. Also the wide shoulder straps are good for covering armpit flab (on me at least). As other reviewers have said, it does tend to 'stick' to the rear and reveal whether your undies fit you well or not so I wore this with some shapewear to smooth that area. The material is quite thin (but not so much that it's completely see through) so it's good for late spring/summer. For info for other Aussie ladies, I'm generally a size 1012. Enjoy!
Nice dress. Give a little bit of color to your wardrobe while still being really dark and discret.
Light cotton material makes it comfortable and easy to dress up or down.

Absolutely adore this dress! The color, cut, and fabric easily transition in between the seasons. I've only worn it in the winter so far, with sweaters, sweater tights, and sheer tights, with flats or heels. I can't wait to throw on some sandals and a hat and wear it this spring and summer. It hits right at my knees, so with a sweater I can wear it to religious functions. Currently shopping for more colors. Wish me luck!

FitList.review_summary: The fit and colour were g
FitList.review_text: The fit and colour were great! However, I found the dress fairly thin and was hoping for something a bit less seethrough.
LOVE this dress. Its light thin fabric, the color is just as pictured, and the cut hides flaws making it very flattering.

FitList.review_summary: I love the color of this
FitList.review_text: I love the color of this dress!  The waist and chest are flattering for my fit.  The only thing that I don't like is that it tends to cling, especially to tights (trying to wear in colder weather). I've tried a slip but it clings to the slip also.  I guess I can only wear in spring/summer without under garments.

This dress is perfect; very flattering, color is gorgeous, material is light but sturdy. And very comfortable! Can be worn casual, as is, or dressed up with accessories for a night in town! I loved it so much, I also got it in the Olive color!
Perfect. That is all.

This dress is delightful!! It's a fabulous purple colour. The length is good too  just right above the knee. I was a little concerned originally with ordering a small but I'm so glad I did! It fits perfectly through the chest and shoulders. The material is very much a light jersey cotton and could use an extra layer underneath (some people have recommended a slip  I was fine with dark tights). Its very versatile  I've worn it to work with a cami and I would be happy to wear it on its own to a party. I highly recommend this dress and plan on buying it again sometime in another colour!

FitList.review_summary: Wore this dress to work t
FitList.review_text: Wore this dress to work today!  Lots of compliments.  The color is phenomenal, exactly the deep purple I was looking for.  The banded waist is extremely flattering (even on my long torso).  The fabric is lightweight which makes it very comfortable without looking cheap.  Definitely tights and a cardigan for the colder months, but I can wear this year round.  Going to buy another in another color!

The dress fits great and is very comfortable. It's a little long on me, but I'm pretty short so I'm used to that! I love the gathering under the bust. There was plenty of room for the girls and it gave my waist a nice definition.

The fabric is smooth and soft but may be a little thin for some people. I love it; it quickly became one of my favorites. It's beautiful dressed up or down and fits perfectly not tight at all and flows nicely. Get it!!

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress in th
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress in the olive colour and just about died when I saw it came in purple too. It's a much more regal, plumy colour than it shows on the website. Gorgeous, comfy and I get so many compliments on it!

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress. It fit
FitList.review_text: I love this dress. It fits perfectly and is a good length to wear to school.
Just fit perfectly! The colour is beautiful too!
Beautiful dress! Great length for me and very flattering.

Stretchy, comfy, modest, beautiful! This is a lovely jersey like fabric that has beautiful drape, is light and airy, great for layering, and sooo comfortable. And the color is wonderfully deep. No complaints! Just get this dress!

FitList.review_summary: This is a lovely summer d
FitList.review_text: This is a lovely summer dress, at once comfortable and elegant.
Bought for a friends wedding, worked great!

FitList.review_summary: I have a 43 inch bust app
FitList.review_text: I have a 43 inch bust approximately, and the bust fit fine but it pulled the back tight enough that it was unflattering and it clung to all of my notsosmooth areas. If I was 2 inches smaller in the bust I would have kept it, but I'm not so I took advantage of the free returns perk. Work appropriate length  material was a little thin particularly in the skirt, but nothing a slip wouldn't fix. Would LOVE to see this in an XL and larger (for all the other colors too because I'd buy most of them).
I absolutely love this dress!!!

FitList.review_summary: I have this dress in the
FitList.review_text: I have this dress in the olive and I would get it in every color if I could! the material is super soft without being clingy (like some jersey fabrics) and the ruching at the waist and bust accentuates and hides flaws at the same time. the plum color is great for the fall/winter months

This dress is perfect! I put it on as soon as it got here and squealed, It's long enough!Being a longlegged gal, it's notable. It hits just above my knees. I could totally go without tights or stockings in the summer. I don't usually go for a drapey jersey fabric but this dress hides all the lumps and doesn't cling. The cut is great, it highlights (or will make) a small waist/hourglass figure. I'd totally buy it in the other colors.

The colour is more vibrant in person which I love. Fits perfect and a light fabric for summer. I can easily wear any bra with this dress without it showing. I am short and this dress hits right above my knee cap.

This dress is a trooper. I originally bought it in olive and when the purple came out I had to have it; that was almost 2 years ago! This dress saw me through a pregnancy and postbaby body changes, and still fits like a gem! By far the best thing I have purchased from Modcloth thus far. A wardrobe workhorse!

Love love love this dress!  I bought it in three colors and I couldn't be happier!  I can't wait to wear it!  So easy to dress up or down!   May need a slip as the material seems to have the tendency to cling.  The fit is very flattering!

FitList.review_summary: What a lovely dress! I ha
FitList.review_text: What a lovely dress! I had some leggings on today and my package arrived (best feeling ever) and I threw that bad boy on right over my leggings... Looked great! So that'll be my winter look along with a cardigan, and in the summer I can rock sans leggings. The fit is great, hugs in the right places. I'm 5'4 and the length was right at my knees. Great buy.

This dress is great!  It drapes beautifully, the color is a fantastic rich purple, and the fabric is so soft.  It's a dress that looks amazing on a variety of sizes and shapes.  It's also versatile; I can wear it to work and wear it to parties/when going out.

Love how this dress looks, I get compliments all the time! The material is lightweight, perfect for a hot Aussie summer yet still looks put together. The dress is rather stretchy and forgiving, nipping the waist at the right place and the gathers hide my mummy tummy! I love it so much I bought another in the same colour and one in brown.

FitList.review_summary: Too short for me, ends up
FitList.review_text: Too short for me, ends up making me look pregnant.#forgoodmeasure
Fit is very flattering and material is soft and drapey. I have it in plum and olive and get compliments with every wear.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this as a gift f
FitList.review_text: I bought this as a gift for someone and she looks great in it! She is between a small and an extra small, and the small worked fine. A lovely dress.

This dress is beautiful and well made.  The fabric is very light feeling, so I'll be getting more wear out of this when the weather gets warmer.  The color is gorgeous.  I'm not sure if the empire waist cut is the best for me, but I love the dress anyway.  I like the longer length on this dress, it comes to a couple inches above my knee. #forgoodmeasure

Amazing true plum color. It's a soft, lightweight tshirt type material that flows nicely. (Great for twirling) The middle has a wide band that gives the look of an empire waist but it reaches down to my natural waistline giving a super flattering appearance. I wore it in winter on a 54 degree day with COVER YOUR BASICS TIGHTS and TEXTBOOK CUTIE CARDIGAN and a scarf. I also wore it on an 80 degree summer day with oatmeal flats. I would love this in every color. Dress it up with heels and a shrug or made it funky with high tops and a leather jacket. Any age and many shapes can wear this.
Dress is soft and comfortable and the colour is lovely. Fit is very flattering. Nice on its own or layered with tights and a sweater in the winter. Just ordered a second one in brown.

I wear this dress all.the.time.  I've had it for about four months and it's been my goto dress for weddings, church, going out, and being super comfortable in at home.  It does everything.  The length of the medium is maybe a little bit awkward on me, covering my knees, but I'm 5'4 so I expect that a bit. The top is flattering without exposing myself, which I love. Pairs with any kind of cardigan, boots or heels or flip flops.  Have machine washed a few times and it still looks great!
I looove this dress, the color is amazing and easy to wear. The fit is also very flattering (I'm curvy with a smaller bust) A+!

I have been so impatient to write a review for this dress!  It's absolutely perfect, in my opinion.  The ruching at the bust is very flattering, even for a largechested figure, and the waistline is slimming.  Could you ask for a more perfect combination?  I'm about 5'3'' and 115 lbs; the Small fits like a glove and hits very nicely right above the knee.  The color is also the most perfect shade of plum.  This was my first ModCloth purchase and I am thrilled about it!  I can't wait to wear it for holiday parties.

FitList.review_summary: Wore this to a wedding, a
FitList.review_text: Wore this to a wedding, and it was so comfortable!  Loved it

FitList.review_summary: LOVE THIS DRESS. It fit s
FitList.review_text: LOVE THIS DRESS. It fit so perfectly and the material is very soft and stretchy! I even wore it to a yoga party and wrapped a rope belt around it. Perfect for anything.

FitList.review_summary: This is stunning and I wa
FitList.review_text: This is stunning and I want to call it my magic dress because everyone said wow you have lost weight  The scales say different but I will take the compliment.

This dress fits me perfectly, it's a nice shade of dark purple and I think is pretty flattering in shape, even though it can cling a little. Hits right below the knee for me, but I'm short and gives a nice look to the chest.

FitList.review_summary: I can't say enough good t
FitList.review_text: I can't say enough good things about this dress. Its perfect. Its so comfortable, and can be dressed up or down, depending on what you pair it with. I usually go for some funky patterned tights and a denim jacket, or pretty beaded heels and a vintage stopwatch necklace

Beautiful color, nice fit, and comfortable fabric. It feels like you're wearing your favorite tshirt, but it looks dressy enough to wear to a fancy event with heels. A touch too short for my taste, but I like longer skirts so this is just a personal issue.

Great dress! I might buy this one in Olive too.  It fits very well and hides any tummy problems lol. Looks great paired with a simple pair of heels ... or fun stockings, boots, and a colorful cardigan :)
The colour of this dress is gorgeous. I like the jersey material for comfort and it drapes quite well.

FitList.review_summary: I wore this dress to Yom
FitList.review_text: I wore this dress to Yom Kipper services and actually sat next to a girl in the same dress. I wore it with black flats and it looked fine. The waist is smaller on the mannequin but thats more because I have a little bit of a belly. I felt it was both comfortable and appropriate.
This dress fits perfectly and is so comfortable. It is great for work, the perfect length. Very flattering!

I'm quite happy with this dress. It's for a wedding, and it's just what I expected. There's some slight seam imperfections, but other than that, it fits very well at the bust and waist, and is a good length. It's lightweight (but not cheap looking), but not seethrough.

As many others have said, this dress is just great. It's a good length, the neckline is high enough to wear to work, it is SO flattering, especially on my pear shape. The color is gorgeous. It is a little thing but I tried it on with bright colored underwear and didn't see it! Love it.

FitList.review_summary: I am 5'9 and while I love
FitList.review_text: I am 5'9 and while I love love love modcloth dresses, I often have a hard time finding ones that are long enough! This dress is perfect! Hits an inch or two above the knee. Very flowy, gorgeous color and overall fit is perfect. I am usually a size 8 and the medium fits great. It is made of thinner jersey type material so I will be wearing a slip underneath it. Perfect for tall girls!

Beautiful colour, good length at the knee, great material that can be rolled up in a suitcase and come out reasonably unwrinkled! Win! Beautiful little staple just waiting to get layered up or accessorised!

Love this dress!  I've been hesitant to purchase any dresses from Mod Cloth due to length, but this hits perfectly just above my knee.  Lightweight material hangs well, and the cut makes me look like I actually have a figure.
Soft fabric that falls just right. Perfect for autumn days on campus.

didn't take pictures because I took pics in this dress in Chocolate for my other review, but my comment is the same. it's comfortable and flattering and the color is gorgeous. i will be rounding out my collection with the Olive color soon.
So flattering and soft! I love it. However, it does need a slip. It clings to every bit of my skin on my backside, and sadly not in a flattering way.

FitList.review_summary: Love it. It looks great o
FitList.review_text: Love it. It looks great on me (and I'm hard to fit) and is incredibly comfortable. The color is great too.

FitList.review_summary: This dress is great!  I l
FitList.review_text: This dress is great!  I love the length and the color!  The fabric drapes well.  I wore it for a portrait session with my husband.  My only concern is the fabric is a little thin.
Lovely!

FitList.review_summary: This type of dress is per
FitList.review_text: This type of dress is perfect for the hour glass shape, I had to get it in two different colors! Very flattering, shows off all the right places. It's nice that it is sleeveless in the hot FL weather yet covers the dreaded armpit fat that girls show when wearing sleeveless outfits. The color is a very rich purple. This dress may be a little boring on someone with absolutely no curves.
This dress was really comfy but it did not look good, it made my boobs look small and my stomach look pregnant.  Not great if you have any kind of tummy.

Just buy it.  Right now.  Get it in the olive, too.  This is the perfect jersey dress.  I've dressed it up, dressed it down...and I plan on wearing it in winter with some tights and booties.  The neckline is elegant, the gathering along the bust is very flattering, and your shoulders will look great.  Just buy it.
Great fit and length! Fabric is super comfy too but can still be dressed up with some jewelry and heels!
Looks great for the price. Haven't worn it much as I prefer my dresses a little longer for work. Color is lovely, but fabric feels a little thin. Would be good for warm weather.
Fit fine, looked great, but it just wasn't for me.

Love!  Already own it in olive, and I paired it with the Everyday Tall tights in Mustard.  It's a tad long (and I'm tall) but a beautiful dress that I can wear to work, on a date, or just at a picnic.  Does it come in more colors??

FitList.review_summary: This is my first Mod Clot
FitList.review_text: This is my first Mod Cloth purchase and I love it. The dress fits perfectly!

Perfect casual dress for work or everyday wear. From reading reviews I was afraid my usual M would be a little too big for my frame, but ended up working well. Goes great with the Charter School Cardigan in Sage! (Another reviewer said this, which won me over since I already owned that cardi)

FitList.review_summary: This is my goto work dres
FitList.review_text: This is my goto work dress. The fabric is SO light and comfortable but not at all sheer. I get tons of compliments in this dress and it's easy to dress up or down. The plum is a beautiful color  highly recommended!
This dress has a beautiful plum color, soft stretchy fabric, and a good length (comes to the knee.)

FitList.review_summary: This dress was part of my
FitList.review_text: This dress was part of my first Modcloth order (The other was A Peek of Blue Dress) and I couldn't be happier with it. I was hesitant to order it considering the reviews that it was somewhat sheer and I thought the fabric might be too clingy, but it's such a flattering dress. It sits at all the right places, and I haven't actually found it to be too sheer. The color is amazing. My favorite, actually. Great for an olive skintone. All in all, the perfect order.

This dress is so perfect. While it is thin, it fits like a glove. I wear a 30F bra size, but I'm very thin, so finding a dress that fits my form is always difficult. This dress does not disappoint. I get compliments all the time!
This dress is perfect: soft, comfortable, flattering and can be made appropriate for any occasion or season.  I feel like a Grecian goddess.

Such a beautiful dress!! The fabric is soft and very nice and it moves beautifully. I was worried because I am large on top but the stretchy fabric and the rouching (sp?) allows for them. Overall a really great buy. I just ordered the one in olive. :)
Love it. Fits perfectly. A bit short for usual taste but not a problem with skimmies.

FitList.review_summary: Love the dress. I have bo
FitList.review_text: Love the dress. I have both this one and the olive. They will be perfect for work and casual hanging out. It's a bit sheer, so I plan on wearing a slip. I wasn't sure when order if I should get a medium or a large. I'm glad I got the large, it fits perfect. I super love these dresses, and I wish they came in more colors!

FitList.review_summary: Gosh I love love love thi
FitList.review_text: Gosh I love love love this dress.  I was a little iffy at first, since it looks like it is a little flowy and would cling in a weird way.  I'm pear shaped, so sometimes dresses like this fit weird and sometimes they fit perfectly.  This is definitely a perfectly instance.  I was so so happy when I received the dress and tried it on!  The fabric is soft and wonderful to touch.  The length is perfect, hitting right around my knees.  Sometimes Modcloth dresses run short, and this one definitely does not.  The fabric around the waist is perfect.  It brings the dress in a little to show of my waist but not so much as to make my hips look huge.  Honestly, this is one of my favorite Modcloth purchases to date.  I couldn't be happier.

This is such a versatile dress.  Super lightweight, and comfy like a tshirt, yet also stylish.  It is long enough and moves with me enough to allow me to be quite active without worrying.  I could wear this running errands and then dress it up in the evening for a date.  The other reveiwers are not kidding when they say it is ridiculously flattering and an even better shade of purple than pictured.
Beautiful dress and beautiful fit  very flattering for ladies with a bigger bust and bigger belly area, like myself. The colour is gorgeous, a lovely deep plum. Length hits just above the knee.

FitList.review_summary: This is a deep rich purpl
FitList.review_text: This is a deep rich purple, and great for work.  The fabric is a little clingy, but the ruching is enough to hide the waist band of leggings underneath.

Color is more reddishpurple than a true purple, almost a wine color to my eyes, but still very pretty.  Fit is good and the fabric is soft, very flattering to my pear shape.  Its a great lightweight summer dress and I think it will work great for the fall with tights and a sweater.

So pleased with this drees! Super comfy and I didn't need to wear a belt to show my waist or worry about too much cleavage showing/falling out. Length is just above my knees. I did get a half slip because it is a little sheer in bright light (and I wore it to a family bridal shower), but that isn't a big deal. I got compliments and I felt great in it! Thanks Modcloth!

FitList.review_summary: I wore this dress to a Di
FitList.review_text: I wore this dress to a Disneyland wedding full of dancing and and amped it up with leggings, The Best of Times heels and accessories. With the leggings and an cami I didn't need a slip but it definitely requires something underneath, especially with the bigger armholes. It's very comfortable, nice soft jersey and it did the seemingly miraculous thing of hiding my stomach and making my bust look larger. I was trying on a few dresses and the minute I put this one on my boyfriend said; that one! I will definitely buy this in the Olive version, if in can stay in stock for more than a day.  It can cling, especially if it's windy but for the price, the pretty deep plum color, the comfort and the way it made me look I highly recommend.

FitList.review_summary: This is my new favorite d
FitList.review_text: This is my new favorite dress! It's perfect for a girl with curves. I went with a medium and it fits perfectly. It's super flattering. It's a dress I want to buy two of so I have a back up!

Beautiful fit, easy to wear.  I don't like that it's hand wash only, but that's because my laziness combines with my kids small sticky fingers is a bad combo.  I love this dress.  Hit just above the knee.  Waistband was snug, but not tight.  Material is thinI wear a full slip underneath.

FitList.review_summary: I also have this dress in
FitList.review_text: I also have this dress in the olive green color. I get tons of compliments when I wear either dress.

FitList.review_summary: I love MY dress. The only
FitList.review_text: I love MY dress. The only thing that would make this better is if it were machine washable. I hate that I have to hand wash it.

FitList.review_summary: I like this dress.  The m
