FitList.review_text: I like this dress.  The material is a little thin, so I'm sometimes a bit concerned with people seeing through the bottom when light is behind me.  Other than that, I really like it.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! The co
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! The colour is gorgeous, jewellike and perfect. It would be nice if it stretched a little more, it's just a little difficult to get on over my shoulders and head, but everything else about it is lovely, and it fits like a dream. This one's going to get worn to death, I can tell!

Very soft, comfortable, good quality fabric that nips in at the waist just below the bust to give a lovely, curvy, slimming silhouette. The colour is also a lovely dark shade of purple which really compliments my skin tone.
Great color, fabric, perfect fit. Needs a slip as mentioned. I wish it were a little shorter for casual purposes, but it's great for a more formal event with some pumps.
A beautiful, classic, comfortable dress. Very happy with the fit and flow (I tend to find these sorts of dresses clingy in a bad way).

FitList.review_summary: I put this dress on and i
FitList.review_text: I put this dress on and instantly fell in love with it! The purple is a little lighter than my computer screen shows, but I like it better in person. I am fairly short, so the dress hits me in the middle of my kneecap. Ideally I would like it about an inch and a half shorter, but that is a really easy DIY. Overall, I think this dress will become one of my new favourites!

FitList.review_summary: I just didn't love this d
FitList.review_text: I just didn't love this dress. The waist fell wrong on me, the top portion was blousey and unflattering. This dress somehow hid my bust and waist. But I did love the color and the material

FitList.review_summary: I purchased this for a fr
FitList.review_text: I purchased this for a friend's wedding (I'm the MOH), and it is PERFECTION. The fabric is supersoft and flowy (so I'll be comfy), and the length hits just above my knee. It didn't seem to be seethrough, though I may wear a slip or something under it for photos. Overall, I am in love with this purchase.
Wonderful dress! It's comfortable and has a flattering cut. I wear mine mostly to work, but the soft, stretchy fabric makes it perfect for lazing around on a day off, too.

FitList.review_summary: This is such a cute, comf
FitList.review_text: This is such a cute, comfy dress. It is a little longer on me than I anticipated, but the bust fits perfectly.I am excited to wear this to the office!

I was underwhelmed by this dress.  It was a cheap cotton, I think this would be great for a swim cover.  Just not worth the price.  Cute color  don't think the arms are that flattering, and it was just a bit short (I am 5'7).  rouching was flattering, but not worth it to keep it.  wait for a sale.

FitList.review_summary: Bought this as a gift for
FitList.review_text: Bought this as a gift for my sister. Perfect.
This dress is really comfortable and fits so well around the bust and shoulder area. It is a bit long on me, but I am 4'11 :) The colour is great too!

FitList.review_summary: I'll keep it at 4 stars f
FitList.review_text: I'll keep it at 4 stars for now, because I have yet to roadtest it.  Wearing it right now, and the fabric is a little thin, but sooooo soft, perfect for summertime.  If you're a little curvy around the hips like me, then I'd suggest wearing some Spanx or a similar product.  For size reference I'm a size 12 to 14, depending on the clothing item or manufacturer.

FitList.review_summary: One of my favorites, I ha
FitList.review_text: One of my favorites, I have it in green too.

This dress is fantastic. It's very comfortable to wear, as well as being very flattering. I'm pretty busty for my build, but the bodice of the dress allows for plenty of space, while still being flattering. Previous reviewers mentioned that the fabric is a little thin, especially in the skirt, but I haven't found that to be the case.

FitList.review_summary: I own and love this dress
FitList.review_text: I own and love this dress in olive, so when it came out in plum, I knew I had to have it. The color is a very saturated and lovely plum, brighter than in the picture. The material is very thin, but it drapes so nicely that it doesn't show every line the way a more formfitting dress might. It looks great with a cardigan and tights or leggings (especially the Tights for Every Occasion in Mustard!) in colder weather, and is a lovely, light dress by itself in summer. I could gain or lose weight and it would still be incredibly flattering. And it hits a couple inches above my knee, just long enough to be acceptable for work. I always feel pretty wearing this dress and the one in oliveI can't recommend it enough!

I reeeally love this dress. It's made of material that really breathes well and I can wear it anytime because it's not too formal.Sorry about the picture, my room is kind of dark so the dress just blends in.

Really nice simple dress of a nice deep purple colour. The fabric is soft and make the dress that much more agreeable to wear. The empire waist is very flattering for my pear shaped silhouette. It hits me right on the knee, so it's perfect for work. I simply pair it with my sage charter school cardi for a nice contrast, but the lines of the dress are so simple that it could easily be dressed up for a special night out!

Versatile and comfortable jersey dress that you can dress up or down.  The fabric is on the thin side, but that is how I prefer my casual dresses.  Ruching accentuates the waist, and higher waist and loose skirt hides flaws around the hip area and is good for shortwaisted/petite women.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress and got
FitList.review_text: I love this dress and got compliments on it when I first wore it out. It's thinner than you might expect, so not very effective in cold weather without some layering. As a teacher, the simplicity of the design and the length makes it perfect to wear to school and it looks great with a cardigan.  An easy, classy outfit.

Since I am 5' 10 tall and a long torso, I often have a hard time finding dresses that work for me.  This worked for me as an empirewaist dress with leggings underneath.  Granted, I like wearing leggings under most of my stuff.  The first day I wore it I got numerous compliments.  The neckline is great without having to wear a cami or something underneath to be relatively modest and comfortable for wearing as a casual/day dress but could be dressed up I think for evening.  Decent stretch without being superstretchy bordering on formless.  So glad I got this!!!

FitList.review_summary: This dress is as pretty i
FitList.review_text: This dress is as pretty in person as it is in the photos. it fits beautifully and is very flattering. As another reviewer said, I like how it covers the bust completely but at the same time flatters it. The material is a bit clingy so a slip is a must. Absolutely worth the wait for it to get back in stock!

FitList.review_summary: I have this dress in Oliv
FitList.review_text: I have this dress in Olive.  It is SO comfortable.  I have paired with with tights and boots, and will be wearing the plum with tan sandals, gold sandals, and black patent leather pumps for dressy ocassions.  Very versatile.  The top of the dress is SO flattering and adds some shape to my small bust.  It also fits perfectly on my shoulders/upper arms and is slimming.  The color in real life is a bit deeper and more purple  I was hoping for a more muted, earthy purple like the monitor shows.  But, it's not a big enough deal to return the dress.  A great buy!  I am 120 pounds, small upper frame, slightly pear shaped.  I take a medium in many other ModCloth dresses that zip up and are fitted without give (I have a big rib cage but small cup size), but the small fits me PERFECTLY.  A medium would be tentlike.
Fits great. Very comfortable. Easy to dress up or down, versatile.
My favorite dress so far that I have ordered from Modcloth.  The material is not very heavy, so it is more of a spring time dress.

Bought a medium, am 5.1, 135lbs.  Bust 36B.  Fits nicely and the colour is quite lovely.  The only thing I don't love is that it is the typical clingy jersey fabric and for some reason makes my backside look frumpy.  I will try it with my Frame it, Girl slip and hopefully that will make it all better.

This dress is simply beautiful. The fabric is amazing, and so soft! The top is very flattering as well as the waistline. The area around the armpits is awesome!!! I was worried it would be too long for my preference but it is a good length. I'd prefer it about an inch shorter but I don't think I care enough to hem it ;) Its a lot less casual than I expected for a cottonmaterial, especially when adding jewelry. I think it will look more fun with a cute scarf or some textured or printed tights!
This is super comfortable, great fit, roomy and easy to dress down or up.
First dress I bought from ModCloth and it is perfect! Fits wonderfully! Love, love, love this dress!

This dress is beautifullycolored, and the cut is simple, yet flattering on me. I have only worn it at night, with black tights, but if I wear it during the day I will make sure I wear a slip, as the fabric slightly lets light through. This is a perfect dress for a variety of occasions!

FitList.review_summary: Great dress! I love the l
FitList.review_text: Great dress! I love the length because it makes it appropriate to wear to the office. Very flattering cut. I have super wide hips and it fits great!

Great dress! Rich color, good quality, soft cloth. After reading other reviews, I was afraid it might be on the sheer side, and the fabric is somewhat thin but I think will have no problem wearing this without a slip or tights. The waist is a little high, which makes my rear look like it starts a little higher up than usual, but it's still pretty flattering. The gathers on the bust have potential to look just sightly baggy if you're not the right shape for it but, again, not bad at all. Short enough to feel a little flirty, long enough to be good work wear, soft enough to feel casual, pretty enough for a night out. This one is a keeper!
The dress fits very nicely and feels great. I was afraid it wouldn't be large enough in the bust, but thats not an issue.

FitList.review_summary: Gilli dba Solgee is one o
FitList.review_text: Gilli dba Solgee is one of my favorite Modcloth designers! I bought this dress in the olive color and it was so comfortable and flattering that I had to have it in purple, too.

FitList.review_summary: I have this dress in oliv
FitList.review_text: I have this dress in olive and love it so much.  Buying this dress in purple was a no brainer.  Like the olive dress, this one is comfortable and a good length.  It can be dressed up and be dressed down.  This dress is so flattering, and the color is gorgeous.

FitList.review_summary: This is one of my favorit
FitList.review_text: This is one of my favorite dresses I've ever bought from ModCloth. Everything about it is flattering; it's fun and flirty, but at the same time modest enough to be appropriate for more professional settings; it's comfortable; and the color is beautiful! If this ever shows up in other colors, I'll buy them in a heartbeat.
this dress is very comfy. i got it for the summer. i needed more dresses that are airy. this will be great! cant wait to wear it.

This dress is gorgeous! The fabric is soft and flows so nicely, and I LOVE the deep purple color. The fit was perfect as well, I ordered a small and it was just right. Not too tight and not too loose, and the length hits me right at my knees, which is perfect for me (I don't like really short dresses). I love this dress and every girl should own it! :) I can't wait until it gets a little warmer so I can wear it out!
Love this dress! It fits perfectly in every way!

FitList.review_summary: I have this dress in gree
FitList.review_text: I have this dress in green and ADORE it, so I was thrilled when they added it in another color. Unfortunately, it was sold out, so I had to stalk it for several months waiting for it to return. It was totally worth it like the green version, it is very flattering but still loose enough to not cling to stomach and thighs. If they make any more colors, I will get those too!

Wow!  This dress is lovely!  Even prettier in person!  It's a fantastically pretty shade of plum, nicer to my eyes than what's pictured on the website.  The fabric is indeed quite thin, which other reviewers have noted.  It will be perfect for summer (and as previously noted, very versatile for winter layering), but I do think the thinness of the fabric makes the dress show every detail of my backside if I'm wearing leggings or cotton undies.  However, you'll probably want to wear a slip with it anyway since it's rather sheer, and that will make the dress drape perfectly.  It is extraordinarily flattering to my figure (long torso, petite bust, curvy hips), and the armholes are the perfect size and shape!  Very comfortable, very versatile, and very pretty.  This dress is definitely a winner!!PS I bought it with the All Eyes on Me Scarf (a peacock print), and they look ohsonice together.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress!  I had
FitList.review_text: I love this dress!  I had been scouting it for months, even put it on my wishlist so when they restocked, I would get an email.  Then it did, but it sold out within a day!  The SECOND time I bought it as soon as I got the email. Everything about this dress is flattering on me.  The waist hits at my waist, the dress falls just to my knees, and I can wear a bra under it without any strap reveal.  I feel comfortable and it is slimming without grabbing on to every imperfection.  I'm wearing it to work today with tights, boots and a cardigan, but know it will also be great for spring or summer.  A mustbuy!

I received and wore this dress on my birthday, my first Modcloth purchase.  It was perfect.  It has a very flattering cut, a gorgeous color, and I love how the top part covers without hiding the bust.  My husband still stared but at least I didn't feel exposed ;).  One note of caution, the material is very thin and sheer.  The first dress where I feel a slip is necessary as an adult, if only to know if the skirt of the dress is hanging as it should or stuck up in my undergarments if not for any other reason.  I purchased the Can't Stop Dancing half slip in bronze to fulfill this purpose and to give the skirt of the dress a little more shape/body/volume.Overall, a very comfortable and versatile dress that I can wear all throughout the year.  Light enough to wear in the southern summers and flexible enough for winter layers.  I paired this dress with the Tale as Fold as Time wedge; another fantastic Modcloth purchase.

FitList.review_summary: I was so excited when thi
FitList.review_text: I was so excited when this dress arrived. I already have the same one in Olive. The color is even more stunning in person! The plum is so rich. FANTASTIC dress for all shapes and sizes!

FitList.review_summary: This is going to become o
FitList.review_text: This is going to become one of my favorite dresses.  Length is about an inch above my knees, which is perfect, since many ModCloth dresses run a bit short to wear worryfree.  The fit is spectacular, with a gathered empire waist and nice thick straps so you'll never have to worry about your bra showing.  The skirt moves well; the only thing I wish is that it flared a bit more away from the body, but that's just because I like a bit more movement when I walk.  All in all, well worth buying and I would recommend this dress to anyone who's still on the fence about it!
This dress is perfect! I love it! The color is definitely a plum, not a purple as it appears on screen which made it even nicer for me. It is so comfortable, and I can't wait to wear it somewhere!

LOVE this dress and Modcloth! I was very impatient for it to come back in stock and I snapped it up the moment it did! It's more plum than purple and very soft. I wish they had an XS though, because it's a tiny bit too big for me and about three inches too long.

FitList.review_summary: I had read all the great
FitList.review_text: I had read all the great reviews for this dress in the Olive color but I didn't think it was suitable for my complexion (I have yellowtoned skin). So I quickly snatched this up when it came out. The style and material make this dress incredibly flattering, probably for all body types. The top is surprisingly flattering for my small bust but the folds/pleats provide plenty of give to accommodate larger cup sizes. The high/empire waist is great for my short torso. The rayon material is soft, cool, and drapes well, hiding all the bumps and lumps underneath. The dress is exactly kneelength on me. Overall, an excellent purchase for the price and I think I'll be getting a lot of use out of this dress. It's both comfortable and flattering, and can probably be worn in nearly all types of settings and occasions  work, parties, weddings, or even just casually lounging around. Hopefully ModCloth will put more back in stock, because I recommend this dress for everyone!

FitList.review_summary: The color is a rich purpl
FitList.review_text: The color is a rich purple very pretty and fabric is of great quality. The dress highlights the waist and tricep areas. Based on the high waist I recommend pairing with a short cardigan or jacket.

FitList.review_summary: Love it.  Fit is good.  M
FitList.review_text: Love it.  Fit is good.  Material feels nice.  Very flattering and easy to wear.
After all the rave reviews for the olive color when I saw the purple I had to get it! It is a very flattering dress and the fabric is super comfortable. Very pretty!

FitList.review_summary: I usually wear an XS, so
FitList.review_text: I usually wear an XS, so I was a little worried about this purchase.  Fits perfectly though. The empire waist is very flattering. The dress hits just above my knees. And so comfy!

This dress is so versatile and flattering! It looks great with a sweater and leggings for winter and can definitely be dressed up or down with accessories. The material is so soft and has a nice sheen to it as well. Overall, it's a great addition to any wardrobe.

FitList.review_summary: I ordered a Large and tho
FitList.review_text: I ordered a Large and thought the fabric was soft and very comfortable, it was very clingy and unflattering to my stomach.  Curvy girls, beware of this.  Great quality though.  I was quite sad that I had to return this.

The olive version of this dress was one of the first ModCloth items I purchased a couple years ago.  Gone up a size since then so I'm glad I was able to snag this up, and in my favorite color! Soft, comfortable, drapes nicely and covers everything to be work appropriate.
I bought this dress for my Wedding. Everyone loved it. Thanks Modcloth

FitList.review_summary: Everything I ever wanted in a wedding dress
FitList.review_text: I ordered this dress one size bigger and it fit perfectly. I have read reviews about need for alteration and that the arms were too big. I happen to carry more weight in my arms so this was sized perfectly for me. I ordered both colors just to see which one looked better because pale colors wash me out. To my surprise the pink was the better choice. The lace is gorgeous and a great contrast to the pink underlay. You will not regret this one curvy girls!!!
Perfect for my wedding. Fit perfectly and was super comfy.

We purchased this for my wedding dress. It is absolutely stunning. I do recommend sizing up. In most brands I'm a US 22. In my experience with Chi Chi London I find I run a 24 and it fits like a glove. I did get a 22 in a different dress from Chi Chi and it was too small. So size up and you'll be in great shape. I recommend this dress if you're thinking of buying it.
it was absolutely perfect for my wedding day! My hubby loved it?

FitList.review_summary: When I saw this dress I k
FitList.review_text: When I saw this dress I knew it was the wedding dress of my dreams and had it saved to my wishlist before my nowhusband proposed to me. The fit was perfect, I didn't feel like I was being stuffed into it. It has enough of a poof to stand out but won't get in your way of sitting comfortably. The lace along the neckline and arms is probably my favorite detail of the dress, it was the most complimented.

This dress was amazing!!!!!! I bought it last minute for my Vegas wedding. I am typically a size ten but I am a 36ddd so I sized up to a 12. It fit perfectly ! I didn?t even need to wear a bra! The pictures don?t do it justice! The sheen and look is just amazing. Very vintage. I added an ivory petticoat for more oomf at the bottom. I would highly recommend this dress.

I bought this dress for my wedding (another year away) and I am so excited about it! I'm short and curvy, so I was looking for a kneelength vintage dress, be comfortable to wear, suit a Fall Wedding, and was under $200. This dress hit all the check marks, and I got it during one of the sales (win!)I was worried being such a low price, that the fabric would be a little cheap looking or the dress poorly made. But when I opened it, I was really excited to see how delicate and ornate the details were! The bottom half of the gown is really lovely, the top is flattering but conservative, and the side zipper really helps getting the dress on/off. It also has builtin bra pads (which I missed in the info description) so that's a win! I don't think I'll end up needing to wear a bra under the dress which was a concern I had. I only have a few notes to share that I consider really minor and easy to fix: there's 3 layers of tool between the dress and the slip, so it jets out a little more than I like (my hips are about 38, plus poofy dress). I'm considering removing at least one layer to calm it down, but I have a lot of time between now and my wedding so I might change my mind. A frequent note in other reviews is that the top neckline lace work near the collar bone sometimes folds in on its self, which I also experienced. A little fabric tape would do the trick though.Overall, I'm really happy with this dress and I can't wait to wear it for real!
OMG! I'm wearing this dress for my court house wedding and it's just beautiful! The lace is so pretty and it fits like a glove

FitList.review_summary: I was so pleased with thi
FitList.review_text: I was so pleased with this choice for my wedding day. I bought my true size and it fit like a glove. If you are on the fence about sizing, order up one. Alterations would be worth it.
The dress was lovely and fit well. My biggest issue was tiny threads pulling and getting caught on things.

I bought this online just days after I got engaged, the week the wedding line was released. I wore it for my backyard wedding and the second I put it on, I couldn't believe how beautiful and perfect it was! I received so many compliments and couldn't have imagined a more perfect dress!!!

I bought this about 8 months in advance for my outdoor wedding. I tailored it a bit myself, capped the sleeves and took in the waist a bit but it fit pretty nicely right out of the mail. My usual size fit with minor alterations. It was maybe a tad longer than I would have liked. I'm 5'5 and it hit a few inches below the knee, but overall it's a great dress, especially for the price.

I loved this dress so much and got so many compliments, everybody wanted to know where I got it from. I ordered a 10 and the body fit great but the arms were too tight so I exchanged for a 12. The sleeves fit great so I took it to a seamstress to have the body taken back in to a size 10. I felt amazing and looked amazing all night.

I bought this to wear as my wedding dress and I loved it! I wear a 16 so buying dresses online usually leaves me a little bit sad. Not the case with this one! It fit perfectly! I really wanted a short wedding dress but was having trouble finding one that still felt special. The Gilded Grace Lace dress in Ivory was exactly what I was looking for. One thing for when you look at my pics: my friend's mom is a seamstress so she made 2 alterations for me. I wanted the sleeves to end just above my elbows so she shortened them a little. I also apparently have a short torso, so the neckline of the dress was folding over in the middle unless I constantly pulled it down at my waist. So she cut off a little at the top. It wasn't noticeable at all though.Oh! I just remembered something else. I noticed a few people complaining about the scratchiness of the lace. This was not a problem with me at all. I was actually really (pleasantly) surprised at how soft the lace was. I wore the dress all day and had a great time!! < 3

I bought this dress for a private ceremony between my fiance and I. Pictures do not do it justice. For what I paid, I am beyond thrilled with the dress. I tried on numerous dresses that were easily five or more times the price of this piece and none of them came close to how beautiful this ended up being. It isn't heavy material and made for an easy escape when removing it. Not scratchy. The arms were a bit tight but nothing I felt I'd hulk out of. I wish I could time travel! I felt so beautiful in this dress. I wear a size 13/14, wedding dress is a solid 16. I went with a 14 in this and do not regret it a bit. It fit like a glove. Plenty of room for a  bra underneath, too. Not too tight in any one place. Just right!

This dress was perfect for my outdoor August wedding at a farm. It was very true to size, though I originally ordered it in a size up and returned to get the smaller size. It fit perfectly, no alterations necessary! The lace was comfortable and I had plenty of movement in my arms. I loved that the skirt had a little body, but not too much poof. Every order I made came so quickly, and the return process was super easy. I loved this dress and got lots of compliments on it. Wonderful!!

FitList.review_summary: I really wanted to love t
FitList.review_text: I really wanted to love this dress for my wedding, but it's just not right.  I knew it would be poofy and I was OK with that, but it's CRAZY POOFY.  To the point where it seems some of the tulle was removed for the photos.  I would feel ridiculous wearing this, it feels like something a 7 year old girl would wear playing princess.  I also felt it ran small...I'm a 36D and ordered a size 10, but it was way too tight across my chest.  It was a good length, right at the knee.  The material is pretty, but it's shiny and I would call it ivory (I ordered champagne and expected it to be darker, more gold/bronze).
this dress was the perfect fit for my vintage themed wedding. the color was just right. the fit was spot on. I was so happy to walk down the aisle in this!
I bought this dress for my wedding and I loved it!I'm normally size 8 but went one size up to be on the safe side and it fitted perfectly except for the sleeves but they we're fixed easily.

FitList.review_summary: I wore this dress for my
FitList.review_text: I wore this dress for my wedding reception. This dress has the perfect amount of vintage flare and class.

I'm a little disappointed, and not sure if i going to wear it. In the title it says it's ivory, but it's not. It's champagne. It actually says champagne in the email confirmation for the color, which I didn't notice. It should not say it's ivory in the dress title. It is still a pretty dress, but I wasn't hoping for a yellowed ivory. It's also hard to zip up, but it's doable. The front fits a little odd, but I'm am also an odd bust size and it still looks decent.
Had a small courthouse wedding and went with this dress, it was amazing and got so many compliments!

This dress is gorgeous! It was perfect for my vintage style wedding in Vegas. The quality is great and it fit perfectly. It's a tad difficult to get off. The belt and shoes pictured also came from ModCloth.

i bought this dress for my wedding after being told by so many bridal salons that tea length dresses were not in style so they didn't carry any. i took a leap of faith and bought this dress off of Modcloth. when it came in, i was excited however the bottom half didn't seem poofy enough for me. (i wanted to feel like a cupcake lol) i took the dress to my local seamstress and she added several layers of tulle and chiffon IN RAINBOW COLORS underneath the dress. she also fitted the sleeves for me and it all came together perfectly. i also purchased my hat from mod cloth. all anyone could talk about the entire night was my dress! it also ran very true to size unlike most bridal sizes.

It was the most beautiful dress I've ever had. I bought this dress for our rehearsal dinner and I was really thinking of wearing it for my wedding. I felt it was more beautiful than my wedding dress! It was a perfect rehearsal evening with my dress! I am waiting for the perfect occasion to wear it again.
This was my Wedding dress!!This dress was Perfect in every way!!!
loved this dress! It fit perfectly and photographed really well. I got tons of compliments on it!

I ordered this dress three weeks before my wedding and had it shipped overnight in case I needed to return it and order a different size.  It fit wonderfully, although the side zipper did tend to stick.  As others noted, the lace at the neck did lay a little quirky as I had to order a dress made for my much biggerthanmyshoulders waistline, but I just made sure to adjust it occasionally.  Both issues were very minor on such a special day.

I fell in love with this dress immediately! I has a very clear image in my mind of how I wanted to look. This dress exceeded all my expectations and when I told my husband how much it cost, he was shocked! He thought I had spent hundreds! Love it!

FitList.review_summary: Wonderful dress, perfect for a small wedding.
FitList.review_text: I got this dress for my wedding in April. I was very discouraged when I started looking at plus size gown, but then I found this dress.  It was perfect. I had read reviews about the sleeves being tight, so I did order it a few sizes up(usually a 18, and I ordered a 22) I did have it taken in around the waist, but the sleeves were perfect.

FitList.review_summary: Still so happy with this dress
FitList.review_text: I bought this last year for my wedding in May. The quality is great (especially for the price), and I love this dress because I feel like the length and fit make it accessible to anyone, and it's not too difficult to alter. There's plenty of room in the chest and sleeves, which is usually my issue with nonstretch material. I got a few alterations: tightened the sleeves, and hemmed the skirt to ~2 inches above my knees (she shortened it at the waist to I didn't lose any of the detail on the bottom of the skirt). Then it was too poofy, so I had some layers removed. There are A LOT of layers, which again makes it so much easier to customize to your preference.

Amazing fast shipping. I had my wedding in Lima Peru and they fast shipping really helped make my special day amazing. Dress is close to true size I had to wear an extra padded bra because I'm pear shaped with a large bottom and smaller top. This dress photographs so nice and was perfect for a Peruvian summer wedding. Thank you Mod Cloth for you dependable service and quality!!!

When I first saw this dress I immediately knew this was THE ONE. I had bit of a struggle with the sizing (solely my own fault) and had to return this dress several times. I'm a size 16 on top but a 12 on the bottom. I thought I could get away with a 14 and was wrong. I ended up getting a size 16 and had a friend take it in. The dress went perfect and I would highly recommend it. It's beyond beautiful in person and the color is striking. When I walked out in this dress during my wedding day..my friends and family literally gasped. I know....DRAMATIC. Some things I'd suggest if your considering this dress: size up and have it altered, if your over a C cup have the bra padding removed, have the sleeves taken in. This dress is all lace so there is no give. There are several layers of tulle in the skirt..so if your not using this as a wedding dress I'd suggest having some layers removed. Also as others have stated it does get snagged a bit...but I can overlook that.

FitList.review_summary: The wedding dress of my dreams!
FitList.review_text: My husband and I got married in a little garden in Philadelphia. Small ceremony, only 15 guests. And this dress was perfect. Sent to me from the universe! You can see in the pictures that I did have the dress altered slightly to make the neckline fall more off the shoulder, and I added a belt from davids bridal. I would definitely recommend using the size charts I wear a size 16 in pants but I ordered a size 22 dress and it fit like a glove. I received ENDLESS compliments while walking around the city and to the day people still remark on how beautiful my dress was. On top of all that, the quality far surpasses what I paid for this beautiful little number. The detailing on the lace is even more beautiful in person than I imagined when I ordered it. My seamstress told me she couldn't even get the beautiful lace fabric for what I paid for the dress! Not a single person could believe I ordered this dress ONLINE and spent less than $200 on it. Overall completely obsessed and would HIGHLY reccomend.

I bought this dress after looking through thousands of vintage etsy shops  it's really hard to find anything that isn't a small or an extra small if you want to buy vintage.This dress has that great vintage look and comes in all sizes, perfect!

I was internet browsing for my wedding dress and once I saw this dress I knew it was the one for me. I usually wear a 24 in dresses USA size and had to go up a size with this dress. I bought a 24 and ended up exchanging it for a 26. I was going for a vintage look and defiantly achieved the look with this dress. Shipping didn't take long either.

The reviews had me scared about the tightness of the sleeves. So I ended up buying a size 26. I will have to take the dress in about a inch on either side and a little in the sleeves but in my size I'm pretty sure they would have been too tight. I don't understand the complaints about the itchy lace. I think its actually pretty soft. The color is a great soft gold and looks very vintage. It feels very high quality for the price and the skirt is much more full than I though it would be. I cant wait to wear it for my wedding next spring!!

We decided to do courthouse wedding and small family dinner with Parisian/vintage theme and this dress was absolutely perfect! Definitely measure yourself and talk to customer service before picking your size.  I ordered a size 8 and it was a little loose in the waist but slightly tight when it was delivered. Luckily, I had a month to lose a few pounds to ensure it fit perfectly on the day.  Sad I won't be able to wear it again, I felt so beautiful in it.

FitList.review_summary: I couldn't love this dress more.
FitList.review_text: I absolutely love this dress. I bought it as soon as I got engaged, and I'm so excited to wear it for my wedding  one year from today!I fell in love with the dress the first time I saw a photo of it, and everyone who's posted photos here looks so beautiful! While there are many more positive than negative reviews of this lovely frock, I started secondguessing my decision when I read the negative reviews. Seriously, go read them! You'd think this dress ruined people's lives. I ordered a size 16 (larger than I need, but I'm quite busty  36G  and I knew I'd have to have whatever dress I bought altered to some extent), and I'm happy to report the bust fits perfectly. I did not find the lace to be at all scratchy, as some others have complained about, and the sleeves and shoulders aren't restricting at all. Because of the placement of the zipper (underarm rather than in the back), you WILL need help getting this over your head if you've had your hair done already. The skirt is fuller than it looks in the photos online, but one commenter suggested removing one of the layers of tulle (there are two), and I think I will end up doing just that. Another commenter said having the dress professionally pressed to help with the poofiness was also effective. I found the color to be a true champagne, not a shiny gold as others have suggested. I think it's very true to the online photos. This was the first dress I tried on, and I was immediately sold! It's exactly what I wanted.
Great dress!

I bought this for my wedding while it was on sale and was so nervous to buy anything online! I went a size up and it was perfect, even on the bigger side. It was so perfect for my outdoor forest wedding and went great with my Frye boots! I can't believe the quality for the price. Everyone kept commenting on the detail and the vintage look!

This was my first ever purchase from ModCloth; I actually stumbled upon a picture of this dress in the blush color on Pinterest after looking at hundreds of other dresses online, so when it was time to actually start seriously finding a dress I decided to check this one out.  It was miraculously in stock in all sizes so I ordered it immediately in a size 16 (to accommodate for my bust) and it came just 3 days later despite the winter storms on the east coast!  This dress fits like it was made for me and I almost cried after slipping into it because something I had ordered online actually fit for once.  The length is perfect (I'm 5'7 and it's true tea length on me), the material is not itchy at all like some of the other reviews say, and I have no issues at all with the lace being frayed in some spots or being floppy at the neckline.  It is exactly what I was looking for without breaking the bank and I cannot wait to wear this dress in September when I marry my best friend.
I was more than pleased with my dress and shoes.

I bought this dress for a second wedding.  I just loved everything about it.  Fit was perfect,  look was perfect.  Gave me the vintage look without the high price.  The only flaw in this dress is that it snags very easy.   You have to be very careful.  I would recommend this dress to anyone.

I knew I had to have this dress the moment I saw it. It was perfect for my wedding. It was timeless and I got so many compliments! ModCloth also had fast shipping and wonderful customer service when I needed an exchange. I'm wondering how I can modify it or dye it so I can wear it again!

I felt like a princess on my wedding day < 3 I ended up altering because the lace across the top and arms was ill fitting and felt a little overwhelming for me. Once removed it truly became my dream dress. The sizing of the dress was perfect and i added a petticoat for extra poof!

I just wore this dress as maid of honor at my sister's wedding.  It was perfect.  Extremely comfortable and fun and full.  What girl doesn't love tulle.  Tons of compliments.  Paired perfectly with the bee belt and some fun conversation heart shoes.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress for my wedding
FitList.review_text: I ordered a 26 (which relates to a 4X), and as anticipated by the size chart, it was a couple inches too small. A few grievances I have with the dress are: the color is darker than anticipated, the zipper goes right up into the armpit, and the fabric is itchy. The sleeves aren't tight to my arms, and the lace on the chest doesn't lay flush. I'll probably have the chest lace tailored. The dress isn't as poofy as the pictures or customer service lead me to believe, so I will be purchasing a crinoline. However, the length is absolutely perfect and the bust is nice, and the in sewn cups fit nicely (which is a surprise for my large breasts, but I'll still wear a bra), and overall I feel nice in my dress.

I bought this dress a year before my wedding, I was married on 10/16/16. The reason I say it was almost perfect is because the sleeves were much too large, they belled out oddly and the scalloped neck stuck out a bit. I'm sure it has something to do with the fact that the dress was plus size. I understand it's difficult to get the fit perfectly without knowing how a person is shaped. That being said the rest of the dress was perfect! I needed no changes made to anything else. The length and style were exactly what I wanted for my wedding. I've added some pictures to show the edits to the dress. Definitely size up for this dress! I wear a size 20 normally and got a size 24. The material has no give because of the lace.

I bought this dress for my upcoming nuptials in April and I couldn't be happier! The dress fits just right. I normally fit between a size 810, but I sized up based on other reviews, and I'm so glad I did. Had I gotten a size 10, it definitely wouldn't fit. I have super sensitive skin, but since the sleeves are not tight on me, I haven't experienced the itchiness others have mentioned. The dress arrived within 4 or 5 days after ordering which is pretty awesome. I'm very happy overall!
My husband and I eloped and this was the perfect dress! The first one I ordered did have a rip in the tulle underneath, but Modcloth did a quick and easy exchange.

A very pretty dress.  The lace is soft and I adore the neckline.  The torso is rather short on me, only 12 inches from the hollow to the waist so not a good fit for me.  I thought it made me look a little too boxy on top, but I'm not a curvy lady and some support from a corset or shapewear would probably help.  The photos others have submitted are so cute but this is just a little too cupcake for me.

I bought this to wear to my January city hall wedding, and it did not disappoint!! I did have to go up two sizes, but it was mostly so the dress would fit in the bust; were it not for the boobs, I think one size would've been sufficient. It also has zero stretch, so keep that in mind when ordering. I got so many compliments though (even from our officiant, who's done thousands of weddings!) and felt absolutely beautiful. It really was the icing on the cake for my special day.

This dress made my special day very special. The color is beautiful, and the dress is high quality. The material doesn't wrinkle in travel and the skirt can be fluffed or smoothed to your liking. I did buy some push up inserts for the bodice since I'm a little small chested. I love this dress.

FitList.review_summary: I wore this dress to my w
FitList.review_text: I wore this dress to my wedding and it was stunning. I liked how it hugged my arms and waist, really accentuating my hourglass figure. My only complaint would be the material that ran between the shoulders and covered my chest was not very stiff. It tended to flop over and I had to have it pulled in a little. Otherwise, this dress was perfect.

FitList.review_summary: I have been eyeing this d
FitList.review_text: I have been eyeing this dress for a long time. It was a fantasy dress of mine and when I finally bought it I was really excited. But then I tried it on and it was too big since I sized up two sizes and it was really poor material. I was really like down by it. It looks great and some of these photographs but it just didn't work out for me.

This dress was PERFECT! I was having a hard time finding a dress that I liked, mainly because I?m 4 months pregnant and I feel huge! Everyone is saying I?m having twins LOL The fullness of the skirt definitely helped me not feel ?fat? like all the other dresses have. It went perfect with the Chimerical Caper Heel in Champagne and Wed the Time is Right Fascinator. I ended up making my necklace by hand since I didn?t have time to try and find something then wait for shipping.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress. I actu
FitList.review_text: I love this dress. I actually wore it for my wedding and got so many compliments on it. its lace so it may be a little itchy but Thats to be expected from that fabric. it was very comfortable!

This dress is gorgeous! It's my wedding dress (for my eloping, courthouse wedding)! It feels so timeless and classic. When I ordered, I was concerned it would be overly sparkly. It is not. While it has a little bit of shimmer, it is not so much that it looks gaudy. My one warning about the dress is that the lace is very, very fragile. In fact, the first dress that was delivered to me had a huge snag  right in the front of the gown. But, as always, modcloth was on it with an easy exchange. I love the (snagfree) second dress that was delivered, but I am still being very, very cautious not to let the lace catch on anything.

FitList.review_summary: This dress was love at fi
FitList.review_text: This dress was love at first sight, Had my mom fix the sleeves cause they were a bit large for my arms , other then that it fit perfectly . Would totally recommend for someone who's going for a vintage style ceremony .
I loved everything about this dress! I wore it for my gardeninapark elopement and it was perfect. great quality for the price and I got a ton of compliments.

I previously order this dress in blush and a size 14. The blush one was hideous. Wayyy too pink. But this one is perfect. The color is spot on with the pictures, and it fits great. It's amazing how much one size down can do for a dress. Can't wait to get married in it!

FitList.review_summary: Loved the dress, but I re
FitList.review_text: Loved the dress, but I returned it...i though that i could wear for different events but the dress looked very bridal to me.

FitList.review_summary: I wore this as my wedding
FitList.review_text: I wore this as my wedding dress. No one, NO ONE (a side from ridiculously expensive designers) sell short dresses that don't look like prom. This was my dream, a golden champagne lace dress that was slightly over the knee so my huge butt wouldn't show while dancing! I'm built like a linebacker, mostly rectangular, and this really helped create a defined waist and an bit of flair. The lace boat neck was perfect for my broader shoulders and ample bust. Everyone loved it, and they were right to. Didn't need any alterations, although I had to send the first one back because the zipper didn't want to work. Love love love, love love!

FitList.review_summary: I am so in love with this
FitList.review_text: I am so in love with this dress! i couldn't have found a better dress for my wedding.

I was absolutely heartbroken when I received this dress. I was OBSESSED with it and was so sure it was going to be perfect. But it was terrible for me. It fit wrong in every single way. And it was super scratchy and gross feeling. and there was no way to make the lace sit nice on my chest. I'm so glad it worked for some, because the photo shown is stunning! I don't know what was wrong with mine ha. I even tried to take it to get completely reconstructed, but it was going to cost upward of $200 for that. I ended up having a perfect dress made for me for a really super great price.
Beautiful dress! A little restricting in the armpit area. I would have liked to have had it taken in a bit at the waist, but the bust was good. I had tons of fun in it!

FitList.review_summary: This is one of the most u
FitList.review_text: This is one of the most uncomfortable dresses I've ever worn. I received it in once of those surprise boxes where you pay $20 or so and SURPRISE! I was super excited to get such a high quality and luxurious looking dress. It fits ok through the waist but the bust was very loose, and it is dang near impossible to get on and off. The sleeves are very tight, to the point that they made my arms raw after just trying it on, and the entire top is very scratchy. Very disappointing, and very glad I paid next to nothing for this dress :(

FitList.review_summary: Once I got the right size
FitList.review_text: Once I got the right size, it was prefect! I almost had to spend the rest of my life in the wrong size (I got a little stuck), but it is such a beautiful dress that it would've been okay. There were a couple of minor blemishes in the lace, however. Near the bottom hem the thread used for the lace was slightly discolored and gray. It was a simple fix for a seamstress, though, and it was still worth the purchase. There's enough flounce in the skirt to make it move beautifully, but not so much that you feel like a cupcake. Also, I happened to notice that the size 12 I received initially had a lot more sparkle in it than the 14. Both were nice, just good to know.
The dress was very baggy on my chest area and arms. I should have sized down

I'm happy with this dress, although there are a couple of things to know.  First, you will need garment tape to keep the lace (and bodice) in place.  Having to put the dress on over my head after getting my hair done was almost disastrous.  Wish I could have stepped into it.  Received many compliments, and loved the color, length and detail.  Overall, very happy with the dress.

My wedding dress ?? I adore this dress! I gave it 4 stars only because the sleeves were so tight it was a major fight getting the dress on and off (and I have small arms). The material is tulle so it just has no give. I ended up getting the sleeves shortened to a cap length before the big day. Also the dress is more gold than champagne, but that was fine with me.

Beautiful! I wore this for my small and informal wedding and felt transported in time. The dress could have used some minor alterations to fit like a glove but I was very happy with the off the rack feel as well.
Fit weird in the chest/shoulder areas. Had to return, but great material and very pretty.
The fit was good. Unfortunately I found another dress and went with that one.

Love this dress. I'm planning on getting married in it. It's everything I wanted. Lovely color, great length (just past my knees), and feels very well made. The sleeves are a little loose so I think I'll take those in a bit, but otherwise the fit feels great. The detail shines a little in real life. 10/10 would recommend.
Love this dress! Wore it for my wedding.  I will be looking into dying it so that I can wear it again!

FitList.review_summary: I think this dress was wo
FitList.review_text: I think this dress was wonderful looking and had a lot of potential. It just didn't feel right for me and didn't flatter my coloration (Caucasian with yellow undertones) so I returned it. But it fits well and is very forgiving to body types.

FitList.review_summary: I was not sure about the
FitList.review_text: I was not sure about the size so went with 12 assuming its UK size. It was quite large. The color was not as interesting as the photo. It looked more yellow to me. Overall, its an OK dress but I had to return it due to size.
Perfect!
Perfect for my gazebo wedding. Fit great!

I got so many compliments on this dress for my courthouse wedding, even from perfect strangers in the street. Be sure to buy fashion tape to keep the lace at the chest in place ($10, tops) and be careful taking it off since there's not much give in the lace at the arms.I added an ivory birdcage veil, gold Betsey Johnson heels, a light pink waist sash and matching necklace, and a bouquet of paper flowers.

FitList.review_summary: I felt like a vintage pri
FitList.review_text: I felt like a vintage princess in this dress.  It was perfect for my wedding ceremony in the park.  I had the dress steamed and used fashion tape to keep the neckline down.  Strangers in the park stared at us and sent tons of compliments on my dress.
It was beautiful just too fancy for my event.

FitList.review_summary: I ordered a size larger s
FitList.review_text: I ordered a size larger so I could get it custom fit perfectly. The breast pads were a little awkward for me (I wear a DDD bra though), but everything else was perfect! I altered the little front chest flap since it doesn't stick to your body and folds over. I would definitely recommend this dress. It was the perfect price and served its purpose for my elopement!
Such a beautiful dress.

FitList.review_summary: Fit like a glove! Got com
FitList.review_text: Fit like a glove! Got compliments from every person who see my photos!! Loveeeeeee it!!
It definitely runs small and is very formal and stiff but looks lovely!
It definitely runs small and is very formal and stiff but looks lovely!

Bought this for my wedding, and I like it a lot. I've gotten mixed reviews from friends I've shown it to. Someone said it looked like a doily. I'm ok with that, but I'm not sure I'll for sure keep this dress. The fit is perfect. I actually don't have any need for tailoring if I decide to keep it.

The dress is beautiful! The lace is gorgeous, not itchy at all. And yes, it is very puffy but still just perfect! The back made feel like Grace Kelly! It's classy, looks vintage and is perfect for my Vegas wedding next February. I sized up and it fits perfectly. I totally recommend this dress.
Returned thisit fit me at the hips in a weird way. It made my hips seems bigger than they already are.
So so beautiful. I cannot wait to wear it at my wedding at the end of the month!!!!!!!!!!!!! I'm so happy!!!

FitList.review_summary: I will wear this for my 3
FitList.review_text: I will wear this for my 30 year anniversary, can't wait the dress is gorgeous.

FitList.review_summary: I was worried the lace in
FitList.review_text: I was worried the lace in the sleeves would be a little tight but it fit surprisingly well! It is a beautiful dress and great quality but then length threw me off. It's just an awkward length on me anyways.

FitList.review_summary: This was a super cute dre
FitList.review_text: This was a super cute dress and I adored the top. I was not super thrilled with the way the skirt felt on my legs or when I touched it. That's perhaps my own weirdness and should not be taken against this absolutely cute dress!!
Just beautiful, it fit perfectly and great quality!
The sleeves are a unique touch along with the lace neckline.

FitList.review_summary: The lace was very hot and
FitList.review_text: The lace was very hot and itchy, albeit very pretty. Far too puffy on the skirt for it to suit someone with a big backside and it was hard to get the skirt's lace to sit right. I did order the totally incorrect size (universal sizing on the site would be a dream!) but it would have made me look, as my mother said, 'enormous', and who wants that on their wedding day?! However, some other girls have styled it amazingly, so although it didn't suit me, I'm not saying it wouldn't suit every bigger girl.

FitList.review_summary: I loved it from the momen
FitList.review_text: I loved it from the moment I saw it! And it was even more amazing in person! It was perfect for our courthouse wedding! I must admit, I was worried about the bust because I'm super top heavy but the fit was perfect in every way! I got so many compliments and felt amazing in this dress! But it now!!! You won't be disappointed!

FitList.review_summary: I found the dress to be m
FitList.review_text: I found the dress to be more of a yellow color than I anticipated. Additionally the lace had flaws and appeared to be poorly made. I returned it.
works perfectly with the short Va Va Voom petticoat!
I'm normally a 10, but I have a wide rib cage so I went with a 12. And sadly, the 12 will not zip over my rib cage :( Otherwise it was a beautiful dress, and nicely made!
Fits perfectly!

FitList.review_summary: I bought this for my wedd
FitList.review_text: I bought this for my wedding and it fit perfectly. The arms were a little loose but not bad.  The skirt is really awesome and fluffy. I really can't wait to wear it.  Using ModCloth was scary at 1st but I'm so happy I did. saved me so much money and no stress. I'd go a size or 2 up. I measured myself and sized by that.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress for m
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress for my wedding and it couldn't have been more perfect! It was airy and lovely and the price is ridiculous cheap for a dream dress.

Love this dress, but I'm happy I sized up because I don't have the narrowest waist. For ladies without dramatic hourglass figures, I definitely recommend sizing up and tailoring things like the sleeves as needed. I'll be taking the sleeves in an inch or so and adding a belt for my wedding day! The lace is not soft to the touch, but lace rarely is and I do not find it uncomfortable or scratchy. The coloration is definitely more golden than you can see in the photos, but it gives a beautiful vintage quality to the dress and I love it. It is not a stark white dress, so if that's what you're looking for, you should consider other options! The hem and neckline are gorgeous, but steaming and fashion tape are your friends to get everything laying the way you want it!

FitList.review_summary: I wish the lace was just
FitList.review_text: I wish the lace was just a bit more soft and girly.

I had been searching forever for a wedding dress with the following criteria: ivory, lace, tea length, 3/4 sleeves and wide neckline.  So of course this dress was absolutely perfect.  Being plussize, I honestly didn't expect this to fit me, not much does, but I ordered it anyway figuring I would have to return it.  IT FIT LIKE A DREAM.  I didn't want to take it off the rest of the day, it was so comfortable.  I had to alter the sleeves and have them taken in, and I also had the center scallop on the front neckline flipped upside down because I have a short neck.  I also had cups and clear bra straps added under the lace to help hold the dress up so it wouldn't only hang from the lace.  I definitely recommend putting double stick tape along the neckline so it will lay flat.  The length was perfect for dancing all night long and I honestly didn't find the lace all that itchy.  This dress was a dream come true.

If I would have exchanged for the next size up it would have been perfect, but I decided on a longer dress. However, the sleeves are definitely scratchy and I think wearing it for an extended amount of time would have been irritating.

completely adorable. i am looking forward to wearing this beautiful dress for my wedding this october. i could not have found a dress that is more me, and for this price?! jackpot! i have to also give big ups to the modcloth customer service team. i first received a dress that had a faulty zipper, and when i contacted modcloth they were more than accommodating, they express shipped a new dress to me to make sure i had what i needed before i even sent the old one back. all for a manufacturer's error? impressed, to say the least!

FitList.review_summary: I wore this dress for our
FitList.review_text: I wore this dress for our small intimate wedding. It was perfect! The only thing slightly annoying is the bottom is kind of staticky. But I absolutely loved this dress :)
This dress was super itchy and was hard to get off :( i returned it immediately.

I can?t believe how beautiful this dress is in person. I first saw this dress before I was engaged and loved it, and when I started shopping for a wedding dress after getting engaged I had to buy it to see if it would work. It?s even better than I expected! The detailing is so pretty and looks much more expensive than it is. The coloring is very nice, and true to pictures in my opinion. It really is a champaign and even ivory in parts so it?s great for a wedding dress if you don?t want bright white. The dress fit me perfectly  I ordered size 2. I feel like it was made to fit me it?s so perfect! No alternations needed. The dress hits right below my knee which is exactly what I wanted. The top is padded so you might not have to wear a bra. Only thing that I noticed is the top lace moved away from my chest when I move around but nothing a bit of doublesided fashion tape can?t fix. Seriously, I can?t say enough good things about the dress. When I put it on my sister and I had the moment when someone puts on the wedding dress that was meant to be. Love it!!

This dress perfectly fits my style and where we are getting married (the courthouse in December).  Every thing about it: the color, the lace detail and slight poof of the skirt is just beautiful! And the dress fit perfectly. I normally wear a 10, bit based off other reviews I went one size up, and it was great!

There's a reason why this is the number one selling wedding dress on Modcloth! I love Chi Chi London's clothing and am so excited that I was able to purchase a dress that was ready to wear without tailoring.

FitList.review_summary: I used this for my weddin
FitList.review_text: I used this for my wedding dress. the only thing I can say is I hated the arms. The material made you feel like you were stuck in the Chinese finger traps.
This was lovely but things got too complicated trying to coordinate the warm off white color with other elements of the wedding. Wish you offered in a cool white! Trying another similar dress.

FitList.review_summary: I was in love with this d
FitList.review_text: I was in love with this dress from the moment I saw it! I thought it was perfect for the beach wedding that I have always wanted. I felt completely glamours on our wedding day. 3
beautiful dress.
The was Beautiful I just bought it a size to small.

I thought this dress was going to be great based on the pictures. My biggest problems were (1) just how poofy it was and (2) the lace on the neck. I didn't know I'd have just a problem with the poofiness for a dress I planned to wear for my wedding, but it made me feel like a big marshmallow. The lace on the neck was the real dealbreaker, though. It has a huge peak right in the middle. It didn't lay right in general, and the peak was so high on my frame that it was above my collarbone. It just kind of sat there in the way. Maybe this is designed for someone with a very different torsoneck situation.

FitList.review_summary: I adore this dress. I had
FitList.review_text: I adore this dress. I had a custom wedding dress made in New York, and when I went to the final fitting something crazy had happened  the dress was too short and snagged! I had a month to find a new wedding dress. This was one of the dresses I ordered as an option. I ended up wearing it as my rehearsal dress and it was perfect! I love everything about the nod to older fashion, the flattering shape, and the overall fanciness.

Lovely dress! Love the goldish color and shine. Not too poofy on the skirt. Length on me was almost tea length. Definitely had to try a few different methods to get out of it ;) but it can be done. I had a little extra room in the waist, but don't think I could have gone smaller with the restrictive arm/shoulder. Lace is slightly scratchy and it isn't the most breathable dress. Overall beautiful! Just what I was looking for.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress to el
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress to elope in. I love love loved it. It was comfortable yet a little itchy but I was focused on saying I Do.

FitList.review_summary: The neck was a little flo
FitList.review_text: The neck was a little floppy but that's my only complaint. Fit well with enough room that I didn't feel like I was suffocating. Very pretty and very affordable

FitList.review_summary: fit a little loose on the
FitList.review_text: fit a little loose on the bust. But loved this dress all the same

FitList.review_summary: this dress fit like a glo
FitList.review_text: this dress fit like a glove, I purchased it for my wedding and it was the best decision ever!

FitList.review_summary: I love the dress is reall
FitList.review_text: I love the dress is really cute

FitList.review_summary: The fit was great as was
FitList.review_text: The fit was great as was the built in bra! I used dress tape to keep the dress attached on the front and back. Beautiful dress.
I love it!

FitList.review_summary: I love it. The threads co
FitList.review_text: I love it. The threads come loose sometimes so be careful

FitList.review_summary: I worse this dress as my
FitList.review_text: I worse this dress as my Rehearsal Dinner dress! I had read the reviews to go up a size. The dress was beautiful. I think it was actually too big, so I places a belt in the Middle. It's a lovely dress, and I'll get it altered at some point so that it fits better but at the time I was in a jam and needed a lovely dress fast :)  it is a good quality and the lace and color is just very nice not too bright! Highly recommend (just maybe don't be as last minute as me so you can alter it) where it didn't fit was in the waist I always have the boobs are too big, waist is a lot smaller problem.

FitList.review_summary: Little itchy but I got ov
FitList.review_text: Little itchy but I got over it. Prepare to have to pull it over your hair. It photographs really well, and people still talk about how my dress was the most beautiful they'd ever seen. I actually got a few gasps!

Loved everything about this dress. Quality was super impressive and managed to stay beautiful when I packed it in carryon for elopement. I had alterations made to the dress because of weight loss but it fit perfectly when I first bought it.
this was my wedding dress. it was like a mini princess dress. so poofy, yet vintage.

FitList.review_summary: I love the lace and the f
FitList.review_text: I love the lace and the fit of this dress... The detail on the lace isn't as gold as I expected it to be. It's more of a neutral/champagne.. The same color as the rest of the dress

FitList.review_summary: I got married in this bac
FitList.review_text: I got married in this back in September, and it was such a simple, yet elegant gown to wear. Everyone loved it!

FitList.review_summary: I wore this as my wedding
FitList.review_text: I wore this as my wedding dress. It was perfect! The lace sleeves irritated my sensitive skin a bit but a seamstress added a nearly invisible material to the lining so it wouldn't itch. Go gorgeous and suitable for so many different occasions!

In love with this dress. Can't wait to wear it at my wedding!!!!!! The fit was great and very comfortable. It's got a nice, full skirt. It's still a very formal dress. I have a non traditional style so it's perfect for me. The color is gorgeous. It shimmers in the light. It's still very light weight and breathable despite the toole skirt. The only bad thing is the lace right by the neck line needs to be startched to stay up corrosion. Otherwise a gorgeous dress!

This was a beautiful dress. The lace was a bit itchy like the other reviewers mention. I didn't end up keeping the dress because I went with another mod cloth dress for my ceremony, but it would be a great pick for anyone looking for a beautiful reasonably priced dress that makes you feel very bridal.

FitList.review_summary: Wore it to my wedding, an
FitList.review_text: Wore it to my wedding, and it couldn't be more perfect. I sized up so had to have it taken in a bit but it really seemed to be true to size. The material is beyond lovely.  I cannot say enough positive things about this dress.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this for my rehe
FitList.review_text: I bought this for my rehearsal dinner and really wanted to love it... Unfortunately returned because in person it was just... odd. the color wasn't so much champagne as a glittery gold and the lace wouldn't lay flat and looked cheap. The top part around the shoulders and bust was much tighter than everything else and didn't allow you to move your armsif I recall correctly, the lace around the armpit started to rip just from trying it on. It didn't look much at all like the photos. Very easy to return, though!

This dress is beautiful! The only downside is for bigger boobed ladies, you'll want a shaper to keep the torso elongated or it could come out a little maternity. We had a private wedding in St. Louis and it was the perfect dress for the occasion.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this for my wedd
FitList.review_text: I bought this for my wedding. This dress is so beautiful in person and it fit me perfectly. I loved it except for the material. I was hoping the lace would be soft but it was very scratchy. I didn't notice this when I first tried it on so unfortunately it was past the return date when I wore it for a longer period of time. I decided It was too important for me to be comfortable on my wedding day so I ended up buying a different dress at a bridal shop. I'll have to sell this one online somewhere. So gorgeous, just be warned that it's scratchy.
This was my wedding dress and it was perfect! I did need to wear a waist corset to make the dress fit, but when I did it was extremely flattering.

FitList.review_summary: Ha to take up the shoulde
FitList.review_text: Ha to take up the shoulders so that it didn't hang too low on my flat ass chest. The pictures of this dress do not show how gold it is. But I love it anyways.

Very beautiful dress! I was so sad to send it back but while the waist was perfect the bodice was a little loose and the cups a little too big. The lace over the front and back lay beautifully, it made me feel very princessy :)

FitList.review_summary: The arms are to small in
FitList.review_text: The arms are to small in the dress but everything else is fine except the arms

I typically wear a 16/18 but after reading reviews I went with the 20, it is a bit loose but I would rather it that way than looking to snug. The sleeves are looser than I expected but overall I love this dress and will be wearing it on my wedding day with my mint heals ??
I really love the dress!!! Its perfection

FitList.review_summary: True to size! I wear size
FitList.review_text: True to size! I wear size 16 in most dresses, get most of my dresses from New York and Co. Loved the length on me and got tons of compliments! Champagne color with gold detail was romantic and fun. It was a little difficult to get in the dress after hair and make up because it uses a side zipper under the arm but I'm So glad I went with this dress!

Ordered this as a potential wedding dress. It fit great but made me look rather boxy. It was much darker and yellower than I expected or cared for, and the fabric detailing was itchy and looked more casual/cheap than I would have expected for the price.

This was my Court Wedding dress, and I loved it since the first day when it arrived home. Everyone told me I looked like a princess, including other brides at the courthouse. I read here that it ran small so I ordered one size bigger and it fit perfectly. I also read here that it's an itchy dress, it wasn't itchy at all for me. I love this dress it is beautiful!

FitList.review_summary: I wore this dress for my
FitList.review_text: I wore this dress for my vintage themed Bridal Shower. I got a million compliments and I felt beautiful!

FitList.review_summary: wore this to my wedding i
FitList.review_text: wore this to my wedding in Europe people on the street literally stopped and stared! I had the sleeves tightened but the rest fit perfectly
Was a little big... Might have been able to go down a size, but the dress is gorgeous.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this to wear as
FitList.review_text: I bought this to wear as a wedding dress. I'd been eyeing it for a long time and when it came back in my size I grabbed it. It fits like a glove. I do not find it itchy, nor does the neckline droop. But if it did it would be an easy fix. I think it's fantastic quality for the price. I own two other dresses from Chi Chi London and they are just as great.

FitList.review_summary: Oh. My. Gawd. I bought a
FitList.review_text: Oh. My. Gawd. I bought a dress from David's Bridal for $99 but it didn't feel magical. At the time, Modcloth was out of my size and so I put myself on the wait list and wished for the best. They restocked it just in time and holy hell it was perfect. Comfortable. Easy. Romantic. And not only awesome for our destination wedding in Iceland, but I also wore it to dinner at a restaurant and bar hopping that evening. Everybody raved. I'm so in love with this purchase.

I absolutely love this dress! Wore it for my wedding and received so many compliments! Perfect for a retro, offbeat bride such as myself. It also matched perfectly with my husbands barong. The only warning is that it is difficult to get on and off by yourself and slightly itchy at first.

FitList.review_summary: I chose this dress to wea
FitList.review_text: I chose this dress to wear for my wedding. I love the vintage look of it and the length. The lace is beautiful! Fit perfectly, I didn't have to get it altered at all. I got so many compliments on this gorgeous dress! Beyond happy with it! 3 I also got the shoes from here on sale!!
Love this dress. The sleeves were a little big but after alterations ($25), I am in love and can't wait for my big day!
Perfect dress for my wedding day. I felt beautiful

FitList.review_summary: I loved this dress, I wor
FitList.review_text: I loved this dress, I wore it to my prom and I felt very elegant! Although this dress was a little tight, it still worked pretty well. I love this dress and the fabric was beautiful. Cannot wait to wear it for another formal gathering.

I was really excited about this dress when I first saw it on the site. I thought it was simply beautiful and would be perfect for my wedding. However, when I received it I was disappointed. The idea of the dress was great, but in actuality, I felt that the material was cheap and costumelike. I felt that this dress was not worth $175, but maybe $50. It was also incredibly awkward to put on and wear. I felt like I was dressing up for a costume party. The material is scratchy. Generally I get amazing dresses form Modcloth, but this one was a let down. I returned it.

FitList.review_summary: I wanted to love this dre
FitList.review_text: I wanted to love this dress! But it was a really thick lace and the collar just came too high. The champagne version is a lighter lace but still a very busy dress. I think it could be a great dress on someone with a longer torso.
Looks slightly awkward if you have a long torso.  A belt to break it up would make it perfect.

FitList.review_summary: I LOVE this dress I felt
FitList.review_text: I LOVE this dress I felt so beautiful on my wedding day!! It match my veil amazingly and was just pefect there were a few stray threads. It is from London so pay attention to sizing.
Would have loved to keep it but orcas pretty huge in the body and tight in the arms for me

the dress fits well everywhere except the arms the sleeves are way to big on me but I feel a size smaller would be to small around my stomach so I'm just gonna get the sleeves altered. great quality material and color. #ModClothMarriage
I loved the dress online but unfortunately the shoulders were too small and I couldn't zip it up all the way or move around. Sadly I had to return it.

FitList.review_summary: So pretty! I love the lac
FitList.review_text: So pretty! I love the lace neckline.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress but the
FitList.review_text: I love this dress but the colour doesn't work for me. It's beautiful and well made. I usually wear a 46 but went wth the 8 because other reviews said it fit small. The 6 probably would have fit perfectly but the 8 was a bit big. Nothing a bit of tailoring couldn't fix. #reviewcontest

FitList.review_summary: Over all the fit is great
FitList.review_text: Over all the fit is great. I have very small shoulders and had a slight alteration to adjust the fit. I also added some Swarovski crystals to give it a little extra something! I'm in love with this dress!

FitList.review_summary: I loved this! I wore it f
FitList.review_text: I loved this! I wore it for my prom dress.

FitList.review_summary: I ended up finding a dres
FitList.review_text: I ended up finding a dress I liked better, but this dress seriously looks good on everyone. It's amazing. The only issue I found was that the lace around the neck didn't really lay flat.
This dress fit me amazingly! It's not itchy or has any discomfort at all! It doesn't sit perfectly on your neck but still looks fantastic! I highly recommend

FitList.review_summary: I always knew when the da
FitList.review_text: I always knew when the day would come, that I would want o get married in a vintage inspired outfit. When I pictured myself in a wedding dress, this was exactly what I had in mind. Based on the reviews of this beautiful dress, I went a size up. I usually wear an 18 but opted to order a size 20 instead. This dress couldn't of been more perfect! Looking forward towards wearing ModCloth for my wedding next April  2017.

FitList.review_summary: I loved the dress. It was
FitList.review_text: I loved the dress. It was so easy to wear, to get many many compliments and to save in the closet.

FitList.review_summary: I wore this dress to my b
FitList.review_text: I wore this dress to my boyfriends senior prom. I had previously bought a different dress from a different store but there was no amount of alterations I could have made to make it fit. So in a hasty effort to find a new dress quick, I got this one and fell IN LOVE. The dress was chic, modest and fancy. I didn't have to make a single alteration. I got tons of compliments. The fabric wasn't too scratchy but it was kind of hard to get in and out of. Nothing too serious though. I would recommend this dress to anyone.

FitList.review_summary: Loved the detail on the l
FitList.review_text: Loved the detail on the lace. Perfect dress for the perfect price...so excited to get married in it!!

FitList.review_summary: I wanted for this dress t
FitList.review_text: I wanted for this dress to be my wedding dress. All the girls in the pictures are so lovely. The lace was beautiful and soft. It was the exact length I wanted. Unfortunately it didn't work out for me. I just looked frumpy. It was too poofy and the bodice was the wrong length for me.
Perfect for my wedding. Comfortable and elegant.

FitList.review_summary: I wore this for my courth
FitList.review_text: I wore this for my courthouse ceremony and bar reception! Got so many compliments, and truly felt very bridal without the huge dress. I ordered a size up and  had to have it altered which wasn't a huge deal, but I really didn't need to size up as most of the reviews said I should. The lace wasn't itchy at all either!It was the perfect dress and I cannot express how wonderful I felt in it. I wasn't too sure about wearing it, even up until I had to put it on for the 'I do'... But as soon as I did, I realized it was the 'it' dress I had been searching for.

FitList.review_summary: I wore this for my courth
FitList.review_text: I wore this for my courthouse ceremony and bar reception! Got so many compliments, and truly felt very bridal without the huge dress. I ordered a size up and  had to have it altered which wasn't a huge deal, but I really didn't need to size up as most of the reviews said I should. The lace wasn't itchy at all either!It was the perfect dress and I cannot express how wonderful I felt in it. I wasn't too sure about wearing it, even up until I had to put it on for the 'I do'... But as soon as I did, I realized it was the 'it' dress I had been searching for.
Very beautiful dress, just didn't fit right. Also wasn't a big fan or the side zipper.

FitList.review_summary: I was worried about the s
FitList.review_text: I was worried about the size, because I ordered my normal size, then read more reviews saying you should size up.
