When I received the dress, I took extra precaution to have my neighbor on speed dial just incase I needed help out of it. All this worry ... for nothing! It fit wonderfully! After some adjusting the lace on the chest lay flat. The lace isn't forgiving and super stretchy but I didn't need it to be. I didn't touch the zipper. I gave it a gentle tug from the nape of the neck and it was off in seconds! love this dress and can't wait to walk down the aisle in it!
Love this dress! So excited!!!

FitList.review_summary: Well I loved the dress bu
FitList.review_text: Well I loved the dress but sadly failed to realize how off the sizing is had I know I'd order the 26 right off the bat. So I'm usually a size 1820 US size ordered a 22 thinking it fit me just a little big and nope way off...there was just no way I could have zippered that sucker up lol. But...quiet honestly I'm still in love with the dress so I've returned it in hopes of buying the correct size once it goes back in stock. Even though it didn't fit I loved everything else about it, it's beautiful and I'm still hoping this will be the dress I say my I do in.  The lace omg I love it! I think it's going to be perfect to complete my simple vintage style wedding look.

FitList.review_summary: I read the reviews and we
FitList.review_text: I read the reviews and went 2 sizes up and it's perfect!! Can't wait to wear it for my wedding in October!!
This was my wedding dress and I couldn't have been happier with it! :)  it fit perfectly.

FitList.review_summary: I wore this dress for my
FitList.review_text: I wore this dress for my rehearsal dinner/bachelorette party the night before my wedding. While I normally wear a dress size 2 or 4, I ordered a 6 in this dress to be safe because I'm super busty!!! There ended up being the perfect amount of room, maybe even a little too much but it wasn't noticeable. It also was poofier than I expected but I loved the volume. If you're not a 32DDD like me, and have similar measurements otherwise, I think a size 4 would be great.
Beautiful dress.

FitList.review_summary: I wore this dress to my w
FitList.review_text: I wore this dress to my wedding reception. It was a bigger hit than my wedding gown! I did have to have some darts put in the shoulders though. (I'm a bit small chested.)

This dress is gorgeous. I haven't had a chance to wear it yet. Have to lose a couple pounds :) maybe tone up the arms a little as the arms are on the smaller side.... And mine are on the sausage side ;)

Like many others, I wore this beautiful dress for my wedding and it was perfect! I loved the fit and the length (a few inches below the knees) was just what I was hoping for. I had the dress pressed, which helped with wrinkles obviously, but also helped the lace on the neckline stand up a bit better. (This only cost me $14 to do, so totally worth it.) I got tons of compliments on the dress and the best part was that I actually thought it was really comfortable. The lace was slightly itchy, but I didn't even notice after a moment because I was too busy having a great time and looking fabulous. :)
Beautiful!! I loved it and the quality was very good. Ultimately I returned it because it just wasn't what I had in mind for my wedding dress but I loved wearing it around the house

FitList.review_summary: Love it. It fit just perf
FitList.review_text: Love it. It fit just perfect! The only little thing was that the sleeves make it a little hard to lift up your arms.

The dress fits just right! It is definitely a champagne/offwhite color. The only thing I'm not crazy about is that the lace overlay on the top and the arms is not very soft; I would recommend wearing it a few hours ahead of your event or party in order to get used to the stiffness of it. I'll also need to figure out how to get the neckline to lay flat, since it has a tendency to curl outward.

Love the dress but didn't love it on me.  If you are a wide hip woman then this dress will make you look even wider.  It is beautiful, but just not on me.  The color is darker than pictures indicate but it sure does photograph well.

FitList.review_summary: I fell in love with this
FitList.review_text: I fell in love with this dress the moment I saw it online. I knew I had to have it as my wedding dress. My mom took my measurements and we decided to order a size up, which I'm glad we did because it zipped perfectly snug on the first try. The lace is absolutely beautiful, and I felt the length was perfect. I did have it altered because the sleeves were too big, and the layers underneath added too much volume for my body type. My seamstress took out half the volume, I believe. She also took some lace off the neckline so it would lie flat, because it had a tendency to ruffle a little. Some other reviewers mentioned it being too itchy, and that was a concern for me because I have VERY sensitive skin. However, the only areas that gave me any issue were from the waist down and once I tried it on with pantyhose it wasn't itchy at all! I loved this dress!!

FitList.review_summary: I revived this as a Chris
FitList.review_text: I revived this as a Christmas present last year to wear for Christmas dinner and a Christmas party. It's an absolutely stunning dress, I felt like a princess.

FitList.review_summary: I wanted to buy this dres
FitList.review_text: I wanted to buy this dress six months ago, after I got engaged. I let my mom talk me into a $700 gown instead, but when I had a 20% coupon, I followed my heart and bought this (for pictures, right? Who wants to drag a gown through the mud?). Well, I put it on and feel like my best genuine self. There's none of the stress that the gown gives me about my body. I wish I had listened to myself rather than my mom this is my dress!I have large arms and the fabric doesn't feel too tight. The lace feels very silky and the dress flows beautifully.
Beautiful dress
This dress was perfect for my wedding. It's very flattering and the lace and color are fantastic.

I took everyone's advice and sized up, which I suppose was a good decision because it fits me okay, the chest area is just a little big, and the dress is very long on me (it goes down to my calves). I'm afraid to exchange it for an 8 because I'm worried it will be too small if I do. It's not as poofy as it looks in the picture, so I think I may need to buy a petticoat to put underneath. I bought it to wear as a wedding dress, but I'm not sure if I'm very happy with it yet.
I couldn't have been more impressed with this dress!

I ordered this dress because my original dress didn't work and my mother went on hospice. I had two and1/2 weeks to plan an elopement and needed a new dress. Dress came quick. I actually liked that it is more golden in color! Photographed wonderfully. Do order a size up. I'm typically a size two, but any smaller and my rib cage would have been crushed. Unfortunately, the top was a bit loose and the lace kept flopping down. Another reviewer suggested starch :( did NOT work at all. If I had time I'd get the top altered to fit better. Lace was not itchy like many complained about and there was no metallic thread in mine, so I think the dress has changed quite a bit from older reviews. It was a great elopement dress and I'm glad I bought it over the others. Lots of compliments all night!

FitList.review_summary: I ADORE this dress. I wor
FitList.review_text: I ADORE this dress. I wore it to our med school prom with a red sash and red heels and got so many compliments. It was super comfortable. The only this is it was a tad long on my 5'5 frame, so I think it would've looked weird with flats

I cannot say enough about this dress!! I felt it was worth thousands of dollar when I received it, because it fit absolutely perfect. The quality and design is so beautiful and it was everything I ever could have hoped for! Thank u for making this so adorable for my tiny little mountain wedding

This is my dream wedding dress and I am still so pleased I found it. So many of the reviews state that the dress runs small, so I originally went with a 4. The 4 was large and frumpy on me up top. I exchanged it for the 2 and it fit almost as if it had been made for me. The top was fitted and the bottom felt practically the same in size as the 4. If you have petite shoulders like I do, you *may* want to consider ordering your usual size. The scalloped lace neckline IS a concern because it is floppy and no amount of starch would provide structure. The answer to this is doublesided fashion tape! It held the neckline in place perfectly all day. The fabric is a bit itchy, but a full strapless bustier and slip helped mitigate that. All in all the dress was perfect amounts romantic and vintage and the skirt was wonderfully swishy and full. A winner!

FitList.review_summary: I ordered it large and ha
FitList.review_text: I ordered it large and had it taken in to fit. I was/am in love with this dress.

This dress is absolutely stunning. Bought as my wedding dress. It was comfortable, delicate, and beyond gorgeous. Not an itchy fabric at all, this was a concern at first but loved how perfectly comfortable it is. So happy with this purchase. Have purchased other Chi Chi dresses in the past. Always order a 6. This dress fit my chest perfect but had to be taken in through the waist to fit perfect. Worth it.
This dress was beautifully made but was really large on me. ModCloth was already out of size 14 so sizing down wasn't an option and I couldn't justify paying to alter it.
just beautiful! I wore it for my rehearsal dinner and everyone loved it.  :)

FitList.review_summary: I got this dress for my r
FitList.review_text: I got this dress for my reception dress. It is perfection! It is flowy and comfy. I didn't want to take it off! It fits TRUE TO SIZE.

FitList.review_summary: i love this dress but it
FitList.review_text: i love this dress but it too big.

FitList.review_summary: I wish this could have wo
FitList.review_text: I wish this could have worked, but alas it's just not for me. Sending it back.

I'm giving this dress 3 stars mostly because it feels a little cheap (or, at least, not worth what it costs). I couldn't decide if I didn't like the way it looked on me because it's not right for my body type (pear shaped), or just because I wasn't crazy about the material/quality, but I've seen the pics other buyers have posted and they are so cute! So I'm assuming it's just not the dress for me. I ended up returning.

FitList.review_summary: I had to have the dress a
FitList.review_text: I had to have the dress altered because I lost 40 lbs before the wedding and bought the dress way in advance, but when all was said and done this was the perfect wedding dress. It was just the look I was going for classic and vintage. I felt so beautiful in this dress and I recommend it to any future bride!

I honestly adored this dress. So classy, so elegant, so vintage looking. It just turned out to be a little too fancy and floofy for my beach wedding. But that's my fault for not considering the possibility. I will say this, though, if I have one complaint it's that the lace edges aren't finished great  like the mesh backing sticks out over the edges, unfinished. You can just trim that up though. And fair warning  the lace at the neckline isn't stiff. So it will kind of flop around. If you hold yourself up in good posture, though, it doesn't happen. Oh PS  I routinely buy ModCloth dresses in a Medium and a 10 fit me perfectly.

FitList.review_summary: This was a very pretty dr
FitList.review_text: This was a very pretty dress, but I am very petite and the fiteven in the smallest sizewas a little awkward. The neckline has a pretty shape, but it was too wide and wouldn't lay flat against my chest or back. The waist and sleeves were also too big on me. I was surprised at how poofy the skirt was too. This dress is beautiful, but I didn't want to keep something that required so many alterations.

LOVE this dress.   It will be my wedding dress next month. Fits well and camouflages my problem areas. There is little to no give (or stretch) with the fabric/zipper. Beautiful coloring.  Extremely happy with this purchase.

This dress is intimidating out of the box, with its stiff fabric on the torso and sleeves. However it is surprisingly lightweight on. Very poofy. The waist and even the unstretchy arms fit perfectly, but alas I would have needed to be about 6 cup sizes smaller to even think of getting my boobs in there (seriously, I'm a HH cup, and maybe a C or D would be perfect in it). I put the fit as just right however, because I am normally a solid 2X and the dress I got was an 18 and was a good fit except the bust.
This is a beautiful dress!  It was a little fanicer than I expected which is not a bad thing, just too fancy for the occasion I was attending.  This dress is gorgeous though.

FitList.review_summary: I swam in the bodice,  an
FitList.review_text: I swam in the bodice,  and the lace wasn't what I hoped for. If you aren't short torso'd like me you'll love it.
Perfect for my courthouse wedding!!
This dress is so beautiful

This dress was absolutely amazing, but I did have to get it altered. I wore it for my wedding day, and followed everyone's suggestions to size up. So I sized up, and it wasn't enough in the arms. THE ARMS ARE TINY!!! Unless you have small arms...which I don't! Despite that, I couldn't have been happier. It looked perfect and I got tons of compliments!
This dress is beautiful. It fits perfect on me, I'm 5'4 and 115lbs. The material is beautiful and high quality. It poofs out just enough. And looks very classic.

FitList.review_summary: It was very poofy and a l
FitList.review_text: It was very poofy and a little too long.

I am 5' 10 175 lbs. I normally wear a size 1012 dress, however I followed others recommendations and sized up to a 14. I was swimming in it! I thought about exchanging it for a size 10, but worried the arms would be too tight. The waist sat very high as well. I really wanted to love this dress. Was hoping to use it for my wedding this April in Ireland. Still looking....

FitList.review_summary: I sized up 1 and there wa
FitList.review_text: I sized up 1 and there was extra room every where. The quality seemed a little cheap, does not look like the picture. more gold and more like a crunchy feeling.

FitList.review_summary: This dress was the most a
FitList.review_text: This dress was the most amazing thing, but incredibly hard to size correctly. This was the ONLY dress I wanted for my Harry Potter themed wedding. I usually am an 8  10, but had to purchase this dress in a 16. All smaller sizes would fit well all over, but the shoulders and sleeves would not fit. There is no give whatsoever in the sleeves. I had to size up, then have it altered at the waist. The sleeves then fit perfect in the shoulders, but the bottom of the sleeve gaped some. The sleeves were only slightly itchy to me  they were not a problem at all. The dress is beautiful and I would absolutely buy it again, even with the sizing issues. I think it is better to just size up and have it altered, if you are having issues with the fit of the sleeves.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress for m
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress for my wedding and it is absolutely *perfect*. I may have cried in the best and girliest way possible when I got to try it on..

I'm in between sizes 14 and 16, and have read some reviews where people were saying the dress runs small and to size up. When this dress came back in stock, I ordered both 14 and 16 (I didn't want to take the chance of it going out of stock again, as this will be my wedding dress in March). I tried on the 16 first and it was way too large. The 14 is almost perfect. It needs to be taken in at the shoulders and the length, but overall, I am very happy with this dress. It makes you feel like a pretty, pretty princess and I can't wait to get it altered and wear on my wedding day!
This dress was PERFECT! I wore it for my outside wedding in October! It was true to size fit wonderful, and I could t have gotten more compliments on it!

FitList.review_summary: I am in love with this dr
FitList.review_text: I am in love with this dress i would have fit in a 12 but i got a 14 because i am breastfeeding and my boobs are always full of milk and it fits just great i love love love it

FitList.review_summary: I ordered this as a poten
FitList.review_text: I ordered this as a potential wedding dress. I range from a size 2 to size 6 depending on the store. The 2 fit perfectly in this case. The dress was cute, but the short length and material made it feel like was made for quincea?era rather than a wedding. It also fell at an unflattering length for someone as short as me (5'2). However, everyone I asked said they preferred how the Gilded Grace dress looked on me over the Sparkling Celebration dress. I ultimately ended up returning both for something with a more delicate lace.

I'm looking for a wedding dress and this style is very close to what I've been looking for. I bought it as well as the long/short sleeve version at the same time to try on. I'm a 46/38/46 which puts me on the large size of an 18 or a small 20. I should have stuck with the 18. The length was great and would be perfect with a bit more poof. It's a perfect dress for the price. Quality issues are expected, floppy neckline, lack of structure.My hesitation at this point is if I want to spend the big bucks on something that is more heirloom quality or if I could be happy in this dress, espcially knowing it's for one day only, although with this style I could definitely wear it on other special occasions. Please forgive me for not having a full length mirror. :)

FitList.review_summary: This is going to be my we
FitList.review_text: This is going to be my wedding dress and I love it! It's beautiful. Normally I'm a size 8 but everyone in the reviews was complaining that it ran small so I ordered up a size and it's a bit too big, but my wedding is in a week so I'm just going to have it taken in instead of exchanging it for an 8 and risking it not showing up in time. An 8 probably would have fit perfect, I think it probably runs true to size but it's important to be realistic with yourself about your true clothing size so you get the right size. Overall, I love it and can't wait to wear it for my wedding! I'll add a picture after my wedding day :)
A lovely dress for special occasions, but be ginger with the zipper.  The lace overlay is easily caught and shirred in the side zipper.
Beautiful material and style, but zipper is impossible.  Can't wear a dress you can't get in an out of, although I wish I could!  Also a little too fluffy for my taste.

With all the reviews that said it ran small in the arms, I have to say I disagree. I've always thought of my arms on the bigger side so when they swam in the dress, I was surprised. That being said, this dress is beautiful. The length is perfect and the dress bodice fits true to size. I wear a 16 in dresses/pants...etc and so I ordered a 16. It fit like it was tailored to me (minus in the arms which are big, but I don't mind because I can raise my arms and move more fluidly). Also, others said the dress was shockingly gold, I disagree. The color is more antiqued, but beautiful and it photographs nicely. Lastly, I've not found this dress to be itchy or uncomfortable as other stated. Overall, I'm very pleased with the dress I'll be wearing to our wedding reception as we did a trash the dress photo session while getting married on the beach.

FitList.review_summary: Let me begin by saying th
FitList.review_text: Let me begin by saying this dress is lovely! I wore it to welcome the new year. I bought it in two different sizes because I was worried based on other reviews, the problem was neither of them felt just right. The 4 was tight around the bust and the 6 was big. I think it's the padding that makes it a little funky. The length was great! The tulle for the dress makes it a little big but it's not bad. It's difficult to get out of the dress because lace doesn't stretch. I didn't think it was itchy at all like others reviews mentioned. It's a great dress! But it isn't for everyone

I really was expecting to return this dress! I'm getting married and it will be perfect for my vintagey wedding. The fit is perfect, the color is a light champagne and not nearly as gold as some people described. I have no trouble lifting my arms in this dress, and though the fabric is a little rough it doesn't itch. You probably need another person to help take it off, like stated in other reviews. I was able to do it but it was difficult. I am beyond excited to wear it for my wedding day. Length hits right at my knees for me (5'6)
I love this dress!!!
It was a beautiful color but the fit wasn't right.

Buying this dress was handsdown the best investment thus far. The dress is not only gorgeously simple but uniquely beautiful. It made my simple military wedding incredible. I have received more compliments than I could have ever imagined. Thank you, Modcloth. Much love.

FitList.review_summary: This is a weird length fo
FitList.review_text: This is a weird length for a petite person. I looked like a doll for a 10 year old.
Beautiful.  In love with this dress.  Wish I could wear it all the time!!!
Material was very itchy and while it looked beautiful in the picture it was not the dress for me
Size up. It's a beautiful dress and was perfect for my wedding.

I was extremely worried about this purchase. It's scary to order a wedding dress online! I'm so glad I did though. I sized up (usually 22, went with 24), because my arms are extremely big and I didn't want the sleeves to be tight. Everything fit perfectly! I was also worried about itching, but I didn't experience any at all. I got so many compliments! And I felt comfortable and amazing in it.

FitList.review_summary: The dress was just a touc
FitList.review_text: The dress was just a touch tight in the bust area, but I was able to make it work. It was pretty difficult to take off though. The lace at the top doesn't have much give. I wore the dress for the reception of my wedding and I got so many compliments. It was comfortable and easy to dance in.

FitList.review_summary: A little loose in the nec
FitList.review_text: A little loose in the neck area. Pinned it and it was prefect

FitList.review_summary: I wore this to the court
FitList.review_text: I wore this to the court house and it was perfect. I usually fall somewhere between a 68. In the other reviews people said size up a little so I got an 8 and it was perfect. If you go between sizes, I'd recommend going with the bigger one. The 8 was form fitting. A 6 wouldn't have worked.

FitList.review_summary: Runs a bit small, but to
FitList.review_text: Runs a bit small, but to be expected from London designer. I actually had to order directly from ChiChi London because modcloth was out of stock on this for over 6 months and I needed it for my wedding! It was great, though, I got so many compliments.

Loveeeeee it :) it was my dress for our marriage at the city hall :) i wore it also at the garden party after the marriage administrations were finished :)) i got so many compliments. I even saw lots of girls buying the same dress afterwards :)) Falls a bit large so i would size down 1 size :) Thank you modcloth for your part on our amazing day :)

Love this dress! It runs small though, so I ended up exchanging it for a size up. The tag says its a US size, but I don't think it is. I normally wear a size 20, and after reading the reviews, I bought a 22. When it came in I was able to get it on, but I couldn't move. So I exchanged it for a 24. And it fits perfect. I can't wait to wear it for my upcoming wedding in September.

FitList.review_summary: I wore this on my wedding
FitList.review_text: I wore this on my wedding day. I received so many compliments. I'm a 36DD it was really tight in the chest. I wear a 10 and would've been more comfortable in a size 12.

FitList.review_summary: This was supposed to be m
FitList.review_text: This was supposed to be my wedding dress and it looked good on every person in the reviews but not me! I was so upset :(
Bought this as a potential wedding dress. After it came in the mail and it fit like it was made for me, I canceled my appointment at the bridal shop.

FitList.review_summary: I loved this dress.  I wo
FitList.review_text: I loved this dress.  I wore it for my ceremony two days before the actual wedding.Keep in mind it's a british designer, so the sizes run small.  I am usually a 2 or a 4 in dresses and I was an 8.  I initially bought a 6 and needed to return it for the larger size.  I am 5'7 Measurements: B35W28H41 (thank goodness for free hip skirts) an 8 fit and needed no alteration.  The arms were a little tight and restrictive.    This isn't a great dress to raise the roof in. lol.  Also, the lace and crinoline is itchy.  I steamed mine with a store bought steamer and it seemed to help a bit.  It also relaxed some of the wrinkles in the crinoline underlay.  It was a perfect dress for a perfect day and I received tons of compliments.  But after a few hours, I couldn't wait to get it off and raise my itchy arms above my head.
Its an absolutely beautiful dress, but as others stated the lace is incredibly itchy. Also the arms are rather loose on me, but I do have very skinny arms. Sadly, I will probably be returning it.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this as my weddi
FitList.review_text: I bought this as my wedding dress and it was absolutely perfect. Did not cost an arm and a leg, everyone loved it including my husband. My only complaint would be that although I followed the recommendations of others who bought this dress and sized up, under the arms was a little tight and dancing was awkward because I couldn't lift my arms very high. Other than that, perfect!

FitList.review_summary: The color is a little mor
FitList.review_text: The color is a little more yellow than it seems to look in the picture.
beautiful dress. material along sleeves was too itchy for an outside wedding in Louisiana.
Got so many compliments
wore this for my wedding, no regrets.

FitList.review_summary: This dress... is my all t
FitList.review_text: This dress... is my all time favorite purchase from Modcloth! I ended up getting a larger size than I thought I needed as this was all they had in stock and I couldn't wait any longer. My sisterinlaw was able to make a few small alterations as the sleeves were very large and lace on the chest/back bulged out a little in the bigger size. The bust fit well and we left the extra bit of room in the waist so it was comfortable to move around when I wore it for the wedding. I am gad I went with the larger size in the end as it offered the opportunity to make these adjustments and fit it to my liking. We walked through the city to get to the ceremony with our photographer and got some amazing photos of this vintage dress and my handsome husband in his uniform. Perfect dress, prefect day!
the color is fantastic
I absolutely loved the dress! Wore it for a function and got lots of compliments. I'm  itching to wear it again!!!
Fits perfectly!!! A little itchy but that is my biggest complaint. The top has a bit of a built in bra which is awesome. Will be wearing this for my wedding in sept.

Many reviews said that this dress was a different color, but what they don't mention is that it is YELLOW. Like, sitting in an attic for 30 years kind of yellow. The lining is so huge and itchy, it made my butt look like I'd stuck a pillow up under there. I had been planning on wearing this when we eloped, but it just was so awful it had to go.

Such an amazing dress! I bought a size 4, which fit perfectly, and traded it for a 2 because I was feeling bold. I'm glad I did, because it is even better! I read to size up here, but I honestly think it's worth I to check the other option as well. The sleeves are beautiful, as well as the tea length cut! The decorations have a pearlescent gold shine to them, and it's truly eye catching! I plan on wearing this as an outdoor wedding reception dress.

Saw this dress and decided to get married! I wear a size 12 in clothes so I knew I would need a bigger size in a dress.  I was a bridesmaid a couple years ago and I needed a size 18 in a dress so I ordered a 16 and an 18 just to be on the safe side. To my surprise, the 16 was too big.  I was getting married the next day!!!!! I had it taken in 2 inches around the waist and 2 inches off the shoulders as well as a LOT taken off the sleeves (they were way too baggy) After the alterations it fit perfectly and I couldn't be happier! Very good quality, itchy to wear but worth it for just a night ?
Couldn't have asked for a better wedding dress! I sized up, so it was easy to get on. The arms were a little large, but it wasn't noticeable. So happy I bought this dress!

This dress was very flattering and fit me well. The color is beautiful. I love it! A couple suggestions: I actually had to wear another slip underneath the built in slip due to the built in slip being pretty well useless. Also, make sure and iron the built in slip or you'll see every wrinkle.

FitList.review_summary: I WISH this would have wo
FitList.review_text: I WISH this would have worked for me  I ordered a 12, knowing it runs on the small size and would be snug, but because other reviewers said it was puffy I didn't want to add more bulk so I opted to deal with it on the tight size rather than it being a baggy mess. The cut is really nice, and the color is pretty and all the details were really nice but the silhouette made me look 15 pounds heavier. SO much poof especially in the back. It made me look like I had some SERIOUS junk in the trunk.  It might have worked if I was less curvy, but as it was, it over accentuated my curves, and I didn't want to come off looking like Ms. Piggy...So back it went. The wedding search continues.

I was reluctant to order this dress due to some of the reviews on here about the quality of the lace. I'm pretty sensitive skin wise and I didn't find it at all itchy.  the detail in the lace is beautiful and I love the color!

After trying on countless expensive dresses I purchased this one last minute with my fingers crossed! I couldn't have been happier! It's well made, flows well without a petticoat and was very comfortable! I can't tell you how relieved I was!

FitList.review_summary: First off, as you can tel
FitList.review_text: First off, as you can tell, I wore this for my wedding. The color was perfect, I was afraid it would be too close to cream but when I saw how golden  it was, I immediately smiled. I paired it with a pair of Betsey Johnson blue shoes in Champaign and a string of great grandmother's pearls. When I looked at the dress I decided that the sleeves were a bit on the long side for me, I have short arms and they were hitting at an awkward location on my forearm. I removed the sleeves and finished the seams myself and couldn't be happier with the overall look. Thank you mod cloth

FitList.review_summary: I wore this as my wedding
FitList.review_text: I wore this as my wedding dress and it was absolutely perfect. Incredible value for an incredible dress!

This was my wedding dress. We had a very simple small wedding and this was exactly what I wanted. I read reviews before and sized up. I usually wear a 4 or a 6 and the 8 fits like a glove. I the lace was slightly itchy, but not so much that I was uncomfortable during the ceremony of reception.
this dress was perfect for my wedding day! not too much for a simple courthouse wedding, not too little for a small reception with family.

FitList.review_summary: I was scared when I bough
FitList.review_text: I was scared when I bought the dress because buying something expensive online always makes me nervous. I have pretty big arms so I was worried if I should size up for that since the dress actually has sleeves but I am so glad I didn't. It was perfect!

FitList.review_summary: It was a little tight for
FitList.review_text: It was a little tight for my arms but still a beautiful dress. I got so many complements.

FitList.review_summary: I just did not like this
FitList.review_text: I just did not like this dress on my figure. Which was too bad considering it's very pretty!

FitList.review_summary: Bought this as a gift for
FitList.review_text: Bought this as a gift for my mom to wear on her wedding day. Had to order a size up to get it right but on the big day, she loved it and looked beautiful

I. Love. This. Dress. My husband and I were just recently married at a Victorian mansion BandB in an afternoon ceremony, so the dress was absolutely perfect. I ordered up a bit based on people's reviews (usually a 2 or 4, ordered a 6) and had the dress taken in a bit at the shoulders. Wore a padded bra, too, to fill out the top. It then fit perfectly, as though it had been made for me. The lace was actually quite soft, not so picky as to bother me at all (didn't notice it a bit), and I wore it for about 11 hours. I didn't have any issues with the sleeves being too tight (again, I ordered up a size). The details on this dress are incredible, it looks custommade. Everyone who has seen it (either in person or in photos) absolutely raves about it. The best part? I can hand wash it now rather than having to send it to an expensive dress cleaner/dry cleaner. Honestly, what's not to love?

FitList.review_summary: Love!  This dress is so e
FitList.review_text: Love!  This dress is so elegant and flows beautifully!  The front lace did fall forward a bit on the neck,  but I ironed it down and it stayed fine.  So pretty!

Bought this dress in hopes that it could be my wedding dress next spring. The details we great! I did not like the full chest coverage. I also didn't realize in the pictures that there was so much tulle involved. I am 5'4, I have a small chest and small waist but larger hips. This dress was pretty for someone else, but not flattering to my figure at all.  Returned:/

FitList.review_summary: Going to wear this for my
FitList.review_text: Going to wear this for my May wedding! Will upload pictures then
This was the perfect dress, matched with a Modcloth shoe, it made my wedding day amazing! The pictures came out spectacular and it fit the setting fabulously!

This was my wedding dress! It is beautiful  especially in photos! The reviews are right about this running small so size up and don't be afraid to try a couple sizes!! I bought 34 to try on because I didn't want to miss out if they ran out of stock! I was complimented so much on my BIG day wearing this dress. I felt like a dream in it. I will say, though shorter in length than traditional wedding dresses, this dress was not 'cooler'. The lace and tull is not so breathable so after a night of dancing I was a bit sweaty  beautiful, but sweaty! lol
perfect dress for my perfect day :)
This dress fit and looked PERFECT. Incredible deal for this price!!! No one could believe I only paid $130 for it. Very high quality.

I just received this dress today for my court house wedding. I was excited to get the dress but a little worried due to some of the reviews I read. I'm normally a size 24 and very busty I ordered a size 26 and I'm glad I did because it fit just perfect. The only complaints I have are, the arms are a little big and kind of funky which is fine I will take them in. Also the arms are itchy but nothing I cant handle usually I'm super sensitive and I was afraid it would bug me but so far so good. Also in pictures and on the website the dress does not look yellowish in person its very yellowish. That's the only thing that sort of bugs me about the dress but not worth returning it. I'm going for a vintage wedding look so it works out, I think its going to be hard to find shoes that will match. Overall I do like the dress for my vintage courthouse wedding date on New Years Eve 2015!
This dress was everything I wanted and more. It was perfect in every aspect. I ended purchasing it a size up based off pervious reviews and it fit perfect. I didn't find the lace itchy either.

FitList.review_summary: bought this to wear for m
FitList.review_text: bought this to wear for my wedding next year! love it. perfect for a simple affair. added a mint jeweled belt to coordinate with our wedding colors and it goes very well. can't wait to get married in this!

This dress is stunning. I always worry about things being underwhelming when I receive them compared to how gorgeous they are in pictures. But when I pulled this out of the package I think I actually stopped breathing for a second! The pattern and material is delicate and lovely. A few big problems though: it is very itchy which is to be expected with the material. And you cannot raise your arms above shoulder height, if that. The stiffness was a let down. We all want to look pretty, but still be able to move almost like a normal person! I wore this for my college graduation, and I was in it for a whole day and managed to deal with the itchy fabric and lack of range of motion. It's also incredibly difficult to get in and out of with the side zipper under the armpit. Prepare to contort yourself into unexpected shapes to get this off. The difficulty of wearing it has deterred me from putting it on more than a couple times. But I hope to have more events to wear it to in the future. Side note: there is so much tulle and layered fabric that it made me look a little chunkier than I am. Small price to pay for such a lovely dress though. Also, it would be nice if this came in a short size, not just regular and long. On my 5'4 frame, it would have been more flattering a couple inches shorter :)

I bought the gilded grace dress to wear for my wedding dress.  The style was perfect for my vintage country wedding.  When I took it out of the box and hung it up I just cried, it was perfect.  And then I tried it on, it fit me like a glove, more tears of joy ensued!  This dress is so beautifully made, and the fullness of the skirt is just magical.  I felt like the most beautiful bride on my wedding day! Thank you ModCloth!

FitList.review_summary: I loved how this dress lo
FitList.review_text: I loved how this dress looked in the pictures, I took my measurements multiple times (just in case) and ordered my size since it says it it runs true to size.... the dress came two sizes too big, and the lace at the bottom was ripped. it's too close to my wedding day to try return it, luckily the seamtress I went to said she can fix the lace and take it in. I sure hope it will look good.

This dress is beautiful! it was only too big on me as I had not realised how much weight I had lost! after some quick alterations by mummy dear to pull the lace in at the back (we added some fake pearl buttons to cover the dart and make it look like button up instead of one piece) this dress wears perfectly. the skirt is so full and swishy just a breeze to wear.

FitList.review_summary: This dress came to me in
FitList.review_text: This dress came to me in a soft champagne gold color. I ordered a size larger than my normal size, and it fit fine around the waist, but I will probably alter the bosom area and sleeves as they're a bit loose on me. It is a little poofier than I wanted for my wedding, but after some alterations it should fit more to my figure.

FitList.review_summary: I loved the quality of th
FitList.review_text: I loved the quality of the dress, it just wasnt a good fit for me.  If you're a bigger girl or have a large chest, I think you'll find it difficult to get in and out of because the zipper is on the side.  The sleeves themselves were fine, but the armholes were too big and I was scared the lace would tear if I lifted my arms.  It fit snugly but not too tight around my waist.  If the bodice had more structure (boning would have been great!) I probably would have kept it and had it altered, but the built in bra thing was not supportive enough for my chest.  The length was great, the lace was beautiful, it just wasn't a good fit for my body type.
Absolutely love this dress! Everything about it was perfect! Truly runs true size. Really made just getting married through the courthouse even more special

FitList.review_summary: This is a nice dress. I w
FitList.review_text: This is a nice dress. I was worried about my arms not fitting after reading the other reviews because I have very large arms, but they fit fine.

Absolutely BEAUTIFUL dress. The fit was strange for my build though. After reading the reviews I opted to get a size 12 times larger than I normally would. The chest fit well (comfortable but not TOO loose), and I am a bit bustier  the portion over the torso was almost too loose, which is understandable for my shape. But where it got a little uncomfortable was in the sleeves and shoulders. It was not too tight as to be physically uncomfortable but it was difficult to move. Which, considering I was purchasing it for my wedding I wanted to be able to move! It was also VERY difficult to find, even a strapless bra that didn't show with this dress. All in all great quality and worth a try. But be prepared to either alter it or hope you've got the perfect body type!

FitList.review_summary: It was just a little big
FitList.review_text: It was just a little big in the bust area for me,  but it still looked beautiful!  This dress saved me from walking down the Isle in blue jeans!

I bought this beauty for my second, smaller wedding ceremony on the East Coast.  The dress was a bit too formal, and the color was not flattering on me.  I loved the lace...but decided the gown was not a good fit for the type of ceremony and did not fit the location. I returned it...

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress. I did
FitList.review_text: I love this dress. I did make some modifications but the overall quality is good. I had to size up because of the sleeves. The lace does not stretch or give at all. So I sized up from a 14 to a 16. Then had the waist taken back in and also replaced the zipper. The zipper in the dress was lackluster.

Beautiful! Love this dress! Wore it for my wedding. I did take out the foam cups as my chest is large enough without the extra padding. I would advise those with larger chests to get a good strapless bra for extra support.

FitList.review_summary: I wore this dress for my
FitList.review_text: I wore this dress for my Birthday and it was a hit.  It's a dress well made good quality . lots of other reviews suggest that material is itchy but honestly I didn't feel itchy on any irritation of any kind.  it is a bit puffy so I took a chance and removed 3 pieces of the tule and left one layer only and it fit perfect. the arm area fit good I was able to lift my arms  however I have slim arms so if you don't it will definitely fit tight.   Thanks Chi Chi London!

FitList.review_summary: I am wearing this dress a
FitList.review_text: I am wearing this dress as my wedding dress for our small intimate wedding. I'm very short, so the hem is a little too long so I'll have to have it altered. The sleeves are also too long for my short arms and hit right above my wrists. The upper arm is a little snug, but I'm able to deal with it for a couple hours. Also, the material on the arms and chest is scratchy, but that comes with the material wherever you get it from. Overall beautiful dress, my body is just a weird one to fit.

FitList.review_summary: I wanted this for my wedd
FitList.review_text: I wanted this for my wedding and it was a darker than I thought more of an antiqued lace color. I was very beautiful and well made. My fiance is very tall and I couldn't really raise my arms in it because there wasn't much stretch. This is the ONLY reason I returned it. It's worth it if you dont have a man that is a giant LOL

FitList.review_summary: I bought this as my weddi
FitList.review_text: I bought this as my wedding dress. I had a baby 4 months prior and couldn't find anything that looked flattering or fit my nursing cup size. This dress fit perfectly, and was so structured on the inside I didn't need a bra. As others have stated, it's a little hard to get the dress off due to the zipper being on the side, and don't expect to have much arm movement even if the sleeves are larger on you. That said, it was the perfect dress and I absolutely loved wearing it .
This dress was bought for homecoming and it firs wonderful. I highly recommend this dress to everyone. The sleeves are a little odd and scratchy but other than that its perfect.

FitList.review_summary: i didnt buy this but i tr
FitList.review_text: i didnt buy this but i tried it on the fitting room haha xD. but it was cute and elegant. Definitely could pull off as a wedding dress(except in my photo i look like a flower girl.. ._.) But the material isnt flexible. i almost got stuck in that dress.

This dress is awesome. You put it on and immediately feel special. Seriously. Unfortunately, I bought it for my wedding in August...I already had another ModCloth dress purchased but I kept going back to this...August was hot...so back it went. I cried. I didn't see any reason to keep it except to put it on and watch TV with a martini. It is that beautiful.

FitList.review_summary: The lace on this dress wa
FitList.review_text: The lace on this dress was very itchy.  I knew there was no way I would be able to wear this through my wedding and reception.  The lace was also a bit droopy near my face and didn't lay flat.  While the built in bra looked fine when the dress was on, it offered no support and did not feel comfortable.  Size 20 was the perfect size for my measurements.

FitList.review_summary: It fit perfectly when I p
FitList.review_text: It fit perfectly when I put it on! And it looked exactly as I had pictured it! It really was the perfect wedding dress for me. The price was right too. My only complaint is that there were a lot of flyaway threads from the lace and the tulle underlay for the lace at the collar had to be trimmed up. It has solid construction quality; the detail work was a little shoddy. But, it only cost $25 at the tailors to have it trimmed and straightened, so keep that in mind when you purchase this dress. You'll want extra time just in case. It was worth having to take it to the tailor.

FitList.review_summary: Like many others i got ma
FitList.review_text: Like many others i got married in this dress! I fell in love with it when i saw it here and it was in my mind the whole time i was looking for a dress in stores so i figured, why not just get this one! This was my first Mod Cloth purchase and i was pretty happy with it. It's pretty lacy, so i was expecting the itchiness, and it was a tad tight in the back, but if i got a size up it would've been way too big. It was longer than expected, but a very nice length, the neckline lays a little strangely but i wore my hair over it so it was hard to tell. Overall i really loved it and it worked well!

I absolutely adore this dress! It is just gorgeous, and I received it in a Stylish Surprise box so I was REALLY pleased with the price. Unfortunately, the sleeves are incredibly tight across the shoulders so once I put the dress on, I nearly had a panic attack trying to take the thing off (I felt like a cat with a cup stuck on its face). Definitely could have used some help with that one. The overall fit of the dress is great, just something weird with those sleeves. I'm going to go get it altered and will update my review once it's done.

I had this dress altered for length on both the skirt and the sleeves, but that's the case for everything I own.  I also removed two of the 3 layers of crinoline, but I still had plenty of body in the skirt.  The seamstress made a good dress into a perfect dress!  The color is a deep ivory.  The bodice was really lovely.  The lace on it was dense enough that I was able to wear a strapless bra with clear straps, which was far more comfortable than merely a strapless bra.  The lace is quite delicate, so handle it gently!  Also, plan for fashion tape to prevent flopping of the delicate lace scallops along the neckline.

FitList.review_summary: My new husband is in the
FitList.review_text: My new husband is in the Navy and is from a different state from me. For certain reasons we're actually having 2 different ceremonies. I love this dress so much I'm wearing it for both!

Beautiful dress. Really poofy. Maybe a little too much. Waiting to see how it settles after being shipped.  Will need some adjustments as I prefer a tighter fit but I sized up in case it ran small in the shoulders. Not going to send it back, instead planning. On taking it to a tailor closer to the wedding date.

FitList.review_summary: The dress was a little ti
FitList.review_text: The dress was a little tight on the arms, but other wise perfect. I had so many compliments when I wore this to my rehearsal dinner.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress to ch
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress to change into for the after party after my wedding... it just didnt work for me. the arms were too loose and me being kind of short i felt as if i looked like a child going to my first communion LOL but the dress was so beautiful and well made!! I wish it made me feel as beautiful as it looked. I'll be returning.
I loved this dress.
So perfect, so many compliments, never thought I would feel like a bride but in this dress I really did!

FitList.review_summary: I wore this dress for my
FitList.review_text: I wore this dress for my wedding and it was perfect! I may even wear it again because I felt so adorable in it! It came in at the waist and really managed to show off my hour glass figure!

This dress just looking too frumpy on me and was a tight fit to get in to. Also, it was VERY gold and shiny. I'm sure it would look better on a shorter frame. I ended up returning it and going with the Aisle Be There Dress in Lily dress for my wedding day, which was absolutely perfect for me.
I really really wanted to like this, but it just made me look ridiculous.  So poofy!  It looks gorgeous on others, but not for my shape.

FitList.review_summary: It's very much a cream dr
FitList.review_text: It's very much a cream dress with GOLD overlay. It was shorter than I expected. It also came nowhere near accommodating my large chest. Disappointed.
This dress was again slightly large in my midsection but perfect everywhere else. I absolutely adore this dress though!

This dress is PERFECT, I am so happy to have finally found the right dress for my wedding. The length hits just past the knee for me, I am 5'8 and 120 lbs and ordered a size 4. it fits perfectly, and comfortably, everywhere, although you cant raise your arms over your head. it has a very fluffy skirt and the lace is a bit darker than the picture, more of an antique gold than ivory. Such a great deal for a beautiful dress!

FitList.review_summary: I just got the dress toda
FitList.review_text: I just got the dress today, it fits perfect. the color is a little darker than it appears online, but its a lovely ivory/gold shade. I was worried it would be too big or too small in the bust and waist. that tends to happen to me when I order dresses online. however the fit is perfect. my only complaint is that I will need to find a slip for underneath as its a tad see through despite all the layers.

This dress fit very strangely on my body type. I ordered a size up like everyone suggested but it was a bit too big (I'm usually a 10 and the 12 was a little large). I just felt like the dress was a little matronly on me. The neckline was awkward and the dress was so puffy that it was not  flattering. The color was definitely closer to tan or gold, as others mentioned. It seemed like a really well made dress, just not the right one for me.

FitList.review_summary: Oh my goodness this is th
FitList.review_text: Oh my goodness this is the best dress I have ever worn. I literally feel like a princess. The photos don't give it justice. It's breathtaking. Almost everyone asked me where I got it from and wanted a picture with me just for the dress

FitList.review_summary: I bought this as my weddi
FitList.review_text: I bought this as my wedding dress for a small, fall wedding this year and it's just totally lovely.  Im a solid 1x in most Modcloth stuff and this fit like a glove. I love the lace and the sleeves and the fact that it isn't bright white  it's essentially just what I wanted and I'm so glad I found it on Modcloth and didn't have to mess with any wedding shops!  It is a little longer on me than on the model, but I'm a touch short at 5'6 and it hits just below my knee.
Beautiful dress. It runs pretty small, so adjust accordingly.
My friend ordered this off my account. She looks lovely in it and loves the dress

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress but I g
FitList.review_text: I love this dress but I got it to big be sure not to size up too much. I decided that it was to fancy for the occasion so I went with another dress.

Beware plus size girls with small boobs, this is made for girls with a larger chest. Everything about this dress fit perfectly except for the boob area. There are padded cups built in, so you can't really tell. This dress was really pretty, but wasn't the style I was going for. The lace is not in the same color as the main fabric of the dress, it is a Champagne color as described in the name.
This was my wedding dress and it was perfect! I had to have the sleeves taken in because I'm very short and have short arms but other than that it was beautiful! Very comfortable and impeccably made.

Dresses are tricky and I want to be able to sit after eating so I ordered a 12. I believe an 8 would be a perfect fit and am trying to decide between having it taken in or sizing down. It is a beautiful dress with just the right length and poof. The sleeves are a bit itchy with the lace though. But I love it and can't wait for my wedding day!

This dress was very pretty, but it hit me in all the wrong places. It was also my first Modcloth purchase, so I was a little disappointed that it didn't work out. It seemed well made, like it would definitely hold up through more than one event and cleaning. The skirt had more pouf than the picture showed and it kind of made me look like a cupcake with legs. The sleeves were a little too long and hit me about mid forearm rather than at the elbow, and the neckline was fairly itchy. The picture shows it to be close to an ivory color, but I found the lace overlay to be much closer to gold (not bad, just moreso than I expected). Overall, it just wasn't the dress for me, which I was sad about since it was so pretty. I honestly think it would probably look better on someone taller than I am (I'm 5'5). Modcloth did make the return really easy though, so I will not hesitate to buy again.

FitList.review_summary: I was going to have this
FitList.review_text: I was going to have this be my wedding dress, but the lace is not very high quality, and the fit is extremely small (like many couture things), so despite being an American size 4 (granted we Americans are bigger people), I could not find a size large enough to fit in comfortably.

The quality is incredible and the dress is a beautiful champagne color that is to die for. It fits TRUE TO SIZE. I am a size fourteen but ordered a sixteen because many reviews said it does not fit true to size  but those reviews were wrong. One size down and it would be perfect. In love with this dress and so am exchanging it as soon as a size 14 comes back in. Love!

The quality is incredible and the dress is a beautiful champagne color that is to die for. It fits TRUE TO SIZE. I am a size fourteen but ordered a sixteen because many reviews said it does not fit true to size  but those reviews were wrong. One size down and it would be perfect. In love with this dress and so am exchanging it as soon as a size 14 comes back in. Love!

FitList.review_summary: Cute dress but on me the
FitList.review_text: Cute dress but on me the colors doesn't look right. Fit was good. Just not for me. Will be returning.

FitList.review_summary: I ordered a size too smal
FitList.review_text: I ordered a size too small. It's beautiful. However I wish the zipper was longer. It goes from armpit to hip. I got stuck in it. Every time I tried pulling it off the laced top would constrict my arms. It was like getting stuck in a Chinese finger trap.  Best advice is to put it on with some assistance. I love it though. It's still my wedding dress pick. I just need to order the next size up.

FitList.review_summary: I really wanted to love t
FitList.review_text: I really wanted to love this dress to wear at my garden wedding in June but I looked like a little fat ball of lace in it. It's too long for me, I'm 5'3 and I have big boobs and the waist was too high so it just made my body look terrible ! Round, shorter than normal and generally bulbous. Sadly it's going back. For someone skinny and taller with smaller boobs this might work better

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress, and I
FitList.review_text: I love this dress, and I will be wearing it in my vintagethemed wedding. I will attach a picture after the big day.
this dress is stunning,  waist is large,  arms are tight and mine has a weird red stain in the arm I will try and hide for my wedding.  I plan on wearing a sash to bring in waist. so pretty though.

I bought this dress from both ModCloth and Chi Chi London (in a different color) in the same size. The one from Chi Chi London while it's beautiful doesn't fit as well and the sleeves are very itchy. This one is WONDERFUL! The sleeves fit much better, the fabric is softer and over all quality seems better. I'll be wearing this as my wedding dress like so many other girls have. I did size up a little so some of the dress will need to be taken in manly in the top area. I can't say enough how beautiful this dress is! Thanks ModCloth I was worried I wouldn't get that feeling from any dress and I was so so wrong.
This fit me perfectly! The lace isn't that itchy at all. I was able to get in and out of it on my own with a little wiggling. Love the dress looks amazing for my small fall wedding!
This dress is sunshine!

while the dress is nice, its a bit frumpy looking around the waist. It was snagging pretty easy, as well and the shoulders didn't allow for much movement. Shipping was a hassle with ModCloth because apparently they closed their facilities for two days and was left in pending for over a week before I had to contact customer service. they are really dropping the ball on customer service/communication

LOVE!! Loved this dress the moment I saw it online. The sleeves were tight and the waist was large but after some alterations this was perfection. Everything I could have hoped for for my wedding reception. #cramblitcampout

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress to we
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress to wear for a graduation party and oh my goodness, this dress is so gorgeous and elegant! The only bad thing I would have to say about this dress is that the length was a little too long for my petite\\short figure. But other than that, it was everything I wanted!
I bought this dress with the intention to make it my prom dress, and it is absolutely gorgeous!!!! It fits me beautifully, it is kneelength, the fabric is soft, and the sleeves are

FitList.review_summary: I knew I loved this dress
FitList.review_text: I knew I loved this dress and was going to get married in it before I even had a wedding date set. I ordered it and let it sit in my closet for a couple of months so that when we actually set a date the dress wouldn't be sold out. I was not going to settle for anything less. So about the dress, its gorgeous! Dusty champagne color and very classy. Its the perfect length. Shoes were hard to find for it so I had a sash sewn on that matched my shoes and to give me the illusion of a waist. I also had the chest decoration taken in a little so that it didn't droop during my vows. I wish I had taken in the back decoration too since it drooped too and is bothersome in some of my wedding photos. The dress is very comfortable which was a huge plus for walking around a fair all day. I received so many compliments I lost count. Vintage is in and classy is never out of style. This dress is amazing, I wish I could wear it over and over again. Thank you for making my day amazing ModCloth and ChiChi London.

FitList.review_summary: I use the dress as my wed
FitList.review_text: I use the dress as my wedding dress for my wedding that was on July 21. It looks amazing on me and fit very well.  I got so many compliments on the dress. As for the reviews regarding the sleeves, I found that they fit me very well and I have a rather large.

FitList.review_summary: I love love love this dre
FitList.review_text: I love love love this dress. I was initially disappointed when I saw it (right out of the packaging) but as soon as I put it on I was in love. the dress just needs to be steamed as it was a little crinkled. I went up a size to be safe, but could have gone a size smaller. I didn't find it to be itchy at all. I am super happy with this purchase :)
This was my wedding dress! I love it, but I definitely had to get it altered to fit better. The material is delicate, but it is so beautiful.

I absolutely ADORE this beautiful dress!! I had it in mind for my bridal shower for a while and was a little wary to purchase it because of the price. But let me tell you, it was worth every single penny and then some!! I plan to wear it as my get away dress at the wedding as well, it is simply lovely!! The only thing I can say is the lace around the neck did get a little wilty, it started to fall forward as the day wore on. But nothing a little starch can't fix! If you're considering this dress, buy it. You won't be sorry!!

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress as a
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress as a potential to wear for my bridal shower. I usually wear a size 10 in pants and a M top. I'm 5'4, 160 pounds and a 36D. the quality of this dress for the price I think is good but I just wasn't feeling it. Like other reviewers mentioned there is absolutely no give in the top. I thought I dislocated my shoulder trying to get it off. The dress did fit well in the waist. It was very poofy and I did feel like a Princess but I'll be returning it.

FitList.review_summary: I wore this dress for my
FitList.review_text: I wore this dress for my wedding. People kept asking me if it was my grandma's because of its vintage look. It's the perfect fit, length, and quality. Some people say the arms are to itchy, but I was too busy to notice. I didn't think it was that bad. Loved the lace, the tulle, the gold and cream colors, and the overall look.
The dress is very pretty but way too large for me in every way possible. I was swimming in it and since the next size or two down are sold out, this will sadly not be my dream wedding dress.
Awful!  So scratchy and didn't fit well at all!
Fabric didn't fall right on my frame and color was a bit too blush for the occasion purchased for.
The fabric doesn't breathe. It looks cheaply made. Quite disappointed. Sent back.
This dress is beautiful. I am bummed it won't work for my beach wedding I will need something more casual. It had a great vintage feel to it. Fit true to size and perfect knee length

I LOVED this dress!  This was my wedding dress.  I think the best thing about it is that I would've bought this no matter what size I was and I in no way felt like I was compromising on my look at all.  The quality was top notch and I felt like I got my dress for a steal.  Like everyone mentions, the top is a little weird and I had to have mine altered but just a 1/2 on each side in the back on the shoulders to take it up and give me the fit I was looking for.  I originally ordered this in a 20 because everyone says to size up, some mishaps happened in shipping (which of course ModCloth straightened out with awesome customer service) and they only had it in 18 by the time it was sorted it out. So, I feel like it definitely runs true to size.  I loved seeing pictures of these beautiful women in their dresses, so here is mine.  Thank you for offering so many beautiful options, ModCloth!

This dress was difficult to get on and off because the lace sleeves have no give. I was afraid I was going to be trapped in it. It was a lot poofier than it looks in the picture. I felt like a cupcake, in a bad way. Ended up returning it.

FitList.review_summary: It is a beautiful dress b
FitList.review_text: It is a beautiful dress but the fabric on the lace is scratchy. The shoulders are a bit tight too. I sized up and I'm glad I did. Great dress but a little overpriced for quality of the fabric.

FitList.review_summary: Love this dress! I wore i
FitList.review_text: Love this dress! I wore it to my highschool prom. Only problems were that I am of a petite build so the arms were a bit lose and it was a little too long for my liking.. But I've gotten used to clothes fitting a bit big. Fabric was a bit itchy but not unbearable. Also getting out of the dress was quite the struggle. Needed two other people to get me out haha. Overall great dress!
Love love love this dress

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress so much
FitList.review_text: I love this dress so much but it just didn't work for me. First I ordered this in a size 14 and it fit perfect everywhere except for the sleeves there was no room for any movement so I thought I'd order the size 16 hoping it would give me more arm room but not be too big anywhere else unfortunately it just was way too big everywhere else but the sleeves fit perfect for me in this size. It's weird because I don't have large or wide arms...not sure if anyone else has had this issue with the sleeves but I will not be keeping this dress for myself I will be returning both sizes back for a refund. Other than my issue with the sleeves it is absolutely beautiful I would have loved to have it for my wedding dress.

This dress is AMAZING! I got it for my British Royal Tea bridal shower and it was a perfect fit, stylewise. I've told so many people about this website as a result! I looked like a princess!The only reason I say the fit is slightly small is because the top is a stiff lace. While the arm fabric moves well and the bodice fits perfectly, it is a little hard to take off.I am a size 4 on top and closer to a 6 on the bottom, with a B cup chest. I got the 4, and again it FIT perfectly, but the material on the top of the dress is not flexible so keep that in mind. The bottom half was very comfortable to move around in and in no way did I have to size up because of a slightly larger bottom half. If you have a bigger chest or rib cage you may want to do so.I wish I could wear it every day!

FitList.review_summary: Not what I thought it wou
FitList.review_text: Not what I thought it would be

So this dress looks cute on a lot of people, sadly I'm not one of them. I ordered one size up based on the reviews, which worked for some parts of the dress but not others. The waist was too high for me, and the lace bit was too large and VERY scratchy and uncomfortable on my sensitive skin. It's a cute style, but I'm sending this one back and trying something else.

absolutely gorgeous dress! purchased for my wedding this month, here is the thing...i ordered a larger size, just like everyone said to, i am normally a size 12, so i got a 16. the 16 was waaaaaay too big. i would've just had it altered, but the lace was all screwy, and it did not line up correctly on the chest. so i sent the 16 back. then i ordered a 12 (cause they ACTUALLY had a size 12 in). the arms are way too tight to even put on. i am having it altered, so my NORMAL size arms can fit into the sleeves. if this doesn't work, i guess i am showing up to my wedding in a dress that i am not 100% crazy about. fingers crossed.

FitList.review_summary: I'm in love with this dre
FitList.review_text: I'm in love with this dress. I ordered a size 18 a few months ago and it was just a tiny bit small. (I would definitely recommend ordering a size up, esp. if you are busty). Size 20 was out of stock, so I held onto it but ended up buying it in pink (awful, sold on eBay) and then in white from Chi Chi London b/c I was worried about fitting into it by Sept. I really liked the white version but when I saw that champagne was back in stock on modcloth, I had to order it to see. I'm SO glad I did. This time around, the champagne gilded grace is more ivory/cream and doesn't have the metallic gold in the lace that it's predecessor did. So, if you are buying this dress now, disregard any of the reviews talking about itchy lace, since I think the gold in the lace is what made the previous dress a bit itchy. It also fits PERFECTLY. No alternations needed at all and somehow the neckline fits even better than the white Chi Chi London. There are a couple loose threads, but that's an easy fix and the quality is still excellent for a dress at this pricepoint.
Fabric is kinda rough and scratchy if you have sensitive skin like me, especially on arms. Very beautiful vintage style wedding dress for all body types.
Fabric is kinda rough and scratchy if you have sensitive skin like me, especially on arms. Very beautiful vintage style wedding dress for all body types.

ADORE this dress! Fits like a glove. It is more champagne coloured than the picture, but I would say it is a true champagne colour and not gold like others have commented. It is quite hot to wear but it's made of polyamide so that's expected. Impressed with the padding in the bust I'm busty and no need for a bra the dress keeps everything in place! :D Love it!!

FitList.review_summary: Wore it to a Christmas pa
FitList.review_text: Wore it to a Christmas party to feel like a princess

FitList.review_summary: Was a bit to snug in my a
FitList.review_text: Was a bit to snug in my arms and chest, ordered one size up and it fit perfectly.

FitList.review_summary: I loved this when I saw i
FitList.review_text: I loved this when I saw it but unfortunately it didn't work. I usually order a 2 or 4 depending on the article of clothing. The lace shoulders were too small and I ended up ordering 2 sizes up. I still had a hard time getting into it. The waist was fine but not the shoulders. It's a side zipper. Going up 2 sizes made the lace at my throat too tall and pooch out. If you have any muscle on your arms this may not be a good choice. Probably better for ladies who are very thin on top. I'm more hourglass. Thankfully returns are not a hassle. Otherwise I loved it!

FitList.review_summary: Okay, to be fair, I didn'
FitList.review_text: Okay, to be fair, I didn't fully try this on (didn't want to wiggle my arms in  I'm not a professional contortionist. The arms fit fine for me (I sized up) when I tried them on before be dress on. I just didn't like the color at all. To me, it was an odd taupe color not gold or even ivory. As soon as I pulled it out of the bag, I was disappointed. I'm started to think ill never find my wedding dress through modcloth (10 dresses!) but thank heaven for the great return policy.This dress just wasn't for me.

Very beautiful details, but the lace was extremely scratchy. I might have been able to bear with that if I loved the dress, but it was a little too formal/embellished for what I wanted in a wedding dress for my simple outdoor ceremony. The skirt is very full, more so than the pictures lead you to believe, which is something to keep in mind if you're heavier on the bottom.... I just felt like it made me look even bigger. Sad to say this wasn't the dress for me, even though I thought it was the one when I ordered it.
The lace is super itchy. it will take some altering for me to wear this, i dont have the heart to return it from how elegant and just beutiful it really is.
Returned this dress. Really itchy fabric and looks more gold than in the picture.

FitList.review_summary: I got this dress for my s
FitList.review_text: I got this dress for my sweet 16 party and it was amazing! The material was nice although it is kind of itchy at the beginning, I was actually a little scared on that because I have very sensitive skin but after like 10 minutes or less you forger about it. The fitting was great I had a little bit of room left over in the waist but that was no big deal.
It was pretty tight thought the shoulders and arms, but it was so beautiful and everyone else loved it. Made my wedding day perfect

FitList.review_summary: I felt like a princess on
FitList.review_text: I felt like a princess on my wedding day. Everyone loved it and it fit quite nicely, albeit, it does run a bit small. You can dress the look up in different ways, for sure.
Beautiful dress but, I unfortunately had to return it because it was not exactly what I was looking for.

What a gorgeous dress! The only problem was that I received someone else's return and it had been ripped above the zipper and was fraying in front. Modcloth customer care was SO awesome as always and helped me every step of the way. Thanks Modcloth!

FitList.review_summary: at first I had mixed feel
FitList.review_text: at first I had mixed feelings about this dress. I thought it might be too dark. wearing it outside you can really see the sparkle. I wore it at my wedding and I felt like a million bucks! I don't know how I could have doubted the dress. it was perfect. I will say however that it is difficult to take off alone. there is no stretch in the lace so be careful not to rip it taking it on and off.
Loved this dress but the bust area was too small, so I returned it.

FitList.review_summary: This was the dress I wore
FitList.review_text: This was the dress I wore for my wedding. This was the dress I absolutely wanted, and I was thrilled when it came back in stock. I loved the way it looked. I felt like a princess :)

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress. I boug
FitList.review_text: I love this dress. I bought it for my prom and could not be happier! It sits perfectly, comes to my knee. I found it a little bit snug around the middle, but it still fits well. Very pleased!

FitList.review_summary: The lace sleeves had NO g
FitList.review_text: The lace sleeves had NO give. I had to wear once or twice before I my arms felt comfortable. Received lots of complements. If I ordered again I would go a size up.

FitList.review_summary: I loved this dress. I ord
FitList.review_text: I loved this dress. I ordered a size smaller than I thought I would be because of the fact I'm a bit smaller on top. The sleeves were a bit tighter but nowhere near bothersome by the end of the night as I bought it for my graduation gala. I got so many compliments on it and everyone around me enjoyed it. Though the lace was a bit scratchy, the dress helped me to feel absolutely amazing!

FitList.review_summary: I loved this dress, but I
FitList.review_text: I loved this dress, but I ordered it way to small by mistake and had to return it. I ended up buying the short sleeved version instead in my correct uk size and it fits perfectly. (sorry modcloth that I didn't end up buying from you... but... short sleeves ftw!)

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! I got
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! I got it to wear to my junior prom and I loved it. It's very comfortable yet a tiny bit scratchy on the lace material around the sleeves. It's very vibrant and stunning!
It is a beautiful dress.
love this dress! I bought a 2x which fit but was a little snug so I went up one size and it was perfect.

FitList.review_summary: It's a little itchy in th
FitList.review_text: It's a little itchy in the sleeves but it is seriously so beautiful and makes you feel so beautiful you won't even notice it.

FitList.review_summary: Didn't seem to be cut cor
FitList.review_text: Didn't seem to be cut correctly based on the size. Otherwise a lovely dress.

FitList.review_summary: It was for my daughter fo
FitList.review_text: It was for my daughter for her sister wedding and she was beautiful in the dress! Thank you

I absolutely adore this dress! I received myriad compliments all night, so I assume others certainly did as well. While the upper lace part is a bit itchy and somewhat restrictive (I could not lift my arms all the way above my head), the sleeves are gorgeous and well worth it.

FitList.review_summary: I wanted this dress to wo
FitList.review_text: I wanted this dress to work out so badly. I saw such cute photos of other girls in it. It may just have been my body type. I am pretty busty. There was so much material and it just made me look huge. Had to return it.

Love the dress except for the sleeves.  I absolutely had to get assistance to get it off and because I could not lift my arms about shoulder length.  The color is a little darker than the picture but it is the same length.  The lace is a bit itchy but its not really a problem if your skin isn't sensitive.  Very pretty, but size up if you want to move your arms a lot!

This dress was stunning! But it was extremely itchy. I have sensitive skin (like eczema prone) and after ten minutes of wearing this dress  my skin broke out in a rash. Another issue I had was the arm's were a little tight. I am bummed I had to send it back because it is such a beautiful dress.

FitList.review_summary: I had hoped to use this a
FitList.review_text: I had hoped to use this as a wedding dress, and while so many ladies looked good in it, the cut just wasn't for me and my pear shape. The waist fell strange  somewhere in between empire and drop waist. I did order up a size, but it was very very big (alterations probably would've taken it down to smaller than the 12 that I normally wear). Still a cute dress  I'm sure I'll have more luck with other modcloth dresses

This is WAY fancier than it looks online. I got it because I want to get married in it, and that's really all you can do with it. It's not something you can wear out to a dinner (or I wouldn't anyway,) because it LOOKS like a wedding dress. Having said that, let me say this, it is absolutely stunningly beautiful! I should have ordered a 10, the 8 is a little snug in the arms and shoulders, and the lace is a little scratchy, but it's so beautiful I don't want to send it back. I'm 5'9 and wear a 9/10 if that helps you know how to size it. It hits right below the knee and is so flattering in the bust and waist! I absolutely love it!

FitList.review_summary: Let me say that this dres
FitList.review_text: Let me say that this dress is very high quality for the price and there is no denying how insanely gorgeous it is! The main reason i decided against this dress for my wedding was because of how my arms felt in this dress. I couldn't raise my arms up like at all past my shoulders and then weirdly the sleeves were way too big near my elbows. Maybe if I got it altered it would have been better but I really didn't have time for alterations. I really would recommend a potential bride to at least purchase it and try it on! I normally wear a 1618 and I did order a 20 and a 22. The 22 was way huge and the 20 is where I had the issues with raising my arms.

This dress was extremely itchy around the neck and sleeves. I ordered up 2 sizes because everyone said it ran small so the fit was okay just not what I was looking for. It has way to much gold on it.  Sending it back!! :( I'll  keep looking for the perfect dress.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! I size
