FitList.review_text: I love this dress! I sized up a size from what I typically wear as suggested by other reviews. The only thing that I didn't love is that it is hard to get on and over my shoulders because of the side zipper, but once it is on it is perfect. I am going to use this as my going away dress at my wedding and am so excited to wear it :) I would definitely recommend this dress, after making sure you go a size or two up.

FitList.review_summary: I used this dress as my r
FitList.review_text: I used this dress as my reception dress and I loved it! I'm not huge in sleeves so I took it to the tailor and had them remove it and it was PERFECT!

Beautiful quality, although the lace is a little scratchy at first. I'd recommend for any alternative bride who is looking for a flattering, vintage style steal. It's a bargain for what you get and I can't wait to wear it to my wedding in September!

FitList.review_summary: It was a bit tight in the
FitList.review_text: It was a bit tight in the arms. I really liked it. The color was more golden then I expected. I did end up returning it because I found the same dress in white eslewhere.

FitList.review_summary: It was a cute dress, but
FitList.review_text: It was a cute dress, but very different from how the photo seemed. Ended up returning it. It was also a little tight in the arms.

FitList.review_summary: I ended up sending this d
FitList.review_text: I ended up sending this dress back. i bought an 18 and a 20. The 18 (pictured) was a bit tight in the bodice and didn't seem to lay right, either gapping under my armpits or if i pulled it up so it fit my arms right, it was too high on my neck. The material doesn't stretch much at all. The 20 was way too big in the chest as I am smaller than most with my waist/hip size. The material is scratchy, but i could have dealt with it. It was pretty, although I would have liked it better if the tool was also a champagne color and not white.

FitList.review_summary: It's lovely! Fit like a g
FitList.review_text: It's lovely! Fit like a glove.

Even though it's literally going to have to be hand altered for me by my costumer/designer friend, it's a great dress and I gasped when I took it out of the box. This dress really is great. I should have bought a size 12 or 14, but it was all out of stock and I knew I'd have to get it altered anyway (being 5' 1 all dresses are too long) so I went with the only option even close  the 16. The arms are PLENTY big and too long for my body type (165 pounds and 5' 1 short). I think a size 12 would have been right for me at the waist/bust/arm thickness (ha) but would still have needed changes just because of my shortness. I normally wear a 14 in pants and a large in those comfy classic shirts from Target. If I could give advice to someone trying to get the closest size possible with the least alterations and my measurements  I'd order a 12 and wear Spanx.

This dress was incredibly itchy and I could not get it on over my head for fear of ripping it. I was thinking of using it as a wedding dress but it looked more like a prom dress to me when I saw it in person. I sent it back!
This was my wedding dress and it was perfect. I received quite a lot of compliments about it. The lace on the neckline was slightly itchy but it didn't bother me at all. Very cute!
After reading the other reviews, I decided to purchase this dress a size larger than I normally wear and I'm SO glad I did. It fits perfectly and I can't wait to wear it on my wedding day!

FitList.review_summary: I thought the waist was t
FitList.review_text: I thought the waist was too short and made me look frumpy. The dress was gorgeous other than that.

I planned on getting married in this, but it looks absolutely horrible on me.  The crinoline that causes the skirt to poof out is sewn into the hem under the bodice, which means the skirt begins poofing out over my stomach.  This actually made me look a lot heavier than I am.  In addition to that, it's super itchy and uncomfortable.  I'm glad this dress worked out for other reviewers, but it was not the dress for me.

FitList.review_summary: This dress is more gold t
FitList.review_text: This dress is more gold than champagne. Very pretty, but not for me. The sleeves were difficult and tight. Definitely not a dress you can get out of by yourself!
I had purchased two dresses for my wedding and this was a big NO. It felt like a table clothes and the lace popped out at the top.

This was my reception dress at my wedding and I swear I get more compliments on this dress than my ceremony dress that was 10X the price. I felt like a princess in this dress and the size 2 fit nearly perfectly on my frame. It was a tiny bit small but the next size up would have probably been too large. The only draw backs were the lace being a bit itchy and getting the dress off (on my wedding night) since the sleeves have no give. It got a bit stuck (luckily I had help). haha

First off, this dress is darling.  As many before me have said, the pictures are beautiful and it is unsurprisingly even more gorgeous in person.  I normally wear and ordered a 2. The dress had a nice, tight fit, but I couldn't zip the dress on my own. I sized up to a 4 which was more comfortable but still appeared tight.As several have said, the lace top and sleeves are a bit itchy.  I have very sensitive skin but it wasn't a problem for me.  The bodice and skirt are lined with a lovely silky material, so no itch there. The silky skirt clings so be prepared to deal with that one way or another. The high waisted skirt does make me feel a little selfconscious and poofy, but worrying is all for naught because it looks great on. I love how it hits the midcalf of most girls who have posted photos here, however it was a bit short on me, coming just below the knee.My dealbreaker is that the tulle DOES provide stretch, but not in the direction that anyone wants.  The tulle stretches if (gently!) pulled vertically, but not horizontally.  This means that there is no room to breathe since the bodice doesn't give any.  It also makes this dress a nightmare to try to get into and out of.  The only way I can get out of this dress on my own is to unzip, bend over, and slowly and gently pull the back of the skirt over my head, thus slowly turning the dress inside out. Painful and not very dignified!I'll try my luck with the longer one that is available in March!

FitList.review_summary: I loved this dress for my
FitList.review_text: I loved this dress for my wedding day! I got so many compliments all day from complete strangers as well as everyone who was at the wedding. The detail is SO gorgeous and the champagne color is beautiful. I was unsure buying online so i went a size up and it of course was to big. I usually wear a 12 but i didnt want it to be small. If its big you can take it in. Truely was perfect. It was the first dress I saw online and I just kept coming back to this one. :D

FitList.review_summary: The waist was in the wron
FitList.review_text: The waist was in the wrong place for me (5'9)hot in the middle of my ribcage. Material was scratchy/didn't feel high quality.

FitList.review_summary: Too big in the upper body
FitList.review_text: Too big in the upper body area. the seeves are alittle to big at the end.color is much more gold than some would think if you see the picture.but I still love it and wil use it as wedding dress!

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress more th
FitList.review_text: I love this dress more than anything I have ever owned!

FitList.review_summary: OMG! So glad I found this
FitList.review_text: OMG! So glad I found this dress!! It's everything I wanted! I did go a size up though like everyone be suggested. Can't wait to wear this on my March 8 wedding!! It is stuff in the arms and lace is a bit itchy but good lord it's beautiful!!!!!!

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress to we
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress to wear for my rehearsal dinner before my wedding. There's more gold to it than the ivory in the pictures. As mentioned in other posts, the lace on top does not lay flat but it's not a huge issue. I usually order a size 20 but at the time I purchased,  there were only 22 available and it fits kind of snug right below my chest and above my stomach. I'm tempted to buy a 24 just to have it because I love it so much, though.  The right strapless bra will go a long way with this dress.  The length was perfect and I think it has enough poof at the bottom it isn't overwhelming. I loved the dress so much that I ended up changing into it towards the end wedding night!

FitList.review_summary: The sleeves were to big b
FitList.review_text: The sleeves were to big but that can be taken in. It's a bit itchy in the top and sleeves but not to bad. Over all loved it I used it for my court wedding and used it for my husband's company Christmas party.

FitList.review_summary: I love the color of this
FitList.review_text: I love the color of this dress and it is beautiful on the hanger! However, I ordered a size up and I had to have my mom peel me out of it because the sleeves were so tight! To say that the dress has no give is a significant understatement! Also, the lace by my neck was super strange looking. Instead of laying against my skin, it flapped over and hung awkwardly. Also, it was itchy. I love Modcloth though but this dress was not the best purchase I have had there!

I bought this dress because I considered wearing it for my wedding dress. However I knew the moment I saw it the dress would be horrible to wear for my August wedding in Florida. I honestly had it on for less than a minute before I pulled it off, it was so itchy! The dress is also very poofy, which I don't think is very flattering for me. I do give the dress 3 stars because it seemed well made, but I had to return because I'd never be able to deal with the itchy fabric.

FitList.review_summary: I loved the dress and got
FitList.review_text: I loved the dress and got so many compliments on it at my wedding and after from the photos. more gold in real life than it looks on the pictures.

FitList.review_summary: I wore this dress for my
FitList.review_text: I wore this dress for my wedding, it was wonderful.  A little tight in my shoulders/arms bc the lace is a little stiff and does not have any elastic in it... but who needs to lift their arms above their head on their wedding?  It was a small sarifice, that was well worth it  I assure you.

FitList.review_summary: I picked this dress as my
FitList.review_text: I picked this dress as my reception dress for my wedding. I loved it. It went well with the vintage look I was going for. The only downfall was that it was a pain to put on without messing up my hair!!

My fianc? bought me this dress for Christmas and it is absolutely gorgeous! It does have a lot more gold accents than shown in the picture,but it still looks amazing on. It is a tad hard to pull the dress above my head because the fabric is a tad stiff, but then I located the zipper so it was much easier. Still contemplating on keeping the 4 or maybe getting a 6. Anyways, the dress is worth the buy.

This dress is so flattering!! The gold and champagne colour is just beautiful. Being smaller busted the padded top will mean I won't have to wear a bra underneath. Be warned, like other reviewers, the arms are a tad tight. Especially around the upper arms/pits area. I can't wait to wear this dress!!!

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress as my
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress as my 'send off dress' for my wedding or just to have as a special occasion dress. It's pretty but the lace and sheer around my chest and arms were way too itchy and uncomfortable for me to smile and deal with it. I was hoping the lace was soft but it isn't. This is not a horrible dress but it isn't a great dress either ( in the aspect of comfort). I have to send it back :(

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress as a
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress as a possible wedding dress, but as others have said  it is noticeably itchy  and you have to pull it on over your head. I'm keeping it to wear at a prewedding party where I won't have to wear it for an extended time. It fits perfectly though!

Well, the first problem is my fault because I ordered the dress a size up as I read in some reviews that it runs small, and also my size was not available. However, when I tried it on it was probably at least two sizes too big, and very poofy. Also the lace is not delicate at all, it is very heavy and thick. I was going to wear it for my rehearsal but it definitely does not lay as nicely as it does in the picture and I looked like I should be in Swan Lake, not walking down the aisle. The gold lace is quite prevalent and I agree with previous reviews that it makes the dress look less elegant than it could. Finally, despite the fact that it was two sizes too big, I still had a really hard time getting it off and had to get my fiance to help me peel it off without ripping it, even with the side zipper all the way open. Also because of the thickness of the material the zipper kept getting stuck. Mostly though I was surprised by how thick the lace it and how poofy the dress was overall. Definitely getting returned.

It's a lovely dress, but I think it fits curvier, bustier builds better. I'm basically flat so the top lace portion of the dress either sags or sticks out in odd places, like the shoulders. The dress is also rather scratchy if you're not used to it, but I still love the design even though I had to return it in the end.

FitList.review_summary: I really wanted to love t
FitList.review_text: I really wanted to love this dress. Unfortunately it was way too itchy. The zipper is on the side too, and that meant I have to pull it over my head.
This dress is beautiful! The color of antique pearls and aged parchment perfect for the photo shoot that Mary Elizabeth Photography did if my and my husband to be.

FitList.review_summary: I needed to do some alter
FitList.review_text: I needed to do some alterations, took in the sleeves and a few inches off of them, under the bust, sewed on a lace belt to lengthen the torso
Really scratchy and not flattering

FitList.review_summary: I wear a solid size 6 in
FitList.review_text: I wear a solid size 6 in most major dress brands (Calvin Klein,  etc) and the placement of the zipper (side) plus the stiffness of the material of this dress made it impossible for me to even try it on, as I couldn't even get my shoulders through. The zipper should definitely have been put on the back. Some people have mentioned the itchiness of the fabric, which I kind of blew off when reading the reviewsit is unbearably itchyto the point when 15 minutes after I tried to put the dress on I can still feel scratchy burning sensations on my arms. Pretty in the pictures but horrendous in person. definitely going back.
the dress is amazing and cutest dress ever!

FitList.review_summary: I wasn't sure of my size
FitList.review_text: I wasn't sure of my size since my measurements were between Modcloth's sizes on their chart, I spoke via online chat with a stylist to get a better idea of what to look for. She suggested a size 26. I usually wear a size 16 in jeans or a 1x so a 26 sounded way too big. After trying it on I found out it is indeed too large. I knew before purchasing that I would have to have the dress altered but now it also needs to be taken in and shortened quite a bit. The lace collar hits a bit higher than I had hoped but that shouldn't be too hard to adjust when alterations are done. The lace is a bit itchy as other reviews have said, but it isn't too terrible. Overall the dress is so beautiful. I am very happy with my purchase and can't wait to wear it at my wedding reception.

FitList.review_summary: I liked the style and fit
FitList.review_text: I liked the style and fit but I felt the color was much darker in person.

The dress is really pretty, but it did not work for my body type at all. I have a larger bust, and a short waist. Pit made me look like a gold twinky. Some of the dress measurements are a bit weird too. Sleeves do not give at all, you like other reviews I got stuck in it and had a moment of panic. The bust was too lose and the waist too short.  I think if it was tailored a bit more and longer in the waist with some give, it would have been a win.

This dress is gorgeous! I unfortunately bought it too small (size 2), and it's too late to return it. However, I'm going to buy a size 6 this time. The only area that was too tight was my entire rib and chest area. If you work out at all, or have been in advanced choir, SIZE UP BY TWO SIZES. There is no extra fabric to let out the dress at all. It's better to size up, and then have it taken in. Even though I'm normally a size 2, my rib cage is huge due to choir and this dress has no stretch to it. I could zip up the dress... but barely. Forget trying to breathe or lift your arms. Another person in the reviews who's my size bought a 6 and said it was a perfect fit, so I'm going to try that out. I'll update this once I get it. Also, this dress is super long. It's meant to fall belwo the knee, but Petites beware! It came down to midcalf for me. This can easily be fixed since the top of the skirt has no detailing on it.
Perfect but itchy! Had to return it.

FitList.review_summary: I am not sure how to judg
FitList.review_text: I am not sure how to judge the quality as I was so turned off by the itchy fabric that I paid little attention to much else. Looked cute, felt like it fit fine, but oh my goodness, my arms were so angry about the scratchy lace overlay that I couldn't handle another minute in it! Best for someone who wouldn't mind it as much, me: reutrned. Bummer, it was so darn cute!
Great dress, photographs beautifully... The sleeves are kind of snug and its a tad hard to get in and out of. But it's great. I highly recommend it!

This dress, like many others, is for my wedding. I am having a military wedding with 2 months notice. This dress is everything I wanted. I will be real, this is slightly itchy but after wearing it for 5 minutes I forgot all about it and its quite comfortable. No picture will ever do this dress justice, its just so beautiful in person. I cannot wait to wear this in my upcoming winter wedding!! So wonderful. If you are on the fence, I would say get it!

FitList.review_summary: Bought this to be my wedd
FitList.review_text: Bought this to be my wedding dress. I'm having a vintage style wedding and this dress is perfect. Ordered a 20 even tho I'm usually a size 16 with clothes. It fit perfect. It has a side zipper...which usually me and zippers don't get along, but this works. The dress does have gold tints to it. love love love. p.s don't mind the black bra in the pics...it was a fast try on.
My only complaint about this dress is the zipper! I picked this for my courthouse wedding and the zipper broke when I was getting ready :(

FitList.review_summary: A stunning dress that I w
FitList.review_text: A stunning dress that I will be wearing to get married next year.  I bought a size too big after reading reviews and it was a perfect fit for.  It is slightly loose on the chest but nothing a couple of stitches in the corner won't fix!  Comes with lots of layering in the skirt, it's beautiful
A divine dress. Can't wait to wear it to my Hollywood themed Christmas party Grace Kelly much?

FitList.review_summary: I wore this on my wedding
FitList.review_text: I wore this on my wedding day. Perfect!

FitList.review_summary: Oh my god my dress arrive
FitList.review_text: Oh my god my dress arrived today. I got so excited. the dress looks amazing. I love all the details. I fell in love with this dress as soon as I saw it on madcloth. I love 50s style I went through all the reviews and said I would take a chance. I am a size 20 on top and 16 in the waist. So I ordered a size 26. going by the reviews sizing up was the way to go. and yes it is a little itchy but il sort that with a little fabric softer. I knew when I ordered that I would have to take it to the seamstress I can't wait to wear it for my wedding in June next year, I will post photos when dress is finished thanks madcloth

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! It was
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! It was a bit big,  specially the top and sleaves, so i had a tailor take it in 1.5 size on the top part. I could have probably ordered a smaller size, but it's  better to get it fitted I think. The lace is stretchy so I think the sleaves should be tighter. Its a bit itchy on the lace part as well,  but I forgot about that in minutes. Everyone loved it!

FitList.review_summary: This dress is so pretty I
FitList.review_text: This dress is so pretty I wish I could wear it more than just my wedding next year! It's got a great twirl to it and it's interesting enough without being over the top with lace or sparkle. The lace is a little itchy at the arms and chest but nothing unbearable. I will say that the one big detractor is how terrifying this dress is to get in and out of. I was trying it on alone the first time and was afraid Id have to knock on my upstairs neighbors door to get them to help me get it off. This is because while the side zips open it doesn't loosen the sleeves any. It ends up being doable with some patience and a lot of wriggling, and that's only an issue getting it on or off. Also the sleeves are a bit restricting so you can't raise your arms above your head very well. With all of those factors weighed, I still liked how it felt on me so much that I'm still keeping it and I look forward to wearing it! The price of lace sleeves, right?
Too tight around my arms. It's a return item for me.

Beautiful, elegant and timeless, this dress has it all! I saw this dress and immediately knew it would be perfect for my wedding. My husband and I decided to elope in our backyard so it was a last minute purchase. I was worried it wouldn't get to me on time but it did! The dress arrived in about 10 days and it fit perfect! I also ordered one size up upon the recommendation of other reviewers and was very glad I did. I did not have a problem with the lace fabric at the top of the dress being droopy or itchy like others mentioned in their reviews. The lace was of excellent quality and the gold thread throughout the lace is absolutely gorgeous. The only negative comment that I have is that the zipper on the dress was not good quality and broke 5 minutes before the ceremony. Luckily a good friend of mine is able to sew and completely sewed the zipper shut. I purchased nude colored heels with  a gold embellishment and the look was perfect. If you are wanting to look like a classy, timeless bride then look no further. This dress is absolutely stunning!

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress for m
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress for my sister as her rehearsal dinner dress. Quality is amazing,  but the top is a little large. Bought a size up as recommended, and it fits everywhere except the shoulders. My mom is awesome at sewing so she'll be able to take it in a bit. Also, one of the scallops sticks out a bit, but that may be due to the fit. Overall it's beautiful and perfect for the occasion!

FitList.review_summary: The only thing I am not 1
FitList.review_text: The only thing I am not 100% about is the lace, it's just a little bit itchy. Not unwearable, but definitely noticeable. The fit is true to size, I ordered a 24. It's so pretty in person. I was kinda worried I wouldn't like the gold, but it's so amazing. Wearing it for my courthouse wedding 1/5/15.

FitList.review_summary: order one size up and it
FitList.review_text: order one size up and it will be perfect.  the arms are tight so the extra room helps. itchy fabric but not bad. very happy with my choice!

FitList.review_summary: So, firstly, this is a go
FitList.review_text: So, firstly, this is a gorgeous dress. The color was exactly the champagne tone pictured. I ended up returning this dress because I have a 42 inch bust and it had all sorts of weird gaps going on. The second reason I returned it was because it was extremely itchy and I wanted to tear my skin off after wearing it for the ten minutes I tried it on. If you can take the time to alter the fit and deal with how itchy it is, the dress is amazing for the price. The bad outweighed the good for me though.

FitList.review_summary: The sleeves are a bit too
FitList.review_text: The sleeves are a bit too long and it's weird how the inner arm is just bare tulle... none of the lace pattern was continued there. Also the top of the neckline pokes me in the neck. Small alterations will work to solve minor inconveniences on an overall beautiful dress.

FitList.review_summary: A little tight in the arm
FitList.review_text: A little tight in the arms but over all amzaing
dress is beautiful. unfortunately, the waist was too low for me and wasn't doing anything for my short rectangular torso. I live on empire waisted dresses so back it went.

Ah, what a disappointment! I was *so* hoping this would be my wedding dress, but alas! 'Twas not to be. Fabric is extremely scratchy which I could have happily dealt with had the dress looked as lovely as it does on everyone else here. I sized up in the hope I could get it taken in at the waist, but the cups still cut half way across my chest and the exaggerated sweetheart neckline of the bodicr did nothing to flatter, which is such a shame as the colours and design are SO gorgeous. The bodice is rather short, meaning the (extremely) puffy skirt started well above my natural waist and made me look 'blocky'. Overall I have the feeling this dress simply didn't suit because of my body shape  the dress itself is stunning (albeit itchy), but mine will sadly be going back.

FitList.review_summary: There are no words for ho
FitList.review_text: There are no words for how much I love this dress. I purchased it for my very small, outdoor fall wedding and it's just PERFECT! Fancy enough to make me feel like a bride but not so much to make me feel overdone at our simple dinner reception later. After reading the reviews I decided to size up from my usual 14 to a 16 and honestly, it's a touch on the roomy size. I could stand to have it taken in a bit but I really like that I can get it on and off without too much hassle. It does take a little interesting maneuvering on my part (flip at the waist, wiggle, grab the sleeves and pull it over my head) but I can manage. Yes, it's at little scratchy but not too bad. Overall it's exactly what I was looking for at a price point that didn't kill a very small budget. I will be DELIGHTED to wear it in a few weeks!

FitList.review_summary: I found this dress to loo
FitList.review_text: I found this dress to look a bit tacky in person. I thought I might be able to wear it to a courthouse wedding but it looked like a cheap dress that's trying hard to look fancy. Also if you can't handle a little itchiness, this is not the dress for you!
Great dress but it didn't work out for me. Had lots of trouble with bust sizing but I'm very large on top. Everything else fit wonderfully. Sadly had to exchange for anther dress.

FitList.review_summary: I ordered this dress a li
FitList.review_text: I ordered this dress a little larger to have it taken in. The sleeves were baggy, but that was an easy fix. The weight of the dress falls on the shoulders, so it didn't provide proper support in the bust. I ordered the Va Bien long line bra which helped a lot. The low cut of the long line bra was important because the back of the dress will expose anything higher. The material was ok, a little itchy on top, the slip was very clingy so use static spray. Also, I recommend wearing some sort of thigh length shapewear the same tone as the long line bra so it won't show through the dress. I received so many compliments on this dress. You will too!

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress for m
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress for my wedding, the fit and length was amazing! I fell in love with it the moment I saw it and the pictures don't do it justice. It's absolutely beautiful!!
wow dress! super pretty

This dress looks beautiful, but it's extremely difficult to put on and remove, and the stiff lace sleeves limit mobility. The side zipper doesn't help. I struggled to pull the dress over my bust and then literally got stuck trying to take it off again you practically have to dislocate your shoulder to pull it up over your head! Finally I managed to wriggle out of it after 20 minutes of sheer panic. I was thinking of ordering a larger size, but finally opted to return for store credit.
love this dress! beautiful golden ivory color and the perfect amount of poof!
Beautiful dress! It was perfect for the weddimg it was worn too! Great lace
This was the perfect dress for my wedding day!!
Sizing runs a bit small

I loved this dress! Very well made and definitely worth the price. I do agree with the other reviews, it's very itchy and the top doesn't lay nicely against my chest. But, overall it was very beautiful. I did decide to return it because it was for a long event. (I wouldn't have been able to stand the itchiness that long)

What an amazing dress.  I chose this for my elopement and I wouldn't change it for the world.  I am a short gal at 5' 2, and I have pretty large breasts, I got a size 14 and the fit around the torso was PERFECT!!!.  Of course the length was long but that was because of ME, nothing to do with the dress.  The quality excelled my expectations,  the lace is beautiful and the tulle underneath gives it even more of a vintage look.  For those worried about the lace across the neck area, its actually two pieces sewn together, so if you're handy its super easy to fix, pull it apart, a few stitches in nude and all done.  It wont look funny or droop at all.  Zero regrets about this purchase, I highly recommend it.

FitList.review_summary: I wore this dress for my
FitList.review_text: I wore this dress for my rehearsal dinner.  It was just beautiful...I love the details and got so many compliments.  Also very flattering for all body types!
Lovely dress, the color wasn't was I expecting and I did feel like it looked good against my skin tone. I'm not sure how it fit because I didn't even try it on. :/

FitList.review_summary: The moment I saw this dre
FitList.review_text: The moment I saw this dress online I was sure it was going to be 'the one' for my wedding sadly it was not :(   It was out of stock, and when it came back I purchased it in a 12, which I couldn't get my arms into, but the body of it seemed like it would have been a good fit. When it came back in stock in all sizes I bought the 14, the sleeves were better but the rest of it was too big. It wasn't meant for me, but it's a gorgeous dress! I didn't think the gold was too costumey, as some have said.

I ordered a 4 after reading reviews and though the dress fit it was EXTREMELY a difficult to take on and take off due to the placement of the zipper. I unfortunately had to return it even though it was a beautiful dress.

Darker in colour than the picture. A slightly more blush colour than the champagne colour shown. Fits very well on an shorter hourglass frame, very flattering for a vintage silhouette. Crumpled/creased a little in the packaging, but the dress is stiff in nature due to the tulle skirt, and had a good travel to get to me (in Australia).

FitList.review_summary: Knowing what I know now I
FitList.review_text: Knowing what I know now I would've ordered a larger size than what was on the size chart. I even went according to my measurements with my trainer I see and it was still way too snug. I couldn't even lift my arms. I even trusted what it said because normally I'm a size 4 or 6 and I had to get a 12 in this dress at the end of all the sizing confusion. It's a hard dress to fit for broad shouldered and big busted girls. But with the size larger and having it taken in it's going to be absolutely perfect. I can't wait to wear it on my wedding day. It is truly a beautiful dress.

Wonderfully made, great material, and perfect fit. I'm a large busted woman so I have trouble squeezing in to a lot of clothes. This was a squeeze in that area but nothing some spanks can't handle. I love the color...champagne gold. I picked some great deep red heals to go with it. Pics to follow once wedding day arrives!

FitList.review_summary: Ok. So I am a girl who is
FitList.review_text: Ok. So I am a girl who is thicker around the middle, I don't have large boobs, and I have always had bigger arms. I am 5'9, size 16 in dresses. I was a bit wary reading others' posts, but I have to say I am really pleased with this dress. I was able to zip the dress with ease (it's a side zip that goes under the arm pit), and the fit is pretty great. My arms don't feel like sausages, either! The material is a bit scratchy, but that doesn't seem like a big problem to me.
Way too much glitter and lace going on. It completely overwhelmed me.

FitList.review_summary: the dress ran a bit small
FitList.review_text: the dress ran a bit small so I got a size larger than I normally would wear and the arms were still a little tight. but I love the dress and can't wait to wear it on my wedding day!

FitList.review_summary: This dress was way too lo
FitList.review_text: This dress was way too long for me. I am 5'4.5 and it just  hit me at an awkward place. It also hit my waist at a very poor place and the material was EXTREMELY itchy. I'm argue chested and the fabric did not sit right on my chest. It was also much more gold in person than in the picture. I was hopeful because of all the great reviews but unfortunately I will not be getting married in this dress.

FitList.review_summary: It was too tight in the c
FitList.review_text: It was too tight in the chest and too big in the body.

FitList.review_summary: This dress was way too lo
FitList.review_text: This dress was way too long for me. I am 5'4.5 and it just  hit me at an awkward place. It also hit my waist at a very poor place and the material was EXTREMELY itchy. I'm argue chested and the fabric did not sit right on my chest. It was also much more gold in person than in the picture. I was hopeful because of all the great reviews but unfortunately I will not be getting married in this dress.

So pretty, girly and swirly! I ordered this for the afterparty of my weddingso a little sparkle was definately appropriate. The other reviews are not off the markthe colour is more of a champagne hue, which anyone eyeing this as a wedding dress should keep in mind. The lace panelling on the front does sort of want to peek up, which a good steaming seemed to settle. And it's a little difficult to get into, as the materials in the bodice doesn't have a lot of give. Once on, I hear what others have said about the itch of the sleeves, but after a few minutes I didn't really notice it. All in all, I'm very happy to wear this dress in the first year of my marriage, per Victorian tradition!

FitList.review_summary: I ordered this dress to w
FitList.review_text: I ordered this dress to wear for my wedding and it is absolutely beautiful, however the color is definitely different than what I thought it would be. In most of the photos it looked like it would be an ivory color with champagne colors and accents in the lace, but when it was delivered I saw it was a darker champagne color with gold accents in the lace, and these colors are perfect for every season and it is still beautiful but not quite what I wanted. Will probably still keep the dress for other special occasions and the rehearsal dinner.Also, other reviewers are correct saying the lace is itchy and a little rough.

The dress is beautiful. The first time I purchased it it was a little but on other bigger side but the return was super easy and I love it. My only complaint is that the sleeves and neckline are a little bit scratchy. That is the only reason I didn't give this dress 5 stars. The size I actually ended up with in this dress is a 22.

FitList.review_summary: I like this dress more th
FitList.review_text: I like this dress more than a lot of the other reviews are indicating. I'm 6'1 and usually about a 20, but I ordered a 24. I'm actually not wearing a bra in these pictures (which is unheard of for my 40DDD endowment), but it still worked. I would have to purchase some sort of undergarment, so imagine a bit more lift. The dress was slightly itchy, but not horrible, and it laid moderately flat across my collarbone. The only issue I saw was the arms were a bit loose and the fit could be altered in some places. A lovely dress, but probably not one I'll use for my wedding.
Beautiful but very itchy. Looks amazing in person and in photos. I received a ton of compliments in this piece.

FitList.review_summary: I too wore this as my wed
FitList.review_text: I too wore this as my wedding dress! I love this dress, I saw it online and knew it was the one. I love modcloth, and I'm so happy I could purchase my wedding dress from a company that has offered beautiful plus sized dresses to women before it was common place. It's so inexpensive for a wedding dress which is perfect because I personally can not justify spending the cost of a plain ticket to our honeymoon destination (or more than that) on a dress I would wear once. That being said, I truly love this dress! I would occasionally see very expensive dresses in the windows of bridal boutiques and think man my dress is so much prettier, and it costs probably 10% of what that dress does! The other reviews are correct, it is a little itchy. I'm VERY sensitive to the texture of clothing, although this dress is itchy, it wasn't the overwhelming kind of itchy.  I ordered a size up from my normal MC size because I thought I could always take it in if I needed to, well I didn't need to since it runs a tad small. I'm happy I read a lot of the other reviews before ordering, they made me aware of the sizing, prepared for the itchiness and excited to see the gold lace. Yay Modcloth! Another winner! I would totally buy this dress in another color so I could wear my wedding dress without having to worry about ruining my original wedding dress or maybe I'll just dye my wedding dress! Thanks for helping me to feel truly gorgeous on my special day!

FitList.review_summary: I liked this dress but ul
FitList.review_text: I liked this dress but ultimately decided to go with another modcloth dress.  In line with other reviews, the dress is very pretty but it's also very itchy.  I was willing to overlook the feel of the dress based on the way it looked on me but I ended up finding something else that's both beautiful and comfortable.  While this didn't end up being a winner for me, I think it's a lovely dress.

FitList.review_summary: I liked this dress but ul
FitList.review_text: I liked this dress but ultimately decided to go with another modcloth dress.  In line with other reviews, the dress is very pretty but it's also very itchy.  I was willing to overlook the feel of the dress based on the way it looked on me but I ended up finding something else that's both beautiful and comfortable.  While this didn't end up being a winner for me, I think it's a lovely dress.

This dress is gorgeous and very wellmade. It is more goldtoned in person. I typically wear a 10, but I sized up and got the 12, which ended up being way too small. I exchanged it for the 14, which was way too big and the lace pattern wouldn't alter well. I didnt have a problem with the lace on the neckline on the 12, but it was too high on the 14 and would not lay flat.

FitList.review_summary: I'm still not sure what t
FitList.review_text: I'm still not sure what to think about this dress.. I'm normally a size 1214 (mostly a 14 on ModCloth) and ordered a size 14. It fits great, the length is perfect, and it is honestly as pretty in real life as it is online. However, the skirt is just too pouffy! I'm planning on wearing this to my small wedding dinner and since I'm curvier, I'm really conscious about getting something that's body flattering. Most of my weight is on my stomach and the pouffy dress just made me look wide from the side. I might want to return it and get the justin  'tough to entre'acte' dress in ivory, since that skirt is not as pouffy. Another option is removing the crinolinelike skirt underneath and seeing how that goes.

I'm extremely upset. And I don't blame modcloth. But I ordered this dress for my backyard wedding. It was perfect. Not to flashy but not to plain. I originally ordered a size 8 but it didn't fit me. I mailed it back about a week ago and never heard anything about exchange or refund so I thought to myself that it would take long to hear something back. So I ordered the same dress and ordered it to come in between 2 to 3 business days. It finally came in and ordered a size 10 this time. Didn't fit. My wedding is in 3 days. And I have no wedding dress. I will be returning this dress as well. I'm not a size 12 I fit into size 8 dresses so beware the sizes on this dress. And it doesn't stretch either.

Absolutely am in love with this dress! Glad I read the reviews it is a full size larger than I typically would buy but the size up is perfect. Love the layers underneath for a full skirt. the lace detail is so pretty.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! It's a
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! It's absolutely perfect for my parade gown for homecoming parade. The neckline fit me just fine, which is a relief considering other customers seemed to have a problem with that. The sleeves are slightly scratchy, of course, but it doesn't bother me at all because I completely expected it. Overall, I'm in love with it and I know it'll help me stand out. The fast shipping was excellent at well.

FitList.review_summary: In love the dress, it's a
FitList.review_text: In love the dress, it's a must have!!

I'm so disappointed this dress didn't work out! I had been eyeing it to wear as my wedding dress this upcoming December and was ecstatic to receive the package. First, it came in a bag instead of a box (like all of my previous purchases), which worried me since it could have potentially been my wedding dress. It has a side zipper instead of a downtheback zipper, which was very tricky since the polyester fabric does not provide any stretch. The sleeves were incredibly scratchy. I'm usually a size 4 in everything but I couldn't get the dress over my head. It looked like it would fit just fine but maybe I have wide shoulders? I feel like if it had a back zipper it would have been fine. I would have liked to exchange for a bigger size but the scratchiness of the sleeves is SO uncomfortable, I won't be ordering another one. =(

This is my wedding dress. I can't wait to wear it, and it's perfect for my vintage themed wedding. Since it's relatively cheap for a wedding dress, and I'm having my wedding in Melbourne, and Melbourne weather is so unpredictable, I'm happy to have it rain and let the dress suffer, although it is so gorgeous. It just means I'm not going to stress over keeping it clean, and it means I can focus on what is important, like my fiance!

Bought this as my wedding dress! The husband loved it and I felt beautiful! It is a pretty champagne color with gold threaded throughout. The skirt is full and the scalloping along the neckline and bottom of the dress is darling. It fit just right! the lace along the top did not lay completely flat, but that didn't bother me. Overall very happy!
Perfect for my backyard wedding!

first off the shipping was super fast. the dress is perfect. perfect fit length and color. its not gold as some would say its the perfect shades of ivory. very delicate. it was itchy a bit up top but nothing that bothered me. this is my wedding dress and I love it!!! its is puffy in the bottom but that's what I wanted. its amazing. I did order up a size like it said too.

This dress looks absolutely beautiful on, and fit great. However, I bought it for my summer wedding and had to send it back because within seconds of putting it on, I began to sweat. It is SO HOT. It would have been great for a fall wedding, but not summer. Also, it's insanely scratchy  the other reviewers weren't kidding. But it really is beautiful,

If you're real short and real busty READ ME. I initially ordered a 14, see my measurements they are accurate. The 14 was too small, sort of in the busy but particularly in the arms and I definitely have arm muscles. I then ordered a 16 with a sort of iffy attitude about the increase in material from the size difference, it was a real fear to be swimming in golden tulle. The 16 camel much later and alas It was too big everywhere in a sense that the sleeves were huge now and the bust was somewhat weight adding imagine  wearing a stiff lace blazer with the shoulder pads slipped down to your breasts. The material, is freaking awesome. The pattern and color and length. If this baby fits your beautiful body then you will absolutely adore it. I wanted it to work badly but It didn't. On a side note:If I could tailor this dress myself I would shrink the neckline immensely and switch the scratchy I'll fitting sleeves with a softer stretchier lace for more versatility in the fit.

The dress fits perfectly, the design is fabulous and it is a beautiful dress.  I am planning on wearing it to my sons wedding.  However,I am disappointed in the quality of the sewing of the dress.  There are threads hanging off of each sleeve and in several other places inside of the dress.  Someone didn't clip the threads.  There is also an area appoximately 1/2 inch in the back where the tulle is not sewn into the waist.  I am going to see if a seamtress here in my town can fix it for me.  Probably no one could see it if you did not know it was there.  I would not have noticed it if I hadn't noticed all of the threads.  If she can fix it for me it is a keeper.  I hate to send it back,  I am afraid the next one I get won't fit or may have more problems or at least like ones.  I did speak to a customer service representive who assured me if I was unable to get it fixed I could return the item.  The wedding is November 1, 2014 So I have time.  The customer service team at Mod cloth is the best ever.  Thanks for being so nice.

Everything about this dress was lovely concerning the actual manufacturing of it. My problems mainly had to do with the fact that it was way too small.  I planned on wearing it as a wedding dress so I made sure my measurements were spot on, ordered according and waited patiently. I'm in Australia so I needed to be certain.  Unfortunately upon arrival, I tried it on  too small. I actually needed assistance getting it off. The lace, although beautiful is rather thick but I'm sure if I would have flexed my shoulders and chest enough while I had it on I would have ripped it.It's also worth noting that the color in the picture appears to be a lovely nude,  it's not. Very gold in some lights, this wouldn't have been a problem for me but perhaps with some it could have potentially been a disaster. It was a shame about the length too, a bit shorter than expected.

Pretty, but the fit wasn't quite right for me and I returned it. The dress had a bit too much poof through the hip area, so it made me look much wider than I really am. Also, the fabric is quite itchy and I could imagine it would be uncomfortable wearing it for long periods of time. I'm really bummed this didn't work as a wedding dress for me because the style is fantastic.
It was a beautiful wedding dress
Scratchy, lace needs to be stretch not stiff.

The color is perfect. It's a champagne gold, not a yellow gold. Length is great. I would like the waist to be a bit longer/more dropped, but still fits well. The quality is really sturdy, in fact it's a bit heavier than I expected. Overall I'm very happy with the dress and excited to wear it to a dear firend's wedding as a bridesmaid.

FitList.review_summary: I will be using this dres
FitList.review_text: I will be using this dress in march 2015 for my wedding! im in love with the dress i went with such a larger size due to the size of my large chest and back end.. my arms also had to play a role in the size i chose as well due to the material not having any give. There are some spots that i could go ahead and get altered in at the moment but i would rather focus on slimming down between now and at least jan/feb before taking in for alterations.. But over all great quality yes the lace is a bit scratchy but nothing that cant be tolerated.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress for m
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress for my wedding reception, and it definitely had some good points. However, it was tight through the shoulders and I felt a little like a frosted cupcake wearing it  which was not quite what I was going for. The quality was very nice and had I been looking while younger I probably would have gone for it!

The dress is stunning!!!  The biggest down fall was the material of the sleeves were so rough and so itchy, it truly felt like sand paper on my arms.  I thought maybe I could get over it but after wearing it for 10 minutes my skin got so itchy that I knew I had to return it :(

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress but eve
FitList.review_text: I love this dress but even though I ordered a size bigger than usual I still need the next size up. My advice is that if you are on a time crunch, orders two sizes up from what you normally wear and you should be set. Mostly it was too tight on my arms where the most delicate fabric is. A 14 should be just right though! I can't wait.
absolutely LOVED it! just a little bit itchy!

This is a beautiful dress. It was a little too short for my torso, so the skirt flared out above my natural waist and made me a little selfconscious about how wide/uncurvy I looked. The lace is beautiful though (very gold colored), and it was a great price for a wedding dress!

This is the most beautiful dress in the entire world. Everything about it is amazing. The golden, detailed lace is perfect for a fall wedding. I can't wait to get married in this. I may be trying it on every day from now until October 25th. :) It is REALLY tight in the arms so I suggest sizing up a bit. I'm usually a 10/12 but I got a 16 to be safe. The sleeves are loose, but the good kind so I can move my arms, and the skirt is perfect. The chest/waist area is super loose but can be easily taken in for cheap. Better bigger than smaller!

Very pretty dress, it fits like a glove, it's not itchy at all, I agree with the reviews here to order a size up, I am usually a 10 but after reading the reviews here decided to order the 12 and I am glad I did :) I am excited to wear it at my wedding :)

FitList.review_summary: I ordered the dress in a
FitList.review_text: I ordered the dress in a 14 which I could tell would fit in my bust and waist but did not fit in the sleeves. I couldn't even get it over my head  not even with the zipper undone. (The zipper is useless, I think, for getting the dress on and off.) I exchanged it for a size 16, and I was swimming in it in the bust and waist. I'm a 36B. However, the sleeves fit. This time, I couldn't get it off. I had to bend forward and inch and wiggle it off. All in all, very frustrating. The dress is very pretty, though. It is a dark ivory with gold embroidered lace. I would have liked it better if it were a lighter ivory, but, still, very pretty. I'm disappointed it didn't work out. I will have spent $12 returning wedding dresses to try on. I've decided to go with a custom made dress from Etsy for the same price and with higher quality fabric. I should also note, I don't ever have size/fit issues. I rarely have to try anything on in stores or online, so this was odd for me.

FitList.review_summary: The dress is cute but MUC
FitList.review_text: The dress is cute but MUCH more glittery in person and the feel of the material is rough. If really girly apparel is your style then I  definitely recommend going up a size, sadly I returned this item but I got in store credit for other purchases so yay!

Size up, ladies! I'm thinking this may be UK sized. I'm typically a size 8, but had to order the 12, as the sleeves were tight and the waist was smallish. Dress is a great color, a light champagne/gold. Classy and demure. Would be beautiful for an outdoor wedding.

Size up, ladies! I'm thinking this may be UK sized. I'm typically a size 8, but had to order the 12, as the sleeves were tight and the waist was smallish. Dress is a great color, a light champagne/gold. Classy and demure. Would be beautiful for an outdoor wedding.

I absolutely love this dress, but it was too gold for what I was wanting it for. I was interested in using it for my wedding, but I was looking for more of an actual ivory or white!I wish I had a reason to wear it though. It's gorgeous!!

FitList.review_summary: I am so happy with this d
FitList.review_text: I am so happy with this dress. I based my size off the measurements in the size chart and the fit is perfect. The lace is a bit itchy, as some have stated, but I only noticed it if I was moving around a lot. I thought the coloring was gorgeous. It is a gold dress but it's a light gold and the lace detailing is the right amount of shimmery. I'm using this dress for my fall wedding and I think the this will be a great dress for the season. I did notice a slight unraveling in one of the lace details but it's a very small patch and barely noticeable. Overall, I'm extremely happy with the dress and I can't wait to wear it in my wedding.

FitList.review_summary: A little tight up top if
FitList.review_text: A little tight up top if you have big boobs, but otherwise a beautiful dress!
I may have purchased this dress as a possible wedding option. It was everything I wanted, but I ordered way too small and had to return it.

FitList.review_summary: This dress is so so so it
FitList.review_text: This dress is so so so itchy!! I could barely keep it on! It was also just okay looking, really puffy and strange fitting. Returned immediately

FitList.review_summary: I order this dress for my
FitList.review_text: I order this dress for my graduation party, I was looking for something different from the other girls with her tight satin finish, rocky dresses and then I found this beautiful dress. This was my first ModCloth order, it took a little while to get home but it was worth it, the quality isn't perfect but at night, in the party, nobody is going to examine anything but how you look in the dress. And I looked good. I got so many compliments about this dress. I'm a big girl so, it has a few complications, it's a little tightfitting so I need help taking it off not to rip it. It's a little hot, too. Anyways, I love it and I would buy it again everytime.

FitList.review_summary: Oh man, the 6 fit me like
FitList.review_text: Oh man, the 6 fit me like it was custommade. (Also tried the 8, which was an inch or so wider in the waist.) That said, the material looked a little too costumey/cheap. It photographs almost white, but much of the dress is actually a champagne/gold, and had an inelegant sheen. Even the sleeves fit great despite providing no stretch (I've got slightly flabby arms so I was surprised they fit nicely), but I had very limited range of motion. Since I was considering this for a wedding dress, I was joking with a friend that I'd have to underhug everyone because I couldn't raise my arms above shoulder height in this; my biggest fear was that it would rip if I did make too sudden of a movement. All told, if it was a more ivory white throughout with slightly more flexible lace, I would've been sold on it.

I was a little skeptical about the reviews on the arms but I should've listened. I could BARELY get it on. It was the most uncomfortable, Illfitting, ugly poof I've ever seen. Whoever designed this dress didn't put it on a human. If you're going to put in a zipper there should be one all the way up the back. The side zipper is USELESS. It's nearly impossible to get your arms into the tight gaudy gold lace up top. I haven't decided if I want to try a bigger size, get this one altered without all of the crap on top (sleeves, neckline), or just say screw it. This was supposed to be for engagement pics next weekend andy rehearsal dinner. At this rate (because none of the dresses fit) I have nothing to wear for pictures.

FitList.review_summary: I'm so in love with this
FitList.review_text: I'm so in love with this dress!!! It's the perfect length and color. The only thing I don't like about it is the itchy neckline, but it's so worth it.
fabric itches like wool.
Though it's huge and kind of itchy, the dress is amazing! I love everything about is especially because I'll be using it for a little something special :) can't wait to alter it and wear it :)

This dress is beautiful! I bought it for my grandparents 50th anniversary party where I will be performing and thought this was a perfect stage dress. There are only 2 complaints. 1) The chest area is cut very small if you are larger chested like myself you will need to go up possibly an extra size. 2) like others have said the neck fits loosely. I am getting this part altered but for the price and since the chest isn't large I didn't expect the neck to be loose. The arms are rather slim but manageable and there we're a few frayed strings hanging from the arm and because it is not a cheap dress I expect more. All in all though none of these grievances are a deal breaker for me. I love the tone and look that this dress gives and when I showed my grandparents they loved it so it's a keeper!

FitList.review_summary: This is a really gold dre
FitList.review_text: This is a really gold dress. It's beautiful, vintage and has a slight rose tint to the slip which gives off this really warm color. The lace is too itchy for my sensitive skin but all the same, it's a very well made dress. The bell of the dress falls at about 3/4 down my legs. I'm planning on wearing it for engagment photos, rehearsal dinner and possibly my getaway dress.***Definitely order up a size!***
It's perfect except for the little detail in the neck which actually is not very serious, and it's more golden than the picture. But definitely this is the dress for my wedding day

FitList.review_summary: The lace on the sleeves o
FitList.review_text: The lace on the sleeves of this dress is very stiff and itchy, and something about the top looks a bit cheap. However, the skirt is lovely and full and soft, and the overall effect of the dress is quite good. I bought this for my wedding and despite some reservations, I think it's a good choice.
absolutely beautiful .. I got so many compliments
Beautiful dress but extremely stiff and itchy fabric. Could not wear it because of this.

FitList.review_summary: I was so excited for this
FitList.review_text: I was so excited for this dress to come in but unfortunately it was not the dress for me. I ordered a size larger than I usually would and because it's a side zipper I ended up getting stuck! It fits very small in the sleeves. The dress is a beautiful ivory with a gold shimmer and is very poofy. I returned my dress because it was not flattering on me....if ordering I would order 2 sizes bigger and be prepared for alterations

FitList.review_summary: I am SO sad this will not
FitList.review_text: I am SO sad this will not be my wedding dress. The look is perfect, but as other reviews say, it's pretty itchy on the lace and my arm movement is restricted by the lace, which has no stretch at all. If it was less itchy and more moveable it would be an easy yes to this dress. I will be returning this dress against my wishes.

FitList.review_summary: This dress is a dream. I
FitList.review_text: This dress is a dream. I fell in love with it the moment I saw it and, although the color is darker (more of a gold than a cream for the lace portions), it is GORGEOUS, love it to death. I have big arms so usually dresses with sleees don't fit me well but this dress has just enough give and surprised me when I didn't rip the (forgivably itchy) sleeves. Can't wait to wear it next weekend!!

FitList.review_summary: I purchased this for my w
FitList.review_text: I purchased this for my wedding day and, wow, it is far more beautiful in person than it could ever be in pictures. It looks glamorous and expensive and vintage in the best way. The fit can really make or break this dress for you. The lace has basically no give, so you have be fairly confident that size you've ordered fits not just your bust, but your arms too. As per other reviews, I ordered a size up, which worked out great. Oh, and along those same lines, because of the nostretch, you'll need someone to help you put the dress on and take it off. I personally run petite, which makes the dress hit me mid calf rather than at the knee (still cute). Be aware that, because of the design of the lace and the placement of the side zipper, it's a tricky dress to get tailored. The bust is so structured, I probably won't even need a bra to wear this dress! It's still the best purchase I've made for my wedding, and I can't wait to get married in modcloth!

I ordered this dress for my wedding. I had already returned three dresses so I was freaking out a little. This dress was out of stock until 3 weeks before the big day. I ordered it and had it in 6 days! I ordered a size up which turned out to fit perfectly. It is a lot more gold than the picture shows but was exactly what I wanted. The neckline doesn't lay flat and is a little itchy so be prepared for that. Once I put this dress on none of that mattered. It fit perfectly, was beautiful and made me actually feel like a bride. The quality is awesome. I adjusted the neckline with a quick stitch and the itchiness goes away. I'm only sad that I can't wear this dress again!!!

I had been searching everywhere for the perfect courthouse wedding dress. I knew the second I saw this one that it was THE ONE. I ordered up 1 size like everyone recommended and it fit almost perfectly. The sleeves were WAY to big and I had to sew them to make it fit. After I sewed it, it fit like a dream. Yes, it's itchy. But its LACE not cashmere. Please don't be silly and expect it to feel like silk. It wasn't bothersome at all. I adore this dress!

I really wanted this dress to work! It was one of the most beautiful dresses I have seen, and reminded me of Classic Grace Kelly. I purposely bought a size 18 because the 16 was sold out. I would have paid for alterations but ultimately did not love how the dress fit. The skirt is very full, and not entirely flattering to bigger hips. The lace sleeves were too loose and the color wasn't especially flattering for a pale complexion. If this would have been for my own wedding, it would have been worth the alterations, but it was just for fun, causing me to return it.

It is a wonderful dress. It fit perfect. It was a bit itchy when you first put it on but nothing that I couldn't get use to. I did have a little problem with snagging it though. All in all I loved this dress and would recommend it to anyone.

I've seen this dress come and go on Modcloth, so I knew I had to get it ASAP once it was back in stock! it's beautiful and I'm so excited to wear it for my wedding next spring. the collar is a little itchy but it's a minor thing.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress for m
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress for my very small wedding and it was PERFECT. It was risky, because it literally showed up the day before, but it fit fabulously. The lace is really itchy, but that's to be expected. Fair warning: If it does fit you like a glove like it did for me, have someone who can help you out of it because it has a side zipper and the lace doesn't give so it's going to be relatively impossible to get out of on your own.
More on the golden side, but beautiful anyways!

FitList.review_summary: I plan to have a Vegas we
FitList.review_text: I plan to have a Vegas wedding and was looking for a dress that wasn't over to top but still feel beautiful. I ordered 2 sizes up and while the fit was fine I feel like the length was just way too long. I am short so I should have assumed that the dress would be long on me. As I looked at it in the mirror the dress just didn't WOW me like I had hoped it would. The lace material most definitely felt scratchy and uncomfortable. This was just not what I had intended. While the dress looked great on other women it just didn't work for me. I will be returning it.
Beautiful dress, but the neckline did not sit well on me and the sleeves were too tight. Sad to return it.
Beautiful dress, but the neckline did not sit well on me and the sleeves were too tight. Sad to return it.
Very pretty detailed material

This dress is truly beautiful.  However, the bust runs small and like the description says, fabric does not provide stretch.  If the bust wasn't smaller than a typical size 12, this would have been rated a full five star.

This dress is absolutely breathtaking. It has quite a few more layers of tulle than I expected, but it looks wonderful. I have no problem with the front laying flat. Although the lace is a little itchy, I got used to it very quickly and I'm honestly so pleased with the dress. It's gorgeous and I can't wait to wear it. I had no problem with sizing, although the bust is a little small. I'd go braless or wear a bandeau something strapless and flattening would help.

This dress is absolutely stunning.The neckline does droop a bit but I plan to have that fixed.And it is a little itchy on top but nothing that I can't deal with.It's so pretty I don't even want to take it off!

FitList.review_summary: Be warned, there is a LOT
FitList.review_text: Be warned, there is a LOT more gold on this dress than you can see in the picture. It is quite sparkly.Also, VERY itchy. There are small remedies for this, but be expecting to have to make some alterations to this dress for it to fulfill your hopes.

Really pretty dress, well made but had to return because the lace that goes over the chest area did not lay flat and the sleeves were too big and loose. I would have needed to have it altered and I needed it for a special occasion that was just days away so there was no time for it.

The dress is definitely more gold than anything. I was very pleased with the shape of the skirt and the quality of the fabric. However, the manufacturers did not redraft the bodice for larger sizes, so the sweet lace detail on the neckline does not match up properly with the sleeves, causing gapping and uneveness. Boo, I really wanted to like this one! :(

I purchased this dress hoping to wear it for my courthouse wedding.  The dress fit me perfectly as per the measurements recommendations.  Did not have a problem with the lace not laying flat against by chest as some reviewers have stated.Unfortunately I had to return it because the material was just too itch for me against me neck and arms, but mostly because even though I knew there was gold in the fabric it was way more prevalent than the ivory which is what I wanted.

This dress. This amazing dress!!!!! I have no words to describe how amazing and beautiful this dress is. Fits perfect. The quality is not cheap! It's just absolutely amazing. If you're hesitating to purchase this dress...STOP and just buy it. You will not be disappointed. So happy!!! I highly recommend this dress!!!!

So this dress looks really lovely on the model. Elegant, and lacy. Problems: The lace is VERY scratchy and rough. The fabric where the neckline is doesn't lay flat on the chest/collarbone (it folds over like a wilted flower). Does not flatter people with not very narrow waists.

FitList.review_summary: I have been trying on so
FitList.review_text: I have been trying on so many wedding dresses, usually $1000+, in so many stores, all of which seem to be made for the tallest people in existence.  When I would ask, Do you have any tea length dresses, I was usually given a quizzical look like, why would you want that?  MODCLOTH TO THE RESCUE.  3/4 length sleeves? Check.  Lace?  Check.  Tea length? Check.  Reasonably priced?  Check.  This dress is perfect in all those aspects.  However, I agree with the other reviewers, it is itchy.  But only when you first put it on, after that, it definitely is pretty comfortable.  My issue is with the sleeves, my swimmer shoulders could definitely use more room.  I also intend to fix the so called neck line won't lie flat issue at my local seamstress.  For the price, alterations really aren't a big deal.  We'll just see if they can do anything to the sleeves to let me be able to raise my arms up all the way...Really, thanks again ModCloth.  You saved me from buying a wildly expensive gown and cutting it in half to fit me.

I bought this dress last minute for my upcoming weddinghad a change of heart about my original dress. Think finding a wedding dress is stressful? Try buying one online a month before the wedding! Procrastination at its finest, and thankfully ModCloth came though on this gem! I was a little skeptical at first because the dress was REALLY hard to get on and was REALLY scratchy, like other reviews said. I ordered up a size and am very glad I did because the top/arms are super hard to get onlike I thought I was going to rip it hard. Once I tried the dress on a couple times it kind of loosened up enough that I can get it on without messing up my hair or makeup. It is scratchy, but it is really not that bad. Overall this dress is beautiful and the detail is amazing. I feel awesome in it!!

I was recently married 5 months ago and went a little more traditional with my wedding dress then I thought I would. Unfortunately our wedding pictures weren't what we expected so my husband and I decided to do a newlywed shoot in our new home together. I immediately knew what I was going to wear. I have loved this dress the moment I saw it and ordered it as soon as it was back in stock. I was apprehensive because of some of the negative reviews, but they were quickly put to shame the moment it arrived and I tried it on. I am usually a size 12 so I did as instructed and ordered up a size, it fit perfectly. It isn't as itchy as some have reviewed and even with my 36 d chest the top panel laid flat as it did in the pictures. It is a little difficult to get on and off as others have stated. But I managed to maneuver it myself without help from my hubby. Overall my favorite Modcloth purchase. Take a chance on this dress! You won't be disappointed :)

FitList.review_summary: I was nervous to buy this
FitList.review_text: I was nervous to buy this dress for my wedding reception because of the complaints listed against it in the comments. But I am happy to say that despite the fact that many of the negative remarks were true, this is definitely the dress!Bad things that were true  The fabric is in fact really scratchy around the arms and shoulders where your skin is directly touching the skin, but this doesn't bother me too much. The lace also really limits the mobility of my arms, and because of this it's a huge pain to take the darn thing off. the zipper was a bit fussy as well. The lace around the neck does drupe forward a bit, but this is an easy fix with a double stitch.Good things  It fit me perfectly. There is enough support in the bust that I will not have to wear a bra (though I am small chested, so keep that in mind). The dress is high quality and is just absolutely gorgeous. It is incredibly flattering. I am excited to be getting #marriedinmodcloth!

This dress is gorgeous, I loved looking at it, just not on me. The skirt is incredible, one of the prettiest things I've ever seen. The top is the issue. What everyone says about the sleeves is true, you feel like you can't raise your arms, and getting it off is a feat. I was afraid I was going to tear it and had to come up with some crazy contortionist maneuvers to get out of it. The material isn't lace, it's a glossy thick tulle, which has no stretch or give to it. The trim around the neckline stands out instead of laying flat and I can see how it could get stretched out and never go back. It's also not very flattering, it's sheer and shows off any sort of back or arm fat.The sizing is true but snug. I think this dress is best for small chested or petite women on top. If you are larger on top I'd recommend going a couple of sizes larger and having it altered.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! I boug
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! I bought it for my junior prom, and it couldn't have been more perfect. I felt beautiful and different. Everyone wanted to know where I got my dress.

FitList.review_summary: Love this dress so much b
FitList.review_text: Love this dress so much but just about had a panic attack trying to get it off. The zipper is on the side which makes for a beautiful seamless look but a huge pain to get off. Make sure you have someone else around to help you out of this dress. I haven't decided if I'm going to keep it or not as I would have to exchange and size up. It was a little small. If you're getting married and are looking for something inexpensive, simple, and elegant  this dress is it!

Searching for a wedding dress on Mod Cloth is quite the challenge and such a fun experience. This dress popped up and after half of day of debating to buy it, my size was already gobbled up. Going one size up, this dress was still all looks but no bite. The material was SO scratchy it just wasn't worth it, and the arms just didn't fit right. Sadly, I had to return.

This is literally the best dress EVER. I ordered a 24 and it seems for plus sizes that its best to size up because the dress is a little tight in the waist, but thats my fault on ordering, the length is perfect and as other reviews said the dress is more cream colored and gold not really white, but I didn't really want a white dress so it works for me. I know in other reviews people said the gold stitching was itchy but to me its perfectly fine... Over all this dress is probably the best thing I've ordered from any online clothing store and don't let the $139 price tag scare you this dress is totally worth ever penny!

Beautiful.Definitely need to have a petite frame. As I am very muscular this just didn't work in the top and arms lol I wanted it to work so badly! I highly recommend it for the quality and the fact that you feel like a princess as soon as you put it on

First of all, this dress is GORGEOUS.  When I put it on I was immediately overcome with nervous excitement about wearing it at my upcoming courthouse wedding.  It is absolutely perfect in every way and it makes me feel like a princess.  I was afraid it would be itchy after reading all the other reviews, because I have very sensitive skin  but it doesn't itch me at all!!  I was afraid I'd have to size up because of what everyone said about the top being super small... I'm normally a 14 (because I have quite a large bust), and only the 16 was available so I ordered it thinking it would be perfect.  But it's actually quite large.  I will be taking it in myself, so it's no problem.  So for me, the top didn't run small.  Although it IS kind of difficult to take off yourself.  It's scary because you think you'll tear the lace in the dress.  I think there should have been a back zipper instead of a side one but then I guess that would ruin the lace illusion neckline at the back.  I think once I take it in, it's definitely going to be even more scary trying to take it off.  But this won't deter my love for the dress.  I'm actually going to tailor the top so that it's REALLY tight because this is the style of dress it is!  It looks better if the top is tight like a corset.  As for the people who think it's too puffy. This is a 50's style gown, why would you purchase such a sillouhette if you don't like puff?  This is the most beautiful dress I've seen.  It's beyond lovely.

I loved the dress online but when I revived it I realized that the whole dress is made of itchy tool. Not lace like I thought. The neckline drooped in front and back. I ultimately had to send the dress back because I wasn't about to wear it to prom.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress to we
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress to wear to my wedding, and I absolutely love it! I actually fell in love with this dress online when they were out of nearly every size, so I bought it in a size 16, even though I wear a size 8. A friend of mine tailored it to fit me, so it fits like a dream. The skirt on this dress is so beautiful, and I love the lace detail on the top. I will say that compared to the rest of the dress, the top was relatively small, especially in the arms. I have larger arms and they never would have fit if I bought it in my size. The top was a little itchy, but not as bad as I expected from all the reviews. I wore it all night without a problem.

I originally ordered this dress for my anniversary. And I've been daydreaming about this dress for awhile now, but alas, to my disappointment.I am so happy that I never have to wear this dress again. I wouldn't wear it if someone paid me to, or if the dress was free.I'm normally a size 2. A true size 2. (I thought it was nice that I didn't have to wear a bra with the dress, but that's hardly a positive in the grand scheme).The quality isn't as good as it shows in the photos. It looks kind of tacky and costumelike in person. The gold and the lace is just... meh. Dress went on nice enough. Zipped up good. Completely awkward fit. I looked like an old Irish bag lady. My skin is really pale, and I don't think the dress did me any favors as it completely washed me out into this nude, ivory, gold puff monster. The lace collar doesn't lay right and bunches up and shifts awkwardly when you move your arms because the whole thing is connected. The bottom of the dress doesn't lay very well. It's uncomfortable around the armholes and near the zipper. It's lined, but IT IS THE SCRATCHIEST thing I have ever put on in my life. I thought I was going to go insane. The greater problem is that I couldn't get out of the dress because of the fit of the sleeves and the collar. It took me a good 30 minutes to remove myself from it. I felt like I was trapped in a scratchy iron maiden. I don't think I could have returned this dress faster.Waste of money. Broke my heart.

FitList.review_summary: I got this dress for my w
FitList.review_text: I got this dress for my wedding, and it couldn't be more perfect; a lot of the issues I read about such as it being super itchy and having a hard time getting it on weren't a problem for me. I am glad that I went up a size, because the fit it is PERFECT on it. It is a lot more gold and poofy than the photo makes you believe, but when I saw the reviews about that, that just made me personally more excited; I originally wasn't even going to wear anything even close to white, so the gold tones to it are great for me. I couldn't be happier with this dress, and I can't wait until my wedding to wear it!
I agree with the reviews in the their comments, I feel so sad to return it :( loved the fabric pattern and the golden thread was just the right color

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress as a
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress as a reception dress to change into for dancing, and I wanted to love it. But it had a very different fit on me than the model.
