I am smaller on top and bigger on the bottom (the dreaded pear!), but the size 6 fit great (my usual size). I didn't have the puckering issue that others had... but the petticoat LAYERS! They were ridiculous. I looked like a cupcake. They had this weird twist in the hem which made them puff out more than they normally would. Also, the lace skirt of the dress was several inches longer than the petticoat fabric. So I found that the skirt would drape outward with the petticoat, but then once the skirt fabric surpassed that of the petticoat, it just fell straight down. Allinall a very strange fit on me. I think perhaps it might work better for someone who is a little smaller on the bottom, as I am already a little self conscious of skirts that puff out too far and accentuate that certain aspect of my bod. Beautiful lace fabric though, and the gold scalloping at the bottom is very pretty.
Very itchy as everyone describes and small is an understatement! The waist fit but I could never get the zipper up! This beauty is going back. And I'm sad as I love this dress!

I ordered this dress the same day it was first made available but as I live in Australia I only just received it today. That means I had no reviews to go on when i ordered it, and was getting more and more worried as more and more reviews came up saying it is not very roomy in the bust. When I finally tried it on to day I was relieved. The waist fit perfectly and comfortably and I was glad I had ordered a size 2 as anything else would've been too big. On top... yes I could've done with a bit more room, but nothing too bad. I think I might take out the padding though as they are not doing much for support and are taking up room that could be better spent on my actual boobs. But I can breathe just fine and they don't look squashed. My only comfort concern is the lace  it's itchy and it's impossible to move your arms up above your shoulders. I don't recommend trying to get out of the dress on your own, I did and I nearly dislocated my shoulder!Overall I am very happy with the dress  it looks great, a bit darker than I thought which is good as it doesn't look too much like a wedding dress and for the price you get a LOT of fabric. I recommend!

I absolutely adore this dress. I do have a few problems though. It is snug in the shoulders; I have larger shoulders and probably should have sized up. Also, I'm rather tall so the waist sits a little higher than it should. This fact is emphasized by the fluffy skirt. So I'm going to take a layer out of the tulle which should help. I still love the dress and will be wearing it at my rehearsal dinner.

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress for m
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress for my upcoming wedding, when I saw it online I was practically jumping for joy because it's everything I wanted for my rustic outdoor farm wedding. When I received it I do have to say I had a mini panic attack. It is a lot more gold than what the picture shows. But after trying it on and looking at it all, it wasn't bad at all. I do have to agree with the other reviews, the neckline is itchy, and it doesn't lay completely flat against you. But with a few very minor alterations it'll be perfect and the itchiness is tolerable. Also, I would typically wear a size smaller, but it was out of stock so I ordered a size up, and clearly it was meant to be because it was the right size, so order up a size. I'd say for this dress it's a great deal! Super excited to wear it on my wedding day!!!

FitList.review_summary: I wish I had read the fir
FitList.review_text: I wish I had read the first comment before buying, as cute as this dress is, it's incredibly itchy!! The metallic swirls however pretty just made me uncomfortable in this dress. It fit great though, and hit right around my knees. Sadly returning this one.

This dress is absolutely to die for. I bought it for my rehearsal dinner and it is SO beautiful. I sized up two sizes after reading the reviews about the arms running small and they absolutely do and I have bigger arms to begin with so I definitely am happy I sized up. Any smaller, I would have not been able to get my arms in. The dress fits my body type great! It such a pretty color as well.Two drawbacks..the material is SO itchy. After having it on for 10 minutes I got used to it but if someone has very sensitive skin, this could be problematic. Also it is NOT easy to get off (remember the arm issue?). The lace sleeves give ZERO stretch so it took help from another person to get me out of the dress so it didn't rip.

I'm usually in between a 14 and 16, but size up to 16 because of my chest. This dress was actually quite large on me, even in the chest. (which doesn't usually happen for me!) The other issue is the arms were not fitted like in the pictures, I feel like the arms were pretty big too. The lace is incredibly itchy and the center of the neckline lace was crawling up on my neck. Very uncomfortable.

FitList.review_summary: I must say this dress is
FitList.review_text: I must say this dress is so amazing.I was so nervous because this was my first purchase on modcloth. The measurements were on point. I could have used a 16 but the dress is comfortable and i have room to around in it.The material is so beautiful and the color is nice. The dress has that extra puff so you don't need to purchase a petticoat.It does not make you look big but rather elegant. This dress is a must!

FitList.review_summary: This dress is lovely in p
FitList.review_text: This dress is lovely in person, definitely worthy of the wedding dress I'm looking for, with a nice justatknee length and just enough underskirt for some flirty poof without being unmanageable.  Unfortunately, the waistline ended up being a bit too high to be flattering on my figure, but I would totally have overlooked that if the lace overlay had been open over the cleavage  the way it was my boobs just looked kind of squished and flat, even though it wasn't too tight.  If the design had lace sleeves and back but an open front, I'd wear it in a heartbeat.

FitList.review_summary: What a lovely dress. I ag
FitList.review_text: What a lovely dress. I agree with others that it is very hard to get in and out of. I had to have help taking it off. And yes, it's itchy and I can't lift my arms. But it's just so beautiful that all that is worth it to me. It fits snug, which I liked because it allowed the built in bra to actually work for me which never ever happens. This dress is perfect for my elopement!

FitList.review_summary: I bought this dress for m
FitList.review_text: I bought this dress for my upcoming elopement, and it is absolutely gorgeous! The dress is more champagne in person with a lovely metallic gold detailing throughout, and the skirt of the dress has the perfect amount of volume. The fit on top is very tight though, it was difficult for me to take the dress off after trying it on! So if you're inbetween sizes or if you are debating between two, definitely order the larger one.

Shopping for my wedding in Vegas has been so hard!I've purchased another dress from Modcloth a few months ago and I thought I hit the jackpot! And then this dress was added. So I did what every nervous bride should do and I bought this one too (but this time I'm leaving the tags on)! The quality of both are wonderful. Although the gold stitching is a bit itchy, but nothing to worry about for me at least. And the skirt is full, and even fuller once it's on my me.My only concern is whether or not it's going to be easy to tailor. I like the 3/4 length sleeves but I want to shorten them. I am going to Vegas after all and it's still warm in October. And the bodice does gap a little.And I agree with another reviewer, the molded cups offer zero support. I despise strapless bras, but will deal with it because I love the dress so much. So overall, it's a great dress with the gold stitching as a unique and fun detail for my Vegas wedding. Now to find some shoes!!

FitList.review_summary: I was so excited to get t
FitList.review_text: I was so excited to get this dress today, but like some of the others, the dress was a bit too snug and the lace was a bit stiff.  I actually would have dealt with the lace if the fit was better.  I know a size up would probably help, but story of my life size 8 is now out of stock. So sad, this dress would have been the perfect wedding reception dress.

I was so heartbroken when this dress didn't end up working for me. I was convinced the moment I saw it online that it was the perfect dress I have been searching for to wear for my upcoming wedding, but alas. It looked awful on me. The biggest problem was the neckline; the mesh and lace isn't form fitting, so it peeled over instead of laying flat against my chest. The bodice area was stiff and restrictive, preventing the comfort of stretching my arms without taking the whole dress with it. And it just made my frame look square and shapeless (as seen in the photos attached). I also noticed that the lace design on the chest was not even on both sides and gave a lopsided appearance.
This dress is so beautiful. I can't wait to wear this for my wedding.

FitList.review_summary: I have been on the hunt f
FitList.review_text: I have been on the hunt for the perfect rehearsal dinner dress and had to snatch this up when I saw it. It's beautiful and the quality definitely justifies the price. The neckline in particular is gorgeous. It would be perfect for a courthouse wedding. It's more sparkly in person and the bodice is shiny. Also, the fabric was itchy when I first tried it on but I got used to it and I don't think it's a deal breaker.I have to agree with the other reviewer who said the top is small. I always have this problem, being busty with a smaller waist. There was room in the waist, but the arms and shoulders are tight. I can't lift my arms all the way up and I had a hard time getting the dress off. I was so afraid it would rip, but it held up. I might order a 6 and see if there's any difference. I have broad shoulders so this is a common problem for me when I buy dresses that don't stretch. Still, a gorgeous, wellmade dress!

FitList.review_summary: I just got this dress. An
FitList.review_text: I just got this dress. And I absolutely love it.  I'm bra 36B and usually wear a size 10 n this was a lil tight on shoulders n chest but I plan on loosing a couple pounds so it's ok. I agree with one of the reviews, the fabric used for the top is very rough. It has patted bra so that's a plus. The skirt is just as shown, PUFFY! Overall this is my fav modcloth purchase so far. It's like that dress I always imagined and wanted!

FitList.review_summary: Complimented every time I wear it
FitList.review_text: Love this dress for the office. Every time I wear it I get compliments on it. My only complaint is that it tends to ride up just a bit when you move, so I have to adjust it all the time.

FitList.review_summary: So Much Potential  Doesn't Fit Right
FitList.review_text: The neckline only sits as it does on the model for about 3 seconds  if you don't move at all, it'll be fine. Otherwise, it flops down into a saggy Vneck ALL THE TIME. Once it sags, it just looks off. Disappointed as I love the fabric and colour.

The fit of the dress is great. And compared to other dresses on ModCloth this dress is made of stretchy materials which is really nice. However, I will be returning it because I do have a little pooch in my stomach and other lumps and this dress is just very unflattering on them. Unless I just don't eat in this dress, I look great. However...I'm not quite sure I want a dress to dictate whether I eat or not. So while this dress is super flattering and super comfy...I will be returning it.
nice material. great pattern

FitList.review_summary: uhhh, I looked like a lib
FitList.review_text: uhhh, I looked like a librarian (no offense to librarians).  I didn't care for the change in fabric nor the neckline with that added material.
great

This dress has the versatility to be a summer or winter dress and can be dressy or casual. It's a fabulous addition to my wardrobe, a nice neutral but still has some visual interest. The cowl neckline is very flattering and the arm holes cover all the important things.
Be careful of Velcro near the skirt.

Cute in theory, but this clung to my waist in a very unflattering way.  Especially with the chevron pattern stretching and distorting around my lower tummy pudge.  The fabric was stretchy and comfortable, though, and would look great on someone with the right body shape.

Very nice! I already had this in Chevron and was pleasantly surprised to see this had the same fabric up top but a more moven fabric for the skirt. It makes it look slightly more professional, which is greatcan't wait to wear this to work.

FitList.review_summary: I get a lot of compliment
FitList.review_text: I get a lot of compliments on this dress! My only critique is that the skirt gets caught on EVERYTHING and snags easily. Otherwise, super cute!
There was something about the position of the waistband in this dress that was just unflattering on me and made me look oddly proportioned. Had to return it, sadly.
Fantastic dress. Great for work.

FitList.review_summary: I love this dress! The to
FitList.review_text: I love this dress! The top is not too low cut.  My only complaint is the delicate material of the skirt...easily snags on rings, so be careful.
This dress just wasn't flattering on me for some reason. Unfortunate, but ModCloth's excellent return policy made this worth trying, and thus far painless to send back.
It's a light, stretchy material. Super comfortable and the design is really flattering. I got three compliments before 9:00. I wore it with a grey blazer and it looked really professional.

FitList.review_summary: I wore this dress to an e
FitList.review_text: I wore this dress to an engagement party and it was great! It's very flattering (I had just had a baby), and it covered things nicely and didn't have to take everything off to nurse! It was pretty light weight, and really comfortable.
My very first modcloth purchase, I love the dress and was complimented by my daughter right away. Despite my height and added weight around the middle this dress works well.
Great buy.  Very flattering.  Not too tight or too loose!
Although I loved the look of this dress, I was very disappointed when I received it. The entire dress is made of a very clingy material that is extremely thin and seethrough. I had to return it.

Great quality and excellent fit. The only (tiny) complaint that I have is that the dress bunches a bit in the back and makes the silhouette less clean which is the only reason it gets four stars. And if you're long waisted, like I am, the waist hits perfectly!

FitList.review_summary: Cute dress. I paired it w
FitList.review_text: Cute dress. I paired it with the Dream of the Crop cardigan to make to workappropriate.
Beautiful dress and I get tons of compliments on it!

FitList.review_summary: I was on the fence about
FitList.review_text: I was on the fence about this dress and admittedly only purchased it because another reviewer said it was flattering. Wow, was she right! This dress hides my belly and extenuates my waist in the best way possible. If it were available in other colors or patterns I would definitely buy another one. It fits great, so flattering, very comfortable, and appropriate for work.It's a nice quality, the skirt is lined, and I like the draped neckline. I paired it with a yellow cardigan and boots it looks great. Very pleased with this purchase.
Comfy and cute
Perfect fit and several people asked me if I'd lost weight! The waist detail really looks lovely.

FitList.review_summary: It's a cute style but onc
FitList.review_text: It's a cute style but once I put it on I just wasn't a fan. I didn't really care for the top as it fell a little weird on me. The skirt seemed like it would fray easily too.
Great dress for work and never needs ironing

It's a lighter dress, no skirt lining, but the top is thick enough and it's workappropriate. With a cardigan it works (for me) for winter wear as well as spring / summer. I wish it had pockets, but I understand how pockets wouldn't work based on the skirt style though. I just wish all dresses and pants have pockets :)
Love it. Adorable. And it looks cute with my heels I bought. Mew and me
I really loved this dress more than I expected to. The material is thicker than I expected and it stretches in a way that?s very flattering. It?s easy to dress up or down for different occasions.
This dress is lovely. It has a flattering shape, modest but flirty length and feels highquality with some weight to it. It's an excellent basic with some personality!

FitList.review_summary: I'm 5'4 and when I put th
FitList.review_text: I'm 5'4 and when I put this on it seriously hit me mid shin. I felt like an 80 year old in it, my fiance thought it was hilarious hahha. but, modcloth was great and I got all my money back!
Great classy dress, love the low neckline. Fit around the waist was a little large but otherwise it's a wonderful dress.
Great LBD! Bought it for a bachelorette party, fit is good & is the right mix of fun & flirty

I needed to replace a little black dress and I've been looking for the right one for a while  I finally found it! The neckline is super flattering and I love the V in the back. The top is fitted and the material has some stretch. The skirt flares nicely. The material is thick and feels sturdy, which I like! I bought a small so that the top would fit, but was very pleased that the skirt was long enough, which is often an issue because I have a long torso. Overall I'm really pleased with the dress!

I bought this to bring on our honeymoon in Europe this summer. It will be the perfect dress to throw on with dressy sandals for some of our nicer nights out. The cut is very flattering, and the material has a good amount of stretch. I'm usually a size 12, and the large fits me great.

I bought this dress hoping I might be able to wear it to work, but I think it will be a casual/goingout only dress due to the length. I am 5'8'' and 125 lbs and got a small. It fits beautifully, but is probably one or two inches shorter than I would be comfortable wearing in a professional setting. I thought about getting a medium to get the longer length, but I'm not sure it would be worth it to do so. Still, it's very cute and has a nice weight to it, and the skirt has the perfect amount of twirl to it. I'd recommend, especially to a shorter individual!

FitList.review_summary: Oh, this dress made me so
FitList.review_text: Oh, this dress made me so sad. The fit is fine (I bought a 1X), everyone else saying the fabric is suuuper stretchy, confortable, and forgiving is right. I have a large bust and short torso, but it hit my natural waistline perfectly. I was concerned when people said it was mega long, but thought that I'd be able to handle it (I'm 6') and that it would still be a cute, flirty length on me. NOPE. This dress is knee length even on my long legs and ultraconservative. Perfect for if you need a dress for a board meeting, or funeral, or visit to your local nunnery, but LBD material this frock is not. The fit and quality are great though, and if you need a lowkey weartotheoffice dress or a basicbutcouldstillbedressedupwiththerightaccessories formal dress, this would be perfect for you!
